Then I suddenly noticed the silence and turned around to see her entering the class.  I do not know till today if she actually saw what I had been doing or she had completely ignored it.  Through  out that lecture I died of shame.  All the more shameful was the fact that she gave me a character certificate. "

label: joy
text: When I fell crazily in love with a beautiful girl and she returned my love.

label: joy
text: When I met my girlfriend - I had not counted on that.

label: guilt
text: "The death of my father made me feel quite guilty, because my attitude towards him had been cold and indifferent."

label: joy
text: It was in 1983 September when MCE results were being announced on the radio. When I heard my name that I had done well I just kept quiet. I was so happy that I couldn't even talk.

label: joy
text: I preached to a F.3 students in a gospel camp.  They thus knew more about God and made up their minds to believe in Jesus.

label: shame
text: When my sister became pregnant at UNZA last year.

label: fear
text: I have done the teachers training course (B.Ed).  During our training I was asked to handle the ninth standard class in a boys school.  I was scared to face the class the first day.

label: joy
text: "When I was back home after a long time, meeting beloved people and close friends."

label: anger
text: "Boyfriend ""chatting up"" another girl."

label: anger
text: I had just seen my pseudo-girlfriend and our conversation angered me greatly.

label: shame
text: Some time ago I promised to meet an acquaintance of mine and to carry him some promised papers. I haven't done it until this day. Now I feel quite awkward when I meet him.

label: anger
text: Unjust punishment of a friend of mine.

label: guilt
text: My girlfriend's results in school had become worse because I prevented her from learning (we often went out etc.).

label: fear
text: "One day, early morning my mother who is healthy fell ill.  There was no doctor or compounder near by and for a few hours -8 A.M to 6 P.M she did not speak a single sentence, nor did she drink water or  milk.  There was no movement in her body and I felt really scared.  I almost lost my confidence about her survival."

label: disgust
text: When my oldest sister discovered that her boyfriend had another girl.

label: fear
text: "A late Saturday night I found myself locked in the central underground station of Stockholm with a group of 50 hard rockers who were drunk and equipped with various kinds of chains, etc."

label: joy
text: "When Christmas holiday started, I felt very joyful when I finished my last exam."

label: anger
text: "It was at Malawi Army, Dormer Squadron, when some of my workmates got promoted to Seargents (sgts); we were having similar Ranks."

label: sadness
text: "Once my friend and I got into into a hot discussion on a very controversial topic.  At one point of the argument I disagreed with her totally and I took what she was saying as an insult.  So I couter-argued and unknowingly hurt her emotionally, I felt very sad about this."

label: sadness
text: "One of my class-mates had a disease unexpectedly, he had been in a coma for six days in a hospital before he died."

label: disgust
text: When a boy put a handful of cooked potatoes down my dress and there was no water to clean up.

label: anger
text: My younger brother and I had been fighting over the TV/Video. He kept on turning it on and off every 2 seconds and was not listening to my authority and was being cheeky. We fought and I ended up in tears - he'd won.

label: fear
text: "I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very romantic. Suddenly I heard a car driving very slowly with the lights out, it looked as if they were looking for something."

label: joy
text: After a weekend at a seminar I saw my husband again. I hurried home hoping he would be there. We embraced - I enjoyed feeling his body.

label: guilt
text: A good friend of mine who is at the moment in a foreign country. I didn't write her for several months and now I feel guilty.

label: guilt
text: "When I was 17, I told Mum I came in at midnight, when really it was 3.30."

label: shame
text: "I criticised an action of my mother and for the first time she genuinely took notice of it. I felt shame that I was almost taking the part of a husband, or at least an equal which I should not."

label: fear
text: "When I had to give a speech about some historical event, to an audiece of about 200 people my own age whom I did not know."

label: guilt
text: I broke the gutar of a colleague but as it happened in a moment when nobody was present I could escape from the guilt.

label: shame
text: My son was apprehended for shoplifting at the age of 14. Because I too had been apprehended at the same age I felt the shame of not having been able to prevent my son from acting in the same way.

label: joy
text: I passed an exam which I was not sure at all to pass.  I rejoyced at the result because the possibility of continuing my studies depended on it.

label: fear
text: On a holiday in France I made a walk in the woods all alone and very relaxed. Then a motorbike took me over and I saw the man watching all the time. Suddenly the man stood behing me and I ran away fast.

label: joy
text: "When my uncle gave me my first year's results.  I opened the envelope and my eyes ran into two ""B+"" - in EC110 and M160, this meant that I had qualified for a major in economics."

label: disgust
text: Viewing the results of senseless vandalism to a local primary school.

label: anger
text: "One night we, all the family members, were sitting in the front corridor of the house when a gentleman looking person came in.  He was my father's client and he had come to bribe my father in connection with the proceeding case.  At my father's refusal he abused my father, my brother and I could not control our temper and we rushed at him."

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine is having psychiatric problems because of his mother's death ages ago. He is really quiet and because it relates back to his childhood I feel sadness for him. He doesn't lead a normal life and it just seems unfair.

label: anger
text: At home when they lost three pieces of my puzzle.

label: joy
text: Finding out I was chosen for the English lectures.

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my father had passed away.

label: disgust
text: People who discriminate other people disgust me.

label: fear
text: "When somebody broke into our home one night when my mother was out, and my sister and I had just gone to bed."

label: sadness
text: Years ago on Christmas Eve I felt very sad because I realized for the first time how I missed my father who had died at Christmas Years ago.

label: anger
text: A girl I was with went off with another guy.

label: joy
text: I was happy to hear that my sister had won a prize at running competition.

label: anger
text: When I learned that several people had died in the street due to  the cold weather.

label: disgust
text: "My classmate at TISS has the habit of biting his nails and ever since my childhood I have never liked this habit.  This person is near me in class, dining hall and the campus so I suggested that he should stop biting his nails.  However he found it difficult and my disgust feelings have not changed."

label: fear
text: When my friend was involved in a car accident.

label: fear
text: I helped someone to do something and was found out.

label: fear
text: Staying alone in the dark.

label: shame
text: "Having finally to admit I was wrong, after having denied it for a long time."

label: anger
text: In certain occasion I have a fight with my boyfriend. During the fight I closed the door at his face. He went away but came back next day.

label: joy
text: A night spent with a group of friends.

label: shame
text: "When I was young I was playing football near my parent's house and while playing I fell on the ground. At first I thought I was not seen by anybody, but when my mother laughed I felt very ashamed."

label: disgust
text: When I saw a documentary film about World War II (about Hitler and his adepts).

label: anger
text: When our government decided to withdraw student allowances as it was one of the conditions imposed by the IMF.

label: sadness
text: "When I learnt that I had to repeat the first year, I found the solution immediately but was blocked by many difficulties."

label: sadness
text: I remember being sad whe my aunt's child died (2 days old).

label: guilt
text: When I was reproved eighth grade of high school.

label: fear
text: "I lived in a student-house, where you shared the lavatory and shower with a fellow student. the shower cubicle formed the connection between both appartments. My neighbour very often was drunk and aggressive. One night, I was afraid that he would enter my room."

label: shame
text: "When I got my fingers stuck in one of the side holes of the door, in the tube."

label: shame
text: Had a very good friend. We grew apart I found myself running her down to other friends.

label: guilt
text: "When they found out that I was absent from school, I had gone to the girl's secondary school."

label: disgust
text: "I broke an egg, with which there was something wrong, into a little cup. There was a thick white ""wad"" in it. I tried to take it out and throw it in the sink."

label: guilt
text: Not handing in homeworks in time.

label: anger
text: "While playing a ball game, I was just about to make a goal when I was thrown off my feet, and I failed to score the goal."

label: shame
text: When I failed some tests my first year at CAL.

label: disgust
text: The serving lady in the students' dining hall shouting at studennts.

label: anger
text: There is a mad boy in our village. This boy hit me with a raw paw-paw in the face.

label: anger
text: When my sister lost my favourite jumper at a party and failed to tell me for several days after it happened.

label: shame
text: "My love and me rented a room in a hotel one evening.  We stayed there a few hours and when leaving the hotel, I felt ashamed."

label: anger
text: I was angry when my abilities of a singer were underestimated.

label: guilt
text: Yesterday my boyfriend and I wanted to play billiards. However there were boys playing (5 times). My boyfriend then is fed up and chagrined. In such case I think it is my fault.

label: shame
text: Finding out about Chinese money cannot buy foreign journals.

label: fear
text: Left alone in dark when young.

label: fear
text: "I was spending my summer holidays in a village.  My friend and I were coming back from a discotheque at night and we heard a noise from an alley.  We were very scared and we got into my friend's house.  A moment later, an unknown car picked up a person from this alley."

label: disgust
text: When I stand at the bus stop for one hour waiting for the bus to arrive.

label: sadness
text: When I failed an exam last Summer.  I had worked very hard for it and I was very disappointed thinking that it was hopeless to continue at college.  I did overreact.

label: fear
text: "Being sexually assaulted (not rape, but passionate kissing) by a friend's father - he stopped when he was driving me home. I hadn't wanted the lift, had refused 3 times, and then felt it'd be rude to refuse again. Was really afraid of what he might do."

label: joy
text: "In the underground's escalator, a youngish bum asked me for money.  Although I did not give him anything, the fellow told me that I was really good-looking.  A man who was in front of me also turned to look at me."

label: sadness
text: "The funeral of a friend who was killed in a car accident. She was of my own age, there were many of my own friends present, as well as her family etc."

label: joy
text: While watching an entertainment program in which there was a clever  and amusing sketch.

label: sadness
text: "A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car accident."

label: anger
text: A friend of mine told other people that I was a slattern (because of an occurence that had happened some time ago). When I heard about that I was very angry.

label: shame
text: "When given responsibility to grade papers in elementary school, I cheated a little and graded my own higher."

label: joy
text: I bought a Christmas present for my girl-friend. On my way home I was really glad about having found such a suitable thing.

label: joy
text: "My first feeling of falling in love.  Coming across a person who made me feel love, happiness, joy, giving me a new and beautiful future, who made me dream."

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I lied to my parents.

label: guilt
text: My father caught me having sexual intercourse with my closest cousin.  There was nothing wrong with it but the female was too old for me.

label: joy
text: When I received the acceptance letter from UNZA.  I had just come home from work when my kind sister handed me an enveloppe which I opened and was overcome with joy.

label: guilt
text: When I committed the sin of immorality mentioned before.

label: shame
text: "Some persons, who are important for me, came to see me and I had not washed the dishes."

label: shame
text: "Exaggerating certain circumstances, wrong attitude and evaluation of these circumstances."

label: anger
text: When my girlfriend of two years told me it was all over.

label: shame
text: My love proposal was turned down by a lady I really loved.

label: fear
text: The only event I can remember is having a nightmare when I was very young (3 years old) I dreamt about a machine which was going to crush me.

label: sadness
text: "Discovering that Lillehammer provided no musical environment that suits my taste, even though I had been told so."

label: disgust
text: When in my childhood we were forced to take cod-liver oil.

label: shame
text: Did not finish homework.

label: shame
text: Acting in a play at the orientation camp made me feel timid.

label: disgust
text: "A gathering of a social sports club at which they proceeded to show pornographic videos and then afterwards (when most people had had quite a bit to drink) carried on in a very degrading, unmoral manner - especially females exposing and flaunting themselves with no shame or embarassment."

label: shame
text: We where in a bar and my friend had a fight with some guys who were in the table aside.

label: joy
text: "In August,1983, the long awaited ""big envelope"" (a document for C.U.H.K admission) arrived.  It was in the afternoon and I had not been doing anything.  When the postman, with his big bag, knocked on the door I knew what it was about.  I hurriedly opened the envelope and my mood at that time is hard to describe.  It lasted several hours and only calmed down later."

label: fear
text: "When in a car accident where car was total wipe off (wipe out, or write off)."

label: disgust
text: A mother who shouts at her child for nothing.

label: guilt
text: "I was out with a friend in a place where it was very, very busy. When we wanted to go I bumped a person, who dropped his glass beer I offered a new one but he didn't accept it."

label: shame
text: When I fell head on in a fountain.

label: anger
text: "My anger is with men, their inability to be human (not all men)."

label: anger
text: It was when I discovered that my boyfriend had another girl. I discovered it through a letter he wrote to the girl when he was away. When I asked him he accepted it.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had passed my final examination at school (with success).

label: shame
text: Failed to recagnize a friend on the street.

label: guilt
text: "I experience a sense of guilt as my middle son cannot express himself like other children, neither verbally nor in writing."

label: anger
text: "When my father asked me if I was a communist, at the same time he made it clear that I should no longer see myself as his daughter."

label: guilt
text: "When it was discovered that I had done the assignment at my work place, this caused a lot of embarrassment for me."

label: joy
text: Some time ago I was present at the wedding party of two close friends of mine.

label: fear
text: "My brother and I were driving to Brisbane when he drove back onto the road, perhaps cutting off another car but not noticeable - this driver did his best to drive us off the road for about 1/2 an hour."

label: guilt
text: When I shouted and quarrelled and for no reason I had been rude to my mother and when my behaviour had been influenced by other outward factors.

label: sadness
text: My cut was run over by a car. After searching for a long time I found her lying in a kerb. I was rather shocked and angry with the driver.

label: disgust
text: Saw a mate bribing the leader.

label: guilt
text: I rejected a person whom I had always thought to be a friend.  I told him so and he reacted angrily.  I felt guilty at not having realized it before and at having hurt him.

label: sadness
text: Love problems.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had got the best result in school and would be definately selected to the university of Zambia.

label: guilt
text: I was to inform the neighbour on my left that a robber had been spotted the same evening near the house of the neighbour in front.  I did not do it and the same day the thieves broke into this neighbour's house.

label: joy
text: When I married my wife and took her home for the first time.

label: guilt
text: When at times unconscienciously I speak to my mother in a high tome but after that I am sorry and I feel guilty.

label: joy
text: When they told me that I had got a study grant.

label: disgust
text: "When a begggar approached me for money, I felt disgusted."

label: sadness
text: "When my grandmother died - I wasn't sad so much that she'd died because she was old, but because she lived in the last few years in an old people's home and had nothing very much that was hers - no chair, or private space, and when I went to visit she would be sitting in the ""lliving"" room the TV room. It was hopeless. And I felt awkward so I didn't go and I was sad 'cos how I couldn't."

label: guilt
text: I prayed unfaithfully.

label: anger
text: I am separated from my husband.  The way he has behaved towards me makes me angry.

label: guilt
text: When I copy someone else's problem set.

label: joy
text: "When I heard that a close relative of mine had given birth at a very young age, in a very remote area and had had very few problems."

label: disgust
text: "Many times, when my father used to come home drunk and maltreated physically me and my mother."

label: joy
text: I was told that I had passed the statistics exam.  I had not expected this so I was very happy.

label: fear
text: When I was walking on a fairly out-of-the-way street.

label: shame
text: The shame came when I was beaten by my teacher at school in front of boys and girls some of whom were my friends and a girlfriend apart from being classmates.

label: sadness
text: "I had to leave Den Helder and all friends and acquaintences, after having spend two weeks there with my friends."

label: shame
text: I drink wine too often.

label: fear
text: "Attempted rape by 5 guys - held my arms behind my back and molested me, constantly threatening to beat me. Penetration did not occur as the driver of the car stopped that."

label: fear
text: I was afraid when my boyfriend came home because my parents disapproved him of his coming home. I thought they would chase me out of the house.

label: anger
text: When someone chased me from his house.

label: sadness
text: Our dog had to be shot because he had killed a roe. I liked him very much and so I could not resign myself to that. I hated the hunter who shot him.

label: joy
text: When I won the first prize in a cross country race.

label: guilt
text: I always feel guilty when I see my mother sad or fed up with life. I really dont know the reason.

label: disgust
text: "When I saw a picture, in the Gothenburg Post, of a totally demolished car with two fatally injured passengers.  The car was so badly damaged that they couldn't get the bodies out at the scene of the accident."

label: anger
text: When I told off a computer teacher who did not want to teach me beacause of prejudice.

label: joy
text: I fell over head and ears in love with someone who appeared to be in love with me. it made me so happy that I could hardly sleep and eat for one week.

label: joy
text: "When after 10 months of national service I was ""downgraded"" and did not have to do the remaining 5 months."

label: sadness
text: My grandfather died thirteen years ago.

label: disgust
text: I read a book about torture. The book described exactly how the torturing was done.

label: sadness
text: Death of a relative.

label: shame
text: When I do something unworthy.

label: fear
text: When I was to sit for my first entrance exam. I had fear of a possible failure.

label: sadness
text: "When I was 9 years old, I got a cat, but after 3 days he died. I was very sad, because I had nursed him and taken him to the veterinary's - but in vain. Although I had had him only for a short time I had liked him very much."

label: disgust
text: When I went in a clinical hospital and saw in what conditions people are attended there.

label: anger
text: A friend of mine promised to come with me to the cinema but he didn't come.

label: sadness
text: When I went to see the result of an exam and saw that I had failed.

label: joy
text: "Found out that the girl I love loves me, too."

label: disgust
text: Girls dressed like foreigners in the university.

label: sadness
text: After the fact that made me ashamed I felt sadness.

label: shame
text: After making a joke about a friend's marriage that was too personal.

label: sadness
text: Breaking up with a girl.

label: fear
text: When two hyenas made crying noise on the window of my bedroom at home when I was preparing for my MCE examination during the night.

label: anger
text: My intimate girlfriend told me that her father was opposed to our relationship  and had insulted my integrity.

label: shame
text: "When I was 15 my mother discovered various items in my room which 15 year olds aren't usually expected to have - mainly alcohol, marijuana and contraceptives !"

label: disgust
text: I came across a woman in town who was very drunk.  She was swearing at everyone and carried on drinking even though she could hardly stand.

label: disgust
text: "Last week a former school (secondary) mate of mine, who is now in a differentt school came to my room here at UNZA in my absence.  He was drunk and he vomited in my room.  I was unhappy."

label: anger
text: When I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without any apparent reason.

label: guilt
text: "A very close friend of mine invited me to spend the holidays with him.  He was very kind, good and understanding.  However it turned out that he had two of his cousins at his place.  He, however gave me everything I needed - even transport money."

label: joy
text: When I entered at the University.

label: joy
text: When I passed the driving test three weeks ago and got my licence.

label: joy
text: "A fellow player, quite unexpectedly, scores a goal, which means a draw."

label: joy
text: When the lady who is now my wife accepted my proposal to be my lover and future wife.

label: joy
text: "Talkiing about the past happy hours with two friends at night in a camp a few months ago.  We shared our feelings, notions and every hidden anxiety.  I thought that they cared for me and I was very happy and satified."

label: fear
text: "That day I was alone at home after coming home from school.  I did not know where everyone else had gone, I kept waiting for them to come back and nobody came.  It was getting very late and I was terrified."

label: disgust
text: On my way to a concert I went with a man who tried to molest me. At that moment I did not care much but now the impression fills me with disgust.

label: fear
text: "A man was yelling outside my window at 3.00 am, yelling threats, though not to me."

label: anger
text: I feel anger when somebody forbids me to do something.

label: anger
text: Someone who was speeding was forced to slow down when I pulled out onto the road and proceeded to abuse me at the next set of traffic lights.

label: anger
text: "I always get angry when somebody deceives me, or tries to conceal his lie skilfully and this offends me even more."

label: sadness
text: I felt sadness when I remembered my former boyfriend with whom I got separated an year ago and when comparing him with my present one with whom things are not much of a success.

label: sadness
text: Death of General Ye Jianying.

label: fear
text: Was nearly knocked down by a car.

label: shame
text: I fell down in the bus when it braked suddenly and everybody started looking at me.

label: disgust
text: "In a warm bus full of people, someone vomited and the whole bus stank."

label: anger
text: I was watching TV with a friend. After the first film I wanted to watch another film on the same channel. My friend switched over to the other cannel without asking me what I wanted.

label: shame
text: "A serious drug error while nursing that I knew I was responsible for (patient lived, no complications fortunately)."

label: anger
text: A new gas connection was to be installed and the mechanic who came to do it was very rude to my mother and me.  I rushed to thhe dealer with my mother and had a fight with the dealer as he seemed to be unreasonable and was taking the mechanic's side.  Ultimately the matter was resolved after my father went and spoke to him.  The mechanic was asked to apologize.

label: guilt
text: "One day my mother forced me to eat more and I refused, the next day she served me more rice and mutton pieces than usual.  When I saw this I got very angry and scolded her, and refused to eat.  Later I felt guilty and asked her to excuse me."

label: anger
text: With the girl whom I may be loved truly. When she refused to come with me to an occasion (she was from another town).

label: joy
text: When I met a good friend after a long time. We had had a quarrel but after two weeks I was really glad to see him again.

label: disgust
text: When reading a newspaper story of a man who had committed incestuous acts on his two-year old child - the thought that anyone could do such a thing is abhorrent to me.

label: joy
text: "When I was with the girl I love very much, for the graduatiion ball."

label: anger
text: One of my first boyfriends got mad at me because a lot of my close friends were guys and he didn't want me to see them anymore because he was jealous.

label: sadness
text: A case of unrequited love.

label: disgust
text: I saw a physically handicapped young man whose spittle ran out of his mouth while speaking.

label: sadness
text: I felt sad when I heard that my cousin had passed away just suddenly.

label: disgust
text: After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself and saw how terrible everything looked like. I disgusted myself and everything I saw.

label: joy
text: "When I passed standard 8 exams I jumped, rolled over the ground."

label: shame
text: When I talked maliciously about a colleague at work to someone else.  Immediately afterwards I felt ashamed.

label: anger
text: It was in March 1985 when one of my fellow students borrowed my wristwatch and after sometime he broke a glass of that watch I got angry when he was telling me but the anger didn't take long to fade.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I was robbed of a friend's radio at Lilongwe bus depot after promising that I would keep it safe.

label: guilt
text: Leaving a friend of mine alone at a dance - I felt I should have kept her company.

label: fear
text: When I went out with my dog in a forest late at night when we were on a camping.

label: fear
text: "During the last academic year i.e 1983/1984 just before the closure, we were surrounded and threatened by the paramilitary forces."

label: guilt
text: In September 1984 I got two girls pregnant and the families of both the girls confronted me .  The fact was that my parents were around and I felt guilty answering some of the questions.

label: fear
text: "The shooting started and we all lay down to protect ourselves from the flying bullets.  This incident occured on our way to Feira, during the Zambia army patrols in the Rhodesia war."

label: disgust
text: I read a story in the newspaper about butchers treating their animals very badly. They disgusted me.

label: anger
text: "When I heard on the radio that the football match in Belgium had ended in a catastrophe, and several people had died.  I could not  understand how normal people could behave in such a way."

label: fear
text: I bet that I would jump down from a window. I was sure that I would jump but before I did it I rather felt fear.

label: guilt
text: When I hurt my parents in one way or another.

label: disgust
text: I went to spend a night with a relative of mine and there I found that the bed had been wet the previous night.

label: joy
text: When I was making music together with my friend. It sounded very good and we were very satisfied.

label: shame
text: When a certain girl I believed to be my life partner refused an engagement.

label: joy
text: I received a letter from a distant friend.

label: anger
text: My mother read a letter that a friend of mine had written to me telling me how she had got drunk the last time.

label: disgust
text: When I happen to witness some sadistic acts.

label: disgust
text: We had gone to our native village and I went to visit a tribal group which believes in Goddess Kali.  As it was a festival day they had to offer a hen to the Goddess so they cut the head off a hen right in front of my eyes.  I felt disgusted and evenb gave up eating meat after this incident.

label: sadness
text: "Last academic year I received bad news - my grand-uncle had passed away.  I felt lonely and bad because apart from the         biological ties, he was a good old friend of mine at home."

label: disgust
text: Class leader told me to collect homework for him.

label: joy
text: Finally being asked by someone to a banquet.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed at myself for having shouted at my daughter because of my marital break-up and the unfair way I was treated.

label: disgust
text: A colleague of mine asked a lecturer to put him a higher mark in order to keep his good mards and thus to continue getting a scholarship for an excellent grade.

label: shame
text: "I told evil lies about a close friend of mine.  I was evil in order to sound jolly, to charm a person whom I wanted to impress.  I sold my friend, I was despicable."

label: sadness
text: "My boyfriend finished our relationship when I started studying psychology in Nijegen, because then we would not be able to meet frequently anymore."

label: disgust
text: "I was listening to a priest in church saying how sinful man was, and how all men should renounce their desires and pleasures to please God. I could never understand how something that brings you joy could be a sin."

label: disgust
text: When I nearly walked on a blindworm and then saw it crawl away.

label: anger
text: The patient whom I expected to get well suddenly passed away after he showed had his meals.

label: sadness
text: "One night a very dear person said: ""I hate you"". Of course it was an impulse and this person didn't feel that about me. The person expressed regret, and everything was settled, but I can't forget."

label: fear
text: My roommate refused to walk with me to the English lectures. I have to walk alone in the dark. Lectures are in the biology building.

label: sadness
text: When I am alone and listen to a song which I like very much and which I had listened before together with friends.

label: sadness
text: My brother in law was dying of cancer. To see him wasting away was very sad.

label: fear
text: When I and the person mentioned above had a suspicion of pregnancy.

label: fear
text: "My mother had fallen down from a ladder when she had been gathering cherries. Her back was hurt. Just when I arrived, I saw people of the life-saving service giving her medical care."

label: shame
text: At a carneval-party I smooched with a man - some days later I was rather ashamed for that.

label: fear
text: When I climbed up a tree to pick apples.  The angle of the ladder I was on did not enable me to get high enough.  This implied that the ladder was not very stable.

label: guilt
text: A person I was attracted to walked me home in the rain and got sick.

label: fear
text: I had to call someone and make an appointment for a conversation. I was very afraid to fail.

label: shame
text: When I tripped while getting on a bus.

label: anger
text: "Recently when my sister, who is four years younger than me and very spoiled, shouted at my mother for no apparent reason .  The heart-broken expression on my mother's face made me feel very angry."

label: fear
text: I was afraid that I would fail an examination.

label: shame
text: The same for guilt would apply.

label: sadness
text: When I went to see the dead body of my uncle.  This was a very dramatic expreience as it was the first time that I entered a mortuary.

label: sadness
text: "I tried to talk to my parents over the phone, as I wanted to go home for the week-end and I knew that I would not be able to bear it.  I tried to reduce the gulf and the conflict between us by talking in order to unite our worlds.  Result : hysterical mess, blinding and blaming."

label: guilt
text: When my husband discovered I was having an affair with another man.

label: disgust
text: I saw a friend's husband with another woman.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a lot of rubbish and animal waste on the floor.

label: anger
text: """ I have been hearing rumours that you have not been allowing people in your room,"" he said.  This sentence really shot my heart.  I failed to find the right words, instead I walked away without uttering a word."

label: guilt
text: Could not buy a reference book because I got up too late to cue.

label: shame
text: Saw something stupid and ignorant happening in the countryside.

label: guilt
text: Did not read reference when other people read them.

label: guilt
text: "When my mother returned from a holiday, I told her a lie i.e my father had brought another woman home while she was away."

label: guilt
text: Not acting on my promise.

label: fear
text: When I was reprimanded by the manager of the hotel where I worked during Autumn 1984.

label: joy
text: "When I succeeded in achieving a scholarship for which I had strived hard during a period of financial, personal and physical stress."

label: disgust
text: "When I heard about the way a parent of a friend had mistreated him, and caused a great instability."

label: joy
text: I felt joy when my boyfriend proposed to me in marriage.

label: guilt
text: "I felt guilty when I ""stole"" the boyfriend of a friend of mine."

label: shame
text: When my cousin's wife refused him sex and claimed that she was my girllfriend.  I think that there is something wrong with the woman as I have never even thought of having sex with her.

label: sadness
text: "In my penultimate job I was responsible of a sections with several employers, after several years of dedication I was dismissed by a new chef, saying that I was incompetent."

label: sadness
text: I was sad at the expulsion of some of my comrades during the UNZA demonstrations.

label: anger
text: It was when my Instructor awoke me late at night to get prepared for the training at Military college when he was coming back from his personal social activities.

label: sadness
text: Being misunderstood by friends.

label: shame
text: "At a private party I literally fell into the food. The party was completely ruined for the host, carpets had to be cleaned, etc."

label: joy
text: When I got through the first day here at the department.

label: sadness
text: "A friend of mine was hospitalized after having been diagnosed as having typhoid, he had to forgo his exams and also his ambition of doing a dissertation at the M.A level.  It was a very sad event for me and I felt very sorry for him so I volunteered to stay with him in the hospital."

label: sadness
text: "One Saturday morning I had got ready to go out swimming with my friends.  Unfortunately the weather did not permit it, so we stayed indoors."

label: shame
text: When I swindled money out of someone.

label: disgust
text: "Being on view in a meat-factory. Pigs being cut open, pigs being suspended from nods, blood everywhere, decompsition."

label: guilt
text: When I took drugs.

label: anger
text: When I discovered that the people I trusted most were talking behind my back.

label: disgust
text: When I was weeding the garden I found a lizard in my hand.

label: fear
text: I confronted a bigger person than I and almost got into a fight.

label: guilt
text: "I felt very guilty when a student, sitting in front of me in the exam, asked me a few questions and I did not show him the answers,  though I knew them."

label: shame
text: When my dad caught me with a honey (girlfriend) in my bedroom.

label: shame
text: "After our sad first of May party, I felt ashamed because the friends who had been invited had to suffer.  We, the organizers of the party, did not drive the intruders away."

label: disgust
text: "I had joined a youth group that observed the affairs of our community and so I had many opportunities to contact the government and the committee members of the district board (a local executive structure).  We always tried to consult and discuss with them, but we found that such people did not understand community affairs and they even dampened our enthusiasm in local affairs.  I did not understand why they had decided to work as community leaders."

label: sadness
text: My sister was in coma for 3 months (due to a train accident). Now her brainfunctions are disturbed. She will never be able to walk and she can hardly talk.

label: sadness
text: When my boyfriend said he did not want to see me anymore (which turned out to be untrue).

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend left me.

label: anger
text: My employer took too many aspirins for a bad back and also drank an enormous amount of spirit.  This was dangerous  and he did not understand that he had done anything wrong.

label: guilt
text: A young girl tried to put an end to her life because of lover's grief; not until she was in hospital I heard that I had been the reason for her action.

label: shame
text: When my darling found me walking hand in hand with another girl whom I loved also.

label: anger
text: My mother and my sister carried on picking at me all day long for no reason at all and I ended up getting angry.

label: anger
text: When I was left by the person I loved without any reason.

label: guilt
text: "I was with a girl one night and then did not call her again, although she had asked me to do so."

label: disgust
text: To see damaged lettuce (with worms) in the icebox.

label: sadness
text: I am sad because some relations to friends are not very good.

label: anger
text: When we rearranged furniture in our flat and got stuck in a chair.

label: guilt
text: "After confronting the person who stood me up, I blew up and said all the wrong things."

label: anger
text: When they put the blame on me when I scored the third goal at the match.

label: disgust
text: "When I was accused of having impregnated someone's daughter, it was the girl's cousin who had done it. "

label: anger
text: "I had made an error in planning a programme and had publicly accepted the mistake, despite repeated requests not to bring the matter for discussion a professor kept constantly passing remarks. I reacted angrily. "

label: fear
text: When I was just to be divorced.

label: disgust
text: One of my very good friends came to me for advice as her boyfriend had been hitting her and beating her quite harmfully.

label: guilt
text: A friend of mine felt bad because of something I had done to something that belonged to him.

label: sadness
text: When boyfriend could not stand up to his mother or for himself.

label: guilt
text: When I insulted my young sister for a very little misconduct of putting on my shoes. She wrote me an apology letter and the message she included made me feel guilty.

label: disgust
text: I came across a group of people with the same basic ideas/beliefs who were all fighting and going against what they would say was good.

label: disgust
text: The sight of vomit on the street.

label: fear
text: Few days ago I really experienced fear. It was connected with unexpected actions on the part of a group of people. This evoked in me many negative emotions.

label: disgust
text: "I was disgusted by my paranoid attitude towards myself, my homework at university and disgusted about my lack of retention. Especially in learning another language."

label: anger
text: I was angry when my friends said that I should not receive Nursing Science books because there was a rumour that I was intending to leave the college.

label: shame
text: When my mother found out that I smoke maryhuana.

label: disgust
text: When my younger sister visited me during the school holidays and told me that she would not go back to school because she was pregnant.

label: guilt
text: "While playing a ball game, I made a mistake and we lost the game."

label: anger
text: They wanted something to happen but I didn't.

label: sadness
text: "I finished the relationship with my boyfriend, after having felt myself very unhappy for a long time."

label: anger
text: "Getting terrible meals, but paying heaps for them."

label: disgust
text: "One of my best friends was found lying flat on the road because he was drunk and was taken by the police and put in a cell. I went to see him the following morning, the place was really a mess and was smelling badly. I didn't like it."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted when somebody told me that my previous boyfriend was her boyfriend.

label: joy
text: When I learnt that I was selected for form I.

label: guilt
text: "For the above: guilt at not living up to my own moral expectation, guilt for not being the type of person my patents wanted, guilt for just about bloody everything, just realising that I have failed drastically in my own eyes."

label: disgust
text: When opened a box of biscuits and found worms inside.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when the truth was known about my impregnating the girl we were staying with.

label: shame
text: I bought a possible answer to a homework problem which was completely inapplicable to the question due to my not having read about the subject matter.

label: fear
text: "One night, while I was sleeping, I woke up suddenly with the sensation that there was someone in my room."

label: anger
text: "I felt much anger and perhaps I feel it till now, against my girlfriend's sister who incited her to betray me just when I needed her very much. She didn't think of anything, simply passed over everything."

label: guilt
text: My friend had trouble and I was not able to help him.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed with my biology lecturer when he asked me a question and I could not answer it.

label: disgust
text: When I had to dissect a live mouse at school.

label: guilt
text: "Some boys talking about nicknames of the lecturers, and I was too afraid of them to stop them."

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend was afraid and anxious the day before taking her exam.

label: joy
text: "A very good friend of mine had been away for three months. When we met again, we ran up to each other and embraced."

label: anger
text: Someone talking about me at my back.

label: fear
text: I was alone in a cottage I often stay in.  I was woken up by a rustling sound in the middle of the night.

label: sadness
text: I felt very sad when a friend of mine failed the final exam and she could not be accepted at the institution of learning.

label: sadness
text: I was so sad when I heard that my Uncle had passed away. He was the only man who was supporting my parents as well as myself.

label: joy
text: I unexpectedly got a present from my father.

label: disgust
text: "After the first of May, I detested my fiance's friends, who had piled on to our party and spoilt it completely."

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died very suddenly without warning.

label: anger
text: While studying chemistry with a friend we became angry with eachother because we were both fed up.

label: joy
text: On New Year's Eve I went in a disco with friends. I amused myself and got to know many other people.

label: joy
text: When I understood that I was admitted to the University.

label: disgust
text: A child told me she had been sexually abused by her step-father. I only knew the child and had not come into contact with either parent. I tried to do what was best for the child. The event and the stepfather disgusted me.

label: joy
text: I liked to see off my aunt (from Zaire) to the airport. That appeared to be impossible because I had to go to school. For long time I wasn't sure if I could accompany her. Two days before the departure they told me I was allowed to miss school.

label: guilt
text: When I was 4-5 years old my mother gave me some parts of a chocolate bar and ordered me to bring it to my father working outside. On my way I could not resist the temptation and ate it myself.

label: anger
text: "My father called me (behind my mother's back) and told me that my mother disapproved my behavior in the weekend. However, he didn't tell me the details and left me with unanswered questions."

label: guilt
text: I was at a boarding school during my primary school days. I was broken so I pretended I was very sick. My father came and he picked me up. He spent a lot of money on medical expenses which all proved to be negative.

label: joy
text: When I am with friends and I do what pleases me this often happenes.

label: guilt
text: I stole carrots and got caught.  I had to apologize to the owner.

label: disgust
text: "I was disgusted with my brother's behaviour when he kept throwing things away because of his anger, after mum had shouted at him."

label: shame
text: When I promised to help a friend over a weekend and did not keep the promise.

label: guilt
text: I am not doing what I should with this questionnaire.

label: joy
text: "I felt happy at the settlement of our marriage, even though we are from different socio-linguistic backgrounds our parents agreed to the wedding without any conflict or discussion.  We had  thought that they would object to the wedding but it did not happen. "

label: sadness
text: I felt sad when my dear friend was needed from training school due to his failure in a number of subjects and simply didn't know what he had to do.

label: joy
text: "I have a boyfriend and I am very fond of him. When we had our ""11-months jubilee"", I had forgotten it. But he gave me a red rose."

label: joy
text: When my brother gave me a watch.

label: anger
text: Landlord putting up rents sneakly and slimily.

label: joy
text: My friend came to see me after she had stayed abroad. I waited at the station.

label: guilt
text: I do not study enough as I do not understand it properly.

label: anger
text: I was drawn up a statement for an infringement of the traffic ordinance. In fact I was innocent.

label: fear
text: Having my luggage checked at Customs.

label: disgust
text: A friend of mine had sex with someone of a different race on a Winnebago trip down to USC in front of everyone (all my friends embarrassed my sorority house name).

label: shame
text: "One day, when I was sitting on the bus, there was an old woman standing beside me.  I was very tired and sleepy and did not think of giving her my seat.  A 50 year old woman who was sitting beside me got up and gave her seat to the old woman and said,  "" Old woman, please take my seat, the youngstters these days are not used to giving their seats to others.""  When I heard these words I was very ashamed of myself and wanted to get off the bus at once.  "

label: anger
text: "I had an appointment downtown, and the person in question was half an hour late."

label: anger
text: When I was accused of something I had not done.

label: joy
text: "Receiving notification that I had made a successful application to the Speech Therapy course at Uni, gave me a very good feelig of achievment and joy."

label: fear
text: "We were driving a car of a friend of mine when we turned in the wrong direction towards an unknown district, and nearly drove down a precipice."

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my friend had started drinking beer.

label: guilt
text: When my friend ended up pregnant by a gentleman whom I considered to be good and faithful but he ended up neglecting her and not bothering about her.

label: disgust
text: When I failed an exam.

label: anger
text: "My brother told me that a person (whom I know) had insulted him.  I am very fond of my brother, and as he himself can not get angry or hurt, my protectiveness was aroused and I got angry."

label: sadness
text: My best friend suddenly acting strange towards me.

label: shame
text: "When a lady I was flirting with told all my class-mates that she was in second year while I was in first year, everyone laughed and started looking at me."

label: guilt
text: When my grandfather was in a nursing home when I was young I never wanted to go and sometimes didn't have to and later I felt guilty.

label: fear
text: When my father died I felt myself alone and the fear possessed me. I was a child and all my sisters and brothers (8) were young.

label: joy
text: When I won the best prize in the National science fair.

label: disgust
text: "When I heard that one of my good friends, when at a party, had got herself involved with some very undesirable characters and was experimenting with drugs."

label: joy
text: When I finally got a job after days of wondering whether I would be hired or not and counting on the money that it would bring.

label: guilt
text: "Adolescent guilt growing up feeling ""bad, immoral"" sexual desires, some 10yrs ago."

label: disgust
text: People spitting in railway stations.

label: disgust
text: Listening to my roommate boasting about her new clothes.

label: guilt
text: "I went to go get a bike innertube fixed. I fixed it and I was supposed to pay previously but I didn't. I said I would after I fixed the tire. After fixing the tire, the salesperson who helped me was gone so I walked out of the store without paying. I felt guilty so I went inside and paid for the tire."

label: guilt
text: "I promised my friends that I would take care of something, but I kept forgetting about it.  When they asked me about it, I promised to do it immediately.  However, I got started only after a couple of months.  I felt that I had betrayed my friends."

label: sadness
text: "At a lack of love of my father for my mum, sadness for him more than anyone else because he does not realise how much love and happiness there could be between them, and is, and how much he is damaging himself apart from mum."

label: guilt
text: Forgetting a close friend's birthday.

label: disgust
text: When I ate a rotten apple.

label: fear
text: The possibility of having failed the examination.

label: sadness
text: "My sister, whom I like very much, asked me for a favour which I refused her for some flimsy reason. Some time later I felt sorry for that and something like sadness."

label: shame
text: Immediately after the New Year holidays I happened to visit a party where there was a lot of alcohol and I became drunk. On the next day I felt sort of ashamed when I remembered what I had said and done on the night before.

label: sadness
text: When I heard that a good friend had committed suicide.

label: sadness
text: My elder sister scolded me in front of my younger sisters and cousins.  She said that I was very lazy and I felt so sad that I cried myself to sleep.

label: fear
text: When I was travelling at night.

label: disgust
text: Cleaning the bathroom of my apt. and realizing my roommate who had lived there all summer by himself had never cleaned the place.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died. She stayed with us until I had the age of 10. When she died I was 13 and I remember the moment after the funeral: I sat on the table and cried.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted at the university wanting some of us to travel from our homes to the lectures here every day.  The way the whole thing was handled disgusted me.

label: shame
text: At a friend's party there were several allusions to my sexual adventures.

label: disgust
text: "A certain girl asked me what my major was and when I told her that it was P.A she started criticizing it saying, ""I hate that course.""  She just shows off in front of other people."

label: sadness
text: When a colleague failed to contact me at the arranged time.

label: shame
text: "The first time that I caressed a girl, I was about thirteen and she was eighteen.  I noticed that it did not affect her at all."

label: fear
text: "I was jogging in the forest, in the central park area, when I saw a man hiding behind a tree.  I got frigthened, turned around and ran out of the forest."

label: guilt
text: "When I made love with a girl, which I don't really love. However I know that she loves me."

label: sadness
text: When my father passed away.

label: joy
text: "When I began dansing, the teacher came and told me that I was very good and would soon get into the ballet academy. "

label: fear
text: "When at school, I threw a duster at another child and hit him in the head. The blow caused a flesh wound and I was afraid of what would happen to me when the teacher found out the circumstances."

label: fear
text: "It was a week before the higher level results were announced.  I had tried and failed many times and this was the last time that I was taking the exam.  I knew that if i failed again I woulld have to enter the society.  I imagined things during this period - I dreamt that I had entered university and it was a nice experience.  When I thought about the future, an unexplainable fear rose in me.  I feared being a worker and not having a bright prospect, I also feared the criticism of my relatives as my brother had gone to university.  Whenevr I thought of this issue I could not eat or concentrate, and my heart beat increased."

label: sadness
text: "A relative, whom I like very much, left for the United States."

label: fear
text: "When I was 8 years old my tonsils had to be operated on. This is not a complicated operation, but just before it started I was very afraid so that I will never forget it."

label: guilt
text: This situation happened when my friend me with a knife which I stole from him.

label: sadness
text: "When I saw the film ""Johnny got his gun"" which deals with the consequences of the Vietnam war."

label: fear
text: When it was found that I had gone out of the school premises without permisssion and at the wrong time.

label: guilt
text: When a friend of mine was beaten for what was my fault.

label: anger
text: I felt angry when I was told that I had not been selected to go to the University.

label: disgust
text: "The repression of rioting and non-rioting ""Blacks"" in South Africa by the police of that ""Democracy""."

label: sadness
text: When my aunt died.

label: anger
text: "When my friend promised that she would come to my place, and did not turn up - I was annoyed at her."

label: disgust
text: If a guy one is not interested in makes advances.

label: guilt
text: One day I shouted at my brother who didn't do any wrong to me only that I had a disappointment from a friend and projected it on to him. He cried and I felt guilty after sometime.

label: shame
text: When I was caught stealing money from my father.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I was given a prize which belonged to someone else.

label: fear
text: During labour when the foetal sounds became faint and there was a big alert for a forceps delivery.

label: sadness
text: The breaking up of a long lasting relationship.

label: anger
text: I experience that feeling when I am unsulted without deserving it or when someone deceives me.

label: disgust
text: "Some people whom I do not like at all, and one of the reasons is their physical appearance."

label: anger
text: Being treated unfairly.

label: fear
text: A man in a car was following me when I went running early one morning in a fairly secluded area.

label: shame
text: "A truth expressed unthinkingly at a coffee party.  I realized later that I had been inconsiderate, at a wrong moment and the wrong place."

label: anger
text: "A ex-boyfriend tried to prejudice me before my fiancT and his family saying things about me that let his family worried. We had to postpone our wedding and we were already using our wedding rings. To be honest I didn't feel just anger, I felt hate."

label: fear
text: Two guys were fighting murderously and I feared that one of them would be killed.

label: sadness
text: My elder sister whom I love very much was leaving for the          West Indies for two years and I was staying behind.

label: sadness
text: "My grandfather died. He lived almost as a recluse not caring for himself as well as he should - Dad and we all helped as much as we could, but it didn't save him from himself. It was an unexpected death. His second de facto wife was lucky she wasn't jailed."

label: anger
text: I saw a report on T.V news on apartheid in South Africa.

label: sadness
text: When I was ill and had to stay at the hospital for a period of time.

label: disgust
text: I was at the table at a French friend's house.  They served me a big dish with roast cauliflower and sauce.  I had to eat it.

label: anger
text: The fact that I hadn't been informed about something and I had the greatest trust in this person.

label: shame
text: During the lesson the teacher called me and asked me if I had reported that I was late.  I pretended that I had but looking at her eyes I knew that she knew that I was lying.  I thought that it was really bad luck that she had examined the list of the students who were late.

label: disgust
text: When my friend who is close to me got engaged and did not invite me.

label: sadness
text: "I was really hoping that I would pass the examination, but I failed and so I felt very sad."

label: fear
text: One time I set up my journey at night going to a certain bar. On the way I met my friends and they told me that two people had died because of heavy fighting. I proceeded on but with fear.

label: anger
text: It was during the beginning of the term. I had K100 and kept it in my handbag. I left the handbag in the wardrobe but didn't lock it. Next time I found that K30 were stolen.

label: sadness
text: "My grandfather died, when I was an exchange student in the USA."

label: disgust
text: "When I attended school, our class visited an institution for mentally and physically handicapped persons. Although I tried to control my feelings, I was disgusted."

label: sadness
text: Finding out that life span in China is shorter than in the West.

label: disgust
text: "In autumn I had to move to another lodging. My landlords, quite intelligent people, warned me I had to move in the nearest future. But I had difficulties in moving my luggage because I couldn't wait for a car to come. How amazed I was to hear them threatening me they would throw our my things. And at that my luggage was well packed and did not stand in their way. I was quite  disappointed and disgusted."

label: shame
text: Once I had dinner at an elegant restaurant and I did not have enough money to pay the bill. There were a lot of people there and I felt quite awkward.

label: fear
text: "One dark night with no street lights, a car was obviously following me."

label: anger
text: Told by some people the class leader only choose his friends (not true).

label: fear
text: "There was a scene of shooting in front of my house, I was very afraid. Two armed men confronting. I didn't discover the reason of the incident."

label: sadness
text: "When I knew almost the same day about two great friends of mine that had serious existential crisis, and mainly when I notice that I'm in the same situation that they are, but I didn't realize it."

label: guilt
text: A friend asked to borrow my notes and I did not give them away (my notes too badly written)

label: shame
text: At one occasion I was ashamed of being refused after a proposal for a friendship with a certain girl. I was ashamed because she refused publically in the presence of my fellow friends.

label: fear
text: "Together with a little brother I biked on a lonely road in the Polder. Then we were annoyed by a boy on a motorbike: he took over, stopped, took over, etc. Then we saw he had something in his hand, we turned until we came across a man, who accompanied us."

label: fear
text: When I nearly drowned in icy water wearing ice skates.  It was difficult to get out.

label: joy
text: When it appeared that I was not pregnant when I was several weeks overtime.

label: shame
text: In an express bus I sat on a seat meant for senior citizens and invalids.

label: joy
text: My admittance to the University.

label: shame
text: "When I told my sister I had slept with my boyfriend, and she at first was mad at me I then felt shame for this act, but not guilt."

label: anger
text: Once I had an argument with my friends and I knew that I was right.  My friends went on arguing with me even though they did not know the right thing.

label: shame
text: I think that the only time I really felt shame was when I was very young and I had to defecate on the street.  I was very worried in case someone should see me.

label: sadness
text: "Three weeks ago a friend of mine bid me good-bye before going abroad.  I felt happy for her as she was achieving something by making the trip, but I also felt sad as I would not be seeing her for a long time."

label: guilt
text: "One night, I went out with some friends for dinner and I did not tell my parents that I would come back late.  I thought of phoning but in the end I did not.  When I arrived home, my parents were very worried."

label: shame
text: There was a time when my room looked terribly untidy; just at that time my aunt came to see me; fortunately I could prevent her from entering the room.

label: guilt
text: "I am going steady with a boy, but I had sexual intercourse with another one, and I felt guilty about it afterwards."

label: guilt
text: Losing my temper to my sister.

label: shame
text: When I arrived too late at a meeting of mentor (the night before the introduction of novices on the University start).

label: disgust
text: "In Punjab, when in the name of religion people killed each other during the agitation."

label: sadness
text: I made a long-distance call to people rather close to me and I thought about the sad incident that had happened to them in the near past; I knew that they were thinking about it too when I made the call.

label: joy
text: When I met a friend that I hadn't seen for some time.

label: fear
text: I was in my village when a bull jumped over a fence and started chasing my friends and me.  We were very frightened till we climbed up a tree.

label: disgust
text: "I read a book about the situation in South-Africa, about the terrible violations of human rights. I was disgusted with the white population."

label: shame
text: When I confessed to my girl-friend (now my wife) that I had betrayed her with another woman.

label: fear
text: Traveling as the only female in a railway carriage in the middle of the night in Italy.

label: sadness
text: My Uncle was beaten by his troublesome son. He fell unconscious and gained consciousness after some time. That time I was at school; this news reached me through someone.

label: fear
text: "A fall during a climb, with almost with no previous experience."

label: guilt
text: "When I provoked a fight with my mother, hurting her feelings very much."

label: sadness
text: My son's mother told me that she wanted to move to Vienna and take the child with her. This means a rather long distance for me. My whole family was sad and dumbfounded so that my own feelings were intensified.

label: shame
text: We had made an appointment to complete together a piece of work. It appeared that I was the only one who hadn't prepared anything.

label: fear
text: "The day I was nearly stabbed to death by ruffians who wanted to take my money.  I refused to give them any money and they started running after me, I ran into somebody else's house to save myself."

label: disgust
text: Finding a hair in the soup.

label: joy
text: When my daughter was born.

label: disgust
text: When I was a child I broke plates because I wasn't given food on the grounds of coming home late.

label: shame
text: My friend told me in a fairly loud voice the blunders she committed last night.

label: anger
text: When on a car journey a fellow student crossed our way with his own car and we had to bump into a roadside trunk.

label: guilt
text: When I cheated my father and told him that the school administration wanted K80 for the purchase of a mini-bus.  Two months later the school authorities wrote back to my father for the money.  I could not go back and ask him for the money again as he had already given it to me once.

label: sadness
text: The day I woke up to find that a kitten I had wanted to keep had been eaten by the neighbour's dogs.  It had been locked out by my wife who claimed that it had dirtied the sheets.

label: fear
text: When I was operated on the knee and had to go through rehabilitation.

label: guilt
text: "I was walking quite quickly and unthinking through a children's playground, when a toddler ran in front of me I knocked him over and he hit his head quite hard and began crying."

label: shame
text: "On the way back from a Summer spent in Sweden, I drunk with a man in the train.  I had drunk so much that when I got home I fell asleep in the entrance hall.  I have never drunk that much, neither before nor after that incident.  I was ashamed because my mother and my sister had to see me in that state and my father had to carry me to bed."

label: sadness
text: "When a close friend took leave of me, because she went to Israel for one year."

label: anger
text: "When my room-mate was making noise deliberately, by playing a flute early in the morning while I was trying to study."

label: sadness
text: "I saw a dead child which was not covered, it had been knocked down by a car."

label: anger
text: "I was very angry when my friend lost my practical's journal, which I needed to study for the exams."

label: guilt
text: After I had cheated my parents that I had lost my textbooks so they had to send me money.

label: disgust
text: When my roommate came home at 10 in the morning after sleeping with a guy she did not know because she got drunk. (Se has a boyfriend too).

label: guilt
text: Not beeing able to stay with my mother for the National Day holiday.

label: anger
text: "I quarrelled with my brothers (twins) at home on saturday.  One of them studies in a private school and the other one is repeating his form five.  They do not know what they are doing.  They follow every word of their teachers, books and systems.  They always try to rationalize their bad acts by some game and they are satisfied with their awkward life.  I have tried to persuade them very often but have failed.  This time I had a fight as they have no voluntary spirit (they did not polish the floor)."

label: fear
text: When we could not land our plane and we knew that the fuel was running out.  Bad weather had already frightened us.

label: joy
text: "My boyfriend and I were getting dressed up and putting make-up on to go to a Halloween Party. We were dressing up to be two mimes. It was very enjoyable and I thought we looked really good, it was an accomplishment. We were alone in his house."

label: sadness
text: When I heard of the death of a friend who had just finished her training I felt very sad for she was young.

label: shame
text: A much older man took advantage of me during my childhood (four to eight years of age).

label: joy
text: I received a letter of acceptance from UNZA.

label: joy
text: "A holiday at a whitesand deserted beach. A cool evening near the end of summer and we had a fire in the sand - toasted marshmellows, cuddled and drank champagne."

label: disgust
text: A boyfriend with whom I split up with came over to a friend's house where I was visiting with a male friend. In a confrontation in another room he tried to find out if I was aroused by my friend by feeling my parts.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine got pregnant anf failed the first year at university.  The boyfriend refused his responsibility and they ended up in court.

label: anger
text: "The last day of school is traditionally celebrated by singing a song about all the students who are leaving.  In the song about me, there were things which irritated me a lot."

label: joy
text: "During my first week in Graz I met a girl who I had got to know in the train from Amsterdam to Graz. Although I had considered her very sympathetic, we had seperated without changing our adresses."

label: guilt
text: When I hurt my sisters for no reason at all.

label: anger
text: "When I found out my cousin had been killed. I was angry at the world, and her murderer who was her ex-boyfriend. It was the worst and most hateful day of my life."

label: sadness
text: My dog died of a cerebral tumor.

label: sadness
text: "When I understood that my marriage was falling apart, and we decided to be legally separated."

label: joy
text: When I gave birth to a child and saw that it was normal when it was put against my breast.

label: fear
text: Talking about snakes.

label: shame
text: "I had high-heeled shoes one time, but a certain girl who saw the shoes told me that they were out of fashion and I looked as an old man when I was in those shoes."

label: shame
text: I was swimming in the sea and a wave took the top part of my bikini away.

label: sadness
text: I put in two years of hard work and it was neither looked at nor appreciated.

label: anger
text: When I was put into a tennis team below my standard.

label: shame
text: Parents finding out I smoked.

label: anger
text: Before the certificate examination I was very poor in Biology (the worst result in my class).  Ever since F.5 it had been getting poorer and poorer.  I had tried my best and had spent most of my time studying this subject.  Finally my results were so bad that I thought that it was just not fair.

label: guilt
text: Last year I put off an exam for the autumn session without knowing if there was a supplementary examination session. When I came home with my exam unpassed I felt guilty before my parents when I remembered how much they had done for me.

label: joy
text: "When I opened my TE Score envelope, and saw I got into Physiotherapy."

label: fear
text: "One of my fellow students had bunked field work and in my attempt to cover up for him I myself was exposed, though not directly.  We were to meet our field work suprevisor and we were afraid of the consequences."

label: shame
text: When I woke up after a night of drinking I couldn't remember and discovered several untoward things had occurred.

label: shame
text: In a very crowded shop I was distracted and missed my turn in the queue.  A woman who was behind me began to shout at me asking me either to pay more attention or to leave.

label: anger
text: When someone does not listen to me after having asked me to repeat what I said. This happened more than one time with the same person.

label: anger
text: "A certain man went to my parents and told them that I was married here, when I am here at school. When I went home for holidays my parents asked me about it and I was angry with that man."

label: guilt
text: When I have to take exams I am very excited and have not much time for the housekeeping. Then my friend has to do everything.

label: joy
text: When my parents complimented me very nicely on something.

label: joy
text: "I was spending the week-end with some friends.  We were waiting for another friend and we went to the meet him at the bus stop, a  woman we met there told us that the coach had already left.  I was afraid that I would not see my friend, but at last we found him."

label: shame
text: It was during a school holiday - I was found necking a girl in my room by my father.

label: disgust
text: "In the morning, the cat of my landlady had vomited on the floor, near the staircase I take to go to the bathroom."

label: shame
text: I was embarassed at the exam in microbiology. I was ashamed with myself - how little I knew and how good was the examinor. I rarely become ashamed.

label: guilt
text: "While trying to get my little brother over a ditch, he fell on his head and started crying.  I was scared of having caused him permanent injury."

label: guilt
text: "When I was starting in romance with my husband, we went out to curt, and we stayed in the car ""making love"". At the time I was seventeen and I was very immature until a day I lost my virginity."

label: shame
text: Soiled my short trousers with faeces.

label: joy
text: When I met my mother after not having seen her for three years.

label: joy
text: I was doing an experiment and was not getting the appropriate result despite the fact that I had repeated the procedure 4-5 times.  Then finally I got it right by a stroke of luck.

label: joy
text: The day I learnt that I had been admitted to the university.

label: shame
text: One day I felt dizzy during a lecture.  When the lecturer asked us as to who had heard the fairy tale - I was the only one who put up his hand and this surprised the whole class.

label: disgust
text: "Being mistreated by my former primary school teacher, Mr Zalu."

label: disgust
text: I saw a film about the nazi concentration camps during the war. After the film I felt disgust.

label: guilt
text: I didn't visit a very close friend at the hospital and some days later he died.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted to see a person vomitting and I was told to clean the place where the vomit was.

label: disgust
text: When I listened to a conversation of friends talking about the power of money.

label: disgust
text: "My superior at the summer job swindled customers as much as he could, and once put me in a difficult situation after which I could not but detest him."

label: guilt
text: When I do or say something inappropriate which hurts people close to me.

label: anger
text: I felt very angry when a mishanga seller robbed me of the transport money I had to go to school.

label: fear
text: "I felt fear of the purest kind after a car accident.  The incident and images of horror kept coming back to my mind.  I wondered what could have happened to my sister, my friend and me, though nothing very serious actually happened."

label: fear
text: I had been watching a triller a dark night in the country and I had to go the outside toilet on my own.

label: fear
text: When a big angry dog put its snout on my arm and had I made one movement it would have bitten me.

label: anger
text: I had applied for a job and they had assured me that the exams would take place a few months later.  A week later I went to obtain some more information and they told me that the exams had already taken place.

label: anger
text: When an unknown person provoked me verbaly and physically.

label: shame
text: "My P.T. instructor also works as a masseur. He wanted to massage me, therefore I had to undress. For the first few times this was not easy for me; I got gradually used to it."

label: shame
text: Having had a very heated argument with my sister - I began hitting her about the head with a newspaper I was holding.

label: joy
text: Emotional reassurances by spouse.

label: sadness
text: When I realized that it did not make much sense to start a relationship with a girl who was not very constructive to establish a firm relationship.

label: shame
text: "Yesterday while playing volley ball, there was one person extra    and somebody had to out.  A mess worker and I were the  last ones to arrive and we had arrived at the same time.  Rightfully one of us had to opt out of the game, as I was delaying leaving the mess worker opted out saying that I should play.  I felt ashamed of myself."

label: joy
text: "Realizing one's desire, an experienced feeling of satisfaction from the realization of one's desires and aims."

label: shame
text: "I arrived late at a seminar concerning my major subject at university, although I had been appointed to formally oppose the paper which was being presented."

label: disgust
text: "A few days back, I walked on a heap of faeces while walking on the road.  I got goose flesh because of this."

label: fear
text: I saw a man who had had a heart-attack and who was being treated for it.  I feared that my own father could have been there.

label: fear
text: When I was nearly beaten up by the brother of my girlfriend.

label: fear
text: Almost always when I go to fetch the results of an exam.

label: shame
text: It was last week on Sunday that I was walking with my girlfriend along Kawale road going to town so I tried to stop a car for a lift and the driver didn't stop and I felt shame because people were looking at us.

label: fear
text: When I got in jungle where there was a great number of snakes.

label: sadness
text: I dreamt of my father's death while I was at secondary school.  I was screaming at the top of my voice and was woken up by my friend.  That day I was really sad.

label: shame
text: I was wearing a short skirt one day and someone told me my underwear was showing.

label: shame
text: My mother and my grandmother were talking about one of my grandmother's friends whom I hardly know. I gave some deprecatory comments on him whereupon my grandmother told me that the man had died recently.

label: anger
text: "After I said something that my boyfriend disagreed with, he walked away from me without discussing what bothered him. I became very angry with him for treating me this way. Yesterday, November 14."

label: sadness
text: When I quarrelled with a very close friend of mine.

label: fear
text: "Being very close to having an auto accident, almost driving off the road."

label: fear
text: Car accident nearly occurred between us and drunk driver coming in opposite direction it missed us by approx 1 m and collided (after rolling twice midair) into nearby scrub.

label: shame
text: My aunt phoned me to ask me why I had refused the her invitation to dinner at her home on the New Year's Eve.

label: joy
text: When I could study at university.

label: joy
text: Finding out that the person I love understands me.

label: disgust
text: At a gathering I found myself involuntarily sitting next to two people who expressed opinions that I considered very low and discriminating.

label: joy
text: When I finished the work that I had planned to do - my homework.

label: anger
text: "Mr C took my drawing pens, without having asked for my permission first, and lost them.  He did not tell me about it till I asked him and then did not try to find them."

label: fear
text: "While skiing in Squaw Valley, I was riding up a chair lift and right when the chair was above a sheer cliff of rocks, the chair lift stopped and all the chairs sagged and everything seemed to creak loudly."

label: shame
text: "On a social occasion, I noticed that I reacted on the basis of my autonomous nerve system (I could not help it)."
