label: guilt
text: After days or weekends where I did not accomplish the amount of sudying that I wanted to because of more pleasant activities which come up.

label: joy
text: "One evening, I was with a group of friends having a talk.  There was a very trustful and joyful atmosphere."

label: joy
text: Third highest grade in the class and the best answer given for one question (the question was graded by the professor and he indicated he liked my answer).

label: anger
text: When someone threw a firecracker into my room at 7:00 am in the morning.

label: shame
text: NO RESPONSE

label: disgust
text: I went to a party and there were some cakes which weren't good and had a bad smell.

label: disgust
text: "Someone, who was sitting very close to me, was smoknig in the compartment of an air conditioned mini-bus."

label: shame
text: Stealing money from my parents when I was young.

label: guilt
text: I had promised to send something to a friend and it completely slipped my mind.  I felt guilty for having forgotten.

label: anger
text: "In the University we were convoked to a stroll like a freshman I was still innocent about the manipulation. On seeing the goal of the exaltation to poor character people, I felt anger on feeling myself mass of maneuver."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted at the environment while getting back to my student lodging. I did not see anything in the suburb which had been planned by taking people's comfort into account.

label: joy
text: "When you are satisfied with something, when you achieve something you have striven to."

label: fear
text: When I was young I got lost on the street and the police found me after a day.

label: sadness
text: When I left my boyfriend. I found another girl at his home but he did nothing to relieve the situation.

label: anger
text: "A certain boy came into my room and started telling me that I was not pretty, that I had no manners and that I should learn some.  I had just come to campus and he was in fourth year."

label: sadness
text: Some months ago my wife gave birth to twin sisters. She had no idea of looking after babies and she felt quite oppressed. The fact that I couldn't help her caused grief to me.

label: guilt
text: Once I worked as a designer. A fitter was hard hit in a damage that occurred at the building site I had designed.

label: shame
text: "When I was in the 12th standard, I could not speak English.  One day, while  talking with my relatives I used a wrong word and  my cousin corrected me, believing that I did not know English.  I really felt ashamed then."

label: disgust
text: "I once saw an elderly lady who was not properly dressed.  She was wearing a transparent dress, such things are not sopposed to be seen in African society."

label: disgust
text: When I heard about a murder of a 16-year-old girl.

label: guilt
text: I borrowed a piece of music of someone and I always forgot to give it back. That person wrote me a letter asking me to give it back. I did so and I told him an idle story why I kept it for so long.

label: fear
text: The weather is very bad (fog and slipperiness) the newcast reports many traffic accidents and my boyfriend is driving home and still has 60 kilometers to go.

label: fear
text: When climbing up the stairs to the top of a ski-jumping hill.

label: joy
text: "I felt joy most strongly some years ago, when I took part in a NH Competition and I was the first."

label: joy
text: When I thought that my high school love and I had a mutual emotion.

label: sadness
text: "When I saw the list of books to read for an acccouting course, I thought "" Oh God how will I ever manaage it!"""

label: anger
text: A typical family argument.

label: fear
text: "Riding through a bush fire on an island of Australia - on a pushbike as a little boy - all alone, lost and surrounded by smouldering wood and flame."

label: fear
text: When diving deep into the sea to reach the floor I felt breathless. I was cautious but I doubted I should be able to come to the surface and inhale.

label: anger
text: When a boy tried to fool me so he would be OK trying to show me that he is a gook boy.

label: shame
text: "I was caught stealing food at my aunt's place.  I had tried to hide the food I had taken from the pantry while my aunt was in the kitchen, however she went to the pantry and discovered the stolen package."

label: joy
text: I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

label: joy
text: "I was joyful when I received a present (2 books and a pencil) from the headmaster in standard 6 because I had passed, I became No 1 and he said I was one of the pupils who had good behaviour."

label: shame
text: Making an unexpected talk with a professor in the canteen. This made me shy.

label: joy
text: "On a boat trip to Denmark, 14 of us had a lot of fun and we spent SEK 10 each on one armed bandits and against all odds we won the jackpot of SEK 1000."

label: fear
text: I feared that I would not be able to hand in the book-report on time as I had started working very late.  The book was difficult to read and my teacher did not accept my work as it was handed in late.

label: disgust
text: "Now that the 49ers are winners, the fans are coming out of the woodwork and jumping on the bandwagon and that disgusts me."

label: joy
text: When I learnt that I had been accepted at the medical school.

label: anger
text: Sometime back another girl who was in terms with my ex-boyfriend came to shout at me at twelve midnight. It was because she thought I was still interested in the boy.

label: shame
text: Once a female classmate told me that the clothes I wore seemed to be a child's clothes.  On hearing this I felt a little ashamed and I criticized her clothes though there was nothing wrong with them.

label: shame
text: The people on my floor last year were very close. This year 4 of our best friends live together in an apartment. My boyfriend and I dropped by on one of their birthdays and stayed for dinner. Two other people had already been invited and I felt uncomfortable and unwanted. Then I realized I was the one who always called them and they rarely call me.

label: joy
text: When I was selected at TISS X.

label: shame
text: I was very ashamed when I failed a test in Standard 7. The teacher told the other students to shout and laugh at me.

label: guilt
text: "I ate a Runeberg's cake, though I knew that I would immediately put on a kilo."

label: anger
text: I was furious when the teacher pointed out in class that I was the quietest girl in class.

label: shame
text: I thought I had taken a decision but I hesitated.

label: disgust
text: "At school, I detested the spinach gruel which had lumps of flour in it."

label: guilt
text: When a crawling child got burnt because of my negligence to keep the child away from the fire.

label: disgust
text: "I am disgusted with my sister's husband. On an early Sunday morning after having knocked at my door, he suddenly rushed in and finching me still in bed he began quarrelling about something. I could not understand. I heard his last words: ""Don't stare at me so because I'll beat you in your bed"" I got up terrified and a thrashing followed."

label: shame
text: My grand father caught me eating his private jelly bean supply.

label: guilt
text: I got 100 FIM too much when I changed money at the bank.  They soon called me at my job and the situation was embarrasing for me.

label: anger
text: "In a sociology class I felt very angry towards some members of society for exploiting the Polynesian people, dawn raids by Police (Martin Luther King, Blacks in S.A.). But this was just a reflection of my own shortcomings."

label: fear
text: "I was physically assaulted and sexually abused about a year ago. Just the feeling that I might not get away intact, or even alive, produced fear."

label: anger
text: I was angry when I had not been granted a leave out pass during the last weekend.

label: sadness
text: When I crashed my car and it had to be scrapped then.  It was my fault and I feel depressed as I miss the car.

label: shame
text: "The time I shouted at most of my friends at a party.  It was as if  all my friends had done something wrong, or may be it was the influence of the beer."

label: guilt
text: When I was responsible for getting my friend run-out in a vital cricket match.

label: anger
text: When I spoke to Jan-Erik Wikstr÷m on the telephone.

label: fear
text: That if ever I was really naughty I would be sent away from my Mum and Dad to another family. I was fostered from age 5 and didn't get to Mum and Dad until I was 6 and then legally adopted at 14.

label: sadness
text: When my elder brother died.

label: disgust
text: Saw a very arrogant girl walking like a queen.

label: fear
text: When my brother hit his head and lost consciousness at the sports practice.  For some time he could not remember what had happened but he recovered later.

label: shame
text: "A few years back I had proposed love to a girl who later turned out to be related to me.  Though we were in love with each other, we both felt ashamed and withdrew from each other."

label: anger
text: "I was accused of having done something, which I hadn't and got very angry."

label: anger
text: When boyfriend lied to me.

label: shame
text: Can't think of any.

label: guilt
text: "Last year I was asked to look after my niece while her mother was cooking.  Unfortunately the kid fell off the bed, I was confident that she would not fall and had not been paying much attention."

label: sadness
text: When the girl I loved turned me down.

label: shame
text: When I made a fool at an examination.

label: shame
text: "My boyfriend had drunk too much and beaten me. When I had to show the letter the door, which was almost crashed, I felt ashamed."

label: fear
text: I was afraid before I went to the doctor's.

label: shame
text: "When I could not pass my exams with good marks.  My wedding was to take place 15 days after the exams and I tried to convince myself that this was the reason for my not having done well.   However, I thought that had I really put my mind to doing well at the exams I would have done well."

label: fear
text: When I was going to bring back my girlfriend to LA to meet my parents.

label: guilt
text: I wrote a bad letter to someone concerning our relationship which we created ourselves.

label: disgust
text: When a student accused me of having stolen his textbook  as he had found a form bearing my name in his other books and all my explanations fell on deaf ears.

label: shame
text: When I blurted out an answer in class without having been asked to do so.  The teacher told me that it was bad manners to do so.

label: shame
text: I passed on some gossip that was untrue and cause two friends to have a fight who were already experiencing difficulties with each other.

label: shame
text: "When somebody I knew greeted me and started to talk with me and I didn't know, I couldn't remember who he was."

label: shame
text: In 1972 I failed my Examination because of my own crooky behaviour of dodging from Examinations.

label: guilt
text: When my husband talked about the restrictions he will have to accept in his life to make our marriage work.  I felt that it was directed at me as it was me who had demanded the changes.  We were with a marriage counsellor then.

label: disgust
text: I was disappointed by a girlfriend when I visited her at her home in Woodlands.

label: fear
text: Whhen the front tyre of the car burst.

label: sadness
text: When I came to know that my feelings for someone were not reciprocated.

label: shame
text: Not having owned up to the responsibility an incident where family car received minor damage.

label: shame
text: "After a party I spent the night with a friend. We both were drunk, the morning was disillusioning. A friend was me leaving the room and I felt shabby and immoral."

label: guilt
text: "I dated another boy several times, when I was still ""going with"" my former boyfriend. This made me feel a little bit guilty towards my friend."

label: joy
text: My son was born.

label: fear
text: When I saw a dead body in the mortuary I became afraid and I was filled with fear.

label: joy
text: "I went to fetch my girl-friend at the station. When the train arrived and I saw her descending and running up to me, I felt glad."

label: guilt
text: Yesterday I broke my sister's raio. She hears it always when she has school examinations and now she has examinations.

label: joy
text: I am a school teacher. At a teacher-parent meeting I received a good deal of positive feed-back on my work both from the parents and through them from the pupils.

label: guilt
text: During 7th grade our class mobbed a famale teacher so badly that she had a breackdown and was hospitalized.

label: shame
text: Once I had to visit a rather special person.

label: joy
text: When I passed the grade 7 exam.

label: fear
text: When I had to walk along a dark road alone.

label: guilt
text: When I realized that not all my friends like the comments that I pass in their presence.

label: shame
text: When I got 1 mark in an Abnormal Psychology exam.

label: joy
text: "When, to my surprise, I got to know about having got ""very good"" high school graduation marks."

label: shame
text: Sleeping with a girl on a Saturday night and then not contacting her in later days.

label: fear
text: "I was visiting my parents in law when the house was invaded by three strange men, and they committed an armed assault."

label: anger
text: When my mother rejected my boyfriend and made unfair judgements on him.

label: joy
text: This emotion happened when I passed my primary school examination and was selected for Secondary School.

label: guilt
text: I forgot about a close relatives's birthday.

label: sadness
text: The loss of a very good friend.

label: fear
text: When I heard that my father had found a letter from my boyfriend and he was calling me to talk about it.

label: guilt
text: After masturbation.

label: anger
text: When someone accuses me without reason and is not willing to listen to me.

label: shame
text: In a play (secret friend) during the time of the high school I had to give a present to a boy and I was very ridiculous because of this.

label: shame
text: During my Highschool time I was chairman of the student's comitee. In this function I once had to make a speech to a large audience and I was very nervous. After three sentences I forgot my text.

label: joy
text: Finding out I am chosen to collect norms for Chinese aphasia (I will contribute to China's catching up with the West in neuropsychology).

label: anger
text: "I was at the corner shop, which I patronise regularly I had only a $ 50 note and I purchased about $ 3 worth of goods that I really needed - the keeper made sarcastic remarks to others about people using him to cash notes."

label: joy
text: Receiving a much wanted letter from a very good friend who lives abroad.

label: fear
text: Walking out from the biology building.

label: anger
text: "I experience this emotion quite often but the day I was most angry was the day I got pulled up for something I had not done.  It happened during my school days, I had not spoken a word in class but the monitor had written my name on the board.  So I had a remark in my callender which I had to get signed by my parents.  This remark resulted in me being spanked."

label: anger
text: "I was annoyed when a person higher up asked me why a particular job was not done, it was not my job to do it.  "

label: sadness
text: When my family and I heard of the death of my grandfather.  We had  seen him a few weeks earlier and it seemed that he had just been waiting to see us.

label: anger
text: "I unfairly got a low mark on an exam and I failed to win a grant, since then I don't have much confidence in myself at an exam."

label: sadness
text: "The day that the results of the college entrance examinations for the S. Paulo University were published and I didn't find my name on the list. Entering this University was my greatest wish, and  the fact of not having succeded caused a great frustration, and not only sadness."

label: joy
text: I had gone camping with my old classmates and there was a storm.  We were in a flurry but at that time I felt the love and concern of my friends.

label: fear
text: "I felt fear when I sat for one of my exams. Though my fear was not quite justifiable, I still remember about it."

label: disgust
text: A gigantic spider climbed over my face and what is more - in my own flat.

label: joy
text: Watching China winning the Asian Olympic games.

label: disgust
text: I felt the emotion when I entered a certain ward in the hospital to visit my relative who was sick.

label: anger
text: Being mistreated by other people.

label: disgust
text: Can't remember any episode of disgust.

label: anger
text: "When my brother went out with my new shirt that I adored, and returned it dirty with grease."

label: joy
text: I asked someone to go out and she accepted right away.

label: disgust
text: When I take a look into a slaughter-house and when listening to stories about torturing people or animals.

label: fear
text: My husband suddenly fell ill seriously and during the medical examinations we did not know what would follow.

label: guilt
text: "The sense of guilt came over me too, when I interrupted my studies. Why ? Because I felt guilty before my parents ! They believed in me though this event did not make them disbelieve me."

label: shame
text: When I decided not to out any longer with a girl whom I liked quite a lot.  This made me feel low for a some time.

label: fear
text: "One fears many things, for example one fears going to the dentist. but as far as I am concerned this feeling is connected with the examination session."

label: fear
text: Fearing the use of power or reprimands when I belong to the minority.

label: anger
text: When I had an argument with my best friend and I thought that I was right and she was not.

label: shame
text: Every time I do not write something well in English.

label: disgust
text: "I stormed into the room, hoping to cool myself with some soft music from my three band radio cassette.  There was only young Kaley there and he explained, "" Your aunt has sold it as she wanted to buy clothes."""

label: anger
text: I work at a petrol station. When there is a foreigner who wants petrol my collegues treat him very impolite.

label: joy
text: "Occurs frequently. A recent experience: when going out with many friends, nice music, after the examinations, I felt so happy I could have embraced everybody."

label: disgust
text: "I became disgusted with the man on whom I had counted, who I had trusted, the man who should have been my mainstay - my father. I could hardly make myself (and the others) believe in this emotion. It has cumulated after events and deeds. Everything can happen in this world."

label: joy
text: When I can see my parents because now I am far from them.

label: anger
text: "Anger I felt when my boyfriend told me he didn't mind breaking it off with me, i.e. each of us to take his own road. Because until that moment, he deliberately restricted our dates. The motives were brought to my knowledge later."

label: guilt
text: A friend came to visit me and I was not there.

label: sadness
text: The first time I left home.

label: anger
text: Someone messing up the room we share.

label: guilt
text: "When I was taking the 11th standard exam, my friend who was sitting behind me asked me for some answers.  The teacher looked at us just then and scolded both of us.  Everyone started looking at us and I felt very guilty."

label: sadness
text: My grandmother died.

label: disgust
text: A  group of youngsters dressed in fads talked foul language on a bus.  They also insulted the  pedestrians on the road and were impolite to the passengers of the bus.

label: fear
text: I am scared when I stroll alone on the Chung Chi college campus.

label: shame
text: When I dated my friend's boyfriend after they had broken up.

label: joy
text: When I had a good result in the certificate examination.

label: disgust
text: When I worked at the life-saving sevice and saw the first exitus.

label: fear
text: The emotion came when I misbehaved at school and the Principal threatened me that I was going to be expelled.

label: shame
text: I felt ashamed of myself the first time I drank as nobody in the family drinks.  I felt that I had let down my parents and my friends.

label: fear
text: "I was skiing with friends and they wanted to ski-jump. I did not want to be left behind, so I braced myself and followed them."

label: fear
text: A friend (female) and I were on holiday on Great Barrier Island by ourselves. One night we were nearly raped by about 20 locals - they came to our bach and tried to break the doors down. All of them were stoned or drunk and we hid under the bunks and were totally terrified. Eventually these guys gave up and went looking for us on the beach. We escaped and slept in the bush for 2 nights.

label: fear
text: Walking on a dark street with noone around.

label: fear
text: "One evening, when I had gone fishing with my friends, we heard the roar of a lion near by and had to run for our lives."

label: sadness
text: When I forgot the lyrics during a song contest.

label: shame
text: I slept with a man purely because I found him physically attractive and was under the influence of alcohol.

label: joy
text: "I thought that I was going to fail a subject and so I began to study for the final exam, then my friend told me that I had passed it.  That meant that I could go home, as I do not study in my hometown."

label: joy
text: When I made up with a girl-friend of mine after having been on unfriendly terms with her (my fault).  I cried with joy that evening.

label: joy
text: Achievement of a task by a friend who had begun a new job. She wasn't confident of handling the situation so was thinking  of leaving the job only after 2 days employment.

label: joy
text: "I was sitting for an exam in biochemistry, I was very excited because it was a supplementary examination. I passed the exam very well and was glad because I recovered my selfconfidence."

label: sadness
text: My boyfriend didn't turn up after promising that he was coming.

label: disgust
text: Such a feeling springs up in me sometimes when I have meals at a catering establishment. It is a result either of the look of the food or when watching the way some people eat.

label: joy
text: "One Saturday afternoon, I deliberately dressed up nicely (I had been in a bad mood of late).  I hoped to go for a walk in the soft sunlight to try and uplift my spirits.  When I was having lunch in the canteen, two of my male classmates asked me as to why I was dressed so nicely (they had seldom joked with me before).  One of them said that he had a lounge suit and we would look very nice if we wore them together."

label: guilt
text: When I don't go to my parents on Sunday and phone them to tell them that I have to study. The truth is that I listened to sports on the radio.

label: joy
text: My parents came to visit me.

label: joy
text: When I was finally able to return to a job that I enjoyed doing after several months absence (I was not needed during this time).

label: disgust
text: I heard part of a conversation in which one talked very low about women.

label: fear
text: "Motorcycle accident with two people involved, running off the road. Broke an arm, only."

label: joy
text: When my elder sister had a baby girl.  She was the first girl in the family after 19 years of baby boys.

label: joy
text: When I felt that my love was returned.

label: sadness
text: When my cousin passed away unexpectedly and tragically (a murder).

label: joy
text: "When on holiday in Greece I called my best friend, she told me she passed the examinations and that she had been admitted to the study for speech therapy."

label: shame
text: "At the seaside, when a wave suddenly came and took off my bikini."

label: guilt
text: When my friend was punished for something that I had done.

label: joy
text: Girlfriend arriving back from overseas and picking her up from airport. When she finally appeared from customs and we came in contact again.

label: guilt
text: "Always, and this happens often when I do not keep my word."

label: sadness
text: When I realized that I could not communicate properly with my closest friend.

label: anger
text: "At an examination I got a bad mark just because of a small mistake. When I went to the lector and wanted to talk about that, he did not listen to me but sent me away."

label: shame
text: Was caught stealing apples in a neighbor's garden.

label: fear
text: In the morning just before going to the dentist.

label: anger
text: "When a friend of mine was drawn into a fight because of the stupid gang he belonged to. I felt angry with him and his friends. They could not think about anything sensible, but would fool around without taking into consideration the feelings of other persons."

label: shame
text: My first girlfriend. I had the feeling that she was going out with me only because of my defect.

label: guilt
text: Some time ago I slapped my son without trying to understand who the real culprit of a damage was. After that I felt guilty and bad but it was too late.

label: shame
text: "I insulted two of my friends because I thought that had been gossiping about me right under my nose, however I later found out that they were not doing so."

label: shame
text: When my mother surprised me while masturbating.

label: anger
text: In a conversation my boyfriend expressed definite and quite pretentious opinions and he took up an attitude towards a theory which he himself had never known. His information was from fortuitous sources.

label: disgust
text: When my father thought that I was an unrelaible son.

label: sadness
text: "When my father passed away of cancer, I was extremely saddened. He was not very old, which made matters worse. The actual death was horrendous, but the moving funeral saddened me more so."

label: anger
text: I had not eaten anything for 2 days to be able to pay the fine for my fiancT. But he stayed in another town and spent one thousand shillings in the restaurant during the same time.

label: anger
text: "One of my friends kept criticizing me about everything I did. I thought she was kidding, but later I found out that she was serious."

label: shame
text: "I was nailed. I lied in connection with a book which I took from the library, because I had to keep it for a longer time."

label: joy
text: When I was pressing figures on the curtain cloth. I had bought the cloth after months of hindrances.

label: disgust
text: "Prolonged ""niggling"" of friend on a single theme which I considered of no consequence."

label: fear
text: Confronted outside a party by some very nasty character - gesturing to a car full of mean-acting friends - felt in danger.

label: fear
text: "I had to have my tonsils out. I had been making up my mind almost for a year - I was afraid. But during the two hours in the hospital room, while I was waiting to be called for the operation I felt a real fear - of the pain, of what they were going to do to me, of the unknown."

label: fear
text: I was raped by a friend.

label: anger
text: I was angry at a University tutorial when an ignorant loudmouth persisted in trying to dominate the conversation.

label: fear
text: Hearing a strange noise in the biology building.

label: shame
text: One day I was the leader of the weekly meeting of the Church fellowship.  That day I had been preparing for the exams and did not estimate the time to travel to the church right and I was twenty minutes late.  As I had not prepared well I led the meeting badly.  I was ashamed of myself.

label: shame
text: People impolite with me because I did not get a good report.

label: guilt
text: "I could not take care of my mother when she was admitted to a hospital  for surgery, I continued my studies as I could not get leave."

label: shame
text: "I told my friend about how I had calculated my salary by cheating a little.  When my friend remarked about it, I understood that it was wrong to do so, and I felt ashamed."

label: guilt
text: Fight with my mate after a quarrel.

label: disgust
text: "I was driving along and saw this young guy urinating into the gutter, in broad daylight."

label: disgust
text: Saw a real party leader.

label: sadness
text: "When a close friend, residing in the hostel, lost his father I really pittied him and the situation made me feel sad."

label: anger
text: "I wanted to see a friend, I had been looking forward to it and had certain expectations, but he did not pay any attention to me, played cards with other people."

label: shame
text: I think I felt ashamed for the first time when I entered a night club.

label: shame
text: When I was ten years old a classmate laughed at me because I had told him that my father had retired.

label: joy
text: "When a close friend met me at the station in the middle of the night, when I came back from a long and tiring journey."

label: joy
text: I received an unexpected letter from a friend I had met a short time before.  He sent me a poem and wished me good luck.  I felt very happy because I had great esteem for that person.

label: disgust
text: "When my grandmother was about 80 years old, she lived with us for several years. I saw her illness. I did not even want to breath the air that smelled of her presence."

label: joy
text: An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses paid.

label: joy
text: Good dinner on the National Day.

label: disgust
text: The smell of garlic in rush-hour bus.

label: disgust
text: "I feel disgusted with the bootlickers, with helpless people."

label: fear
text: "I was very startled when, at night at 2.00 am, a boy approached me and yelled ""I fuck you"", then however he stopped and laughed at me."

label: sadness
text: After the loss of a close relative.

label: shame
text: Failing in an examn.

label: guilt
text: At work a boy was injured because of my lack of supervision.

label: shame
text: When inadvertantly I found myself in the ladies room.

label: guilt
text: I mangled the side of my dad's van on a fence. I did not realize the extent of the damage until he showed it to me the next day. The shock on my face was genuine so a friend interceded with a good excuse which I did not deny. I never clarified the situation.

label: disgust
text: "When I was talking to a person who is a hypocrite, I felt disgusted at his reaction."

label: anger
text: Made mistakes in exam.

label: sadness
text: When my uncle died whom I had loved very much. I was very sad and I felt totally helpless.

label: joy
text: Article published in the college newspaper.

label: sadness
text: "One day, I was home and there was a phone call informing me that some of my relatives had died in an accident."

label: shame
text: Being caught in changing the truth (lying).

label: guilt
text: When I did not concentrate on my studies despite my mother's help and cooperation.

label: anger
text: "It was quite recently, at the football match between the national teams of Bulgaria and France. I felt strong anger with the Scottish referee who ran the match quite partially."

label: fear
text: When I am walking on the streets and see a gang of thugs.

label: anger
text: I was told to do something I did not want to do.

label: fear
text: "I was alone at home, in bed reading a womens' magazine in which there were storiees of paranormal experiences.  My leg was itching and I stretched my hand to scratch and I felt another strange hand. (later I realized that it was the corner of the blanket)"

label: sadness
text: My friend was badly hurt.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to the university of Zambia.

label: disgust
text: "When I saw a lady putting on a pair of trousers, I felt it was a disguise according to Malawi culture."

label: joy
text: When I won a tennis match.

label: sadness
text: When I knew about my sister's in law finacial situation and what she was facing.

label: sadness
text: "At the funeral of a friend about 20 years old, who was killed in a hit-and-run motorcycle accident."

label: guilt
text: I had found out that I was pregnant. I talked it over with my boyfriend and he was unsupportive - yet encouraged an abortion - I did.

label: anger
text: One day I was really angry when all my food was eaten by a dog. My anger was against my mother because she was careless. She didn't keep the food in a hidden and proper place.

label: guilt
text: "When my ex-husband left our house, and the children cried because he was not coming back."

label: disgust
text: When I saw a wino by some cans with Food Stamps and use the change to buy wine.

label: sadness
text: I felt sad with the two situations I described before. The cat and the school. Sadness was intermingled with the other feelings.

label: fear
text: "When I was young I had gone to an old lift and played with the antique lift.  The guy discovered me and warned me, I was very frightened."

label: disgust
text: I was at home and I heard a loud sound of spitting outside the door.  I thought that one of my family members would step on the spit and bring the germs in the house.

label: shame
text: In a Christian gathering's lucky draw I mistook a girl's name for mine (a boy's name).  I realized my mistake only when I went up to the stage for the prize.  I did not know what to do as everyone was looking at me.  I blushed and went back to my seat.

label: disgust
text: "I watched the news at the TV, it was a commentary about ""Hainburg"". I felt disgusted when I heard members of the union speak about the situation."

label: guilt
text: I crashed my father's car.

label: disgust
text: "After my +2, when I did not get admission in B.E I felt disgusted."

label: anger
text: I took part in a football match. The referee was extremely partial to the opposite team. This stirred up my discontent and anger.

label: shame
text: I was examined by a teacher I greatly respected. I was well prepared on the subjects but he put some side-issues to me and I couldn't answer.

label: guilt
text: Telling a lie to wife over phone about what I had been working at.

label: sadness
text: After an operation I had to stay in bed for a long time.

label: disgust
text: "When my friend got very low marks in field work even though he had worked throughout the year, I had this feeling."

label: guilt
text: "When I laughed at a lame man walking down the road, it looked funny at the time but later I felt lousy.  It was the same day that I had stolen some coins from my mother in the shop."

label: disgust
text: Someone I know and respect sexually assulted a girl.

label: fear
text: My mother had not come home at midnight.  She had forgotten to tell me about it.  I was very young and all alone at home.

label: shame
text: One day I went for a bath. I took off my clothes and as soon as I had finished my brother came in. I felt sad and I found no reason why he came in.

label: joy
text: "After my vacations, one day after a lecture it occured to me to buy a rose for my mother.  We went together to a pub and my mother told me that she would be getting married next Spring.  I did not known about it and so was all the more glad."

label: guilt
text: Describing to mother how a hole in the wall had appeared while I was babysitting.

label: sadness
text: A close friend of mine was to get married in a weeks time when her father died of a heart-attack.  I knew him well and felt bad on hearing of his death.

label: fear
text: When a drunkard barged into a room where my friend and I had run in order to get away from him.  We were all alone and all I could see was this hand coming towards me.

label: sadness
text: Shifted from Melbourne to Brisbane. All my old school friends gave me a party and I had to say good-bye to them all.

label: disgust
text: I had been forced to get together with strange and disgusting classmates.  The things they talked about disgusted me and made me feel ill at ease.  I knew that I would feel unhappy if I stayed there but I was defeated by the social norms.

label: guilt
text: When I caused needless anxiety to a person close to me because of my lack of self-insight.

label: anger
text: When my room-mate locked up the keys of my room in our room after I had told her that I was  only in the bathroom having a shower.  She left and I had to do without supper.

label: disgust
text: When my best friend started getting involved in my private affairs.

label: fear
text: When I saw a horror film.

label: anger
text: "My mother told me that I could not go to the mountains.  Despite my age, as long as I am in her house I must do what she says."

label: anger
text: A female classmate was always late for meetings which were for the homework and not social gatherings.  We were very busy and the deadline was close but we had to waste half an hour or an hour waiting for her as we could do nothing else then.

label: guilt
text: "When I behaved improperly - fought in a public place.  Afterwards, I felt guilty about my conduct."

label: anger
text: I was angry when my boyfriend did not turn up as promised.

label: anger
text: "My father accused my brother of having bumped his car, and it was wrong."

label: shame
text: I am ashamed of the horrible way I used to treat my little sister.

label: fear
text: The day the results of the certificate exam came out.  I went to school and at first I did not feel frightened.  By the time I reached the fourth floor ( the results were being given on the fifth floor) I found it difficult to walk and felt that I would die.

label: sadness
text: "When I see people with burns I feel sad, actually I can not even express my feelings as I think that they must suffer a lot."

label: fear
text: "When I went up the stairs in a high, dark house full of shadows, passed a door and had the feeling that someone or something was behind me, although I knew I was alone."

label: sadness
text: When I part with my friends I feel always sad for some time. I can't remember a concrete example now. For example I have just parted with a friend of mine and I am feeling sad.

label: sadness
text: "Alone I am coming back home in the night after the serial ""explanation""."

label: disgust
text: When employer made a pass at me whilst I was at work.

label: disgust
text: When my parents insisted that I take up a teaching career.

label: disgust
text: "I do not like one of our neighbours as they are very selfish.  Whenever they want something or need help they come to see us,  otherwise they do not even bother about people who live next to them."

label: joy
text: "After my graduation exams I was waiting to get admitted to a post graduation course, however the situation was not very favourable for me and I was upset.  Suddenly, Bombay university offered me a seat and I landed up in Bombay for my post graduation studies.  This happened last year and was very pleasant for me."

label: guilt
text: When the student union leaders were expelled from the university and we continued to study.

label: sadness
text: When I felt lack of aid from close friends.

label: shame
text: When I failed one of the tests because I had not worked hard enough.

label: shame
text: "When I was hungry, I tried to take the money that my mother had saved up for something else."

label: guilt
text: "In a playground I was playing at the seesaw with a little niece. I wanted to stop but nobody came to help me. When I got off, all alone the seesaw fell down with a big smash. My niece got hurt above her eye. Now there is a scar."

label: sadness
text: When my dog was stolen.

label: joy
text: "My friend replying to my letter and again saying he was attracted to me and suggesting we write, talk and get together and see how things went and his suggestion that I could ring and doing that it was really good - though really insane conversation."

label: guilt
text: "When I met another person I began to go out with him, and my boyfriend (with marriage accorded) met us together he did a great scandal, he broke the engagement and I began to go out with the other, and it didn't work because my mind was all mixed up."

label: sadness
text: "My mother left my father for his best friend, and he moved to Papua New Guinea. Despite the fact that I am closer to my father than to anyone else in my family, I had to move in with my mother, and say good-bye to my father, not knowing when I would see him again."

label: fear
text: "In the traffic with a car, I nearly got crushed between a bus and a tram.  The attention of other drivers saved me at the last moment."

label: fear
text: When burglars with guns forced themselves into my house and ordered me to give them money or face death.

label: anger
text: "I felt anger when I saw that I was being misleaded by my boyfriend, he went out with other girls. I felt anger for his falsity."

label: disgust
text: The day I went to eat dinner in the dinning hall and found a dead fly in my gravy.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a film in which the man suffered from an illness and    his skin came peeling off.

label: sadness
text: "I had a good relationship with two friends. Once without reason, they clearly showed that they thought I was naive, dull and unable to take care for myself, while I expostulated that I could manage things."

label: disgust
text: Obscene phone calls.

label: joy
text: "During my Summer vacations I planned a carnival for the community youth center with a few other volunteers.  I was the head of the organizors and we spent over a month planning it.  During this period we got to know and understood each other.  We discovered each others potential and we planned many interesting things for the carnival.  The day of the carnival everything was bright, the programmes went well and the attendants enjoyed it.  I felt extremely excited about it."

label: anger
text: I had an exam and I had it well prepared.  I did the first part very well but did not know the second part.

label: joy
text: A meeting and a conversation with a woman (somewhat elder than me) who considers me as her child (she also has one child of her own). Last two years I lived with her (no relationship).

label: disgust
text: I visited a place in Morocco where they worked the leather.  I saw the skins emerged in a liquid which ressembled putrification.

label: shame
text: A friend started to insult another person without reason and I felt ashamed of her behavior.

label: shame
text: When some of my close friends and colleagues talk about me and my work and say that I am the brightest student of the college.

label: guilt
text: Did not return the library book on time.

label: anger
text: Insulted for no reason.

label: joy
text: "My sister gave birth to twins, healthy ones."

label: anger
text: On the TV news I heard that Nicaragua had complained about the increasing threat of war with the USA.

label: shame
text: When I don't succeed to fulfill a promise.

label: joy
text: "I received an assignment back, and got an A+ grading."

label: sadness
text: When my beloved uncle was shot dead by relatives.

label: fear
text: I met intoxicated people with dubious intentions in a back alley one Wednesday night.

label: disgust
text: When I have seen people very drunk and making fools of themselves.

label: shame
text: "I had been rude to my mother at a time when she needed comforting, not anger (death of my sister)."

label: joy
text: "When I finally managed to get a specific sound from my guitar, after baving tried for a long time."

label: shame
text: Watching TV about china is behind in winning gold medals.

label: fear
text: Anatomy lesson and told we have to do it at night sometimes.

label: shame
text: Once as a school girl I was copying at a class work and my teacher spotted me.

label: sadness
text: "My dog, whom I had had for eleven years, died. I watched his soporification."

label: fear
text: Being close to drowning.

label: disgust
text: I met my best friend's husband with a prostitute.

label: sadness
text: When one of my best friends commited siucide during these holidays.

label: disgust
text: "I read in the newspaper about a 21 yr. old woman who was found naked and dead along a roadside. It turned out she had had two relatives 14 and 19 who were kidnapped, raped and killed earlier."

label: disgust
text: "The first time I saw a pornographic film, all that in practice is so beautiful but on the screen appered as something mechanical, irrational, disgusting and dehumanizing."

label: sadness
text: When grandfather died.

label: guilt
text: I had fixed a meeting with my classmates and I missed it as I was tired.  Besides everyone at the meeting was a stranger to me and I did not want to make friends with them.  Whatever the reasons - I  felt guilty.

label: anger
text: "I am one of four directors of a company. We inherited land held by our family - ours is the 5th generation. A ""democratic"" decision was made to stap-bank an area of mangroves."

label: guilt
text: "Incomprehension and repression towards a child's behaviour, commonly not accepted, and making the child cry."

label: disgust
text: "I felt this situation when a certain woman from a close village shouted at my mother because she didn't get what she wanted, she wanted some salt to put in her relish."

label: sadness
text: The thought of having to read a boring book of 400 pages in English.

label: joy
text: For about one year I had a rather bad relation with my father. Last Christmas Eve he invited me to stay withhim and I was very glad about it. It was a fine evening.

label: sadness
text: My cat died painfully and slowly.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed at being the only one to have got a C+ in ED120 assignment.

label: joy
text: The joy came when I first proposed a girl at Secondary School.

label: guilt
text: I had told my boyfriend that I did not want to go on with our relationship.  I knew that I was important to him but I wanted to be free.  I saw that this was difficult for him but I remained firm and did not change my mind.

label: disgust
text: "Our neighbour came and gossiped, about others, with my parents."

label: disgust
text: "My life-partner is going through a crisis (way of life, old-fashioned values) and can only get out of it by talking bold decisions.  I have noticed his cowardice and attempts to escape his problems by drinking.  I detest his drinking and his being full of self-pity."

label: disgust
text: When I saw our computer teacher.

label: fear
text: When I dreamed that I was being attacked by a friend.

label: guilt
text: My mother developed hipertonia and I think I too am to blame bacause with her it is a stress disease.

label: disgust
text: One of my good friends told people something I had told her in confidence about someone else.

label: guilt
text: "Car accident, hurt three of my closest family."

label: anger
text: Argument with roommate over a lock he had put on kitchen cupboard without telling anyone.

label: fear
text: I was very scared at the time of the Ty.B.Sc examination as I had decided to get 1st class results.  I was afraid thinking of how the papers would be.

label: joy
text: Had a letter from my father (usually he does not write to me).

label: sadness
text: "I had asked the teacher to write a recommendation letter for me, but I had not provided enough information and had run short of time."

label: anger
text: "My best friend started moving out with my boyfriend. When I heard this my heart sank because I didn't expect that my own good friend could do such a thing, so I got angry."

label: guilt
text: One time I felt guilty when I told one of my previous boyfriends we were through just because I never felt like having one at that particular time.

label: disgust
text: I saw a sort of black worm being attacked by many ants.

label: anger
text: "When a person is privileged in account of situations that are unjust, and disloyal to colleagues and friends."

label: anger
text: Arriving home from work after a long and tiring day to find no dinner prepared as I had expected.

label: shame
text: China not doing well in the Asian Olympic games.

label: fear
text: Canoeing across harbour in winds - 20 knots and rising seas.

label: anger
text: My mother carried on using mental pressure concerning something which was serious and a real burden to me.

label: disgust
text: A class-mate answered (accidentally) the call of nature in the class during a tough mathematics examination.

label: joy
text: Talking with a nice girl.

label: joy
text: "Day before yesterday my mother bought me a new pair of shoes, without my having asked for them.  She told me that when she saw the pair of shoes she felt like buying them for me.  I really liked the shoes and they made me feel that my mother cares for me."

label: anger
text: I was enjoying the company of bird life while I was eating lunch in a park when a group of people began throwing sticks at some of the birds - for no reason other than the satisfaction of seeing them being scared away.

label: joy
text: "The day when my son said for the first time ""mummy""."

label: fear
text: "At age 10 my foster grandmother died, I had a fear of dying."

label: joy
text: When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

label: disgust
text: I worked in a harbour and emptied latrine containers from the back of the lorries.

label: guilt
text: "I had asked the Salvation Army to take away a piece of furniture of mine, but I forgot to cancel the agreement (a friend of mine took it) and I thereby caused the Salvation Army people some unnecessary work."

label: disgust
text: I saw a film where snakes were crawling everywhere. I felt them crawling over all my body with that ... skins. The noise that they did disturbed me very much.

label: fear
text: "After my car accident, when I woke up in a heap of stones."

label: fear
text: When I was little I lost control of my bike and started to go into a buay intersection but my neighbor stopped me just in time.

label: anger
text: Insulted by the class leader.

label: joy
text: "My boyfriend suffered form ill health for some months, this week the physician told him that he was restored to health."

label: joy
text: Getting back with my boyfriend after a year away - apart.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted when I was in a restaurant which didn't appear to be clean and orderly. (I do not like to be in unclean environments).

label: fear
text: "I was to meet one of my friends (girl) at the library at 8:00 already dark. She would be walking alone. She was 45 minutes late but I kept waiting, calling her room and other places she could have been."

label: disgust
text: Once at a camp a classmate criticized me in front of others.  Now I find that this classmate is very disgusting.

label: disgust
text: An Engineer I know wants war so he can get a job making bombs.

label: disgust
text: My brother caught a spider and let his frog eat it.

label: guilt
text: When I broke up my relationship with my former girlfriend as she would ask me irrelevant quetions about my past.

label: joy
text: When I was told that I was selected to attend Medical Assistant Training.

label: shame
text: "My father died after two very painful weeks in bed. I felt relieved, and was ashamed of that."

label: disgust
text: "This is an incident that many of us witness in our everyday life in a city like Bombay.  One day I was travelling by bus, three men dragged two fellows out of the bus.  Once outside they were beaten into pulp.  These two fellows, who got beaten, were pick-pockets and they were being beaten by all and sundry.  I thought to myself -""what is life?"".  It is one hell of a place where everyone is after someone else.  One waits to cut the throat of the other one just for a living, (money).  When I think about such things - the purpose of life, etc, I feel very disgusted and dejected."

label: joy
text: "Being reunited with my family after not having seen them for 5 years, at the airport. Sheer elation at getting through the ""paper work"" collecting bags and the anticipation of coming through the customs gate."

label: sadness
text: I felt sad when I heard that my girlfriend was double-crossing me with the boy who is my best friend.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had passed my end of first year exams and I was ready to enter 2nd year because I felt I had failed as they were very hard.

label: shame
text: While playing I urinated on grandma's floor and did not go to the lavatory.  My cousin told grandma and she came.

label: anger
text: I had stolen a bottle of rum from a person who knows me well. He threatened to call the police if I did not pay 500 Shillings.

label: guilt
text: Sleeping through crew practice one Monday morning.

label: anger
text: I was really angry when the President general of UNZASU was arrested by policemen.

label: disgust
text: "In school I had difficulties mith mathematics. When I had to work for an examination, I really felt disgusted."

label: disgust
text: When a girl I knew aborted and threw the seven month foetus in a man-hole.

label: disgust
text: From the cigarette smoke. Usually I feel disgust from it when I am in a restaurant.

label: guilt
text: After the death of a girl who I disliked.

label: joy
text: The time I first saw my cousin who is living in Tanzania.

label: joy
text: I felt very happy when I heard I had passed the examination to move up to the second year course.

label: guilt
text: When I deliberately engineered a situation to cause tension between friends so as to bolster the impression one of them had of me !

label: joy
text: "When I got an unexpected letter from  a guy, who had been my school mate."

label: anger
text: During the short period of my unemployment about six years back.

label: sadness
text: When my mother and father separated (it was a brief separation and they are together now).

label: anger
text: I once failed a test miserably and my friend did very well and someone made a nasty comment while comparing me to my friend.

label: guilt
text: A great friend of mine travelled with the intention to change his life. He didn't succeed and returned depressed. I had not power to support his frustration and his behavioral change.

label: anger
text: Being told that I have not got a personality.

label: shame
text: "I feel shame every time I think of very dear friends of mine abroad who were family to me for a year, and now 2 years later, I have attempted, but have not actually gone through with corresponding with them, to express my feelings and gratitude."

label: sadness
text: When I came to know that my grandmother had died.  She was very close to me.

label: joy
text: When my brother who has been out of New Zealand for 10 years came to visit with his wife which none of our family had previously met.

label: sadness
text: "My dog of 16 and 1/2 years - ""Lord Grey"" died in his sleep - His death caused me more and deeper sadness than I thought."

label: anger
text: My boyfriend told me that I had very high demands towards him. In my opinion this was wrong.

label: fear
text: Damaged the tap in the residental Hall.

label: sadness
text: Finding out that China is still backward in science.

label: joy
text: My boyfriend returned after a long absence.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty after hearing that my girlfriend with whom I had spent most of my time was pregnant.

label: shame
text: When I was young I felt ashamed when our relatives visited us and I hid myself.

label: guilt
text: Classes were over and I wanted to go home.  A friend of mine asked me to wait for half an hour to take him back home.  I said no.

label: sadness
text: When my daughter had problems with her friends and I could see her predicament from the window.  She was given a the cold shoulder.

label: fear
text: "At school, I had acted against the will of the group, and the next day they promised to take revenge on me."

label: fear
text: When my father was very drunk and raging at home.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to this university despite my having studyied in difficulty throughout my secondary school days.

label: joy
text: When we took out an 84 year old woman for the evening and had hamburgers. She described the evening out as her happiest night out in 20 years.

label: disgust
text: My brother gave me a beating because he could not beat me verbally.

label: fear
text: "When one of my relatives went out at night leaving me and my friend alone, I cheated my parents that she didn't go out, after they had heard that she was out, I was afraid that she might have beaten me."

label: guilt
text: "After having told an authority figure a very large lie I was told she believed me, because she believed I had never lied to her. "

label: joy
text: When I succeed in writing something I felt and doing it I felt well and very happy for being able to express to myself something that was suffocating me.

label: anger
text: "When my mother scolded me for coming home late, i.e after 7 P.M."

label: sadness
text: "I tried my level best to care for my client, I took an appointment with a doctor and before meeting the doctor he expired - a poor small boy from Uttar Pradesh."

label: sadness
text: When my parents did not let me go on a study tour.

label: joy
text: "When, for example, I was in my eleventh school year and I learned I had been classed for the Bulgarian Language and Literature National Olympiad."

label: guilt
text: A situation where I stole a friends wife's wallet.

label: disgust
text: "At a Sm÷rgasbord table, a man mixed differnet kinds of picked herrings with fruit salad."

label: disgust
text: A tiresome person held me up all day long.  I was very busy then (I can not remember what the problem was).  He continously tried to make me talk to him and disturbed me.

label: fear
text: I was walking home late at night from lectures and someone deliberately started following me. It was dark and I was scared.

label: joy
text: When I was accepted to study at this school I was very happy.

label: joy
text: Joy at meeting a woman I love very much.

label: disgust
text: "When a girl in my class (on the secondary school) appeased the teacher, resulting in getting a higher grade. This occurred often with her."

label: disgust
text: When one learns through the mass media all the wars and killing going on in the world.

label: fear
text: "When I took blood from a patient for alcohol estimation and urine for some other examination, he told me that something bad would happen to me as he would play magic on me."

label: anger
text: "When I played in a chess championship, I was disturbed by other people. I asked them to be quiet, but in vain."

label: guilt
text: Reported neighbour to police for taking to my daughter with baseball ball - her counsellor rang me and after long talk convinced me the woman was o.k. I felt guilty for ringing the police then guilty for feeling guilty about it.

label: joy
text: "Coming to this lecture and listen to you talking about feelings, I am so happy that foreigners have the same feelings as Chinese."

label: fear
text: I felt afraid just before receiving the question paper of the part II exam.

label: anger
text: My lovely girlfriend double-crossed me and so that I found her chatting with another guy.

label: disgust
text: Some friends and I were having lunch.  Someone said something funny and one of the guys started laughing and spat his food in a girl's face.

label: anger
text: Once in my work it happened a fight between the person in charge and me. I got so angry and spoke out everything I felt at the moment.

label: joy
text: Getting University Entrance accredited and arriving home from boarding school on accrediting leave.

label: sadness
text: "During the Christmas holidays, I went to see my parents and stayed with them for two weeks. After two or three days, we had the same conflicts we had had ten years before when I had lived with them. They were glad when I left."

label: joy
text: I have a new born child.

label: shame
text: Not being able to be selected for the dancing team.

label: anger
text: "I had been having a heated argument with a lover - whose intention was that we should marry in the near future - and was rejected by her when I started to cry. When I stopped crying for a moment she said ""There, have you got it all out now ?""."

label: fear
text: "I turned the knob of my granny's two band radio and did not hear any broadcast,  "" What ! Have I broken the knob ? How much does it cost ? What if the spare part is not available ? ""  --I did not know how to tune a radio."

label: disgust
text: "Once I offended a friend, instead of her coming to me to ask and discuss the matter she was just telling other people about it and say all she could about me."

label: guilt
text: When I broke something and a friend of mine was blamed.

label: fear
text: Going out alone in the dark.

label: shame
text: We had arranged a beach party with 20 people. There my father got drunk I felt very ashamed.

label: joy
text: Last year I passed the B.A exams in Psychology in which I stood first in my class.  Thus I got the first prize from the college.  I was most happy to tell all this to my parents and friends.

label: fear
text: "When I was a kid, I always opened the door to greet my father when he came back from work.  One day it so happened that his hair was scattered due to over-crowding in the train, and when I opened the door as usual I saw something else.  I was so scared that I could not talk."

label: joy
text: "While having a discussion with a colleague of mine, I realized that her conception of man and work were similar to mine."

label: sadness
text: I realized that the girl I loved had to leave me.

label: sadness
text: A friend's mother died.

label: anger
text: At boarding school someone put a lot of tiny thorns on my bed.  When I complained everybody began teasing me and laughing at my inability to find out my enemies.  I lost my temper.

label: joy
text: I was happy when I understood that the girl I liked was in love with me.

label: sadness
text: Being sexually assulted and told my friends about it (we cried together).

label: sadness
text: A close friend died.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty of having suspected my room-mate of stealing the money last term.

label: disgust
text: When I watched a film about the problems of abandoned children (PIXOTE).

label: shame
text: "I thought I would be able to use the mangle of the house, and so I did not want any help.  However, I blocked it and I had to get the janitor to help me out.  He reproached me for not having followed the instructions"

label: joy
text: "I was in the living room at home with an ex-boyfriend, it was nearly a year that we had separated, during the talk he began to remember our courting and gave me a long kiss."

label: fear
text: When I forgot the lines of the play during an orientation camp.

label: sadness
text: When my close friend was involved in an accident and passed away instantly.  He had gone to buy a new car and had asked me to wait at his home so that I could see his new car.

label: fear
text: "Fear - paralysing - that I would not be accepted by the God who I believed to be there because I was ""morally bankrupt"" (before becoming a Christian and realising that that was why Christ came to free us from sin and to forgive us)."

label: disgust
text: Being in a Malaysian city with my girlfriend coming out of a picture theatre - seeing her rush up to a taxi that a very old sick man was trying to get to. Seeing her take over the taxi.

label: disgust
text: "When I patronized a certain tavern which had prostitutes, it was almost a brothel."

label: disgust
text: I was dancing Malipenga (traditional dance). I exaggerated the steps I was supposed to make in the negative way. This happened in front of spectators. It was bad for our Boma (group) because I was on the front line where ability is displayed and it is this ability that counts when choosing the winning side.

label: sadness
text: "My father had a complicated operation. A long time before and also a long time after that, we did not know how he would get over it. During all that time I felt very sad."

label: fear
text: An hour before receiving the certificate results I was very frightened.  When I saw others crying I felt very tense and as time went by my fear grew.

label: guilt
text: I ran over my dog with a bicycle when I was carrying him tied to the handle bar.

label: fear
text: Finding out in your lecture that a doctor can make misdiagnoses because of ignorance in neuropsychology.

label: anger
text: "When I was dancing with a dame at a social, one of my friends who  was interested in her came and took her away from me.  I was really angry with him then."

label: shame
text: I was running in front of a crowd when I slipped and fell on a wet lawn.

label: joy
text: Hearing Fran Wilde introduce the Bill.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed when my boyfriend went to sit with another girl when he invited me to come to watch Drama festival.

label: disgust
text: "When I went home by train from Sicilia, I was molested by a man."

label: guilt
text: "When as a 7 year old, I stole money from my mother."

label: anger
text: "When my brothers were being cruel to my boyfriend, because his flat-mate bent back one of my brother's fingers. It wasn't his fault."

label: guilt
text: I send a word to my boss through my servant telling him that I would not report for work as I was not feeling well and that the   doctor had refused to give me sick leave.  My intention was actually to go out of Lusaka for a week-end.  I left the same day and the following morning my boss found me in Mongu.  I felt guilty when asked to explain things on my return.

label: disgust
text: "I was travelling in a local train when a drunkard, smelling terribly, entered the same carriage and started eating fish that was stinking."

label: disgust
text: Someone smoking on Electric train (Electric trains are non-smoking) with alcohol smell coming from person.

label: disgust
text: "The acts of brutal violence in generally disgusts me. Fights, phisical aggrssion, etc."

label: sadness
text: This feeling was quite deep when my friend (girl) died in a car accident.

label: fear
text: Two years ago I saw a film on the TV. Even now it makes me afraid.

label: joy
text: China winning the Asian Olympic games.

label: fear
text: My uncle was taken to the UTC for an operation as he had cancer.  There had been a lot of deaths of late - 3 out of every 4 operated.  I was scared for my uncle's life.

label: fear
text: "When going for my driver's licence for the third time, because everything, it seemed, hinged on getting it. I was really nervous, and the testing Officer made me a little afraid as well. There were lots of things to worry about. I passed however."

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted to find out that the water isn't filtered or purified before it leaves Latimer Hall from the drains.

label: disgust
text: "When I went to report a stolen good at the police station, the woman-officer-in-charge was very rude and did not seem to have respect for anyone."

label: shame
text: I scolded my sister without waiting for her explanation.

label: anger
text: Being sexually assulted on a bus and noone helped (people only laughed).

label: disgust
text: With a woman who had walked into my place of employment and urinated on the floor in front of everyone.

label: joy
text: When I received a positive answer from my appeal to withdraw my registration at UNZA.

label: sadness
text: Saying goodbye at the airport to my boyfriend who has to go to school back East. We are very close and have been together 4 years.

label: joy
text: When we were able to afford a new sofa - a leather one which cost SEK 20000.  I had waited for it for 2-3 years.

label: guilt
text: When I cheated my father about the book allowance at university.  He discovered that we were given K150 per year for books.

label: joy
text: "When I was in a situation which seemed hopeless for me, I moved back to my parents. For my father it went without saying anything (normally he ofter grumbles at me)."

label: disgust
text: I was eating in the dinning hall and some women joined me.  I could not eat with them so I left the dinning hall.

label: sadness
text: Insulted by my mother.

label: joy
text: "Getting my kitten, found at work several years ago, taking him home in a box on my motorbike, showing it to my defacto."

label: fear
text: "While preparing my master's thesis, I was scared that I would not accomplish anything as the subject was rather difficult."

label: joy
text: Meeting with two of my friends I had not seen for 15 years. They were special people to me.

label: guilt
text: It was when I injured a friend accidentally with a stone. It made a cut on the cheeks which resulted in suturing.

label: anger
text: When after a lot of provocation my child threw a plate on the floor.

label: disgust
text: A close friend took part in a racist violent action.

label: fear
text: "This was when I was being followed home every day from the campus, by a stranger.  He would follow me to the campus and then sit outside my class.  If I was not there he would ask my friends as to where I was.  He was a dark, ominous looking person and I was terrified of him as I did not know his intentions.  I reported him to the security officer, who turned him over to the police.  I was even more petrified then."

label: sadness
text: I felt sad at having to leave my girlfriend after constant problems and failed attempts at reconciliation.  My sadness was caused by the irreversibility of the decision.

label: fear
text: "One night, when I got out from the University I saw two strange people near my car. When I got near, they moved away, and then came close again. I had a feeling that they were assaulters. After I left I discovered that the windshield was broken."

label: sadness
text: At the death of my friend's father and especially as this happened ten days before her wedding.

label: anger
text: I am a teacher in arts and crafts (boys from 15-16 years). for them it is obligatory and they dislike it. They tease me. When one of them cut up some material I flared up.

label: sadness
text: The death of a close relative.

label: fear
text: I feel fear when I only imagine I could lose confidence in my own abilities and powers. A similar feeling I feel sometimes before an exam.

label: sadness
text: "When my best friend died, at the age of 16."

label: fear
text: "Once at midnight, I was working alone at office and the phone suddenly rang."

label: fear
text: Telling my parents that I did not well in an examn.

label: disgust
text: "The carterer refused to give me sugar to add to my tea saying that there was no sugar whilst it was there, so I left the cafe disgusted without taking the tea."

label: joy
text: When I got a good grade for an exam in statistics.

label: joy
text: "When they phoned me from Great-Britain to tell me that I could go there, if I wished, in Summer."

label: sadness
text: It was shocking news to me when I received a telegram from home telling me that my grandmother had passed away. I had to go home to attend the funeral but unfortunately I found that the burial had already taken place.

label: joy
text: I passed an exam which I thought I had failed.

label: fear
text: In a dark street at 4 o'clock in the night and there was complete silence.

label: shame
text: "The last time I had to phone the Registry, after having called them so many times in the last few days."

label: shame
text: I kicked the dog outside on a cold night because he was annoying me. The next day he came down with the flu and we thought he was going to die.

label: joy
text: "When I worked as an ""au-pair-girl"" in London, I received a call from a good friend who told me that she was in London too and wanted to see me. I was very glad - after that call and especially when I saw her."

label: fear
text: "I had decided to propose to the man I liked to make a trip together.  One day, during breakfast I told him my idea.  I was afraid of his not accepting it and that the idea would end up as a failure."

label: shame
text: "At using other people, because of sexual experience that was using another to the detriment of both. Anxiety that I may have affected another for the worst."

label: anger
text: "I went to the dining hall and found that the cooks were cleaning the plates and there was no food for me, and the blue birds  (security guards) were busy eating the food that was supposed to be for me."

label: anger
text: When being made look a fool by the teacher in front of the class during a turn.

label: fear
text: A film on zombies.

label: guilt
text: "One night during dinner my nephew was naughty, so I quarrelled with my  parents.   I regreted this as my nephew was only two years old and I  had to tolerate him !  The quarrel made my father think that his children  may not take care of him in the future (it was a slip of the tongue and  this made me realize that my father keeps his thoughts to himself).  I was  still very angry so I dropped my bowl and chopsticks and went to the kitchen  to drink tea and then ran to the other side of the house."

label: anger
text: "My girlfriend does practice and therefore leaves me alone at night and in the weekend. In addition, she is very busy doing several things. So we don't see each other often."

label: guilt
text: "One day when I was working, I went out for dinner with friends without my parents knowledge and I only came home at 2300 hours."

label: disgust
text: When I noticed two spiders running on the floor in different directions.

label: fear
text: I was walking to my car at night and thought that I was being followed.

label: anger
text: I was angry this morning when I missed the train to university.

label: fear
text: "I'm afraid of driving on the special seat of a mororcycle, mainly with certain colleagues who by exces of self-confidence drive beyond limits or measure in the traffic and the main victim is always the person who sits behind the driver."

label: sadness
text: When the girl whom I have lusted after expressed reciprocal feelings and then days later changed her mind.

label: sadness
text: I was once nominated as an Officer Cadet in the Armed Forces and my name was cancelled on the list of nominees of those who were sent to Kenya for Training.

label: anger
text: "When I saw a car run over a child, out of carelessness."

label: anger
text: "A time when, as part of my work, I was sent out actually sort of volunteered to run an errand for someone who had no authority to send me out and the address was very far especially on foot and turned out to be incorrect too. The whole trip was a waste."

label: guilt
text: "I call my mother at least once a week. However last week I completely forgot. This morning she called me, she thought I felt ill."

label: guilt
text: When I shout at a colleague in classroom.

label: fear
text: In the dark an unreal figure formed by a shadow.

label: joy
text: When I get a hug from someone I love.

label: fear
text: I felt fear when I fell down and broke my leg into pieces and I could not feel it at all.

label: guilt
text: This I experienced when going around with more than one girl.

label: disgust
text: "On a trip abroad, a lady-like member of our group turned out to be an alcoholic.  She spoilt many days of my holidays because of her behaviour and paranoia."

label: fear
text: When a man rang the doorbell and wanted to enter the house with violence. I was alone at home that moment.

label: disgust
text: "I felt very disgusted at a friend to whom I had given a Psychology book to read, and she did not care to give me back the book during the exams."

label: joy
text: "The day I received the key of my apartment and we could enter in it, for my fiancT and I had bought it yet in plans, and it seemed to us that this was almost impossible to happen."

label: disgust
text: At a party where the boys were telling revolting stories about the girls they'd been with.

label: guilt
text: I wanted to get rid of a bad habit and it seemed that I had succeeded.  However a year later I got the bad habit again.  I felt  useless as I always found excuses to explain my behaviour.  As a result I felt guilty.

label: sadness
text: When my grandfather died.

label: disgust
text: When I could not attend the college picnic due to some difficulties.

label: guilt
text: "At secondary school, one of my classmates lost her locker key.  During a class I saw two other classmates holding a key and talking secretly.  I do not know why I suspected them, also another classmate supported me.  He remembers that these people had only one key in the key-ring, this had seemed strange to him.  Besides another classmate said that he had seen them selling books at a book-shop and they should not have had such books.  I told the teacher and the person was caught.  He had sold the books and was forced to quit school.  I found that I had not helped him as he stole later on also.  I felt guilty"

label: sadness
text: When my parents got divorced.

label: sadness
text: When my brother (5th in the family) passed away.

label: disgust
text: Spit and vomit.

label: shame
text: I gave a wrong answer at school.

label: anger
text: When I learnt that my younger sister had been expelled from secondary school because she was pregnant.  That was the second time that this happened in the family - the first time it had been my elder sister.

label: shame
text: When I was young I was told to to the shop to buy a dozen eggs.  I went and asked for one egg and the people in the shop laughed at me and so did my family when I told them what had happened.

label: disgust
text: "My mother called me because she had read through the enveloppe a letter addressed to me.  She denied having read it intentionally and said ""the words just popped out through the enveloppe as the sun was shining on it"". Hah Hah."

label: anger
text: "My father had bought too many goods for his shop, there was not enough space to store them."

label: disgust
text: "Disgust - no. Maybe it is more precise to say revultion at a worm or a snake. But I mean it in a social aspect when somebody had behaved like a scoundrel to you, when by his actions he has made you change your attitude towards him but I thing this feeling the way I meant it, is not typical for the people interrelations."

label: disgust
text: "At an anti-pornography meeting, when samples from films and magazines were shown."

label: guilt
text: When I overate at lunch.

label: guilt
text: I lied to my mother in the sixth form she said she would ring to find out and I had to tell her I had lied.

label: fear
text: "I was walking with another person when a ""gang"" separted us and pushed me in to a house, hit me in the stomach and the face, then they left - leaving me bleeding."

label: sadness
text: "My child, unexpectedly started acting in a restless and disturbing way at school.  In addition his performance at school weakened."

label: shame
text: After I had given the wrong answer to my students they pointed it out to me and I had to correct myself.

label: fear
text: "I felt fear when once I was asleep and dreamed that I was dying asfixiated by a cardiac attack, I was afraid and woke up desperate. Altough I wasn't afraid of death I was afraid."

label: shame
text: I felt shame when I discontinued my education for eight months.

label: sadness
