text: My elder brother had been expelled from college and he was so frustated that he attempted suicide - he drank bottle fragments.  I was very sad when I learnt this.

label: disgust
text: It was in a tramway-carriage: A stranger insulted a girl just because she blew her nose. I detested his behaviour.

label: fear
text: "When I was stopped by plain clothes policemen because the car I was driving had overturned on the Avenue.  I had been driving too fast, and I was afraid when I was stopped, questionned and then toild to go.  The situation ended happily since there were no consequences."

label: anger
text: It was necessary to organise a competition in connection with a celebration. Everyone was to be present at that event. It turned out that there was no audience at all because everyone had pretended to be very intelligent and no one had come. I got furious.

label: guilt
text: Talking about someone behind their back.

label: shame
text: I had lunch in a restaurant with a friend and I paid the bill.  The change was that of a two dollar and a ten cent coin.  As I was talking with my friend I took the two dollar coin and forgot to leave a tip.

label: shame
text: "When I was taking an exam in grade 5.  The examinator found me with a note-book and accused me of copying, All the students laughed at me."

label: shame
text: "When I was leaving home I decided to leave without saying good-bye to my young brother.  My brother saw me and said,        "" Will you not say good-bye to me?""  He is only 31/2 years old. "

label: sadness
text: "Sometimes, when I'm alone I am seized by this feeling. But it always helps me to come round and at the same time to judge if it is worth. Very often this feeling is caused to me by people - friends who I love and respect."

label: guilt
text: When I hurt a person's feelings.

label: fear
text: I got lost in a foreign town. I did not know the language of that country and it took me hours to meet my friends again.

label: anger
text: "When I knew that they would not give me a transfer from one university to another.  I began to insult the educatioon authorities and the government, I ended up at the door."

label: shame
text: I slipped on butter one evening in the Dining Commons landed on my rear causing my tray also to land on the floor.

label: guilt
text: I was late meeting someone for an appointment.

label: disgust
text: "Very intoxicated men who incite each other to fight.   I met a vile smelling man on the tram who got closer and closer to me till I got up, then he got angry."

label: joy
text: "I am not especially good at English, and after the high school graduation exam in English I tensely waited for the result the whole day.  In the evening, when I heard that I had done excellently, I became very happy and the anxiety vanished.  My family was at home."

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I got the message that I had been accepted as a student in medicine.

label: guilt
text: "A friend was going to come stay the weekend with me, but something came up and I cancelled out on him."

label: fear
text: I was afraid when I met my Uncle because this time I was with my boyfriend I thought I was not going to be given pocket money.

label: anger
text: "When during a social evening with my father, brother, sister, close friend and my father's 2nd wife - I had an argument with my father, who abused my friend who was sticking up for me."

label: joy
text: My girlfriend sent me a letter with a shiny picture in it.

label: fear
text: I am afraid before an exam or colloquium.

label: guilt
text: "In the begining of teenage, on the matters of sex - speaking about sex."

label: guilt
text: When I did not go to work because I had to study for a midterm.

label: anger
text: My girlfriend started singing (she cannot sing) and did not stop despite my asking her to do so.

label: disgust
text: "When, for example, someone is calumnating."

label: anger
text: Being refused to attend the neuropsychology lecture in the medical university.

label: disgust
text: A friend prepared a soup with chicken heads and invited me to eat it. I saw the eyes staring at me and the tongues hanging out of the bills. I was so disgusted that I felt nausea and had to leave the room.

label: anger
text: When a pick-pocket robbed me of my money (K20) while I  was buying bathing soap.

label: guilt
text: Once while playing tennis with my classmate I lost a few tennis balls.  I found one near the tennis court and took it to be mine despite thinking that it might belong to the student in the next court.  I felt guilty.  Later someone came to me to claim the ball and I gave it back to him.

label: joy
text: I was admitted to the University and a niece was born to me.

label: joy
text: When I was in the sauna bath.

label: anger
text: NO RESPONSE.

label: disgust
text: When I was told that the brother who was staying with me would not go to the training school that year but only the year after.

label: shame
text: When some unforgiving acquaintance dragged up an old and rather embarassing situation from my past.

label: anger
text: I was sleeping nicely until in the middle of the night when I became awake because a friend called me for some (in my opinion) nonsens reason.

label: joy
text: When I was accepted as a student.

label: shame
text: "In our class we had a test on Nursing, so a friend from the Army was caught peeping, by using a paper which had already answers which was written by him. So all of us from the Army got ashamed."

label: joy
text: My boyfriend was playing with my cat. He was playing games with her and telling nice things to her.

label: guilt
text: This feeling comes frequently when I go out at night and tell my mother that I shall come back early. But then I get home a 5 or 6 a.m.

label: joy
text: Winning a rowing race at a Karapiro regatta. With 7 other friends.

label: guilt
text: The first time I went away with my boyfriend and lied about where we were staying.

label: anger
text: I was badly beaten up by one of my friends during a wedding party.

label: disgust
text: "When I was working, I got treated in a way which I felt was not democratic."

label: sadness
text: When I was trying for a girl who I really liked and cared for and thought she felt the same way too. But she didn't like the idea and just wanted to stay friends.

label: shame
text: "I lied, to be precise I cancelled a meeting with a good friend."

label: fear
text: Once I woke up in the middle of the night and felt frightened as everyone else was sleeping and I could not even go to their room.

label: joy
text: A good report card (a scholarship) in primary school.

label: disgust
text: When I read racist slogans on the walls.

label: anger
text: "I am a school teacher.  One of the classes does not obey me at all, keeps on talking, does no work.  One afternoon, everything went wrong, and I got exceedingly angry."

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died.

label: joy
text: Listening to the opening bars of Tchaikovsdy's symphony No.2 fourth movement at my sister's wedding.

label: guilt
text: "I threw away an object, which belonged to a friend, because I did not know what to do with it. My friend was very sad about that and I felt guilty."

label: fear
text: "While taking a short cut through the Vasa park, I was surrounded by three people who tried to steal my money.  I was scared and was saved only by the appearance of other people."

label: anger
text: This was the worst incident of my hostel life.  I was insulted by a close friend of mine on the eve of the New year and it totally spoiled my New year's night.

label: joy
text: "When I finished my exams after 12th Grade, I was worried about getting a T.E. Score high enough for Physiotherapy. When I found that I had been accepted I was ecstatic, or more appropriately, could jump for joy."

label: joy
text: Helping in the nursery school.

label: joy
text: Found out my wife (girl-friend?) pregnant.

label: fear
text: In March I was busy studying during the night I could only sleep two or three hours only for fear that I would be weeded and sent back.

label: disgust
text: I received a letter which was too strong for me. It said I had done something which I really didn't do.

label: fear
text: I felt fear when one night my aunt and Uncle left me alone at their house to look after the baby when they went to a party.

label: sadness
text: At the end of my senior yr. in high school I found out that a friend of mine I knew had cancer had been diagnosed as terminally ill.

label: disgust
text: "I happened to see the video-tape movie ""This is America - Part one"" at my friend's place."

label: shame
text: It was a shameful moment when I heard that I had failed my Primary School leaving Certificate Exam in 1978. My girlfriend was there when the news was released.

label: joy
text: When my first child was born.

label: disgust
text: "When one individual takes advantage of and/or injures another relatively defenseless individual, consciously. I feel disgust mingled with anger. A person on my dorm floor verbally assaulted another person for having a certain religious belief."

label: joy
text: When I was selected to come here.

label: fear
text: "When I was a child, I heard the floor cracking and I thought there was a burglar in our house; I hid under the blanket and trembled."

label: guilt
text: When I told the driver at my workplace to lie and tell the boss that it was not me who was responsible for the delay.  The boss was very annoyed and the driver was punished and a day's salary was taken away from him.

label: joy
text: When I got a letter from home.

label: guilt
text: When I splashed a child by not slowing down while driving through a puddle of water.

label: disgust
text: A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the child was very upset when arriving at home.

label: disgust
text: In the bus I was sitting next to a colleage who was drunk and behaved in keeping with his state.

label: disgust
text: Once I had to clean a lavatory which was obstructed.  It was in a friend's country house and there was nobody there to help me.

label: sadness
text: I felt sad when I was despised by another person.

label: fear
text: "I was travelling back home by boat with two friends of mine after a lovely holiday trip.  The night and the sea were dark, and the wind was blowing.  I feared that death was there on the boat, I somehow felt sure about it.  I feared being left alone."

label: fear
text: When I was in a little fishing boat and we ran into hard weather in the open sea.

label: sadness
text: "My friend got married and went abroad, this made me feel sad and lonely."

label: joy
text: Blank.

label: joy
text: When I took my entrance exams successfully and also when I got my school leaving certificate because the delivering ceremony was extremely official.

label: guilt
text: When I nearly got my fiancee pregnant.

label: sadness
text: When India lost the Benson and Hedges cricket trophy.

label: shame
text: "At a concert an old man arrived and began to danse, sing and do silly things."

label: shame
text: A theft committed by me.

label: sadness
text: When my first boyfriend left me. I tried not to let him understand I felt miserable.

label: sadness
text: "One of the greatest sadness was when my grandfather died, because I loved him very much."

label: disgust
text: A friend of mine remembered me when she needed me and did not even think about me when she did not need me.

label: sadness
text: "Looking up end-of-semester results, and finding I'd failed three out of seven (subjects)."

label: fear
text: When I am out in the dark and a suspicious looking character comes towards me.

label: guilt
text: "When my father had a serious fight with my sister, because of me."

label: sadness
text: A friend told me about his cousin who is my girlfriend. He said she had treated him in a mean and nasty way. I was surprised because in front of other people she had always treated him in a friendly way. I am very sad about it.

label: shame
text: I came home from school very keyed up. At the dinner table I unfortunately unloaded a lot of my hostility off on one of my parents. I'm ashamed that I didn't dispate and control these feelings before coming to the table or even let the energy build up in the first place.

label: anger
text: The sight of a man who ran amok (fighting) at a dance.

label: sadness
text: A woman I know is slowly dying from cancer. Observing this process makes me sad.

label: shame
text: I felt ashamed when my lecturer said in class that I happened to be the dullest of all.

label: anger
text: Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night. Therefore I made big efforts to make everything ok (food). One day before he cancelled the appointment because he had to go to church with his parents.

label: anger
text: "A friend of mine tried to persuade me to go at her place to act as a model because she felt too tired. It was a quarter of an hour before the appointed time, I had just lied down and did not want to go because it was too late anyway. She said that I only was talking about looking for work, but if it was possible I would not accept it. I was angry about this unjust judgment."

label: shame
text: When I went to see the doctor and had to take my clothes off so that he could examine me.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted with my girlfriend's behaviour. She was going out with other boys who were also my friends.

label: guilt
text: "I had been on friendship with a certain girl for sometime and the love was going on well, but it happened that I made the friendship come to an end suddenly without good reasons."

label: shame
text: I travelled on a bus and I forgot to punch the ticket. A ticket collector came in and I had to pay the fine. I did it with a feeling of shame.

label: anger
text: My grandmother's brother had taken active part in the resistance movement. He had been in prison many times and there he lost his health. He became an invalid. When we phoned to First Aid the nurse on duty behaved quite unkindly when she understood how old he was (79).

label: disgust
text: "For a drunk man (about 20 years old) that I met one evening, and who behaved impudently with the girls standing by."

label: sadness
text: When I realized that I did not have the basic things needed by a student like me.

label: disgust
text: A pig in the well from which we drink.

label: shame
text: "I do not seem to feel emotion such as shame, guilt or fear - far out !"

label: sadness
text: Hearing about developments of sience in the West a lot better than China.

label: guilt
text: "I had promised to say goodbye to a person who was going on a trip, and I did not turn up."

label: disgust
text: "There is a girl at my work that doesn't take care much of her hygiene she comes always with her hair oiled, a not very agreable smell, and a bad appearance. Beside this she tries to be nice."

label: guilt
text: When I shouted at my mother when she was nervous and depressed.

label: disgust
text: A female friend was violently ill on the return journey from a wedding reception we attended. Getting her out of the car when home took quite a while.

label: joy
text: When I passed my form three exams.

label: sadness
text: Since I moved into the dorms and I've been spending most of my free time with my boyfriend. I hardly see my old high school friends. I had several bad incidents with my 2 past best friends.

label: sadness
text: When I was told that my friend's wife had cancer.

label: fear
text: "When I have to leave the baby in the carriage and go shopping, I fear that something will happen to the baby."

label: sadness
text: When I heard the news of the death of my father.  It was in the evening and I was alone all night in my room trying to remember the face of my father.

label: joy
text: When I realized that I loved someone of the opposite sex.

label: anger
text: "At an unjust, or to be more precise, at a bureaucratic treatment of one's personality."

label: disgust
text: When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning after.

label: joy
text: After the funeral of an acquaintance I felt very depressed. That feeling turned into joy when I heard that I had achieved a good grade for an examination.

label: sadness
text: Getting separated from my family for a week caused me a sense of sadness.

label: sadness
text: When my boyfriend almost had a relationship with a close friend of mine.

label: anger
text: Someone signed up for a workshift at the co-op where I live and she did not want to work the switchboard. I became very angry. She had mentioned earlier that she wanted and needed the workshift to me so I did not sign up.

label: disgust
text: When programmes on violence or pornography are shown on T.V.

label: fear
text: "The day before the university results came out I was both excited and scared.  If I failed I did not know what I would do as I did not want to work, my family was ambivalent."

label: joy
text: I worked at a lawyer's office during Summer and I got a very good reference from him.

label: guilt
text: "Attending to a demand made by a client (I work in a bank) I suggested her an application of money in a week ahead, but I informed her wrongly. The client arrived a week after and the application wasn't made and she lost with this a lot of time and money."

label: sadness
text: My relationship with a boyfriend was finished and I didn't succeed a years-course.

label: fear
text: I was afraid when I learnt that my father was seriously ill in hospital.

label: fear
text: When a good friend of me told me one evening that she didn't want to live anymore.

label: disgust
text: "I had a quarrel with a friend who lived with me in the same flat. He moved out. Before he went he invited me and some friends for a drink. At last he was totally drunk and smelled disgusting. Besides, he told lies about us and behaved as if he was to be pitied."

label: guilt
text: "I had parked in a corner, and when I was going out I didn't watch if another car was coming and went out. The car that was coming was obliged to stop suddenly. It didn't crash but for a little."

label: guilt
text: Not doing something I had promised.

label: joy
text: "Unexpectedly I met some persons who I like very much. Spontaneously they invited me and integrated me within their group, although it was late in the evening."

label: sadness
text: When my father died.

label: guilt
text: I had promised to visit my girlfriend but for different reasons could not make it.  I rang up later to tell her that I could not come.

label: fear
text: Before one of my final exams of the third year - natural sciences.

label: disgust
text: Seeing a pornographic film when looking for a place to live.

label: fear
text: It was more that fear - anguish -that I felt before my last exam.

label: guilt
text: "I had planned a trip to the South during Easter, together with a friend. She was very sorry when I changed my mind and decided not to go after all."

label: disgust
text: Nothing.

label: joy
text: I met again a very good friend whom I had not seen for a long time.

label: shame
text: When I bought new skis; I was ashamed to tell the assistant that I am not good at skiing and therefor bought racing skis.

label: disgust
text: Maltreatment of children.

label: anger
text: We had to move to a very different city because the company where my father worked also moved to that place. It was very difficult for me to make new friends than.

label: sadness
text: Death of a close friend.

label: shame
text: When a certain drunk man slapped my buttocks when I was quietly standing waiting for a bus.

label: shame
text: During a meeting.

label: sadness
text: When an earlier friend was spreading negative rumours about me.

label: fear
text: Afraid I wouldn't catch the train when I was going to see my sweetheart.

label: fear
text: I had the window open and the door was shut so that the kitten would not go out.  My partner came in and started talking about something and I forgot about the window and suddenly I saw the kitten hanging from the window frame. I was rigid with fright till I got hold of her.

label: disgust
text: When somebody who had been a bully and had acted cruelly to others who were unable to defend themselves was taken down a few notches and he began to grovel. I was disgusted with his grovelling and the manner in which he had treated others.

label: fear
text: "One day before Christmas, I went shopping with my brother and his friend. We had a good time. But on the way home we were almost in an accident because the weather was bad."

label: sadness
text: I feel sadness from the fact that I was not born with a better appearance.

label: sadness
text: When I got a message that my child was not feeling well.

label: guilt
text: "When I decided my first marriage had ended, and left with the child. I felt overwhelmed by guilt as I was separating mother and child."

label: disgust
text: "When one finds out that someone you know is not at all like one had thought, for instance friends who steal and things like that, quite unwarranted."

label: anger
text: Saw in the TV South Korea cheating in the Asian Olympic games.

label: anger
text: When I saw my brother being attacked and I could not do anything.

label: joy
text: I shot the decisive goal in an ice-hockey match.

label: fear
text: "One day during our clinical practices, we had a very ill patient. Unfortunately the patient passed away. I had seen him dying and it was the first experience. During the night I became afraid fearing the dead body."

label: guilt
text: It happens sometimes in connection with certain persons with whom I have frequent relationships but nothing special.

label: sadness
text: My best friend got married and left her home-town to go and live in Poona.  After her wedding I felt sad.

label: shame
text: On own reading book. Recall came to mind of slight sexual exploitation of a female (years ago) i.e. had her on even for sexual motives.

label: joy
text: When the Cambridge results came out and I obtained a first division.  I had been thinking that I had not done very well.

label: disgust
text: Disgust with a subordinate.

label: shame
text: I had a short lasting sexual relationship with someone I didn't love.

label: joy
text: China winning the Asian Olympic.

label: shame
text: I had misbehaved at a party and did not wish to meet the person in question later.

label: guilt
text: "When I went to my room-mate's drawer to see if she had an iron  which I could use, she came in.  I felt guilty as she may have thought that I had been stealing."

label: anger
text: I felt anger against a colleague of mine during a rehearsal in acting. He hadn't learnt the text of an opera act in the course of several months and thus making difficulties for the rest of my colleagues.

label: fear
text: "My father was very angry with me, and I locked me up in the shower. Then my father knocked his fist through the door, I was scared to death."

label: disgust
text: When a person I did not know hurt a friend of mine.

label: fear
text: You may find out that I am stupid and not to let me do your experiment.

label: guilt
text: "I felt guilty about talking negatively, and agreeing with a person who was doing likewise, about a non-present third person."

label: fear
text: When my relatives and I were in a car going slowly on a frozen road.

label: disgust
text: Knowing that I had to do the survey with him I felt very reluctant.  Although I do not know him I feel disgusted by just looking at him.  Thinking that the project lasted several days I regreted having joined that project.

label: sadness
text: ""Sitting in a bus, I heard behind, the voice of a girl I was friendly with. After her talking for some time with another girl I decided it wasn't her in fact that someone miming her, which it was when I finally looked. I was talking to a friend at the time."

label: disgust
text: I saw a cripple in rags with small children in Italy.  He was probably an imposter.

label: shame
text: Finding out from this lecture that China is backward in psychology.

label: anger
text: "If they force me to eat something I don't like. For example, my parents always twaddle and whine, when I don't eat all the food."

label: sadness
text: A colleague's 17 year old daughter is seriously ill with cancer and has only a year to live.  I  heard about it 6 weeks ago.

label: sadness
text: "Departure of a very close friend - for a long stay overseas, sharing in the sorrow of her parents who were left behind."

label: sadness
text: "When my grandmother, who has been living with us for 14 years, had a stroke and was left paralysed on one side. She has been quite close to our family and to see her suffer in this way makes me feel really sad."

label: joy
text: Getting my accentance letter from CAL.

label: sadness
text: Girl I was fond of did not initiate conversation as I expected in tutorial.

label: fear
text: Staying alone in the biology building after the dark.

label: fear
text: "When abroad, while driving a car along a dark, winding road."

label: fear
text: When my 2 year old son climbed up and sat on the 7th floor balcony with his legs hanging out.  He was holding on tightly to the upper railing of the balcony but he could have easily lost his balance when he sat down.

label: sadness
text: When I found out that I could not go to the concert (after buying the tickets) because of a biology test which occurred the morning after.

label: guilt
text: When I had had the possibility to act or to do certain activity better but I had not done it because of reluctance or carelessness.

label: shame
text: "Hit a dog with my car, and didn't stop."

label: sadness
text: I was sad when my MCE grades were out. I had gone for a football match a mile away from home. The mail found me there. I was disappointed and didn't play the other half of the match.

label: fear
text: I was scared when I realized that I might miss the train which I was supposed to take.  I was 1500 Kilometres away from home and when  I heard the depart whistle I was still 150 feet away from the train.  I finally made it.

label: guilt
text: When I complained about a colleague to the manager and he told her that someone had complained; this colleague came to me believing that I liked her.

label: joy
text: When I bought my car.

label: joy
text: "When I hooked a girl in Kitwe.  She was very beautiful for my standards, a rare bird of this kind accepted me as a boyfriend."

label: joy
text: "After a one year's stay abroad, I returned home. I was even more glad to see how much my family was pleased to see me."

label: joy
text: I won a sport contest.

label: joy
text: When I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And most important she also liked me.

label: disgust
text: "I saw a man falling on the walkway. He seemed half dead, and was immobile. I felt disgust for the people who passed by without doing anything to help."

label: sadness
text: "When my grandfather died, I saw my grandmother crying against my aunt's shoulder (I had never seen my grandmother cry before)."

label: disgust
text: Saw my class leader acting like a God when he chose people to go to your English lectures.

label: fear
text: When I come home late at night.

label: joy
text: Easter holiday - I had been working weekends and had just left.

label: anger
text: "My superior blamed me for some neglects at work in front of others.  In fact, the task in question was not supposed to be done by me."

label: shame
text: The first time I slept at my boyfriends house and had to walk down the hall to the shower in front of his housemates. I felt they were judging me.

label: shame
text: When I saw my 18 year old son grab an oxygen mask as he had breathing difficulties.  I had a bad conscience because I had not stopped smoking.  Medication for the dilation of his breathing tubes also caused a sense of guilt in me.

label: fear
text: "I was in about Grade 7, I came home from school one day and was told that my mother had skin cancer and would have to go to the hospital straight away."

label: anger
text: Friend (male) hinted that my talking to other men at a pub was immoral. He implied that I should remain only with my boyfriend the entire evening.

label: sadness
text: After my little sister's Graduation from High School my grandmother became very sick. She passed away a few months later.

label: fear
text: I was crossing the street together with some colleagues of mine when I suddenly found myself almost under the wheels of a truck.

label: guilt
text: "When I was young - 14, I pinched from a store and was caught.  The store then contacted my parents."

label: anger
text: I have a very big family. At my grandmother's funeral we all met and everybody pretended mourning. In reality it was like a fashion-show: everybody wanted to show himself.

label: anger
text: Korean judges cheating.

label: guilt
text: "An item which belonged to a friend of mine was missing.  I had taken it earlier and I thought that I had returnrd it so when he asked me for it I stubbornly refused having it.  Later when I looked for it, I found it in my room."

label: disgust
text: I had to wash my grandmother because she did not get to the bathroom on time.

label: disgust
text: "I think I have hardly had a situation where I felt disgusted. Perhaps once, when I saw a big spider."

label: sadness
text: When I failed my Standard 8 Examination for the first time.

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to a Language school. On the day when I was informed by a message and my parents congratulated me.

label: disgust
text: When I became aware that an acquaintance had stolen from friends.

label: joy
text: I had an interview for entry into college. The results were to be announced on radio. After a long period of waiting the results were released. I had succeded - tension was relieved by joy.

label: guilt
text: My mother wrote me and said that I would not writ enough letters home.

label: guilt
text: The results of the mid term examinations were very poor.

label: anger
text: The housing council asked the city to cut 40 linden trees so that the inhabitants of the lower floors would have a view to the sea.

label: shame
text: I always feel ashamed when I do not succeed in accomplishing something in which I had put in all my efforts.

label: sadness
text: "Several years ago my brother died in an accident. When I heard about it, I was very sad. It took years until I resigned myself to it."

label: guilt
text: "I did badly in one of the vital exams, despite getting proper guidance from my parents.  I felt guilty of improper use of the chances provided to me. "

label: shame
text: The mother of a friend of mine passed by me and saw me sitting on a boy's lap.  I tried to greet her but could not help blushing.

label: guilt
text: At the age of 12 (or so) I stole from a Ranger's fruit tree an apple. (And eventually was compelled to confess - Dostoersky would like this).

label: joy
text: When I passed the B.A exams with first class results.

label: anger
text: "I work for a journal. Once the lay-out came to nothing, due to thoughtlessness of some colleagues."

label: sadness
text: My sister marrying a bad man. He is cruel to her.

label: guilt
text: I broke off with my partner as I wanted him as a friend and not as a lover.  He reacted very violently and I felt guilty as I had made him so desperately unhappy.

label: guilt
text: When I unjustly accused a person of my family of something she didn't really do.

label: disgust
text: The disgust I feel towards a certain person.

label: joy
text: When I saw my name in the newspaper and I knew that I entered at the University.

label: sadness
text: My girlfriend let me down badly 3 times in one week. These instances summed up all the negative aspects of our relationship which at the time seemed doomed to fail.

label: anger
text: "I went to a lecture and once again it had been cancelled, this was the second time.  One had a negative attitude towards the lecturer."

label: joy
text: After I saw my family and good friends back after staying one year in a foreign country.

label: guilt
text: I did not reply to my friend's letter in time.

label: guilt
text: When I was afraid to tell my sports teacher at secondary school that I had not participated in the sports activities the previous day.

label: joy
text: Joining in a research group studying consumer's behaviour and helping the people in the shop with the sales.

label: anger
text: The government's announcement of the withdrawal of the student allowances in 1984.

label: guilt
text: "We had promised, with a friend of mine, to take our friends to a restaurant and after having looked for a place for hours without finding one, and not being helped by the others we had to give up the idea."

label: fear
text: I had a dream about my fiancTe leaving me and making an end to our relation.

label: fear
text: A certain night during initiation.

label: disgust
text: The first time that I saw a surgeon cut off a leg and put it in a black rubbish bag.

label: anger
text: "When they broke the artistic work of several weeks.  Changes were made and it was broken without permission, they had no right to do this."

label: joy
text: Being chosen to do this experiment.

label: shame
text: When I just took a shower with a girl down the hall. I felt that I had let my devotion to God go out the window. Although nothig happened I felt ashamed.

label: fear
text: "When I was in the army, a room mate of mine came back from furlough and threatened another fellow with a knife."

label: anger
text: Saw some young people fighting for seats on a bus.

label: sadness
text: I got to know about the death of a close friend.

label: anger
text: "I felt anger at my last exam, I felt angry with our teacher, because he did not rate me objectively and I failed."

label: disgust
text: I have experienced disgust with some people - usually double dealers.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilt because on account of my ambitions I nearly turned my sister out of my parents home.

label: shame
text: When somebody suddenly said something (about me) at a wrong moment and I didn't agree (at that exact moment I was needing an extremely positive word).

label: disgust
text: "When I saw a woman subjugated by money and not being able to hide how she hated herself for not having the will power to get out of such a situation because it was convenient, according to what she told me."

label: joy
text: "When I got my first unknown compound while doing my M.Sc research, I was very happy.  This is because my research was based on this type of reactions and compounds."

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I received the year end results as I was worried about how well I had done.  I was very happy to know that I had passed.

label: joy
text: "Walking along the beach with a friend (another girl), talking, picking up shells, laughing, chasing seagulls."

label: shame
text: "I forgot to zip up my trousers, this was not noticed by anyone."

label: fear
text: When a thief broke into my house at night.

label: anger
text: Angry when our team (small boys) lost the county championship football final.

label: joy
text: "Winning a race that I had been training for, for many weeks. (Running Race)."

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to the Bulgarian State Conservatoire.

label: disgust
text: There was a family fight in my house some time back.  My uncle had given me a watch as a present and I lost it.  During the fight he accused me of having sold the watch.  I was disgusted at his false accusations.

label: shame
text: "At the funeral of my uncle, I was one of the bearers.  I was not familiar with the etiquette and acted tactlessly because of my ignorance."

label: disgust
text: One of those days when I was going to school with my brother and he annoyed me.

label: joy
text: My current lover and I had been very busy with work and study and had not had time alone together for almost a month until one afternoon recently when we made love for hours and then showered and ate together.

label: disgust
text: I attended a ceremony in Denmark which is comparable to our Halloween. They build a large bonfire and place a life size dummy of a witch. The crowd cheered when the dummy burst into flames.

label: joy
text: I was overwhelmed with joy when I received the acceptance letter to UNZA.  This happened again when I passed all my first year courses.

label: sadness
text: Not doing well in an examn.

label: disgust
text: "Yesterday in the elevator a man started smoking, this is something I just can not tolerate."

label: anger
text: "When I talk to silly, petty-minded and unmanageable people."

label: shame
text: I greeted and embraced the wrong person thinking that it was my friend.

label: fear
text: "I was driving my car and it was very misty. It was in the night and I was alone in my car. I felt totally insecure, nervous and overstrained."

label: fear
text: "I received a phone call from a high school friend whose younger sister studied with me at the University and gave me a lift every moning. She was going to get married to a guy whom I knew too and who had died when he fell from a building, I was afraid to lose somebody since I had already lost a brother in an accident."

label: guilt
text: In an exam I answered the questions rather carelessly and afterwards I thought that the exam would have been better had I answered more carefully.

label: guilt
text: My friend came to the concert for my sake as it was me who had organized it and the concert was unsuccessful.

label: anger
text: My parents do not like my friend and told me to stay away from him.

label: fear
text: When I crashed my car.

label: sadness
text: Watching suffering in Third World country.

label: joy
text: "I made the college entrance examinations for P.U.C. It was what I wanted more. When the first list came out I got frustrated. I wasn't in. When the second list came out without hopes I started to read the newspaper and my name was thre. I was in the bus and felt like crying so that everybody could hear me. The cry was hold, and 1982 became forever a mask in my life."

label: fear
text: In the real sense of the word I experienced fear in my first months in the army. During my first night of duty. The cause for all this was a bear. I became panic sticken (may be for the first time) and even forgot that I had a gun.

label: fear
text: "I was with a friend in a stationed car when, suddenly a man appeared on my side and an other with a gun on his side the hold-up lasted a few minutes but it was terrible. I had never seen a gun so close."

label: anger
text: My husband and I were invited at the house of our nieghbours then we got an invitation on the part of my parents which we had to refuse. A a result they called me by words that provoked my anger.

label: anger
text: "When you kill yourself with work and see the number of slakers wandering around, doing nothing."

label: disgust
text: During the Chinese lessons a student often showed off. Moreover he misbehaved and dressed very badly.  So disgusting !

label: fear
text: When my brother had an epileptic attack and I was scared as to what would happen to him.

label: fear
text: Finding out that my health condition may be against my attending university lectures.

label: joy
text: When we got a young dog.

label: anger
text: I was stood up for a date function by someone who I really cared for.

label: disgust
text: I wanted to take something from under my bed. While doing this I felt a dead bird laying under my bed.

label: shame
text: "When I was young, about 6 or 7, I did not make it to the toilet on time.  I hid the dirty trousers in the cellar as I feared itbeing discovered by my parents."

label: fear
text: As a child (i.e. 5-7) hiking in reasonably rugged bush and becoming lost for a duration of 5-7 hours.

label: sadness
text: "When the guy I was in love with told me that he had met someone else and that we would not meet again for a year.  Although we did not have a steady relatioship, we were having an affair."

label: fear
text: "I was at home alone, and heard noises on the roof, and doorknobs, and drawers."

label: guilt
text: Decided at the last minute not to do something that I said I would do with a person.

label: shame
text: Close friend discovered I had deceived them. Felt shame at having done it and knowing that they knew.

label: disgust
text: Saw Chinese people flattering foreigners.

label: shame
text: I had to pay a fine because of speeding.

label: guilt
text: "Due to laziness, I failed the term studies completely at University.  I also wanted, to some extent, to protest against my parents' expectations."

label: sadness
text: "When my grandmother passed away.  We had been waiting for it as she had been sick for years, but when it happened I found it hard to accept."

label: joy
text: When I met my mother after months of absence.

label: fear
text: My father gave me money for school fees and I didn't pay school fees instead I spent it on beer and did not tell him about this.

label: disgust
text: When I visited a creche. The conditions weren't too precarious but the children were in conditions of physical and emotional penury.

label: joy
text: "My friend had organized a birthday party for me secretly, I was very happy not so much for the presents but because they seemed to care for me."

label: shame
text: As a child - being sent to the shop by mother - buying some chocolate - getting caught by mother.

label: shame
text: During my childhood I once lied and my sister found out.

label: fear
text: Mugged while on holiday in the U.S.A.

label: guilt
text: Being aggressive against members of my family.

label: fear
text: When I heard a lion roar for the first time.

label: fear
text: I felt fear when my friend and I broke into an abandoned military base in Los Angeles this summer. I feared because I didn't want to be caught.

label: anger
text: An old lady slipped and nobody helped her.

label: shame
text: When I stated sharply something I was not very sure of and a few days later I was shown to be wrong.

label: sadness
text: Years ago I fell in love for the first time. as natural for every school-girl I was day-dreaming. Later (after 3 years) we left each other. No one was to blame but I felt deep sadness. Even now I remember about it quite often.

label: shame
text: Emptied a bucket of water in a hospital.

label: sadness
text: I felt alone among a large number of people.  I was sad to see that nobody cared about what was happening to me.

label: disgust
text: My friends aren't working for the same common goal we all need to accomplish.

label: anger
text: The editor changed the heading of an article that I had written.  He considered the heading to be derogatory towards the person I had written about.

label: disgust
text: A lie on the part of a person close to me.

label: joy
text: "Begining the week-end with my girlfriend : cozyness, beer and wine."

label: guilt
text: "Feeling guilt after greed, buying chocolate and pigging out to the point of feeling sick, especially as I am fat."

label: disgust
text: "It is very difficult to relate it to a certain event. I am familiar with the disgust of Sartre (la nausTe), a frequently occurring cause may be described as ""the self-assured dullness""."

label: anger
text: "When a colleague asked me for help at work, despite the fact that he had more time to do it than I had."

label: anger
text: When my sister came home late one day and thus disobeyed my parents.

label: anger
text: When I failed an exam I thought I would pass.

label: disgust
text: "Spoilt, smashed and molded potatoes in the fridge, and having to clean up the dish later."

label: anger
text: "When I was concentrating on my work, my friend disturbed me continously.  I asked him to stop but in vain."

label: fear
text: "When I was very young, one day, I was in the street with my father and brother.   While my father was talking to some friends, I saw a dog and began to pat it.  My father told me sharply to stop doing it because the dog had mange.  Then my brother told me that I would die and I could not stop crying after this."

label: disgust
text: When I saw several people washing their car with water from a drain.

label: guilt
text: When I think that I do not study enough.  After the weekend I think that I should have been able to have accomplished something during that time.

label: joy
text: When I began to date a boy with whom I am till now. This was 16 months ago.

label: fear
text: I was studying in class at night. I was in Form II by then. There were rumours about an earthquake. That night dogs were chasing one another and passed through the window outside the classroom. Those who saw the dogs thought it was a lion and were terrified. Trying to run away the desks were dragged and there was a shaking movement. I thought it was an earthquake and jumped out of the window.

label: disgust
text: "When I had to eat scraps from a dust-bin, because of a bet."

label: joy
text: When I was acceptted as a student of psychology.

label: shame
text: When I failed to answer a simple question.

label: fear
text: Diagnosis that I have a stomache ulcer.

label: fear
text: When they tried to rob me.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother passed away.

label: guilt
text: When a close classmate failed a year.

label: guilt
text: When my parents quarelled over something I had done and which was wrong.

label: shame
text: I was ashamed of being laughed at by my colleagues when I failed to answer a question in the classroom.

label: shame
text: When I could not hold my bladder while making a telephone call and ended up wetting myself.

label: joy
text: The day I was told that I had been accepted as a student of economics.

label: fear
text: One night I and my friends went to the cemetery. We stopped the car in front of the wall and suddenly the grave digger appeared over the wall looking like a ghost. I was already afraid and almost died.

label: fear
text: "My brother lost his temper and started smashing things in the house.  I was quite scared, that something terrible might happen, till the situation was brought under control."

label: joy
text: Seeing my sister after about 2 years of not seeing her. Only spent 1 hour or so before she was off overseas with her husband for 3 months.

label: anger
text: "When my mother and father split up I was angry: I felt deprived and ""different"" from other children at school."

label: sadness
text: "Summer, heavy rain, storm - I was standing with my face stick to the window: the childhood, something was going away forever this summer, I was leaving my home, I was going to study in another town, for the first time I was leaving my parents, friends, I had to manage myself, a long and loved period of my life was over - I was crying."

label: sadness
text: Loss of close relative.

label: guilt
text: When I took the car of someone without saying it to him.

label: disgust
text: Some students whose English is worse than mine can go to your lectures (English lectures).

label: joy
text: Naturally when I got myself discharged this was my second birthday.

label: anger
text: When some seniors tried to scold and insult some juniors on account of what the juniors were supposed to have said at secondary school.

label: fear
text: When my neighbour's life was threatened by someone who was trying to break into his house.

label: sadness
text: Long illness.

label: fear
text: "When a man who had a knife grabbed me and threatened me with it,   during my holidays in Monze."

label: sadness
text: I did not do as well as I expected on a chemistry exam. I received a score below the average and I thought I had done very well.

label: fear
text: When going to the exam.

label: shame
text: I made a joke about the rat of a boy. I compared his rat with a sausage. I told the boy he had a delicious sausage.

label: shame
text: The day my fiancee told me that it was bad that I could not write my mother tongue.

label: disgust
text: Some boys boasting about their ability to tell dirty jokes.

label: shame
text: I was given the task to learn a page of music text for a small part. But I had forgotten all about it and I felt quite awkward when I had to show what I had prepared.

label: anger
text: I had gone on a vacation and my mother left home without leaving me any thing - money to come back to school.

label: shame
text: Found out that I am not good at football.

label: guilt
text: "Some boys told me your nickname is ""Little Girl Doctor"", I did not tell them off and laughed with them."

label: shame
text: "I was talking with an aunt of mine that I adore and I found courage to say ""I love you"" and just after that came the shame."

label: anger
text: Going to Cowell Hospital and finding out tediously that I had a stress fracture. The anger came when the senile doctors found out 4 weeks later that I had 2 stress fractures in one foot and should have had crutches. I was in distinct pain and barely could walk to classes. They said it would be better in 2 weeks.

label: sadness
text: The quarrel between my  parents.

label: joy
text: Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work in the garden and the contact with other volunteers filled me with joy. They also gave me support after I failed passing my driver's test.

label: sadness
text: During the Physics experiment session I did not understand the content of the experiment and did not know how to do it.

label: fear
text: During a football game I made an offence towards an acquaintance. Later on this acquaintance also tackeled me and the game became very rude.

label: anger
text: When I was at S.Y.Bajaj I wanted to get admission in another college and this was not easy and I felt angry.

label: shame
text: I took a girl out once and discovered that she was going around with one of my close friends.

label: sadness
text: When I was a Sr. in HS. one of the class counselors died of hepatitis. She was very sensitive. She knew my shyness and drew me out to improve myself image. I missed her funeral - so I could not publically grieve. My parents didn't understand.

label: shame
text: "I went to study in a public library but I didn't know it well. I got a book and wanted to study hearing music. Then I went to a place were I could do it, but when I passed by a door a bell rang and a man came saying that I couldn't leave with the book."

label: joy
text: First public speaking.

label: sadness
text: When my cousin passed away during the holidays at home.  He fell ill at night and the next day he died in the evening.

label: fear
text: I was scared of water when I was a child.

label: shame
text: "When Dad went to a Sports Day and was the only parent there, and he was cheering for us."

label: joy
text: "I had a picnic with old classmates, we chatted and played games."

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I was admitted to the Higher Agricultural Institute.

label: guilt
text: When I have been overhastingly offending or hurting.

label: sadness
text: A close friend of the family died.

label: shame
text: "At school I was talking to a classmate about mathematics.  I had grown weary of it and said : ""I would like to throw the book on the arse of Kuikka"".  My classmate said : ""Now, he is sitting there and waiting for the book"" (Kuikka was one of the most quiet boys of the class).  I was ashamed of myself."

label: sadness
text: "I felt very sad when my boyfriend wanted to break our relationship. Our relationship lasted two years, we shared everything and all this was finished."

label: fear
text: I was in form five at the boarding school and my friends and I had gone drinknig beer in the nearby village.  And we were caught red handed there by a form master.

label: anger
text: When I was charmed by my relatives.

label: joy
text: At the moment when I heard the result of an examination and it proved that I succeeded the second year of my study.

label: guilt
text: I caught a close relative with the servant of the house.

label: guilt
text: My friend did not do well in the examn because I did not help him.

label: sadness
text: When one is alone and knows that all the others are celebrating.

label: guilt
text: Calling lecturers nicknames when talking to housemen (They told ne you are even younger than they are so you should not be giving public lectures).

label: disgust
text: When I see the acts and deeds of a blind drunk man.

label: anger
text: "When I tried to breake it up with my boyfriend, and he refused to let me go."

label: fear
text: Fear of punishment for having broken an item of value to my parents.

label: sadness
text: A friend who was 22 years old died.

label: sadness
text: The day I left my first girlfriend.

label: shame
text: "I feel this emotion very often when I try to express my feelings in public, because other people do not understand my reactions and think that I am silly. "

label: guilt
text: When I was forced to decline the invitation to my mother's 70th birthday because of my work committments in another area.

label: disgust
text: When my uncle comes (3 times a year) for the traditional Christmas dinner with my grandparents and other relatives and is very drunk.

label: anger
text: My classmate always borrowed my notes and would not return it to me on time.  When I had a test she was selfish and irresponsible and so delayed my studies.

label: anger
text: "I lent a text-book to a person I did not know very well, they lost the text-book and gave me no compensation."

label: joy
text: "I had a singing-lesson, but I was not very good. The last exercise was singing scales. I did that very well and my teacher seemed satisfied."

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine who was driving a car ahead of me died in a car accident.

label: shame
text: I was saying bad things about a man I had never seen.  I was with a friend and did not know that she was related to this man.  My friend did not tell me about it and I discovered this myself.

label: disgust
text: I lived together with my boyfriend. One night he stayed away and next day he told me that he had chat up with another girl.

label: joy
text: When I learned that my parents were going abroad and leaving me alone for a few years.

label: disgust
text: "I met a girl (22 years old), married. I liked her. I asked her for a date and I kissed her. I discovered that she lived nearby where I passed every day. I got amused thinking that her husband would be ... or me . I didn't talked to her anymore."

label: disgust
text: On TV I saw a report about church in Amerika. A priest was shown who was performing miracles in front of the camera - I felt disgusted.

label: anger
text: When I was robbed in a bus.

label: shame
text: I felt shame when I saw someone I knew and pretended not to see her. Later she saw me and said hi.

label: sadness
text: "This occurred when my girlfriend and I have to finish our relationship due to some circumstances between her and her family. I was really sad, hurt and couldn't really find any reason why am I still living. Is this life is all about ? This was one of few question which crept up vividly every time I thought about what had happened."

label: guilt
text: Finding out that I have misunderstood other people.

label: guilt
text: I failed to keep a promise and this had a serious effet on someone's problem.

label: sadness
text: "The saddest I've ever been was when my lover was killed, hitch-hiking to work."

label: joy
text: When I passed an exam which I had failed last year.

label: fear
text: "One day when I was a little boy, my friends asked me to play with them outside and to catch some boys.  However our parents did not know that we were out and when I got home it was very late and I feared being scolded by my parents."

label: joy
text: "When I started a relation with a girl, with whom I have fallen in love already some time ago."

label: fear
text: When I was a child I was afraid of big dogs. One day when I came home a big dog was laying in front of our door. I was so frightened that I did not dare to enter the door and I waited until somebody passed by.

label: anger
text: I wrote an assignment and was given less marks than a friend with whom I had previously discussed the assignment.

label: guilt
text: "When my aunt took her own life, I felt guity for not understanding that she needed support."

label: disgust
text: When a very dirty class-mate farted in my  presence.  There was a terrible smell.

label: guilt
text: "When I broke off with my boyfriend after three years.  It was quite unexpected for him and there was no particular reason for the break up, such as someone else."

label: fear
text: "When the robbers broke in, at night."

label: shame
text: One morning after breakfast I was still not satisfied.  My nephew (a small boy of 2) had not eaten his breakfast and just when I was taking a bit of his share someone walked in.

label: sadness
text: My father left us for another woman.

label: fear
text: As a child - stepping on a rusty nail - being told that I might get tetanus.

label: joy
text: "I met a dear friend of mine after a long time.  I expressed my feelings in our own usual way, by mutual scolding and abusing (with complete understanding) and by touching, patting and taking the hand of the other person, etc..."

label: guilt
text: I made my boyfriend so unhappy and depressed that I feel guilty.

label: joy
text: When I entered University.

label: joy
text: The time when my sister had her first baby I was so happy and joyous because she stayed for two days after marriage before she had a child.

label: disgust
text: "The way my husband and his family treated me - unfairly, cruelly, and unjustly."

label: guilt
text: "I was driving a friend's car, and I got close to the pavement to ask my way and I struck a parked car."

label: shame
text: China cannot give your lectures bigger place and sound system.

label: sadness
text: "When I began to read a thick book, which I had a limited time to read.  Also when I have a lot of work to do and I cannot keep up."

label: joy
text: When my brother came back home after staying in hospital. He had undergone an operation which had been a matter of life or death. When he came home I could see him smile for the first time after may weeks.

label: anger
text: "And she said absurd things, false things that filled my ears and inflated my head which seemed to be caught in a carcass where the heart wanted to explode and where the arm wanted to knock down the world."

label: disgust
text: "When I read about or think about environmental pollution, the armor race, starvation, etc. Then one realizes that mankind is bad, most important is power and money, at the cost of nature and mankind."

label: anger
text: A girl entered in the division where I work and greeted everybody but not me.

label: anger
text: When a friend and me played a joke on our boyfriends.  Her boyfriend came up and accused me of having planned the whole thing and said that I did not deserve my boyfriend.  He embarassed me in front of a crowd.

label: sadness
text: "When an uncle of mine, who was close to me, passed away after having had a stroke, before his first daughter could be named."

label: shame
text: The day after the night I drank too much at a party.

label: sadness
text: My got my mathematics test's marks and could not believe that it was true.  In the past I would have at least 80% marks.  Was I getting weaker at studies ?  This made me feel that I should not expect too much from going to the university.

label: guilt
text: I beat my young sister because she refused to wash plates. She started crying and I felt sorry and guilty for what I did.

label: guilt
text: "My mom told me not to gamble, but I did anyway. Sometimes I would even take some money from my parents and brother. She found out and yelled at me."

label: shame
text: "I had this feeling before my graduation and never dared to speak to my relatives and  friends.  Because of this feeling I would avoid situations, however I do not know the reason for this."

label: disgust
text: "When I was a child, I was sometimes forced to eat things that disgusted me."

label: shame
text: I slandered a person behind his back and he got to know about it.

label: guilt
text: "When my Bictorian ""friend"" was staying at my house we ere going places together, and sleeping together. At the time I had a boyfriend locally. The first time I had to face him after sleeping with the guy from Melbourne I felt very guilty."

label: shame
text: When I realized that I was pregnant.  I thought about what my relatives and friends would think about me and I felt a lot of self pity.

label: shame
text: When I was in F4 I led my class to a riot.  However the form master said that my conduct was good and asked me to tell him the names of those who had taken part in it.   I replied that I did not know.

label: disgust
text: "Every time I meet a certain person. We cannot get on well together, we dislike each other."

label: sadness
text: When I deeply felt that I could lose the person I love best because of my foolishness.

label: sadness
text: I received a letter form home telling me that my sister was very sick.

label: anger
text: "When I was dismissed unjustly from the firm where I worked, because there where persons that didn't have problems, and wouldn't miss in the jobs they occupied if they were dismissed."

label: shame
text: "The mother of a small child found me shaking the child in exasperation, because I couldn't get it to sleep."

label: fear
text: Speaking in front of a large group of people.

label: disgust
text: Some foreign students playing loud music late at night.

label: anger
text: Someone told me we are not as good as the All English Class.

label: shame
text: Not being able to have a party at home with friends.

label: disgust
text: "In the army, I had been in hospital for two weeks and as soon as I returned to the company, a sergeant ordered me to fetch a load on the tractor trailer."

label: shame
text: When I wet my head (or bed ?) one day my sister discovered it and reported it to the other siblings. So my mother had to scold me.

label: shame
text: "When I stole a book in class and the teacher caught me, the rest of the class laughed at my attempt."

label: shame
text: When I went to the library three weeks after it had opened and found that everyone was busy.

label: disgust
text: "When I woke up one morning and went to the kitchen I discovered that our dog had diarrhoea.  There were small ""piles"" all over the floor and the smell was choking."

label: joy
text: "When I got a first class in the twelveth standard exams, I was very surprised and happy and I had a very good time with my friends."

label: joy
text: A party with friends on New Year's Eve.

label: fear
text: When I first came to the UNZA I did not know the kind of people I would find here and the kind of behaviour they would have towards me.

label: fear
text: "When we were going to Nkhoma last Saturday the vehicle was moving very fast, so I feared we might crash since the road was too rough."

label: joy
text: At my sister's wedding.

label: sadness
text: "My grandfather died, I went to the mortuary and saw the corpse."

label: fear
text: "After seeing a horror film - Omen.  I could not sleep at night  even though I closed my eyes.  The last scene of the film kept coming back to me, I seemed to hear the girls in the film shouting at the devil.  The devil did not have any expression on his face and I thought that he would choose me."

label: guilt
text: "During the military service, I lost a part of an equipment; I accused another person and he was rebuked and punished."

label: joy
text: "After a busy day I went back to my hostel.  I closed the door and had a drink, then I read my favourite book on the bed.  Suddenly I felt peace and joy."

label: joy
text: "The day I got to know that I would get a shared dwelling with my boyfriend.  My parents place was getting a little crowded with my growing bother wanting a room to himself.  I first felt doubt, then joy, but also sadness.  The feeling of joy was the strongest."

label: disgust
text: Saw an arrogant girl walking pass by.

label: fear
text: Watched a horror movie which involved sexual attacks on women.

label: sadness
text: Finding out I am not good looking.

label: shame
text: "In my 20s - and was going out to dinner to celebrate a friend's birthday. Her (older - in 30s) cousin, really wanted me to get drunk cos I'd visited their (cousin & wife) place quite a bit, but had always been very careful - brought up to believe in moderation in drink (but not guilt repression etc). I mixed drinking with smoking (which I rarely did) and got drunk and had to leave the table to get sick in the loo, and later went home and was sick again; have never felt so awful in my life. And I didn't want to face or tell my other flatmates, or family."

label: guilt
text: I called off a relationship with one girl so I could see another.

label: sadness
text: My father died last year after an 8-week severe illness.

label: guilt
text: "A few days back a friend of mine had asked me to call on him on Sunday.  I had accepted it but later did not go for no specific   reason.  I just slept in my room.  The next day this friend called  me up and told me that he had been expecting me the day before and his wife had prepared a very good lunch for me, which had gone waste.  I felt very bad about this incident and it has been growing in my heart ever since."

label: joy
text: Made a wonderfull new friend.

label: shame
text: I insulted my friend for a small reason and after time I realised that I was wrong and felt ashamed; everytime I meet her I feel ashamed.

label: disgust
text: When I entered a brothel and saw two sailors with a young prostitute who was not older than 18.

label: disgust
text: Finding out that my best friend was deceiving me.

label: anger
text: In a hurry to get to lectures and the car would not start.

label: guilt
text: "I took my grandmother's money without telling her and when asked if it was me who had taken the money, I denied it."

label: guilt
text: "When having a relationship, I made love with another girl."

label: anger
text: "Anger at doctors for their treatment of me after giving birth. They left part of placenta behind and I bled heavily for twelve weeks - due to this, I felt weak and emotional, and they said I needed psychiatric treatment and give me no support."

label: sadness
text: "When I learned that my former boyfriend had become engaged - although I was glad that he had found what he wanted, I was very sad at my own personal loss, since I had always hoped we might one day reconcile."

label: shame
text: "I was ashamed of the way I deceived that I could not help a friend, although it was absolutely possible for me. Nothing was revealed but I haven't called up this person since then."

label: joy
text: When I got my B.Sc degree with first class.

label: guilt
text: "I was supposed to fetch some friends at the bus stop, but I did not do it because my father was in a bad mood and I was afraid that he would grumble."

label: fear
text: I broke my Uncle's Radio player accidentally and so I feared that he was going to cut me off from going to his house as well as playing it again.

label: shame
text: I didn't offer my seat to a pregnant woman in the bus.

label: shame
text: When I didn't meet an appointment I had made. The person phoned me but I thought of something (I told I was ill) so that I didn't have to go.

label: sadness
text: One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend died. When I visited my friend at home and when attending the funeral I felt very sad.

label: anger
text: My bed sheet (present of my parents) damaged by roommate.

label: fear
text: "After a footballmatch I went home by car, a friend drove. I did not realize that he was drunk until we were in the car. He was madly racing. Several times we were in dangerous situations and I told him to be cautious, but he did not care."

label: sadness
text: A friend died of cancer when he was 18 years old.

label: shame
text: When I wet my bed at boarding school.

label: guilt
text: I was trying to have sex with my best friend's girl but she did not agree to it.

label: joy
text: "I won a car in a prize-competition. The moment I was informed about it, I felt joy."

label: shame
text: After a big fight with my parents.

label: disgust
text: "I am disgusted with liers, hypocrites, slanderers, flunkeys."

label: anger
text: Deliberately provoked by someone close. Angered by the deliberation not the provocation.

label: guilt
text: "I was going around with a girl without loving her.  Not only did I go around with her, but we did many more things.  In the end I was not very sincere to her."

label: joy
text: Hear my name on the list attending the English lectures.

label: sadness
text: "When, for example, I left for the first time my parents and I went to live in Sofia."

label: anger
text: When someone ignores what I am saying or doesn't let me have my point of view and they monopolise a conversation.

label: anger
text: "My classmate used her personal relations to get a seat for a subject that I wanted also.  I had taken the pains to help him apply and I did not get selected.  I did not like this as he had not told me the facts earlier, he need not have lied to me."

label: fear
text: "One night, walking along a park, I began to think that some roughnecks would appear suddenly with knives and things like that."

label: shame
text: "That my brother and father are into alcohol, two men with priviledge. Not using it positively."

label: joy
text: "I felt a great joy when I knew that my father was going to sell the apartment from GUARUSA, because in some way we were helded by it, that means that we didn't go to any other place, because we had the apartment."

label: anger
text: "I was angry the other day because the teacher told me to sweep some orange peels. It was my friends who were supposed to sweep, but the teacher told me to do it."

label: joy
text: My sister had a daughter. I saw the baby for the first time through a pane of glass and she looked at me.

label: guilt
text: I blew up at someone for being confused and because of his irresponsibility and afterwards I felt guilty and that I had no right.

label: shame
text: After the car accident in GUILT.

label: guilt
text: In an exam when I answered the questions with very little assurance due to insufficiet preparation.

label: sadness
text: I quarrelled with my younger sister because I had said something against her boyfriend.  Consequently she looked through me when she saw me as she thought that I was trying to separate them.  She had misunderstood me.

label: disgust
text: "At a party I met a girl who drew me to her, told me some nonsense and always wanted to kiss me."

label: guilt
text: Someone asked me to do something and I made up an excuse and said no. I then went and didn't the same thing with someone else and hoped the first person never found out.

label: shame
text: "I was worried by a task related to my studies which had to be done in groups of two.  I was talking about it to my friends when I said something negative, in too abrupt a manner, concerning my work partner.  I did not quite mean what I said and I felt ashamed at having been mean enough to criticize him as he is also a friend of mine."

label: anger
text: When my dad told me about something he had done against my mother.

label: sadness
text: I met again a very good friend after a year and realized that there had grown a certain distance between us.

label: joy
text: "On my birthday, when I was given my presents."

label: disgust
text: When I study my butt off for a midterm and still get an average grade.

label: shame
text: "When my mother found a leaf of my diary where I had written about my mother's lack of education, especially her poor arithmetical insight."

label: anger
text: "A few monthe ago, when my brother's wife told me that I had bad manners.  To make matters worse she did not let me use their telephone as she only allowed people of her own tribe."

label: joy
text: "At the pre-university, I was appreciated as an examplary student by our pricipal.  This is something which made me feel very happy."

label: joy
text: Aticle published.

label: disgust
text: I cannot remember exactly such a situation. But I know that once I went to a very dirty lavatory and that disgusted me.

label: anger
text: I felt it when a girl who was dear to me lied to my face. I got angry with the fact that she knew I didn't believe her but she kept on telling lies.

label: shame
text: "When I was in a bus on my way to the examination centre, a man    sitting opposite me kept looking at me continously.  I did not know  what was wrong.  When I reached the  centre I started strolling around  as I still had a little time.  Suddenly a man came and whispered ""You  have forgotten to zip up your trousers.""  I was at a loss to say anything  and I felt very embarrassed.  When I thought of the bus incident I felt  even more ashamed."

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to the Higher Institute.

label: shame
text: When the literature teacher made me recite a poem in the middle of the class and I had to gesticulate.

label: anger
text: In form three we were taking our mock exams and someone else (a friend) was making noise when the examinateur picked on me and said that he would tear up my answer sheet.  I got very angry with the girls involved.

label: guilt
text: Dad had just married his second wife (my step-mother) and I did not like her so I went to the wardrobe and set fire to her dresses.  Eveyone suspected my brother and he had to bear the consequences.  Nobody ever got to know that it was me who had done it.

label: joy
text: My boy-friend told me that he would take me to the training of the life-saving dogs.

label: anger
text: When my wife told me that the refrigerator had stopped working.

label: anger
text: I got angry with a stranger in a train who behaved impertinently and immorally

label: anger
text: "While having a discussion with my mother, I realized that she does not for a moment doubt the justification of her making the decisions concerning my life."

label: shame
text: After having failed my driving test.

label: guilt
text: "When being illoyal (disloyal) to people close to me. Had such an episode with my sister, who should have received my support and attention."

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died; I had a stronger relation to her than to my mother.

label: joy
text: China winning the Asian Olympic games (TV).

label: anger
text: "I wanted to go to a friend of mine who had a party; at the moment I wanted to leave, my father said I couldn't go because he needed me for some work in the afternoon."

label: guilt
text: When my brother had to spend all evening repairing a gear-lever that I had broken.

label: shame
text: When I was still a child I was told off in face of other persons for having touched an object that didn't belong to me.

label: joy
text: Winning Queensland Chess Championship.

label: guilt
text: Guilt at often being unable to visit a close relative in hospital after her death I felt very guilty and wished I had done more.

label: sadness
text: "When I read the diary of the girl with whom I was living, it was about another boy with whom she had been going around some time back."

label: joy
text: "A close relative of mine underwent a difficult operation, and everything turned out fine."

label: guilt
text: "I had a quarrel with my father. He was depressed, because somebody had treated him injustly. As we had an argument, it was impossible for me to help him."

label: shame
text: I was very ashamed when I was neglected by a certain friend whom I was thinking loved me very much.

label: shame
text: Sending pictures home when I'd put on so much weight.

label: disgust
text: I caught a glimpse of a black-beetle.

label: anger
text: When I damaged my wristwatch which I liked very much.

label: joy
text: "I was happy when at difficult times I could find support in my friend and my fiancT, I was happy because of their spiritual and moral help which gave me new power to struggle. I was happy then, I felt it in my soul."

label: fear
text: When my mother had a nervous illness.

label: guilt
text: "I was in a cafe with another person when, suddenly, several close friends of my partner appeared.  I did not know what to do and my partner felt uncomfortable."

label: joy
text: When my husband and I decided to take a few days holiday after a particularly trying period.

label: disgust
text: "One day I was going through the street door of my house, when a man asked me for a doctor.  He then showed me his genitals and asked me to cure him myself."

label: guilt
text: When a mistake occurred at work which I was not responsible for.  This was disclosed later.

label: disgust
text: My friend and I worked for the community centre by holding a booth.  One day my friend went off to another booth to play.  This meant that I was very busy and could not maintain order.  His behaviour disgusted me.

label: guilt
text: I said nasty things which I did not mean to a friend.

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend left me.

label: sadness
text: When on Christmas day my grandmother died. I received the news when I was coming back from a party on the 24th at 5 am.

label: joy
text: "When I got home from a pleasant trip abroad, I got to know that I had been accepted at university."

label: disgust
text: Returning home in the late afternoon I saw an indecent act made by a man with the purpose that I saw it.

label: anger
text: When I saw a few people beating a man who seemed to be a stranger.

label: sadness
text: When I found that my ability to do ordinary work was worse than my fellow mates.

label: fear
text: Once I was alone at home. I suddenly felt unwell and there was no one to help me and call First Aid.

label: sadness
text: As a ten-year-old I was at the funeral of my grand-father.  It was more the ceremonies held in the church and not really the death of my grand-father which made me sad.

label: sadness
text: I was very sad when I heard that my uncle had passed away untimely at home.

label: fear
text: When my mother met with a serious accident and there was danger that she would not survive and if she did she would loose her memory.

label: guilt
text: Said something I should not have said in public.

label: sadness
text: "When my boyfriend openly let me down, preferring another girl."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust when I kissed a guy that I know. I was on the outs with my boyfriend and this person appeared but he has nothing to do with me.

label: disgust
text: Disgust with myself for consistently making foolish errors in communicating with others (asking for 1/2 Kg of nuts when I only wanted 50 g).

label: guilt
text: "Flirting with other girls while I already had a very good relationship. When there are problems in my relationship, the flirting increases as does the feeling of guilt."

label: guilt
text: I beat up a female friend after I heard the defamatory stories that she had been telling.  I was later called to explain my behaviour.

label: anger
text: I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment. She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She expected me to explain it to her.

label: disgust
text: Watching a TV documentary on seal clubbing.

label: disgust
