text: "When my friends and I were camping in a weekend, and with little food, we met a middle age couple from a small town that invited us to eat in their house. Their house was small, badly built with old and dirty forniture and utensils. The problem was with pans, and dishes, and even the food."

label: fear
text: I had a dream in which I was an African elephant.

label: sadness
text: The death of my twin sister - suicide.

label: disgust
text: My roommate being nice to a party leader in order to get into the party.

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I saw my daughter after a separation of twenty days.

label: joy
text: This happened when I was selected to go to Secondary school to start Form I in October 1980.

label: sadness
text: When I see children on T.V from areas devastated by drought and war.

label: shame
text: My mother revealed personal details about me and the negative aspects of my character to other people when I was present but unable to defend myself.

label: fear
text: When my mother's heart nearly stopped.

label: shame
text: I experienced shame when I failed to keep a promise to meet my friend at the bus depot. He later came and asked me why I had not turned up.

label: fear
text: A fear from the loss of a close friend as a result of his behavior.

label: disgust
text: At school a classmate who was a very good pupil had to help another boy who performed less well. He told him on purpose the wrong things so that he had to repeat a year.

label: guilt
text: "When my niece was 3 years old she was in the living room while we were fixing the table for a birthday party and, as every child, she couldn't stay calm. She burst a balloon. When I told her to be quiet her father pinched her. I believe if I hadn't said anything this wouldn't have happened."

label: shame
text: "I had a habit of wetting my bed when I was young.  One day, when I was invited to my friend's place to stay for the night, it happened again.  I was ashamed of myself."

label: disgust
text: Seeing persons spending money in a shopping center with completely indifference to the misery reigning in our country.

label: sadness
text: When they gave away my dog to other people without my knowledge.

label: shame
text: I felt it when I felt that I was being observed as an object of pleasure (sexual) when I opened and took off a shirt in a classroom at P.V.C.

label: shame
text: "Whenever I am late, I feel ashamed of myself even though no one tells me anything."

label: joy
text: My father promoted to be a professor.

label: anger
text: "When I did not find the rack used for beating up rugs, in the yard."

label: shame
text: When I fell down.

label: shame
text: "I woke up at the house of someone I knew, not remembering very much about what had been said or done during the party on the previous night."

label: guilt
text: This is a kind of confession - my mum found me stealing meat from the pot.

label: guilt
text: "When I secretly tried smoking for the first time, being 12 years old."

label: joy
text: When I qualified for form I.  I was one of the three pupils who qualified for form I that year.

label: disgust
text: "I heard somebody talk about studies in a highly enthusiastic ""student-like"" way."

label: fear
text: The same situation as with sadness. I was afraid about what my parents would further do to distroy my relationship.

label: disgust
text: I saw a terrible accident in which the driver of a motor was thrown through the frontwindow of a car. His face was completely away.

label: anger
text: "A friend of mine came to visit and stayed with my roommate and me. My roommate and she became good friends. After she left, he didn't talk too highly of her."

label: sadness
text: I lost a close friend.

label: anger
text: "In a tram, the ticket seller was commanding, taking the role of a leader, trying to emphasize her non-existent authority with undue strictness towards a good-humoured drunk who could not find his ticket at once."

label: anger
text: An unjust refree decision at a sports event when I was the team leader.

label: joy
text: Having passed an exam.

label: anger
text: I bought an aquarium which made me much pleasure. I was watching the fish when my father came in and asked me how much I had payed for it. He said he would not pay for the current that it would require.

label: joy
text: It was when a friend took me to a place and gave me as a gift my astrologycal map with the explanations of a psychologist.

label: fear
text: When a friend of mine told me a horror story.

label: anger
text: "At having an argument with a stranger, in the street."

label: disgust
text: I don't remember about a situation when I have experienced this feeling. Maybe it was when I saw a drunkard in the street.

label: fear
text: "At about nine p.m., I went home by bike on a dark cycle-track; because of lack of time I had to take the short-cut."

label: joy
text: I was coming home from an exam and I supposed that I had passed it so I ran to a restaurant for a beer.

label: anger
text: My father had once again told me that I should be careful and try to seek admission to other places also apart from the faculty of Social Sciences at the university of Helsinki.  I was not at all interested in any other place and had no time to study for other entrance exams.

label: guilt
text: I had to decline an appointment which had been very important for the other person. For this reason we even got into trouble.

label: joy
text: When I drove partially across the country with my father. We stopped in a few towns and stayed overnight in motels. The joy I got was from the feedom I felt and the real beauty of the country.

label: guilt
text: "I was drunk one night and I insulted three ladies.  The following morning they approached me and asked me the reason behind my bahaviour, I apologized for my unruly behaviour."

label: joy
text: When I succeded in establishing a contact with a girl (who is now my girlfriend).

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my father had been involved in a car accident in Lusaka.  This happened when he had gone to get the car which had been stolen in Lusaka.

label: disgust
text: A condition in which I was disgusted followed when I lost money on my way home from the college.

label: guilt
text: "When I felt I had let my parents down, especially my mother, by having sexual intercourse for the first time, and a few times after that. Also, when I went on the Pill."

label: anger
text: "My life-partner, who was drinking more and more, spoke about kicking the cat.  He had never done anything of the kind, but I knew that he would do so one day, without thinking about it."

label: disgust
text: "When I saw the film ""Memorie of Prison"" I saw a scene of masturbation of a man in the hold of a ship apart form fact that the film wasn't pleasant I had a leg of coconut candies in my hands."

label: guilt
text: Criticizing my mother when she refused to drive with the radio on. I told her that I thought she wasn't intelligent enough to cope with the radio.

label: disgust
text: A drunken man forced me to kiss him.

label: fear
text: When I met an elephant in the bush.

label: shame
text: When I try to lie.

label: fear
text: When I failed my first exam at the Higher Institute.

label: joy
text: When I passed the first examination that I had to repeat.

label: sadness
text: When another fellow worker decided to leave the company. We had been very close and we would not be able to work with eachother any longer.

label: guilt
text: "When I realised that I had rejected a boy, who was fallen in love with me, rather bluntly four times."

label: disgust
text: Sitting in the dorm when the guys were verbally reading letters in Penthouse.

label: sadness
text: I was not chosen for the All English class.

label: guilt
text: "It happened when I still went to school: I got closer to a girl but I considered it only as an ""affair"". Only much later I realized how painful this must have been for the girl."

label: disgust
text: I vividly remember having feelings of disgust toward some of my jr. high classmates who didn't work at all on their schoolwork and who would coplain and take my tax money when I was older and more successful than they were. At the time I pictured some adults like this that I knew in the complaining situation.

label: fear
text: A friend gave me a lift and we met a road-block.  He tried  to turn back when an officer shouted at us to stop.  My friend took a turn suddenly and the officer raised his gun but by the time we were gone.

label: guilt
text: "When I see that my mother forces my little brother (15 years) to work very hard for school. I don't agree that she constantly puts him to work, but I don't tell it to her, so nothing changes."

label: guilt
text: I chatted up with a girl who I didn't love. She however was fallen in love with me. I felt responsible for her sorrow.

label: guilt
text: I got into a bad fight in a bar and my friend received a bad cut above his left eye while trying to separate us.

label: disgust
text: I usually come back home early but this day I came home back late to find some visitors at my place.

label: shame
text: "I felt ashamed when I fought with my mother on some issue, and caused her trouble."

label: guilt
text: "On a telephone talk where I was agressive and stupid without the least, reason or better motive."

label: joy
text: I got my driving licence after they had frightened me with it's difficulty.

label: shame
text: I ride my motorbike in my village and everyone stares at me as if I was a rare specimen.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty because I had not accomplished a thing as well as I had wanted to.

label: fear
text: I was inside the car with my husband and we were assaulted with a gun at 10 o'clock in the evening.

label: shame
text: I thought of myself as being clumsy when I made love for the first time with a girl.

label: shame
text: In a fight with my girlfriend in a luncheonette where everybody stared at me in such a way that I had to leave it.

label: fear
text: "I was walking down a little village at night.  There was nobody in the steet.  A dog began to bark, I felt that it was following me.  Then I began to run, the other dogs started barking too.  At last I arrived home."

label: sadness
text: When I think about the short time that we live and relate it to the periods of my life when I think that I did not use this short time.

label: sadness
text: "After hearing the news about the death of my sister, I felt very sad."

label: joy
text: "When I was at school, no one thought I could pass my MCE so at the end of the year my name was announced on the radio that I had passed. I was the happiest person."

label: sadness
text: When my grandparents moved to another part of the town.

label: guilt
text: "I felt guilty when I read an advertisement for a job as a chemist in the newspaper and when my friend asked me if I had applied for that job, I told him that I had not even seen the paper of that day."

label: shame
text: Some men were talking about me and my sister.

label: guilt
text: Did not get up early enough to watch my class football team playing against another team.

label: anger
text: A drummer who had borrowed my drums destroyed both the drumskin and the sticks.  He did not repair them nor did he tell me about it.

label: disgust
text: Can't remember having had this feeling.

label: anger
text: Had an argument with my classmate for borrowed books.

label: disgust
text: Can't remember any such feelings now.

label: fear
text: My mom called early in the morning (On a Monday) and I had just seen her that weekend. I couldn't understand what could be so important as to make her call at such a strange hour. I missed the call and had to call her back that afternoon.

label: fear
text: I felt afraid when I smoked maryhuana for the first time in my life with a lot of friends in the middle of the street at day brake.

label: sadness
text: I suddenly found that those whom I considerered to be my good friends did not care for me.  Although I could still be with them I felt unimportant.  I deeply thought about the reason behind this so as to see who was responsible for this.  Finally I made up my mind and decided not to expect too much from them.  I was sad when I decided that they were no longer my good friends.

label: joy
text: "When I was in Form 4, at Secondary School, I was elected as a school Library Assistant and also the leader of Catholic Students, so I felt very joyous."

label: disgust
text: "I have felt this feeling when a person whom I believe and respect, lied to me."

label: guilt
text: When I was caught with my girlfriend in the house at night.

label: anger
text: "At the hairdresser's, I got two stains of dyestuff on my new trousers. These stains are not removable, so I cannot put on the trousers again."

label: shame
text: I met a woman who was looking for our house. She stopped me but I ran away. When I arrived at home I found the same woman and she told my parents what had happened so I felt ashamed.

label: disgust
text: When my roommate forgets to flush the toilet.

label: guilt
text: "Borrowing a car, and then having a minor accident (breaking a headlight)."

label: joy
text: I got a fairly large amount of my taxes back.

label: sadness
text: "I couldn't sleep, and began to remind of my childhood. We are many sisters and at that time we were spanked a lot and I don't know why I started to remind of the spanks they and I had had, their shouts when this happened."

label: disgust
text: Saw someone spitting in public.

label: guilt
text: When I hit my young sister without a valid reason.

label: guilt
text: "On Reberbahn, I was in a ""restaurant"" where drinks were overpriced.  I did not ask for the prices beforehand, and when the bill came I could not pay the bill."

label: sadness
text: "It was at the time of my M.Sc exam, when I was not in a position to take the exam after having studied seriously."

label: guilt
text: I had thrown with the ashtray a still lighted cigarette in the plastic wastepaper basket. It had burnt out and my landlords made me a row that I might had set their flat on fire.

label: fear
text: When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of darkness.

label: anger
text: When my aunt told me angrily that I was a good-for-nothing and she was fed up with my behaviour.

label: sadness
text: "The holidays come to an end, and the next day we had to go back to University and to the exams."

label: sadness
text: "When I realized that my girlfriend, whom I like, and I were going to separate."

label: shame
text: Confession to my parents about my involvement in a moped theft.

label: fear
text: Before an examination: I had the fealing that I had not learned enough.

label: anger
text: "There was a sofa in my flat which belonged to the old tenants who were acquaintances.  It should have been picked up a year ago but they had postponed it.  Eventually they decided on one date and I stayed at home despite the fact that I had other things to do.  They did not come, nor did they call and they still have not got in touch with me."

label: guilt
text: I stopped my car in front of a pedestrian crossing as a child was crossing the street.  The car driving in the next lane did not stop and the child got hurt.  Had I not stopped ...

label: joy
text: When I passed an exam.

label: shame
text: "When I realised that I had become too emotionally involved with the person I'm going out with, and when I began to like someone else and questioned whether I really care about person I'm with."

label: joy
text: I sensed this feeling when I passed successfully the second tour of a competition.

label: disgust
text: Hearing Norman Jones get hysterical in Parliament about law reform (on the radio - listening with 2 others).

label: joy
text: "Receiving a very personal letter from a lady that I like, which revealed that she was more enthusiastic about me than I had thought possible."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust with alcohol in general when a close friend of mine got so drunk that he didn't realize what he was doing and it was quite shameful.

label: sadness
text: I was going to go on a vacation to Texas this summer but was unable to go because of registration.

label: joy
text: I got a job right after school was over.

label: disgust
text: When my mother's new husband treated her and my brothers and sisters badly.

label: guilt
text: I was travelling in a bus from school going home for holiday. In the bus unfortunately I stepped on a bag in which there were delicate things.

label: anger
text: "In September 1984, I was forced to live with someone I did not like.  The first week we were at loggerheads and our conversation was like a debate.  The atmosphere was very bad.  When he learnt that I had got 95 marks in a test he told me "" A failure, You lost 5 marks.""   I was very angry, not because my marks were lower than his, but because I could not tolerate his pride.  I did not show my discontentment and carried on doing my work."

label: sadness
text: I felt sad when my boyfriend and I were apart for some time.

label: anger
text: This was when my boyfriend told me that I was double-crossing him with a certain boy.

label: sadness
text: When I noticed that I do many things to the pregiudice of myself.

label: anger
text: When a certain boy went about saying that I am his girlfriend. I wrote him an insulting letter to him and called him names.

label: joy
text: When seeing a friend that I had not seen in a long while.

label: anger
text: This situation keeps occurring - when my little sister disagrees with me or vice-versa. We have very similar temperaments and I always end up feeling angry at her and myself for fighting so much over unimportant trivial matters.

label: shame
text: "When the teacher asked me a question, I did not know the answer and I just stood still for about a few minutes without saying a word."

label: fear
text: "When I was a child, I had a terrible nightmare with St. Nicholas' Devil Servant. I asked my mother if he really existed and she said yes. The following nights I could not sleep and a light had to be left turned on."

label: joy
text: On my birthday when several good friends came to visit me.

label: anger
text: Whenever my father smokes the smell makes me feel very uncomfortable.  He never listens to my complaints and I curse him furiously in my mind.  I cannot solve this problem by violence because of traditional moral values.

label: fear
text: "When I left a carnaval ball at 4 o'clock a.m. I was alone in a foreign city and I had to go back home, when a guy appeared and tried to ""catch me""."

label: guilt
text: "For example, when I have promised something but I haven't fulfilled it."

label: fear
text: When two drug addicts tried to take away my money.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted with the behaviour of one of my fellow students during my Secondary School life. He was a habitual noise-maker and caused great conflicts with the teachers.

label: sadness
text: When my grandfathers died and I realized how much I would miss them.

label: disgust
text: "Disgusted with boyfriend's mother - her overpowering, over-protecting and selfish attitudes."

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I passed and went to form I.  It was a great relief for me as I had been very worried considering the large number of pupils who fail.

label: disgust
text: When I found out that the seat in the coach that I had booked had been sold to somebody else.

label: joy
text: When I found our my mother didn't have cancer.

label: shame
text: "When I got really drunk on Norvegian Indipendence Day, and was not allowed to participate in football (soccer) games for two weeks. That was very unpleasant."

label: disgust
text: A bad smelling cucumber.

label: disgust
text: Someone acting stupid in public.

label: sadness
text: "On the last day of my school life I was very sad, specially on the farewell party day.  I felt sad to leave behind my beloved teachers and friends."

label: shame
text: Finding out China is backward in science.

label: joy
text: "Yesterday, when the final whistle blew at the final match between OIS and IFK and it was certain that OIS had won the Swedish title."

label: joy
text: The birth of my first child.

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgust when I received visitors at an odd hour. I was seriously preparing for Examinations, so I did not appreciate their coming."

label: shame
text: "When my younger sister, who was then 16 years old, was pregnant."

label: fear
text: "Once, when I was very young, my mother left me alone in the house and came back very late."

label: guilt
text: I felt it when playing I pushed my brother and he fell down cutting himself in pieces of tile.

label: sadness
text: "When the grandmother of my friend died in a hospital. My friend was crying and I was sad, too."

label: joy
text: "After having at last finished my master's thesis, I felt great joy and relief.  I had been haunted by the thesis during the whole of my studies."

label: guilt
text: One day I took my playmates to the river to swim and play. One of them was epileptic so he drowned into the water. I felt guilty because it was me who took them there.

label: shame
text: When I was a child my parents caught me with a pornographic magazine.

label: shame
text: Once I spoke without thinking very much - it was quite a nonsense.

label: shame
text: I was about to share lunch with my aunt's husband when she told me that I would have to wait and eat with my cousins.

label: disgust
text: "When I got  grade ""C"" in M160 at the end of my first year at UNZA.  I had expected a ""C+"" or a ""B"" as M160 is easy, going by my capacity in mathematics."

label: fear
text: When my father was involved in an accident.

label: guilt
text: Because I had not studied.

label: shame
text: When I had not done well in Geography at my MCE I was expected to get more than I did.

label: disgust
text: A lecturer in great detail spoke about his sexual experiences.

label: guilt
text: "Some time ago I took the driving test. I did answer the theoretical questions very well, but I failed the practical driving test. It was my fault because I had not enough practice."

label: shame
text: "When I found a letter addressed ""To Mum"" by my son, 6 months later, he begged me not to sell his new shoes which he messed up after wearing them for the first time."

label: shame
text: A young visitor to the house stole money from an elderly visitor's purse. It wasn't noticed for some hours.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a scene on T.V where a castration was shown.

label: shame
text: When we received  our academic result I learnt that my  results were bad as I had not done my best.  The results of my accquaintances were good and when they asked me about my results I really did not want to answer.

label: guilt
text: I was living at home during the Summer vacations and towards the end decided to take some of my clothes and other belongings to the appartment in Guttenburg.  When I had finished I went to my ex-boyfriend's (relationship uncertain) home and stayed there till 5 A.M.  I had to leave then as my parents needed the car for work in the morning.  My parents do not like my boyfriend.

label: fear
text: "One day a fierce looking man came to our house  and said that my father should apologize to him, however I was alone at home."

label: disgust
text: With an alcoholic.

label: fear
text: Late one night I was pursued by gipsies who had no good intentions.

label: sadness
text: When I failed an exam.

label: sadness
text: "Realizing that school will soon be over, and we will all go different ways, perhaps never meeting again our friends from this year."

label: sadness
text: When summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my holidays.

label: joy
text: Won a prize for effort.

label: sadness
text: Could not get into the university I wanted to get in.

label: disgust
text: When I saw hundreds of snakes twisting over one another in a movie.

label: fear
text: "I was asked to join my friend in a boat at Mangochi Lake Malawi and when making a turn, it seemed as if the boat would sink on the side."

label: fear
text: "When I received the higher level exam results, I mistook the grade E in mathematics for a grade F and I was shocked."

label: joy
text: When my mother was tremendous on the phone and we talked for hours. She was in a good mood.

label: joy
text: At a friend's birthday party with some of my closest friends.  It was all very pleasant and one could say that I was happy to have such good friends.

label: fear
text: Beaten up by a classmate in school.

label: fear
text: When two of my children were critically ill with measles.

label: fear
text: I woke up in the middle of the night as I had jumped and shouted with fear.  I thought that someone's cold hand or something similar had touched my hand.  I crept down under the covers and went back to sleep.

label: fear
text: "I was sleeping when I heard the neighbours screaming, I peeped through the window and saw a thief  trying to enter my neighbour's house."

label: shame
text: Not being able to answer question in a seminar.

label: anger
text: Being hooted at when I was learning to drive.

label: shame
text: I had subscribed for this test. We were informed by our secretary where the test took place. We went over there and thought there was a course. So we went back again I felt ashamed that the secretary again should see me.

label: guilt
text: Not speaking to my sister-in-law due to lack of interest in a relationship on my side.

label: fear
text: Waiting for my marks in a difficult subject.

label: shame
text: "A daughter in court for staff pilfering, she was dressed like a ""street walker"" - I had a friend form overseas with me and was falsely trying to impress with my family."

label: sadness
text: "That afternoon I received two messages informing me, one that my brother was in a coma in the U.T.H suffering (kidney disease) and two, that my uncle met with an accident on his way to the hospital  to see my brother."

label: anger
text: I was angry at my boyfriend who had promised to come to see me but did not because he spent the evening with his pals.

label: anger
text: "Unjust accusations directed at me and my way of acting, by someone close to me.  "

label: disgust
text: "The same event described under FEAR - in the bus a man sat beside me, with his trousers open and holding his penis."

label: shame

label: sadness
text: I felt sad and depressed when I heard that our cat had died.

label: joy
text: "Right before I went to a concert with my last boyfriend he told me that although he told me he was going to take me to the concert, he didn't want to see me anymore. After that we stayed overnight and I said ""well, when he leaves me I will be ruined for awhile, but for now we're together."" I woke up in his arms and it was the happiest moment of my life."

label: anger
text: "When my friends left without waiting for me, after we had arranged to go out together."

label: shame
text: "On one occasion whilst engaging in horseplay with my girlfriend, I caused her to be physically harmed."

label: anger
text: Someone in my family (my brother I suspected) ate a bun which I had made for myself. It was during a long telephone call after I had just made it and put it in the oven warming drawer.

label: guilt
text: I once stole my father's money and denied having done it. Instead father threatened my young brother and he was beaten. He was innocent and I felt guilty.

label: guilt
text: "When as a child I stole, from a friend of mine, the ring she had got in an easter egg."

label: shame
text: I lied to my best friend and I wouldn't reform what I had done.

label: guilt
text: When I answered to my mother with rudeness.

label: sadness
text: "I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were some other friends there and I was able to have a more or less good time."

label: joy
text: "It was Saturday, my duties were over for a few hours and I could at last be with the people I wanted to see."

label: anger
text: "When I arranged our holiday in Paris, and my girlfriend raised criticisms all the time."

label: sadness
text: When a close friend died.

label: disgust
text: "While reading Olli Jalonen's new book, the distant, cold and selfish relationships between people (in the book) made me feel disgusted."

label: shame
text: Criticized by a teacher in public.

label: disgust
text: A film were a woman was attacked and raped.  One did not see the worst but it had the desired effect - very strong.

label: sadness
text: "I was on a class excursion, by boat to Stockholm.  At night my class mates prepared to clebrate their motive in life which was ""life is merriment"".  I felt depressed about the way they sought happiness."

label: shame
text: I had lied to a person because I had thought that I could not tell him the truth. When he found out he was not angry but understanding. We talked the whole thing over.

label: shame
text: When I had been angry at my friend without any reason.

label: anger
text: When close relatives tried to dissuade me from studying Psychology because of its low status.

label: joy
text: When the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final of the Europe Cup at Athens.

label: fear
text: "When I saw a good male friend unexpectedly after a year, as I've just returned from overseas. I was feeling tired, looking a mess, and nervous."

label: sadness
text: Death of brother.

label: sadness
text: I wrote a letter to my boyfriend but he couldn't answer it in time so as a defence mechanism I just found that I felt so sad about it and couldn't talk to anyone.

label: guilt
text: I refused to lend my homework to a friend.

label: anger
text: When I had a serious argument with a dear person.

label: guilt
text: "I wanted to finish a relationship after 3 months. Unfortunately my friend had a different opinion. I could not answer his feelings this made him unhappy, and me feel guilty."

label: joy
text: A recurrent lovesickness.

label: joy
text: I was at school whhen I received a letter from the dean of my school congratulating me for my performance at the previous year's exam.

label: joy
text: "Last year my freshman yr. It was a day in March I did well on some tests. I seemed to finally adjust to college, it was hot and sunny. I was walking in front of a frat. when I heard Beach Boys ""Surfin'USA"". I had this overwhelming feeling that to be at CAL was good. I still have it somewhat."

label: guilt
text: When I didn't study for tests in High School. In particular  remember a physics test. I didn't study because my friends talked me out of it and we did something else boring. I felt so helpless just being there - then guilt set in because I was very close to getting an A in the class.

label: shame
text: "In the traffic I insulted a man who crossed my way. Afterwards I paired with him, and felt shame because of mine lack of pacience and ridiculous attitude."

label: joy
text: When I was offered a place in the university as a full time student.

label: fear
text: "Sometime back, my boyfriend and I were having a walk nearby my parent's house. Suddenly we met my grandfather and I was afraid that he would report to my parents."

label: fear
text: I had gone for a medical check-up at the U.T.H and failed to make it back on time for the C119 practical sessions at 1400 hours last academic year.

label: joy
text: When I met my girlfriend again in another town after a long separation.

label: shame
text: When I was an evening school teacher it was my job to make the coffee but I was not able to get the coffee ready on time and I thus arrived half an hour late to the class.  On top of this the coffee was undrinkable.

label: anger
text: Being insulted on a bus.

label: disgust
text: T.V features showing the violation of defenceless people.

label: shame
text: News was spread that I had been found doing sexual intercourse with a small girl. At first this annoyed me but later on I became ashamed because many people seemed to believe it.

label: joy
text: "Winning a tight tennis match. One set to play, and the team was behind by 3 games. We won the last set 6-2 and won the match by a game."

label: joy
text: "When I got admission in M.Sc (I) Organic Chemistry, I was very happy."

label: guilt
text: When one lets friends down

label: disgust
text: A saturday night a bus full of drunken people.

label: guilt
text: "One night, after having decided to finish our relationship, I took my girlfriend home.  While driving back home, I felt that I had not handled the whole thing very well."

label: anger
text: Physically fighting with my girlfriend because she just walked out of a room of my friends and had pushed and cursed at me when I went to find her.

label: joy
text: "I sensed a strong feeling of joy when in the plant, at my working place, I got a message that I was admitted as full time student at the Higher Agricultural Institute."

label: disgust
text: When a person saw that I was accused of something I had not done and did not do anything to defend me.

label: anger
text: We lived with 3 persons in the loft of a house. It often occurred that other persons again and again climbed the stairs with much noise. When I was studying I couldn't concentrate and got angry.

label: shame
text: I am troubled by hair growing in my neck. I was troubled by this for a long time and was much ashamed when someone brought his/her hands close to my face.

label: disgust
text: It was when my father beat my mother while she was ill for three weeks and now she was recovering.

label: joy
text: "In a day when at work, in school, and relationships came out as I wanted, and I was recognized in my work."

label: joy
text: "As the time to get the results drew near I became more and more anxious.  My friend called me and said, "" You have passed.""  My heart was full of joy."

label: joy
text: I went to see the entrance examination results at university.  I rejoyced at my success.

label: guilt
text: Once I quarrelled with my sister and after this I deliberately messed up her belongings.

label: guilt
text: "During a holiday in East-Germany I got aquainted with a boy who lived there. We started writing, but I only wrote once. I felt ashamed because I probably was one of his sparse contacts with western Europe."

label: guilt
text: "When I lost my study grant without having attended any exam in the career I had started, and it was too late to cancel my registration."

label: anger
text: When my friend (girl) promised to help me go to the hospital and be examined by good experts and she deceived me.

label: guilt
text: I once drank too much alcohol and became very ill. This was in the presence of my friends.

label: joy
text: Made a wonderful driend who understands me.

label: joy
text: "When I received the result slip of the higher level examination (an university entrance exam) and saw that I had a very good possibility of being accepted into the university, I felt very excited."

label: sadness
text: When I woke up after a nightmare.

label: fear
text: Looking for the toilet in a dark place.

label: disgust
text: "When I discovered my mother had been having an affair with my father's best friend, and then ran away with him without even speaking to me about what she was doing letting me come home from school simply to find her gone. I was filled with disgust and contempt."

label: disgust
text: When my room-mate made a mess of the room after having drunk the whole night at a graduation party ceremony.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a drunk man urinate upon himsellf and he seemed to be thoroughly content with it.

label: fear
text: I was alone in my room at the boarding house when at 12 o'clock someone knocked violently on the door.

label: fear
text: Before my final examination.

label: fear
text: Fear of the turn that the examination paper would take as I lacked confidence.

label: sadness
text: After receiving the grade on the paper mentioned in FEAR.

label: joy
text: "I was in a dancing-tavern and the atmosphere was one of waiting for the end of the world.  Suddenly people began dancing wildly, inspired by the band.  An unbelievable experience : wonderful that even Finns sometimes flare up and forget to think ""what others are thinking of me"".  It was delightful to dance to one's heart content."

label: disgust
text: My father is someone I disgust. So when he comes close to me a feeling of disgust overwhelms me. When I stay a week-end at my parent's place I will remember it for long time.

label: sadness
text: "I hadn't been at my parent's place for a long time. When I went to visit them I had high expectations, but when I was there it was very different from what I expected."

label: fear
text: When armed robbers broke into our house at night.

label: anger
text: "When I tried to explain to a plumber, face to face, that the toilet was broken and he did not believe it (it had been mended ten times)."

label: sadness
text: "I was away to school (Primary). In my abscence my young brother at home got sick suddenly. My parents took him to hospital. On the way he died. It came to me as a sad, sudden and shocking news and I felt very sad."

label: joy
text: "When I passed the last exam, which I had doudts about."

label: disgust
text: When I slept with a guy because my best friend wanted me to.  He had never had intercourse with anyone and had a terrible complex about it.

label: fear
text: I was with my boyfriend forgetting that I had left the house unlocked. Unfortunatly a thief came and stole all the kitchen utensils. Thereafter I was afraid of the consequences.

label: anger
text: The surname of my brother was different from ours.  He often grinned at home and provoked others for the pleasure of it.  This made me angry.

label: anger
text: "When an acquaintance of mine beat up another person for no just reason, and thus showed off his power."

label: guilt
text: "When I still went to primary-school, I went on a ski-trip with my family. After skiing we went to a restaurant for lunch. Suddenly my father said that he had forgotten something in the car. He gave me the key and asked me to go and get it. I had difficulties with the key which was already bent. I asked my mother to help me. When she tried to turn the key it broke. We had no second key. My mother was blamed for all that and I did not say a word."

label: sadness
text: When I am alone in a room with no contact with anyone - loneliness drains me.

label: anger
text: "When I was house-hunting: Another person got a flat that I would have liked, too, because he heaped a floot of words on the letter."

label: disgust
text: Whenever I see a spider or a snake I feel disgusted.

label: anger
text: A friend doesn't let me study when I want to. She doesn't feel I need to study and doesn't understand how important studying is to me. I get very angry with her.

label: guilt
text: "I was looking after my cousin's little daughter; she fell down, was slightly injured and cried vociferously."

label: disgust
text: I saw someone that I thought I knew repeatedly drunk. I do not like to be around alcoholics.

label: fear
text: Once while walking along a hill; I fell down out of carelessness and I broke my left arm.

label: anger
text: South Korea winning more gold medals in the Asian Olympic (more than China).

label: disgust
text: When I committed a sin mentioned in ANGER. A sin of sexual immorality.

label: shame
text: Nearly caught masturbating.

label: sadness
text: "Being bored in school, not being able to marry and have children."

label: anger
text: "A close friend first said he accepted an agreement, but later used that agreement as a reason for attacking me."

label: guilt
text: "The negative feelings towards me displayed by my ""parents-in-law""."

label: shame
text: When I bought new clothes and put them on.

label: sadness
text: When I couldn't find my dog which was missing.

label: guilt
text: "A friend of mine got encouragement and I did not, as the supervisor did not like me."

label: anger
text: "Some classmates said I did not do enough social work. Therefore I was not elected as a ""Tree Good"" student."

label: guilt
text: I took Pharmacology books from my friend's desk without permission and I was found guilty.

label: fear
text: "When, for example, my grandfather fell seriously ill. It was necessary for him to be operated and I felt great fear of losing him because he is so dear to me."

label: fear
text: "I studied medicine for several semesters and at that time I developed a great fear of examinations. I was most afraid of my examination of anatomy. While other students were examined, I was dissecting. I was able to hear everything and was waiting with fear until it was my turn."

label: joy
text: I was very joyful when I heard that I had passed the standard 8 exams. The day I heard the news was the day I celebrated my birthday.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother passed away.

label: anger
text: An argument among several friends because of the irrational behavior of one of them who fell out with us for no reason and said that we were to blame.

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to the University.

label: anger
text: Someone stole my ski at Vitosha and of course I was the one to be blamed. I left them without supervision.

label: guilt
text: Made a misjudgement in a football match.

label: joy
text: "When I received my report card in C.O.U.  I was afraid of obtaining low marks, but they were much higher than expected.  "

label: shame
text: "When I stayed on a nudism beach, a man was watching me in a disagreeable way. I had the feeling that he was examining my body."

label: sadness
text: At rejection / being ignored by a loved person held in great esteem.

label: joy
text: "After watching the 49ers lose game after game, year after year, I was finally rewarded with a Super Bowl victory which made me extremely happy."

label: fear
text: I was sleeping in my room but woke in the middle of the night to think I could hear noises and see shadows moving. I felt that someone was in the house.

label: fear
text: "Climbing a mountain to see a view, towards the top we suddenly came across a ledge with a nearly sheer drop on either side, which I had to cross."

label: joy
text: When my favourite football team made a goal and was about to win the Cup of England.

label: disgust
text: When I tried to explain to my child as to why there were magazines wiith naked girls on them at the kiosk.

label: shame
text: When I had a Latin examination in school.

label: sadness
text: I was sad when I saw that a beautiful girl was not attainable.

label: guilt
text: "While at primary school, I did not let a friend ring a bell although he would have liked to do it.  Afterwards I felt bad."

label: fear
text: "I had a very horrible dream one night, I dreamt that I had fallen off a very crowded train."

label: sadness
text: The saddest moment in my life was when I lost my younger sister a few years back.

label: guilt
text: A friend of mine trusted me to back her in a decision she had made.  But when the moment came I did not agree with her opinion.

label: anger
text: "A member of a religious sect tried to convert me, using really evil tricks to persuade me.  After he had left, I was anxious and angry for a long time. After the event, I was alone."

label: guilt
text: "One night,when I was in primary 5 or 6, I felt thirsty so I fetched the thermos to pour a cup of water for myself.  Then I saw my brother lowering his head and I, jokingly, poured the       water on his head."

label: shame
text: "I think that I am rather shy and do not mix with people as I would have liked to, out of shyness."

label: fear
text: Finding out the great difference between China and the West in science.

label: anger
text: "I had worked very hard during my vacations to raise some money for a few major items (e.g a radio).  but when I arrived at the inter-city bus terminal, my hard earned money had been stolen from me."

label: disgust
text: When I worked at the life-saving service I was disgusted by a patient whose outward appearance was distasteful.

label: sadness
text: When I was transferred from Chichiri Secondary School to St. Mary's Sec. School. I was happy at Chichiri as a day scholer and had made a lot of friends. I was going to a boarding and that meant parting with my friends as well as my boyfriend for the first time.

label: guilt
text: When I was parking my car I was not cautious and bumped into another car. I caused considerable damage. The driver of the other car was very angry and I let him insult me because I felt guilty.

label: joy
text: During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of Mozart on the piano when I gave my first performance I succeeded to play it very well.

label: anger
text: "When others let me down, fail to keep agreements."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust with a person whose behaviour was out of the elementary human norms.

label: disgust
text: At a party my best girlfriend got really drunk and went off with a guy she knows I really like.

label: shame
text: When I wasn't well prepared for a terminal exam and the teacher tried to give me a three by asking me some very easy questions. I burned with shame then.

label: anger
text: "When a cousin of mine took my bottle of T.B tablets, put water in it and threw it in the dust-bin."

label: fear
text: "The week before I entered to army, when we were being selected. During 5 days I had to pass 10 hours a day waiting for the answer, which at last was the worst. The fear of being convoked, of hearing the fated phrase, was constant."

label: fear
text: I felt fear when I was young and left in my big house all alone.

label: disgust
text: When somebody behaves like a scoundrel. Recently a colleague of mine used the name of another one for his own benefit.

label: guilt
text: "As I could not be home before midnight I called home at 11.30 and asked them to leave the door open so that I could get in.  I actually woke up the whole family by calling them so late.  My mother could not go back to sleep, besides she had a conference   the next day and really needed to sleep."

label: fear
text: Tutorial again !  A fearful feeling came to me when I sat on the chair and looked at my fellow students all around.  I was really scared that they would ask me some questions or challenge the ideas that I had presented.

label: disgust
text: "I went out with my sister, her boyfriend and his friend. I did not like this young man. But suddenly he overcame me and kissed me. He was very strong so that I could not defend myself."

label: anger
text: "I was on a farm with a few friends and during the talk I discovered that a friend of mine, was being betrayed by her boyfriend and a 3rd friend of ours."

label: fear
text: "When my exboyfriend threw me around the dorms because I was talking on the phone to another guy of whom he was jealous, after we had an argument in which I thought we broke up."

label: joy
text: When my affairs with the girl I love settled positively.

label: joy
text: When I asked my girlfriend to marry me.

label: fear
text: I was living with my brother and one day he went away on business and I was left alone to look after the house and the property. At night thieves came and wanted to break into the house.

label: fear
text: "My friend and I had offended our classmate unintenionally.  We wanted to apologize to her so we decided to visit her.  We knew that she was stubborn so we were frightened.  When we rang her door bell, our fear was at it's climax"

label: disgust
text: Not applicable.

label: anger
text: My roommate leaving my drawers in a mess after plowing thourgh them looking for something.

label: sadness
text: When my mother was operated.

label: sadness
text: My dear hamster (called Hannes) died at the age of 2 and 1/2 years. His shape forced me to mercy killing (an injection).

label: fear
text: "My episode of fright happened when I came to study.  I had to stand in front of my still unknown fellow students and talk about myself.  My hands shook, I flushed and became tongue-tied."

label: shame
text: Comments from other children on my alcoholic father

label: anger
text: When I lost my driving license because I had been driving while under the influence of alcool.

label: disgust
text: I saw a magazine with photographs of dead and maimed people whose limbs were separated from their body like a head on one side and the leg on the other.

label: sadness
text: When a friend died.

label: anger
text: Mad at my dad.

label: fear
text: "I was walking home one night (after getting a bus to my town) when I was confronted by a group of males (about 6), they would not let me pass - they made comments etc. - I crossed the road and hurried home."

label: guilt
text: I left a boy with whom I was going around without giving him any explanations.

label: guilt
text: "I bought something and the shopkeeper gave me more change, I realized this after I had left the shop and was on the bus-stop - and I then needed the money."

label: shame
text: When I get an exam back with a grade that I did not desire. Then I get mad at myself and say that I could have done better.

label: fear
text: "Once I was stopped by the police in Spain, when I had some ""grass"" in my tobacco."

label: disgust
text: "On Christmas day a drunk man came to our house without a shirt on, he dansed, spoke nonsense and behaved stupidly."

label: shame
text: I guess I have often been ashamed after having talked badly of other people.

label: sadness
text: I was all of the sudden sad when I heard that my cousin who usually paid school fees had passed away after a very short illness.

label: sadness
text: I had drunk a couple of beers and my fiancee got angry at me.

label: sadness
text: Railway station good-bye.

label: shame
text: "I tried to date a girl, but she refused."

label: shame
text: It was the time when everybody spoke about and discussed Hainburg. I was also asked for my opinion. I was ashamed because I had no firm view of the whole thing and therefor was not able to join the conversation.

label: anger
text: "When I come home in the evening, the first thing I do is to sit down and smoke a cigarette. One day I found the flat in a totally desolate state. My girl-friend had wanted to tidy up but had not finished."

label: anger
text: "When my father made my mother go through really terrible situations, I felt furious, impotent, nervous, upset, ........"

label: shame
text: "I promised a friend that I would return a book to it's owner for him , but I forgot to do it."

label: joy
text: "When I got a stereo walkman from my father when he had finacial difficulties. I thought that although he promised to give me that present, he was not obliged to do so."

label: disgust
text: Flicking through a magazine showing pictures of homosexual men committing various acts.

label: fear
text: ""My girlfriend and I slept in a lonely hut (we had drunk alcool). Suddenly some soil fell on us, then some water. Although we tried hard, we could not find out the cause."

label: guilt
text: We had had a party the night before and we still had some liquors left the morning after. I went to the kitchen pretending to prepare some tea and was caught by my fiancee pouring some rum down my throat.

label: sadness
text: When I heard the news that my grandfather had died.

label: anger
text: A certain Area Party Secretary came home in the morning and said we had to leave our home and build somewhere and the reason being that they wanted to establish a market. The Chairman knew nothing about it and was very angry.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had made it to the second year at UNZA.

label: joy
text: When I got a message that I was employed as a nurse at a kindergarten.

label: disgust
text: "Quarreling with my father, when he made false assertions."

label: disgust
text: "My parents attitude towards each other when they should become reconciled, despite my father's long-time addiction."

label: anger
text: When I was faced with writing an essay and I didn't want to do it I was angry that I had to write an essay and angry at myself for not having the time to write a good essay.

label: anger
text: "I went singing with a group of young people on January 6th (The three Magi), a local custom called ""star singing"". One of the girls, my girlfriend, broke the star. Being the accompanying person, I felt very angry thinking of the consequences."

label: disgust
text: "When some people, including me, are treated in a way which equates them to an animal or a thing."

label: guilt
text: "I had arranged to meet my friends at a certain place, and I was with other people.  My friends did not arrive and the people who were with me began to get tired.  My friends were one hour late."

label: fear
text: This last August when my parents dropped me off and moved me into college I didn't know anybody here; I was 17 and Berkeley really scared me.

label: shame
text: "When I was a child, my uncle came to see us. I spit at him and ran out - I do not know the reason for that. My father came after me and insisted on my apologizing."

label: shame
text: I had not punched a ticket in the bus because I had a card. But when the ticket-collector came it turned out that I had forgotten it. The shame I felt was great though it was not done on purpose.

label: guilt
text: "My cousin knocked on the door, looking for me to get her watch back.  I had given it to my girlfriend, Lizzy, as a present."

label: fear
text: I lost my way on a trip in the mountains.

label: disgust
text: A story I heard recently about a baby dying after sexual abuse.

label: anger
text: "As in sadness (A), relating to this slaghter of fur-seals."

label: disgust
text: One day my friend told me that she had heard that I was moving about with her boyfriend. I was disgusted with the news.

label: guilt
text: I promised to fulfill an errand. Later I understood it was impracticable. The explanation I gave was accompanied by a sense of guilt.

label: joy
text: "On my birthday, an old friend of mine sent me a card. I had not met him for a year and I was very glad that he had thought of me."

label: shame
text: Insulted by a woman in public.

label: guilt
text: "I entered the hostel this year.  My mother was ill and could not move and needed people to look after her.  Every week I left home to go back to school, I felt guilty."

label: fear
text: "When my relationship with my family is very poor I often fear being excluded from the group, a fear which is stronger in situations when an argument is on hand."

label: shame
text: "My father died 4 years ago, 18 months after my mother died. I feld my sister was responsible for his death, in that she ""hadn't loved him"". I felt ashamed for myself, and for my family."

label: disgust
text: "During lunch with some classmates, a priest was also there.  He was eating desperately as if someone was going to take his plate away.  He did it with gluttony.  He wiped his hands on his suit several times and it was full of crumbs."

label: fear
text: Getting back my Psych 140 midterm.

label: guilt
text: "One day at school I had quarrelled with a school-mate, and ultimately I had hit him hard.  He, being physically weak had to visit his doctor and remain absent from school for two days."

label: joy
text: Talking to my close friend.

label: fear
text: A fear of lack of personal powers.

label: guilt
text: In neglecting some work that had to be done around the house and telling my roommate I would get it done.

label: joy
text: The begining of my relations with my current girlfriend.

label: anger
text: That was what I felt with a teacher who put down quite unreal marks.

label: joy
text: At church camp when I accepted Christ into my life and so did my friend.

label: joy
text: When I passed the TOEFEL with very good marks.

label: anger
text: When I met my new girlfriend with another man in the street.

label: anger
text: When a friend of mine was trying to make a fool out of me.

label: sadness
text: When I left a man in whom I really believed.

label: anger
text: "I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out together. When I arrived at the place, the other persons weren't there. I became very angry because I thought they were gone without me. That, however, didn't appear to be the case."

label: anger
text: "Being insulted in front of my parents, and they believed other people (those insulting me)."

label: disgust
text: "When I was denied my favourite dish at the dinning hall (shima with roast chicken), I felt disgusted."

label: joy
text: When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.

label: anger
text: I got angry at a friend of mine whom I caught reading my notebook (almanach).

label: shame
text: One night a friend found out that I dumped one girl for another and he proceded to lecture me.

label: anger
text: "With the job appointments committee when the headmaster in charge explained that a male teacher was more suitable for the particular post.  I had more years of service than the male teacher, but this was not taken into consideration.  I could have been given a less attractive job if things had gone the way the headmaster wanted."

label: fear
text: Introducing myself at a first tutorial this year at University.

label: anger
text: "I was having an argument with my brother on his behavior, then we  started fighting and I got annoyed at him because he started teasing me."

label: disgust
text: Was picking up my father from work and on passing through the Valley watched three prostitutes walk up and down waiting for someone to pick them up. Clothing was disgusting.

label: sadness
text: "I have a very close friend who lives in another city and we have been writing to each other for a long time.  The last time I went to her city, just to see her, I was disappointed to see how great the distance between us was."

label: disgust
text: When I was reading a book.  It had nothing to do with the book itself but with the disagreable smell of the pages of the book.

label: disgust
text: "When my parents behave very ""witty"" towards me, they make insipid jokes about which they laugh. Or my mother who treats me like a little child."

label: fear
text: When I sit for examinations.

label: disgust
text: An acquaintance of mine revealed himself in a light unexpected to me.

label: anger
text: Being sexually assulted on a bus.

label: sadness
text: "When I heard about the death of Frantois Truffaut, the French motion  picture director, on the radio.  I had planned to go and see his last film."

label: guilt
text: "No ideal result in the University entrance examn, guilty to family and friend."

label: anger
text: "I wanted to go to Bhopal for relief work (gas tragedy).  My boss simply refused to let me go, I was so angry that the only thought that came to my mind was to quit the job."

label: disgust
text: "When I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist in mud."

label: guilt
text: Some of my friends had an argument.  I had earlier phoned one of them and that may have influenced him to argue.

label: disgust
text: Helping older people on the toilet.

label: sadness
text: "When my friends died one after the other.  The first died in a car accident and the second one recently, due to an illness."

label: disgust
text: The behaviour of a fellow towards me and some others in the army was really mean.  I detested this.

label: shame
text: My father was very angry with another man in the presence of my friends.

label: guilt
text: Two-timing - going out with person other than guy I was in relationship with.

label: sadness
text: "When my grandfather died, with whom I had a very close relationship."

label: shame
text: When I was dismissed from a job after having been accused of theft.

label: sadness
text: When I couldn't go for a trip with my friends in a holiday.

label: sadness
text: "I partly colored my hair black. My mother didn't like it and reproached me to be a ""subversive element"". Later on she stated that this was due to my friends. As I see it, this all resulted from colouring my hair."

label: disgust
text: "3 years ago I served in the army. Once a collegue denounced me because of a delict, which is usually committed. I was arrested for 3 days. I still detest this man."

label: sadness
text: When my father a 4th/5th generation colonial (from Eng.) attacked me verbally about my chosen partner. A man whom he discarded because his colour skin was not white. His ultimate disgust saddned me.

label: anger
text: My grandfather's funeral.

label: shame
text: "I talked with a man who stammered and without controlling myself, I started to talk imitating him."

label: fear
text: At primary school I was accused by some boys of being in love with a certain girl in their class so they had to shout and beat the girl and the matter was reported to the headmaster.

label: fear
text: I was afraid of a certain examination although I was relatively well prepared.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a big spider from very close.

label: shame
text: When my best friend foud out I'd been lying about something I'd been doing behind her back.

label: shame
text: "I was working in I. when a friend of mine borrowed his car so I could get bach there, I had to come to S.Paulo and his car was here. He said :""When you get the car tell my mother that you are only taking the car bacause I asked, for she doesn't like me to borrow it"". Next day he borrowed me it again for I had to come back again. When I was coming back I crashed the car quite a lot. One of the first person I met at the accident was his mother, that said to me ""You weren't to take the car only yesterday ?"" (before I saw her I was already ashamed)."

label: anger
text: I feel anger when things don't come out as I wish.

label: joy
text: "After my marriage I received the B.Sc results by post, I was very happy to learn that I had got very good marks - first class."

label: guilt
text: As a child - accidentally stepping on a pet guinea-pig - it dying.

label: fear
text: "I felt fear once, when the car in which I travelled directed towards the precipice along the road."

label: fear
text: One day I went to the cinema to see a film in which I was interested.  On arriving there I saw a long queue (which I had not expected) and went back home without seeing the film.

label: fear
text: I was to be given an audition to get a role. I had a competitress and I wasn't well prepared because I was ill.

label: joy
text: My 3 children - each top his class in the final exams 1984.

label: joy
text: Bulgaria won a football match against France.

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend and I experience something nice or when we have made a nice walk together.

label: anger
text: Not being alowed on a school camp with the class I'd been in for 11 years (I had stayed down due to illness)

label: fear
text: When I saw a large spider crawling up the wall.

label: guilt
text: "At a party, I started talking to a guy I had seen in one of my classes. My boyfriend felt awkward and left to talk to a friend but kept on looking at me as I talked."

label: fear
text: Fear when fulfilling my obligations on my first night fatigue duty as a soldier.

label: disgust
text: When I see rotten meat.

label: fear
text: Watching a horror movie with friends.

label: guilt
text: My mother wants to talk very often about her life. I dislike this because she always talks negatively about the same people whatever I do it doesn't help.

label: guilt
text: When I was caught going out with another girl by my girlfriend.

label: fear
text: "When I impregnated a certain girl, I thought that I would be forced to marry her or go to court."

label: anger
text: I got angry when I learned how short a time we had to prepare for the term examinations.

label: sadness
text: "After some friends had come to see me. They had stayed for several days and we had got on very well. When they had left, I had a feeling of emptyness."

label: shame
text: When I broke-down while seeing off my friend.

label: anger
text: "When I was in form 3, my aunts lied to my daddy telling him that I had told them that I was pregnant.  My daddy  told my mother and she asked me if it was true.  I was very angry with my aunts."

label: shame
text: "In an important situation for me, my father behaved inadequately."

label: sadness
text: Lecturers being unfair to me in reports.

label: guilt
text: "When in the initial interview for the recruiting, I don't know why, I accepted to do the test for army."

label: disgust
text: When I was presumed to have stolen maize from the school garden.

label: shame
text: I was once chatting with friends. Then some boys came and joined us. These boys took all my 3 friends away and I was left alone in shame without knowing where to go from there.

label: disgust
text: Saw someone who picked up a cigarette from the floor and smoked it.

label: disgust
text: This happened when I went to visit my friend in Chelston and found him screwing my girlfriend.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had been selected for the university.

label: fear
text: "In Sweden, a friend and I lived in an appartment owned by a Finn.  One day, this man came back to the appartment heavily drunk (hashish and alcohol).  He was quite dizzy and he broke down, and I could not foretell his reactions.  However, nothing happened."

label: fear
text: Reading a horror story alone.

label: shame
text: When I proposed love to a girl and she turned me down.

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgusted one day when, as we were eating, a child defecated on the table side."

label: anger
text: I was angry with a friend of mine who behaved in an affected manner.

label: joy
text: "During the exam period I studied in the library alone.  A close   friend of mine, who is also a classmate, told me that my application for a Japanese inter-cultural exchange programme had been accepted.  I was not very sure as I did not know that the list had been declared.  I ran to the board and saw that I was really included in the list.  I was so excited that I smiled all day long.  When I met my classmates and friends I told them the good news.  I was so happy that I could not concentrate on my studies. "

label: joy
text: "When I went to the pub with a large group of friends, we drank and danced."

label: disgust
text: "When we complained about the uncleanliness of the work place, the authorities agreed to have the place cleaned.  Even after 2-3 days nothing had been done.  I felt disgusted at the whole situation."

label: guilt
text: I saved up money for a good purpose. As I also have to organise a party I am afraid there will rest only a little money for the good purpose I feel guilty about this.

label: fear
text: "I was going home by car late one night when it was cold, dark and windy.  I became rather panicky on the way to my house."

label: guilt
text: I was in a sanatorium. In front of me a boy fell down from his invalid's chair. I could help him but I didn't. I felt like being paralysed.

label: sadness
text: My sister lost one of her twin sons (my first nephews) and then the older one died a week later.

label: guilt
text: I had to leave an important function early because of family commitments. Someone else had to complete my job.

label: joy
text: Talking with someone I admire a lot.

label: sadness
text: "A and I were walking along the new Asia stairway to the Chung Chi college for our lecture and I saw him with her.  He put one arm around her shoulder and laugher brightly and joyfully.  I did not dare and did not want to look, just walked by them quickly.  The interest of talking to A disappeared and I just wanted to remain silent.  But I did not want A to know and so I left him and went to F.  I should have expected this to happen."

label: anger
text: When I was punished in school for no serious mistake of mine.

label: shame
text: "I am ashamed when I am not ready for my seminar in internal diseases, simply because the assistant professor is a person who deserves high respect."

label: guilt
text: When I could neither measure up to the expectations of the teacher nor to my own expectations in one of the assignments.

label: sadness
text: When my friend (girl) went abroad for two years.

label: sadness
text: To fight with a sister and to know that she doesn't care.

label: anger
text: I am currently taking CS 50P. I had to finish a couple of assignments but I was hindered because I could not get a passing score on my program.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about torturing political prisoners in India (this happened in the India of Indira Ghandi).

label: disgust
text: "Ever since I have been a child, the sight of any kind of wound."

label: anger
text: "When a friend carelessly broke and object in my parent's house and did not apologize, or pay, or anything."

label: guilt
text: I added a little   ?   to a yield in an experiment to get more of a yield.

label: sadness
text: "I would have liked to go out to chat with some acquaintances, but I realized that I was not wanted.  I felt hurt, disappointed, lonely and deserted."

label: anger
text: Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

label: sadness
text: "When I knew that a person that I liked very much didn't react the way I would like to, even that I knew about his feelings for me."

label: joy
text: When I passed an exam.

label: guilt
text: "Having suffered a not very pretty sight, I reacted by uttering some very cruel and sharp words."

label: joy
text: When I got my results ( I had made it to the second year ).

label: sadness
text: "My sweetheart left me, or rather we decided to break it off by mutual consent.  The consequences were - unrestrained weeping, feelings of loneliness, hopelessness and disconsolation.  I felt that I should find a friend, to talk to joyfully and to forget."

label: sadness
text: "I was very sad  when I got the XIIth standard results, when I got low marks as compared to my friend and I could not get admission to courses like medicine."

label: disgust
text: "On Reperbahn, in a restaurant, a ""charming"" old saleswoman came to beg a drink for herself."

label: anger
text: "My partner without discussing with me the situation decided it was time for us to have a break and went ahead and arranged his own life for the next 6-12 months, then told me the day before it was about to happen having been tolerant and friendly for the preceding week."

label: disgust
text: When I heard the bad news about the death of a close person.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine was hurt as he thought that our relationship was not the same as before and something had gone wrong.

label: guilt
text: Guilt conscious struck me when I failed my Standard Two Examinations in 1972. I knew that I would suffer the consequences of what I had been doing during class hours: thus playing with friends and sometimes not even going to school.

label: anger
text: Once my father slapped my mother for a small quarrel.

label: guilt
text: "A certain colleague of mine sent me to buy a bag of flour for him, he gave me K20. Unfortunately I lost it."

label: guilt
text: I had to tell a collegue the time for an appointment with another collegue. I told her the wrong time - it was obviously my fault.

label: fear
text: To talk in a meeting - expound my thoughts on a subject. Fear delayed me acting to do this.

label: disgust
text: Disgust with drunk people.

label: guilt
text: "I felt guilty when I had taken the car keys and I had an accident but as my parents did not know who was to blame, they punished my brother because I had no driving licence and they thought it impossible that had driven the car."

label: fear
text: I had a cousin whom I loved so much. Unfortunately she passed away suddenly and one time I had a dream in which I was talking to her yet she is dead.

label: sadness
text: "A friend of mine lent me his apartment for holidays and besides this he was a fine person. Months later I knew that he died tragically in a moto accident. He was very young, and I felt sad and couldn't believe it (until today)."

label: joy
text: "When I knew that there were, at last, no problems in making a journey that I had been wanting to make for a long time."

label: joy
text: When I passed the driving test after three failures.

label: guilt
text: The time I was at secondary school during the holiday I appeared to my father while heavily drunk and I talked nonsense like in some sort of carefree.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to start Form I at Chilumba Secondary School out of the 100 pupils I was among the 4 who were successful. Family History showed that I had done better than all my brothers who had passed after repeating for several times.

label: shame
text: "When I was teasing a girl, who turned out to be my brother's dame."

label: anger
text: When I got low marks in B.Sc final.

label: guilt
text: I went to my boyfrien's house. There I found clothes of a certain girl. Without asking whose clothes they were I started tearing them only to realise that they were his sister's and so I felt guilty.

label: shame
text: When I walked out of my room with only my pants on and found my girlfriend and her female friend looking for me outside.

label: anger
text: I had to unscrew something on my car. I didn't succeed after two afternoons of trying. A feeling of anger built up itself.

label: sadness
text: When I went home on holidays I found that my niece and nephew had passed away I was very sad for the children were not even sick before death but suddenly died.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to study here at UNZA.

label: sadness
text: "When I left all my friends at school (break up) knowing we would probably all go our separate ways, and none see one another for a long time."

label: anger
text: I helped my little sister (13 years) learning mathematics. Obviously she did not want to understand what I explained and started to cry. I grew angry.

label: fear
text: Waking up from a bad dream in a dark night with noone else around.

label: anger
text: "I ""cooked"" the engine in my father's car - it was actually his fault because he hadn't fixed the temperature gauge or told me. When I finally got home I was absolutely screamed at and the anger I experienced was over the injustice of it all plus the huge row which developed."

label: fear
text: I was skiing alone and the mountain became covered with mist and I thought I was lost and was going to panic.

label: fear
text: "I walked up the main street of Auckland at 10 o'clock at night. I expected it to be very active with people, gangs, fast cars etc, thought it was actually quite quiet, though also oppressive. I walked about half a mile and bought a drink along the way."

label: joy
text: The period when I was pregnant and when I gave birth to my son. I can say those were the happiest months in my life.

label: shame
text: I failed an exam which I thought I would certainly pass.

label: guilt
text: "I spend the night with my boyfriend, while there was also a friend of his. We all lay on the floor to sleep. When my boyfriend was fallen asleep the other boy and I started petting. After 15 minutes I felt miserable and awoke my boyfriend to tell him that."

label: fear
text: "The first day that I was close to a dead body, in my third year at UNZA, school of medicine."

label: shame
text: When criticizing something about a person and then realizing that the person whom one is talking to is similar.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I lied to my parents.

label: sadness
text: I did not like it when a little girl was crying for her dead mother and was calling her by her name.  I was sad.

label: joy
text: When I won a trip to Greece in a competition.

label: sadness
text: My father had a heart attack when I was not at home (I was still living with them).  He recovered relatively well although he had to retire (which implied relief from the stress of a small scale enterprise).

label: shame
text: "A friend came for dinner with me at home. His parents are ordinary people. My mother, however, used the very expensive porcelain dinner-service and the silver cutlery. I felt very ashamed."

label: anger
text: "I was disappointed and angry at the bad quality of a documentay program on TV.  In my opinion, the topic was important and the program should have been made with seriousness and consideration."

label: shame
text: A good friend of mine told me in comfidence that once he had tried to commit suicide. To meet him you wouldn't think so. I told another friend of mine about this when she was feeling depressed about her twin brother's suicide. I broke a bond of confidentiality.

label: fear
text: "At night, I walk home past a forest.  Once, somebody got stabbed in the forest.  I imagine someone attacking me and I hurry up."

label: shame
text: Being sexually assulted in public.

label: fear
text: When the relationship with my first girlfriend broke up and I realized it too late.

label: sadness
text: I met some nice people during my holdidays. When they left I knew that I would never see them again.

label: disgust
text: I went to the shopping centre to buy something and saw packets of Kapenta  with maggots in them. Oh !

label: disgust
text: My main disgust is against codfish because I detest even the smell of it.

label: shame
text: I was dishonest to my boyfriend concerning something that is important to our relationship.

label: fear
text: I was driving very fast on a small road and I met an oncoming car in a right handed bend.  The other driver was on his own side of the road and I had to skid out of it to avoid a collision.  It was dark.

label: anger
text: Same situation as before - having my car stolen.

label: anger
text: I was with my girlfriend when some guys that I don't like made fuss at my girl.

label: disgust
text: When my husband quarrelled with me for no reason at all.

label: shame
text: I told a friend that I was going to a party and he would not enjoy himself if he came along.  He understood  that he would not have fitted in and there was something in that.

label: guilt
text: "My roommate got married and invited me to share a flat with them. But with a young couple there should not be a third person. I am to blame for not following the advise of the others, but it is not late still."

label: sadness
text: Caused a family disturbance.

label: anger
text: I was with my family and we found some abandoned puppies.  I wanted to help them but everyone said no.  We then left.

label: disgust
text: When my cousin put feaces in my washing.  A silly idea which was meant to be a joke.

label: anger
text: "I entrusted a friend with the delivery of some money to my father, however he misused the money."

label: shame
text: When I realized that I was directing the feelings of discontent with myself at my partner and this way was trying to put the blame on him instead of sorting out my own feeliings.

label: shame
text: Being caught by parents in a compromising situation with girlfriend.

label: guilt
text: When I pulled a chair from under someone at kindergarten and he hit his head.

label: guilt
text: Not to have studied enough when exams were near.

label: anger
text: I had an appointment with someone at a certain time. The other person didn't appear.

label: joy
