text: When I learnt that I had been accepted at UNZA.

label: guilt
text: When my middle child became very difficult to handle after the birth of his baby brother and I did not have any patience with him.

label: shame
text: "When someone I know was caught in an ""adultery"" situation."

label: shame
text: A friend catched me while masturbating. I am not fully sure whether she saw it or not.

label: disgust
text: The stories about my aunt who was beaten and humiliated by my uncle.

label: joy
text: After my final examination at school I was glad that the examination was over and that I had passed it.

label: anger
text: "I was angry about how the government acted concerning Hainburg, especially when I saw a discussion about it on TV."

label: sadness
text: When I realized that I was in hospital after a car accident and that I had a scleral tear in my left eye.

label: guilt
text: "When I think about my family (parents, brothers, sisters) guilt is a part of my feelings."

label: joy
text: "Joy of giving birth, and of sharing that joy with my husband. Moments of complete happiness and feelings of so much love."

label: sadness
text: I couldn't be with a girl on whom I was very keen.

label: joy
text: "In Southern Tyrol, I was gathering apples, it was a fine day, I was not thinking about anything, I felt an overwhelming joy."

label: guilt
text: "It was about midnight and I wanted to go to the countryside (I was in town) to watch the stars in the sky.  My mother did not like this, in spite of it I went out for a while.  My mother got angry."

label: shame
text: Insulted my girlfriend during a peptalk.

label: fear
text: Falling off a cliff in the mountains.

label: disgust
text: "In the army, an acquaintance of mine tended to use his position to advance his own interests."

label: fear
text: I experienced it once when we were on a drive. Our car passed by the one comming from the opposite direction at an incredibly small distance.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted while studying for my applied psychology and mental testing papers in B.A.

label: joy
text: A close acquaintace cried for me. I felt happy because somebody cared.

label: anger
text: "On the occasion of assignment of tasks and responsibilities in which such an assignment, dispropotionately carried with it high responsibility and low ability of organisation and resolution."

label: guilt
text: In the past I used to think that my mother was a very nagging person.  When I started living at the hostel we had little time to meet each other.  Whenever I went home she would take care of me.  I gradually realized that what she had done was for my own good.  So very time I saw her I felt guilty.

label: anger
text: I was given an exam which I thought did not measure at all my ability or my knowledge of the subject.

label: shame
text: Losing my temper and allowing myself to act childishly by yelling and screaming at a person who I felt had done me wrong - in effect lowering myself to their level.

label: sadness
text: My brother is a soldier. He promised to come home in a furlough but in the last moment he phoned and said that he could not come.

label: joy
text: Discussing psychology with my friends before the lecture.

label: disgust
text: I studied medicine for several semesters. I was always disgusted when we had the dissecting-course. I cannot understand why some persons like this course.

label: fear
text: I was riding with a friend in his car. At a speed of 120 km/h on the snow-covered motorway I would have liked to get out.

label: fear
text: I went to the apartment of my boyfriend and saw some people before his door. I thought that something had happened.

label: shame
text: I said something especially stupid which I did not mean at all.

label: anger
text: "Nearby the end of the year my wife and I were having a car ride, when it appears another vehicle, driven by a drunk driver and provokes an accident."

label: joy
text: I had a friend who I didn't see for a long time. We had a relationship from much union and interaction. It was more that one year that I didn't see her. She appeared in my home and we talked.

label: anger
text: "One of my best friends accused me of giving up to early on problems. It was only a casual remark on her side, but I was angry and hurt."

label: fear
text: When I heard that there is teasing and bulling at Secondary School.

label: joy
text: "When I went to a job interview, I met a person who was very nice, and his attitude made me glad."

label: disgust
text: "In a park near our home, a group of young people who were strangely dressed were seated in the middle of the street.  They began to eat while carressing each other."

label: guilt
text: "A very, very close friend of mine used to come to my room to      see me and I naver bothered to pay him a visit.  One day he asked me the reason behind this and I gave him a shirt."

label: disgust
text: When my mother got a terrible beating from my father.  It was so bad that she fainted and it was only then that my dad realized how bad it was.

label: disgust
text: I saw in the street a man spitting.

label: shame
text: I experienced long ago when I was sightseeing Bulgarians in a foreign language.

label: fear
text: "When I was the first to arrive at the scene after an accident, and found that a close school friend had been killed."

label: fear
text: "Once when I crossed the street, and was nearly trampled by a car."

label: fear
text: My 80 year old grandfather underwent three successive operations during a single year.  The third operation was risky and I was scared that he would die and feared that my grandmother would be very sad.

label: shame
text: At Christmas night there was a good movie on television which I wanted to see for years. I was whining about it till someone told me it was very childish. Then I felt shame.

label: joy
text: "This happened when I went to check my first year results, I had  thought that I would fail and I found that I had a clear pass in all my courses."

label: sadness
text: The loss of the woman who loved me most till today.

label: shame
text: I liked a boy and I would feel shy and then blush.  The more I wanted to avoid it the more I blushed.

label: guilt
text: "I felt very guilty when I tried to teach swimming to my younger brother, as I myself could not swim very well and my brother had started sinking to the bottom, however my elder brother saved him."

label: disgust
text: When I saw a very disagreable scene.

label: guilt
text: "When my boyfriend was away, I flirted with his best friend; I felt guilty the next day."

label: disgust
text: "In the tram there was a fat, sickly looking woman in front of me who was asking for directions in a thick voice.  When she got up to go a disgusting smell of urine came from her.  I felt that I would choke."

label: shame
text: When I dated a close girlfriend's boyfriend a few times. He told me that it was over between them and I accepted it.  When she found out she finished our friendship.

label: sadness
text: Death of my father.

label: disgust
text: Some students deliberately disobey me as a class leader.

label: guilt
text: "My uncle had promised to buy me a bicycle. As time went by and I had not received it yet, I asked my father to buy it for me. Later I heard that my uncle had wanted to offer me the bicycle on my birthday two weeks later."

label: fear
text: The last time I was face to face with with the monstrous dog which lives in my street.

label: sadness
text: "When my mother went through an operation, it was not very serious but I was sad and could not sleep before the operation."

label: sadness
text: When my uncle died of leukemia at age 35.

label: guilt
text: Guilty when I hadn't walked my dog for quite a few days and had given her no attention.

label: joy
text: When I received a letter of acceptance to CAL.

label: anger
text: "My friend half-teasingly called me a bad nickname.  I felt insulted and kicked his hip in anger.  I was stable later and did not feel angry at him.  In fact I was afraid that the other friends who were with us would think that I was an intolerant person.  However I could not apologize, so I pretended that nothing had happened and smiled when I left.  My friend did not say anything but just watched me leave."

label: disgust
text: The physical appearance of a meal.

label: guilt
text: I had an argument with my boyfriend.  It was my fault but my pride would not let me admit it.

label: sadness
text: Thinking about friends overseas.

label: anger
text: "When a teacher though pretending to be a highly cultivated teacher and a man, slapped a classmate of mine in the face quite undeservedly."

label: disgust
text: When I learnt that my cousin sister was pregnant.

label: sadness
text: Failing examn.

label: anger
text: "Two boys whom I know were telling me, in an indecent manner, how they had teased a young and shy girl I know.  They had despised her conviction, scorned and touched her.  I got very angry and did not try to conceal it and gave it back to them."

label: sadness
text: My boyfriend decided to make an end to our relationship.

label: disgust
text: "I and my friends got acquainted with a guy from Sofia who turned out to be gay, but we found that out only after 2 or 3 days."

label: sadness
text: "I was going away, leaving a dear person behind."

label: joy
text: When my brother was selected to the University of Malawi (the Polythecnic). I was very excited and I rejoiced due to one of our family members qualifying for University level at long last.

label: sadness
text: "Got a package from my parents, without even a small note enclosed."

label: disgust
text: I am disgusted at the number of second year students who are pregnant illegitimately.

label: sadness
text: When I heard about the death of my aunt.

label: disgust
text: "When I was young, one day in the car we fell sick and ended up vomitting on each other."

label: sadness
text: "A close relative was at odds with a very powerful firm.  All his things had been taken, His dad had died a little before this event.  He gathhered his children and vowed to give them a good life with a new start - the words were hollow, he bit back his tears .....I asked to be excused and then went and cried in the loo."

label: anger
text: Somebody was blaming me of a story which was not real and not true.

label: sadness
text: On rising. No apparent reason.

label: disgust
text: We were at a hamburger bar and a man at a table nearby started coughing and spitting into his plate.

label: joy
text: Passing a very difficult examination which I didn't expect - MCE.

label: shame
text: "I had to prepare a report but I couldn't write it. I read from a book off-hand, I was quite uneasy and I felt I didn't manage."

label: fear
text: Before an oral examination - which I did not take eventually.

label: fear
text: "When I was on holiday, walking back to where I was staying, at night, and two men started closely following me. There was nobody around that I could run to."

label: sadness
text: I received a letter from my grandmother. She has obviusly suffered a lot from my grandfather's suffering health. She mentioned things she had gotten him and he would never use.

label: sadness
text: "I was alone in my parents' house, having made plans to spend the afternoon with a lover (plans which the lover cancelled), watching a movie and considering my life and circumstances - pressures of examinations in particular."

label: sadness
text: The same as for SHAME and DISGUST. I was asked to resign my sorority which I did because I was ashamed.

label: shame
text: When unjustified hurting other people.

label: anger
text: When a thief broke into my house and stole some valuable goods.

label: fear
text: ""When I got to know that the friend I am closest to got engaged, and she was going away.  I was overjoyed for her, but also felt frightened as I was very emotionally dependent on her.  I did not know what I would do without her."

label: shame
text: When I bribed the person who caught me doing something I was not supposed to have done.  I was very ashamed of what I had done.

label: shame
text: I was to take part in a cocktail party on the occasion of our national holiday as a servant.

label: disgust
text: "I was sitting in the bus and a man with a very unpleasant smell came and sat next to me, to top it all he smoked continously."

label: sadness
text: A horse which I had liked very much was taken away.

label: disgust
text: I found out that someone that I knew had someone else taking tests for her.

label: guilt
text: I'm allergic to most foods - eating something that I'm allergic to caused guilt.

label: disgust
text: Our boarder burping after meals !

label: fear
text: "I went to see a movie and I went with a friend, it was really frightening and it made me stop and think about the world around me and what it is really like out there. I was frightened all that night."

label: anger
text: "A friend of mine had promised to arrange me some tickets for a concert which I considered important.  He could not get them the way he thought he would, so he gave up the whole thing."

label: sadness
text: "Watching ""11 am"". They had a programme on the starving refugees. Their plight was a source of sadness for me."

label: guilt
text: Not being able to help my friend to study English.

label: anger
text: An old woman was violently thrown down the stairs of the tube by a group of louts.

label: disgust
text: "I stayed for several weeks with a friend of mine before she moved to live with her husband. One evening he came drunk and made an awful scene, which I still remember."

label: shame
text: "As a young girl in form I, I wet my bed one day at the boarding school and many girls came to see the person who had done it as I had to take my mattress out that day."

label: joy
text: I'm glad when I have good relations with my colleagues and most of all when we are at a party.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty after I battered to death a classmate of mine.

label: disgust
text: I feel disgust when hearing or seeing other people being treated inhumanely. For example torturing in chili.

label: anger
text: Being stopped by the police for a traffic offence which I don't think I committed.

label: joy
text: "On holiday, seeing the lanscape in Gerona."

label: anger
text: "During the Xmas holiday, I and my best friend at Secondary School had planned to meet at a Cultural afternoon at the Mt. Soche Hotel after missing each other for such a long time. When I asked my mother for permission, she told me not to go for no good reason. I felt very angry with her."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted at my teams poor perfomance prior to league play.

label: sadness
text: "When I left New York, and all my family and my friends behind me."

label: disgust
text: When an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich sounded very dirty. (He can't help it of course).

label: shame
text: "Because I was lazy and unthoughtful I did not get into contact with a very close friend when she shifted from the Gold Coast to Brisbane, for a month, despite her efforts to contact me. I felt shamed when I finally confronted her again."

label: shame
text: I was complaining about calling people whom I didn't know. I forgot that the purpose is to invite people for dinner and get to know them.

label: joy
text: Getting a part-time job.

label: disgust
text: "At my father, when he yelled and accused my sister's friend (over the phone) of doing something he didn't do, or know anything about."

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to a certain school as a student.

label: sadness
text: My best friend was not chosen for the English lectures.

label: fear
text: "I had this experience of fear when few people were fighting at a social one night, which one of my relative was involved. My fear was greatly for him because he was being assaulted badly."

label: sadness
text: So as to be closer to the university I have left home and moved into Auckland. It now seems as if I have left home - especially my family - forever.

label: guilt
text: When I spanked a child in anger and later regretted it terribly.

label: disgust
text: At the hypocrisy of some of my friends.

label: guilt
text: When I got very drunk and really misbehaved at Christmas.

label: guilt
text: Insulting other people.

label: sadness
text: When my ex-boyfriend and I separated.

label: sadness
text: When someone I was close to became a paranoid schizophrenic and I was unable to see this person because of the situation.

label: fear
text: Once I spent a night with a friend at the secondary school. We told each other horror stories and suddenly we heard uncanny noises. I was terribly frightened.

label: anger
text: I was waiting to receive the participation on the profits and did not receive it.

label: fear
text: When I went to my first dental appointment.

label: anger
text: On the way home from Marstrand I was driving behind my father's car.  Another car tried to push in front of my father and he was forced to swerve and he thus collided the car with a pillar.  The other car drove off without even seeing what had happened.

label: sadness
text: I ran a race for the CAL track team and I did terribly and then the coach said that I should sit out for the season. I felt really sad because I wasn't going to be able to run. It was something I always had done and now I couldn't do it anymore.

label: joy
text: "My girlfriend wrote to me telling me that she was four months pregnant and that I was responsible for the ""damages"".  This made me happy as I longed to have a child to call mine."

label: joy
text: I am happpy when I get good results in the field of academics or athletics.

label: fear
text: "Car accident. Travelling as a passenger along narrow bitumen road at night - trying to overtake semi-trailer. The truck pulled over onto our side and we hit the wet dirt, swerved back into the truck, back onto the verge, over a guide post and into a ditch."

label: shame
text: When I went to meet the family of my boyfriend in a party in his house. His mother was eager to know me and all his friends ready to make jokes about the situation.

label: shame
text: I felt ashamed when I had not attended a class and the teacher asked me the reason for my absence.

label: shame
text: "I was learning judo and my instructor wanted me to assist him in teaching girls judo at a suburban college.  I was just a beginer, and he made me a green belt so that I would be able to command respect.  This was against my principles, and yet I allowed myself to listen to him.  I gave it up soon after, however I felt very ashamed at not sticking to my principles and at not having put my foot down earlier."

label: joy
text: I got a good reaction from my tutor and tutorial group for a presentation I'd given that I was very worried about.

label: shame
text: Insulted by classmate in public.

label: anger
text: "When I am accused of something I have not done, I get unbelievably angry."

label: sadness
text: Whenever I read or think about the way people treat animals and nature.

label: anger
text: Having my personal objects rearranged by someone else without my consent and having it arranged to their taste. Then trying to find a particular object they rearranged for an hour or more.

label: sadness
text: "My grandmother died over the summer. I knew her very well, she baked great biscuits. She was in the hospital but expected to improve and go home soon. She died in her sleep."

label: sadness
text: A) A documentary in which baby fur seals were being clubbed/spiked to death by Canadian seal-hunters. Brutally graphic.

label: sadness
text: "A close friend travelled to another country. When I knew that he would only come back after many years, I felt very sad."

label: anger
text: "A good friend deceived me. Because of that little quarrel our relationship finished, mainly because she was not honest. I was very angry about that."

label: anger
text: "When I used to go to my chief asking about any doubt about the job and he didn't care, didn't answer me, leaving me speaking alone."

label: shame
text: One day I addressed my husband in an abusive manner in front of his friends.  Later on I realized this myself and felt ashamed of myself.

label: fear
text: Fear came towards the end of May when the P.T.S. results were out after hearing the failure of my fellow three friends.

label: guilt
text: When quarreling with friends.

label: guilt
text: When I and the boy next door set fire to a house by accident.

label: anger
text: "A person close to me mistook my good intentions for bad, and therefore associated unpleasant traits to me."

label: joy
text: As an evening class teacher I got positive feedback.  When the atmosphere is good and a kind of relaxed understanding exists.

label: disgust
text: Saw someone acting in a false manner in public.

label: anger
text: I played chess with my 12-year-old brother. I made a stupid mistake - and he won!

label: shame
text: Not doing well in the examn.

label: shame
text: "At a meeting with over one hundred people, they decided who had to speak from the stand by drawing lots."

label: shame
text: When I broke the piggy bank of my brother and my mother discovered that.

label: shame
text: A conflict with a pupil and there were probatory teachers present.

label: sadness
text: "Estrangement from my best woman friend.  We have been going different ways for quite some time now, but the break was total when she got married as her husband is unreasonably jealous of me."

label: shame
text: I was ashamed to tell my mother that I fell down with a bicycle.

label: anger
text: "I was coming home in a taxi with a fellow worker of mine.  He was criticizing my earlier conduct towards him, which to my mind was unfounded.  When I reached home, I ran out of the taxi and slammed the door."

label: fear
text: I was not prepared for the exam but I wanted to sleep the night before the exam.

label: shame
text: Failed in a piblic argument.

label: disgust
text: Saw my father with that woman he is married to now.

label: fear
text: I was walking home with a friend at night along a quiet street.  Something started rustling in the bush : it was an exhibitionist.

label: sadness
text: "When I said good-bye to my girlfriend.  I had spent two years on developing this relationship and it was unsuccessful, I felt very sad."

label: guilt
text: When I misled a person: I said that I would do her a favour and didn't.

label: shame
text: Taking part in the mobbing of some girls in my class in primary school.

label: shame
text: I was wearing a slit tight dress at a disco and it burst open.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I couldn't help a person.

label: fear
text: When one meets new people with whom one is forced to collaborate with.

label: joy
text: "When I saw the certificate results, I did not feel very happy as I did not realize that I had got all the credits until my classmates pointed it out to me.  My parents and my relatives praised me and I realized that my results were good i.e 2A, 5B, 2C.  I felt satisfied with the results and was happy."

label: shame
text: I lied to a friend.

label: anger
text: As for disgust.

label: guilt
text: I was caught sneaking sweets.

label: joy
text: When I saw that I had passed an exam.  It was the last chance and there was a lot at stake.

label: anger
text: I had an accident with damage to the car body.

label: fear
text: "I had not told my parents about my bad marks in school. One day, my father wanted to speak to the teachers. Fortunately I could influence my parents to take it easy."

label: joy
text: When I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a long time.

label: disgust
text: I saw a program on T.V where they had to saw a skull for an        operation.

label: disgust
text: I hate hypocrisy. My friend (girl) tried to intrude into my affairs with my future husband. After that she behaved as if nothing had happened.

label: guilt
text: "As I was not paying attention, my little brother fell off the table."

label: guilt
text: Not noticing my roommates quietness or a sign of discomfort.

label: shame
text: "I just opened the bathroom without knocking not knowing that someone was bathing inside, it happened to be my father."

label: guilt
text: When I tell someone no. In other words when I refuse to do something although I could have helped him.

label: shame
text: When I had my first sexual relation and it didn't work.

label: shame
text: "When I met a friend whom I had not seen for a long time and heard all about her troubles, I thought that I should have got in touch with her earlier."

label: shame
text: "Following heavy stirring / ridiculing a close friend who was very vulnerable to such attack - inspiring fierce, defensive counter-attack."

label: sadness
text: When my family heard that my Mother's cousin who lives in England wrote us to tell that he had cancer of the lymph glands.

label: fear
text: When I first sat for an entrance examination.

label: disgust
text: When a friend of mine keeps telling me morbid things that happened to his dog.

label: fear
text: When for the first time I rode on a motorcycle with my brother.  He was going so fast that I felt that I would fall off without my brother realizing it.

label: anger
text: "When, for example, I was not approved to continue my studies at the Moscow University, no matter that I had the highest marks and in general the best records of all the candidates."

label: sadness
text: When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made clear that he didn't want to continue in the same way. He choose his girlfriend (also a friend of mine).

label: anger
text: My cassmate laughed at me when I was being scolded by the teacher.

label: joy
text: When I passed the first year and so I could come back for my second year.

label: disgust
text: One evening when a boy who was drunk made a pass at me by trying to kiss me.

label: joy
text: Reading a letter from a close friend who said he missed me and cared for me.

label: anger
text: "A friend who shares the room with me, opened the window in the morning and left the room the whole day. When I came home in the evening, the room was so cold that I couldn't stay there."

label: shame
text: "I had obviously done the work badly but my class-mates of the student's association did not blame me, they helped me do the work."

label: anger
text: My young brother took my wristwatch in my abscence and sold it to his friend at a cheaper price.

label: fear
text: I was in a camp and went out for a walk at night on my own.  I lost  my way and spent several hours looking for the camp.

label: fear
text: I experienced this feeling when the doctors found a nodule in one of my mother's breasts. It turned out to be an occlusion resulting from continious sucking but for a few days I was not in my reason.

label: sadness
text: Last year when I worked during the Summer holidays and studied at the same time for an examination I had to repeat; my boyfriend went to Greece for a holiday for a month.

label: fear
text: "When I went home alone early in the morning, I had to go through a wood."

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust of my father when I knew he had a lover.

label: guilt
text: "When my pet dog,who was to us a family member, died.  He had been vomitting for the past three days and we had not found the time to call a vet, finally when the vet came it was already too late."

label: sadness
text: I had received bad news informing me that grandmother and grandfather had passed away. The first one to die was my grandmother and after two days grandfather died too.

label: joy
text: "When I meet old past pupils of mine - and find they are all doing well - I feel joy. Yesterday I met a young woman (20 yrs) I'd taught her at 6 yrs, then at 12 yrs and hadn't seen her for last 3-4 yrs; she was no longer a waitress but a meter maid for Council."

label: joy
text: My joy was the joy of meeting again.  My husband came home after having been away for weeks (for work).  I was on the railway station to meet him.

label: disgust
text: When a friend of mine got drunk and started to blame and scorn my other friends and me.

label: anger
text: When I was accused of having planned my friend's outing at secondary school (boarding) as we were not allowed to go out.

label: guilt
text: "I was cold to my sister without meaning it, just because I was upset and frustated."

label: disgust
text: "Bisshop Ter Schure intoduced himself on TV to the Dutch Nation. He spoke as if he was God himself, and didn't discuss the way he had achieved this position."

label: joy
text: When I was appointed by the Ministry of health to join the teaching staff of one of the medical colleges.

label: guilt
text: I had to take care of a neighbour's child. I did not look after it all the time and the child fell down and was hurt. I felt guilty.

label: sadness
text: A father of 4 children killed in an accident.

label: disgust
text: A piece of work was marked as bad by the teachers I and some fellow students didn't agree with their vague criticism. I felt myself taken in by the teachers and felt disgust.

label: sadness
text: The death of my grandfather.

label: disgust
text: Bad temper of the serving lady in the students' dining hall.

label: guilt
text: "When I was 4, we spent our holidays at the seaside. My sister and her friend wanted to go to a bay on an undangerous way. I wanted to arrive before them and went on a shorter, but more dangerous way. When I arrived, I found nobody there. I waited for a long time, but nobody came. On my way back I met my mother who had been searching for me desperatly. She did not scold me, but I saw how much she had worried (herself)."

label: shame
text: Being criticized by teacher in public.

label: joy
text: Seeing relations from overseas after a few years.

label: guilt
text: "When my little brother asked me to play with him, I told him that I had no time and that I would play with him the next day. However, the next day I said the same thing."

label: shame
text: This situation happened when I was found kissing a girl who was my friend's girlfriend.

label: sadness
text: We got news that my (almost) 21 years old brother died while visiting Europe of a cerebral hemorhage. It finally hit me an hour after we saw his corpse in the coffin. It felt like a door between himself and everything had closed and locked forever.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted when my cousin decided that she would stop going to school saying she wanted to get married. She was only 14 years by then and she didn't understand what she was thinking.

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I passed the worst phase in my life and discovered how many people considered me important to them.

label: shame
text: "Last Summer I went camping with some C.U students.  As I was working then, I had to leave the second night (some of them had joined us the first night).  Next morning, 6 o'clock, a female classmate knocked on our door and tried to wake us up.  I was not fully conscious and I said something which I should not have.  I realized the trouble I had made and wanted to hide.  Later I said sorry to her and the matter came to an end."

label: fear
text: When my father was ill and was waiting for the results of his tests.

label: fear
text: As a result of breaking the indicator light as mentioned for guilt.

label: anger
text: "When I saw parents punishing their little child for something he had not done.  In my opinion, even if he had done it he should not have been punished for it."

label: guilt
text: "When I used an adjective for a person without knowing what it meant.   When I got to know the meaning, I felt guilty as it was a clear and unfair insult."

label: anger
text: "I was informed by my flatmate that, when we'd moved into our flat, she'd expected us to buy our food separetely - this event actually happened some 5 months after our sharing began. Prior to this, she had said nothing."

label: joy
text: "When finally I found a place to live, I felt relieved, predicting changes in my life, and I became happy."

label: anger
text: "When, late at night, I discovered that they had stolen my bike."

label: shame
text: "After an oral examination I shook the professor's hand, but he had only stretched it out for my ball-point-pen."

label: shame
text: "I was supposed to go out with my girlfriend one Saturday night, but I got really drunk with some friends earlier that afternoon and evening. So, I totally forgot about going out with my girlfriend. She showed up the next day, and that was when I remembered."

label: disgust
text: I was drinking coffee in a cafe and I found a piece of scrubber in my cup.

label: guilt
text: I lost my self-control and raised my voice at a child.

label: disgust
text: A too eager approach by a dirty drunken person in a bus.

label: joy
text: Receiving a nice present from my parents.

label: guilt
text: "My daughter was a baby and was crying to be taken on my lap. I felt very nervous and moved her away and went out. As soon as the feeling of nervousness passed I was taken by an enormous feeling of guilt, for having rejected my daughter."

label: guilt
text: I am not good enough for your experiment I am doing.

label: joy
text: I was accepted by the Chinese university.

label: fear
text: "In a dam lake, when the water was let flow to water the plants and I and two other boys were near the water pit. We rescued ourselves only thanks to the flippers and the tyre that was with us."

label: fear
text: "I work at a day care centre, and one day when the children were outdoors a four-year old boy disappeared from the yard.  I was not looking after them then, but as the manager it was me who was responsible."

label: anger
text: "When I checked my examination paper and realized that I had been careless, thoughtless, lazy and hasty so as to make unnecessary mistakes concerning things I know and understand."

label: disgust
text: One day my colleague misbehaved with me.  I felt disgusted and thought to myself that he could only do this because I was a woman.

label: disgust
text: Heard someone boasting his fortune telling and I knew he was lying.

label: fear
text: We were on the road in a car when a lorry bypassed us.  We had to swerve and we almost got run over.

label: shame
text: "When I was 12 years old, some friends of our family had come to watch TV. I lay on the floor and moved my pelvis. When the other people had gone, my mother told me that it had looked as if I had wanted to make sex."

label: sadness
text: One day I heard from a friend that the boy I loved had gone out with her and not with me.

label: sadness
text: My girlfriend wanted to breakup for an indefinite amt. of time. She said that she couldn't commit herself fully to the relationship without going out with other people. I was her first boyfriend.

label: fear
text: Saw a classmate knocked down by a motorcycle.

label: fear
text: "When cleaning up a pile of junk under our house, a huge spider (a ""Jungle Spider"") ran out near me. (I do not like even small spiders)."

label: guilt
text: When I took a small boy's share of choclale.  He was our guest and so had been given a larger share of the sweets.

label: fear
text: "I was seven years old and swimming outside the flags at the Gold Coast. I was caught in a rip and taken out about 100 m. I couldn't swim too well, but an older friend (17) swam out and saved me."

label: sadness
text: "When I was a child I had a grass-parakeet I liked very much. His legs were crippled so that he could not move very fast. Once I came into the room, did not notice him and stepped on him. A few days later he died."

label: disgust
text: Some students talking when other people are having a nap.

label: disgust
text: At the crowded conditions of living.  I always quarrel with my elder brother as he puts the T.V volume at a deafening level and I can not practise my piano lessons.  Thus I feel that my home is disgusting.

label: shame
text: When I dropped a bottle in the state liquor store and everyboby started laughing.

label: shame
text: Not brave enough to take up a challenge in a group discussion.

label: fear
text: Finding out that I made a stupid mistake in the examn.

label: joy
text: When the contract about my shop was signed.

label: fear
text: "One night going downstairs, and hearing a strong stirring of brances, which was not the wind."

label: sadness
text: "The person whom I liked most left me for a friend of mine, after several months of mutual help and a profound knowledge of each other."

label: sadness
text: A person died (not really a friend).

label: disgust
text: Accidentally seeing a friend in a compromising situation with a stranger.

label: disgust
text: "Political and military trnsgressions around the world, generally speaking. This cannot be described through this questionaire."

label: sadness
text: "Two years ago my best friend died in an accident, just a day before my birthray.  We were very close to each other and I felt very sad at loosing a close friend."

label: fear
text: "I was at the cinema with my sister and her boyfriend.  A man sitting beside me started to stroke my leg for a while, he left in the middle of the film."

label: guilt
text: Not finishing homework in time.

label: sadness
text: "My mother kicked my surrogate father out and he in turn did not care for the dog, Afthur, he bought for the family. His lack of concern lead tho Arthur's death on the freeway. I loved Arthur like a brother. He was easy to talk to."

label: anger
text: In a situation whereby a friend's actions were deliberately against my wishes and (with) no regard to my feelings.

label: guilt
text: "Accidentally dropped a friends camera flash, so that it was broken."

label: joy
text: Did well in an examn just before my father's birthday: the best present I can give to my father.

label: sadness
text: "I was at home alone when I realized that a young roe approached our house. I hid because I did not want to frighten it. It limped. Some time later, when I thought that it had already run away, I saw it lying on our terrace. I came nearer and saw that it was terribly wounded. I informed the ranger who said that the roe must have been attacked by dogs. He had to shoot it."

label: disgust
text: "I feel disgust at my neighbour, because she comes to our house with her child, who spoils our furniture."

label: fear
text: I was scared in the dark when I was a little boy.

label: sadness
text: When my dog died.

label: disgust
text: My parents inherited an appartment and this made them behave in a peculiar manner.

label: sadness
text: Due to some reasons my boyfriend and I decided to separate.

label: sadness
text: Watching a football game. This remindes me of the time when my father was still alive and when we watched football games on TV together.

label: shame
text: A teacher spent a lot of time helping me without wanting to be paid for it. For the exam I didn't got a good grade and I felt ashamed.

label: anger
text: My elder brother often criticizes my mother's cooking.  Once he did it very impolitely and lost his temper.  This made all of us very sad.  I was very angry and I scolded him.  He asked me not to interfere with what was his buisness.

label: fear
text: Small car accident. Black ice on the road - cars in front of us started zig-zagging and so did we. Car in front did a 180¦ turn we followed and ended up in a gully.

label: guilt
text: "Make a mistake, offended my friend."

label: guilt
text: I had stopped talking to a very close friend of mine.  A week later he came over to try and make friends with me  again and from the way he talked I felt that he was a very mean preson.

label: anger
text: "Disagreements with mother.  When I moved from KankaanpSS, she had promised to help me move but broke her promise because of some hindrance. "

label: disgust
text: When I was the South Koreans on the TV.

label: anger
text: "Teenage neighbours smashed my letterbox for the fifth time in a couple of months. It was a deliberate action of kids who had stayed in my home, had meals there yet took a dislike to my daughter. "

label: fear
text: "When I saw a TV program on the North American military plan called ""The startwar""."

label: disgust
text: Friends calling me fat - pear shaped in front of a nice girl.

label: guilt
text: When I let a person assume a fault that I committed.

label: fear
text: "My sister had to undergo a very complicated operation, her eyesight was at stake."

label: sadness
text: "When I received the S.Y.J.C results, the marks I obtained were not up to my expectations and I missed admission in engineering."

label: disgust
text: At a social event when none of the guests would help to serve food or clear tables. It was all beneath them.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a dog which had been knocked down by a car.

label: guilt
text: Low evaluation of other people's cares.

label: fear
text: "When I was going home, I saw somathing which looked like a snake   on the road but later I found out that it was only a stick."

label: fear
text: When I had to walk home in the dark for the first time.

label: guilt
text: "Feeling helpless, not being able to accomplish what I really wanted to do."

label: anger
text: "One day, when riding on a bicycle path, a car coming from the opposite direction forced me to get off my bike although I had the priority."

label: disgust
text: When I see dead dogs on the road.

label: disgust
text: After learning on the news about this man who killed more than 300 women and habitually copulated into their inert bodies.

label: disgust
text: "Father said: If you are pregnant, you will have to procure abortion. I was filled with disgust against my father."

label: guilt
text: "A kitten had wandered into our office, and I was told to take it back across the street. When I crossed back, the kitten followed me and was run over and killed by a car."

label: sadness
text: Finding out my best friend cannot go to the English lectures.

label: joy
text: When in the end of a semester I got the approval in a matter that I judged very difficult.

label: shame
text: I am chosen for the English lectures instead of my good friend and people told me that girls are more likely to be chosen.

label: joy
text: "I thought that I had failed an examination, but when I was informed about the mark, I saw that I had passed it."

label: disgust
text: "I feel disgusted when people do not understand me in the right way, i.e they misunderstand me."

label: shame
text: Insulted by somebody.

label: guilt
text: I had to take care of my little brother. When I met a friend I did not pay attention to him for a certain time and he was hurt while he was playing.

label: disgust
text: When my cat vomited and a worm came out which was still alive.  I was forced to wipe it up.

label: sadness
text: Lost a friend.

label: joy
text: When I was informed that a short story I had written had been accepted for publication.

label: disgust
text: A student who lives in the same house where I live is an alcoholic. He tries to manipulate other people with his money when he has drunk too much.

label: shame
text: On the train a drunk person touched my baby and I reacted very disapprovingly.  I felt ashamed later as the person had not been aggressive though he could have been.

label: fear
text: "We were walking in the park at night.  It was very dark and very late.  We began to hear foot steps all around us, and we could not find our way out."

label: joy
text: Winning a close volleyball game. (I'm on the intercollegiate team at CAL)

label: guilt
text: My parents appreciate very much me and my boyfriend coming and have dinner with them at Christmas. However we decided to visit his parents. My mother was rather disappointed.

label: sadness
text: "A relationship in which I had put my trust, broke up.  I was sad when I realized how easy it is to forget something that one had once regarded as great and significant."

label: sadness
text: I experienced this emotion when my grandfather passed away.

label: joy
text: "When my father managed to begin a ""new life"" after the divorce from my mother; resulting in a new little sister for me."

label: guilt
text: The assistant professor saw me cheat at the preliminary examination.

label: fear
text: When my cat ran under a car and came home wounded. He could hardly walk. I didn't dare to go to a veterinarian because I was afraid he would kill him.

label: joy
text: "When I got through the examination for my driver licence, and when I finished I knew I had passed it."

label: guilt
text: My grandmother wanted me to help her. I was driving a tractor pulling a dead branch off a tree. I told her she didn't respect me.

label: fear
text: When I almost walked on a snake.

label: anger
text: South Korea cheating for gold medals.

label: sadness
text: When I did not get the salary increase that I had been expecting and understood how little one's work was appreciated.

label: anger
text: Being insulted by my roommate.

label: guilt
text: I feel this feeling most often before me not before the others. My outside is iron but actually I'm wasting away.

label: anger
text: Someone called me a disgusting nickname.

label: joy
text: "When I went for a picnic in Lonavala, I felt full of joy."

label: sadness
text: "The fact that my mother is getting married again (my mother and father divorced about 15 years ago) means that she will probably move to Turku, and our home, which is a one family house, will be sold (I myself have not been living at home for the past six years)."

label: disgust
text: "A similar feeling I felt quite recently while travelling in a taxi. The driver treated me roughly and dishonestly - he chose the longest route, he overdrawed almost one lev more and he tried to be intimate with me."

label: anger
text: "A class-mate urged me to carry out a particular protest along with him, and when the time came this fellow drew back while I had to face the situation."

label: shame
text: "A day when I was getting out of the shower I covered only the front part of my body with a towel (I was 7 years old), and I didn't see that my cousin was in the room."

label: disgust
text: "A series about Freud was shown on TV.  In it, a tampon had been set in the nose of a woman, and forgotten there.  After great pain it was taken off (close-up picture), the woman was bleeding from the nose and the mouth."

label: anger
text: While I was away for the weekend some friends went into my room and played my very expensive stereo without asking me or my roommate.

label: anger
text: When a person whom I had invited did not come on the appointed day and time.

label: anger
text: This was when I found out that a cousin of mine had taken away my trousers without my consent.

label: fear
text: I once felt that my last hour had come when I was unexpectedly found in the hands of.

label: sadness
text: The death of my grandmother.

label: anger
text: "One night I could not practise my violin as my family was watching T.V with the lights off, so I wanted to listen to some tapes.  It was dark so I asked my brother to bring me a torch, however he scolded me.  I was so angry that I slammed my violin on the floor."

label: sadness
text: Some colleagues decided to go out on a Saturday not inviting me to decide either the place nor the time.

label: anger
text: When a friend tried to back bite me on false grounds.  This made me wonder if he was a really a good friend.

label: guilt
text: When I had an argument with my grandfather the day my younger brother was born.

label: shame
text: I flet shameful when I learnt that I cooked Nsima which was full of lamps in it.

label: disgust
text: "My notes were not returned to me, it kept on being procrastinated."

label: disgust
text: With a Manager who insists on making crude innuendos pertaining to sex.

label: joy
text: When I heard that someone who is very close to me did very well in the exams despite having fooled around a lot.

label: disgust
text: "When a girl said in my back that we were in love, and she had actually refused me.  When I confronted her she started insulting me."

label: sadness
text: "While still at school a friend died of cancer, after being ill for a long time, she was 17 yrs old."

label: guilt
text: When I don't fulfill my obligations.

label: shame
text: We were writing Primary school leaving Examinations when I had fallen at the steps going into the Exam room.

label: shame
text: When I gave my boyfriend a brush-off.

label: anger
text: My father began to say incoherant things concerning my brother's and my own behaviour towards him.  His biased (authoritarian) and ridiculous point of view made us angry.

label: fear
text: I was sleeping alone in the house at night. A boy putting on a short only knocked at the window whispering that I should open for him.

label: anger
text: "A male, Honduran acquaintance of mine despised my opinions."

label: joy
text: Renewed contact with an earlier friend.

label: sadness
text: "I felt sadness when I notice that I'm not important for a determinate person. We do many things for a friend, and we see soon after, that he doesn't do anything for us, nor thinks of us."

label: joy
text: When I got the loan for my studies.

label: disgust
text: When my sister's boyfriend accused her of having been sleeping around.

label: joy
text: "I was in hospital, and then was visited by someone quite unexpected."

label: sadness
text: My fiancT's family was adopting a 5 years old boy. I felt myself close to him as I never felt before. After some time his mother demanded the care of the kid and we were obliged to send him back.

label: shame
text: "If I don't go to lectures, I often feel ashamed."

label: sadness
text: When I read a lot and did not remember anything.

label: joy
text: "I was biking with my boyfriend, the sun shining after a long period of bad beather, afterwards we spent the evening and night together."

label: disgust
text: Disgust of drunkers and of blood.

label: disgust
text: When I was getting so fat.

label: fear
text: "I felt so afraid when dad fell ill, he had never suffered from that disease since and I had never seen him as he was."

label: shame
text: I didn't do an important job and it had an adverse effect on other people.

label: sadness
text: When I first heard that Tage Dannielsson had died.

label: sadness
text: When my aunt passed away in early 1982.

label: joy
text: I won the country ski championship.

label: guilt
text: About not helping my sister when she asked me to help her on her chemistry class. I pretended to be busy.

label: disgust
text: In a public swimming hall I saw a very aggressive man who practically attacked the children who got in his way when he was swimming.

label: guilt
text: I didn't give back in time some money that I had borrowed. My friend relied on them.

label: fear
text: When I was travelling home by bus and suddenly the bus hit and the bus leaned against a wall.

label: sadness
text: "A child, 9 years old, died in a stupid way.  He fell from a place which was 1 metre high."

label: disgust
text: I have a horror of spiders and snakes. On a walk through the wood I saw the body of a slow-worm (without the head).

label: shame
text: Failing in an examn because of lazyness.

label: fear
text: "In 1960,  I was going to a school which was near my village and I met a lion on the way, which disappeared suddenly."

label: sadness
text: "When my sister left to go home, in Sweden, after the Christmas Holidays."

label: guilt
text: "When in grade 3, late home from school every day for weeks because of harassment from a grade 7 boy I lied to mother about why I was home late."

label: shame
text: "I am ashamed of the way my father behaves with my mother and sister, and with me too."

label: sadness
text: When I learnt of the death of a friend.

label: sadness
text: "My mother died of cancer after a 4 year illness - I think the most pregnant moment of sadness was the next morning, just as the sun rose."

label: disgust
text: "I detested my father who was a drunkard.  He would rave, threaten and blame my mother and me.  He finally drove us away from home."

label: joy
text: The day I got a telegram telling me that I had been selected for a B.A at UNZA.  I felt happy because I had not expected to be selected.

label: fear
text: Birds had made nests in our thatched roof and they were flying and flapping their wings in the bedroom at night.  It was very dark and I could not even see my nose.  I did not know that it was the birds till my mother told me so.

label: guilt
text: When I robbed a loop in supermarket.

label: sadness
text: When I found out that I had failed to pass my exams during the term by one point.  The fact that exactly the same thing had happened last term did not help.

label: guilt
text: "A borrowed car broke down while I was using it.  It was not my fault, nevertheless I felt guilty."

label: shame
text: My guilty behaviour was found out by others.

label: fear
text: "When my sister had the still born child, she was emotionally very deep down, and it took her a long time to recover."

label: sadness
text: A friend breaking up with her boyfriend.

label: sadness
text: Leaving the house myself and a female friend had shared for 6-8 months because of the friendship which developed and our approach to each other in occasional instances of several personal crises.

label: joy
text: Today I did a lot better on my architecture project than I expected.

label: fear
text: Could not find my way out in the college building at night.

label: guilt
text: "When my parents fight lots of time, when I'm the reason of the fight, I feel guilty."

label: guilt
text: When I did something wrong in the past and denied having done it when asked about it later.

label: disgust
text: "I was on my way home by bus.  A man who had drunk a fair amount of alcohol started talking, trying to hug and pat a woman sitting next to him.  Fortunately it was not me."

label: disgust
text: "Discovering a good friend had lied to me, resulting in a detrimental relationship with another person."

label: joy
text: The feeling of joy when again I had confessed my sin and experienced God's forgiving grace and cleansing power - total enlightenment and freedome - bliss.

label: sadness
text: A girl I love does not love me.

label: shame
text: I was the last among the list of failures in my class of Biology.

label: joy
text: When India first won the world cup cricket tournament.

label: sadness
text: The death of a close friend.

label: fear
text: "While cycling in the country a dog started running beside me, growling and barking, and trying to bite my foot."

label: guilt
text: When I became angry at my boyfriend without any reason. I know he cannot bear me being angry at him and that he can't study anymore then.

label: joy
text: "When high level results were declared, I found my candidature number.  I was very happy as I had not expected it.  As I had been  injured before the examination and I had performed poorly."

label: joy
text: Going to see a good film with my best friend.

label: anger
text: "When my mother decided to clean out my room and throw out what she thought was junk, without my knowing about it, so I returned home to find half my stuff gone."

label: disgust
text: I felt dusgust with a self-iterested person who ruined the life of another by means of utterly unfair methods.

label: anger
text: When a little brother of mine damaged a cassette.

label: fear
text: As I was in a ward one man died and I was instructed to watch the last offices. But this was my first time to see a dead person - fear came.

label: joy
text: "When I learned, after the ecography, that my mother was expecting a baby girl.  That was what I wanted."

label: disgust
text: I saw in an ice-cream kiosque a cockroach walking through a cornet.

label: guilt
text: "I do not have the time for other people's problems.  My mother-in-law is sometimes depressed and I do not have the time, the desire or the strength to help."

label: sadness
text: My good friend misunderstood me.

label: shame
text: When I first had a sexual intercourse.

label: joy
text: This happened when it was finally confirmed that I had stood first in the university for the M.A exams.  A few days before the official results were declared a clerk had brought the results unofficially.  So I had been expecting the results but the confirmation allowed me to legitimately feel happy at my success.

label: anger
text: "When playing a football match, there was one player who made mean tackels, kicked at everything and did things having nothing to do with football."

label: sadness
text: When my dad passed away.

label: shame
text: About a dozen girls laughed at me and I was sure that there was nothing wrong with me.

label: fear
text: When I was walking along a road alone on my way to go shopping.

label: fear
text: Before knowing my marks I was not sure that I wanted to go to that class.

label: guilt
text: "I once torn the inner tube of a bike, that was not mine. Then I saw it was a brand new one. I felt very guilty then."

label: anger
text: When my dress and a few other things were stolen from my wardrobe.

label: anger
text: When my friends tried to discriminate against my friendship with certain other friends which they thought was improper.

label: shame
text: I had promised to help out with domestic chores and I forgot about it.

label: fear
text: "When I heard that there had been some women raped at uni, just near where I usually park my car and walk by myself at night. Although I wasn't in danger it unnerved me for days and I was fearful whenever walking through the area."

label: shame
text: When I failed Psychology examination when most of the students passed.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty the other day because I took two pieces of bread instead of one in the Cafeteria and some of the girls were short of bread.

label: fear
text: "On the way back from Denmark with a friend on a small yatch, there was a storm and my friend was blown overboard;  I was very scared till I managed to get him back onboard."

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgust with a man I had trusted and respected, to whose problems I had always shown deep understanding."

label: anger
text: I was very angry at my father when he didn't give me as much money as my brother to use for studying. Once again my brother was better off then me.

label: fear
text: The day my parents were involved in a car accident and had to be operated  and before the operation the doctor said that it was mater of life or death.

label: shame
text: "One day mother slaughtered a chicken for a brother who had come back for holiday. In everybody's absence I opened the foodstore and ate all internal organs of the chicken. When mother discovered, we were all called and I was found with hands stained with soup. I was ashamed being the eldest of all in the family."

label: joy
text: When they told me that I had been admitted to the faculty of medicine.

label: fear
text: Finding myself alone in a public toilet block with a man known to have had great psychological disturbances.

label: guilt
text: When I don't justify the confidence of people that I respect.

label: disgust
text: "One day when I was sitting in a not very crowded bus, a middle  aged woman was standing beside me.  The person sitting next to me got up to get off and this woman pushed me and occupied the seat.  Then she took off her shoes and put her feet on the seat."

label: joy
text: "I felt the greatest burst of joy when after being heavily ill for a long period, my father came back home."

label: shame
text: "I was eating in a very nice restaurant, when the servant asked whether I liked the food I told him that I liked it but that there was one thing which wasn't so good. The servant than worked very hard to make it good."

label: anger
text: "I felt much anger when my fahter interferred in my relations with another person whom I liked very much, ending something that I adored."

label: disgust
text: Overeating a traditional type of food - blood pudding.

label: shame
text: "Recently, some friends and I had too much to drink while on a foot-ball road trip to USC. We trashed our hotel room and I felt ashamed when the maid walked in the next morning."

label: joy
text: "When the person that I was very fond of, returned to me."

label: joy
text: "When my former boyfriend and I reconciled and he decided that I was very important to him. I had always wanted us to get back together again, but had doubted the likelihood of this, so I was very happy when my small amount of faith was vindicated."

label: disgust
text: In a certain occasion I saw a dog in the street eating something so strange gooey that I wasn't able to eat lunch because I remembered the scene all the time.

label: sadness
text: My child passed away after a short illness when he was just eleven months old. I was only told about his death without knowing that he had been ill.

label: joy
text: "I had stayed for months without seeing mother because our holidays were short and my home is far. Some times, mother came to see me at school, I was very joyful, and I didn't want her to go."

label: guilt
text: When one has neglected or been unjust to a good friend.

label: fear
text: My father had been involved in a car accident two years ago.  I was then very scared thinking that he would die as he lay unconscious in hospital for two weeks.

label: joy
text: My girlfriend gave me some feed-back and I understood that it meant that our relationship was about to turn even closer.

label: fear
text: My parents were out and I was the eldest at home.  At midnight a male stranger phoned us and spoke to me in a rough language.  I hung up and heard someone walking outside our door.

label: fear
text: I was about to begin a journey in a car with an acquaintance of mine.

label: anger
text: "In traffic I often get relatively angry with other drivers. Several transgressions make me mad, especially not yielding to priority traffic (e.g. coming from the right)."

label: fear
text: Assaulted by drunken neighbour.

label: joy
text: I had a very pleasant conversation with one of my friends.

label: disgust
text: My parents claimed me on their income tax after I had been out of the house for two years receiving no financial support from them. As result I had to work more during school because they were expected by the FAO to contribute to my education when they refuse to do so.

label: shame
text: "In the compartment of a public transport railway, I did not give my seat to an old man who was standing near me.  It was another teenager who did so."

label: shame
text: "When a woman who I respected very much was made pregnant, unexpectedly by a man of a caliber I never expected."

label: fear
text: When the car I was driving skidded on an icy road and landed in   a ditch with one side against a rock.

label: guilt
text: "While travelling in a bus with an invalid ticket, I got caught."

label: joy
text: It was the first time I met him (my boyfriend Mr.W).  It was during the first term Summer vacations.  We met each other while handing in our homework.  He invited me have a trip with him and we were together till 8 P.M.

label: disgust
text: Doesn't apply.

label: joy
text: The more than satisfactory result of a recently-completed university subject was communicated to me by phone.

label: sadness
text: Death of my grandmother.

label: sadness
text: My girlfriend who had spent 6 months abroad broke off our relationship by letter.

label: joy
text: This came in when at one time I met a girl who I didn't expect to fall in love with me. Fortunately I tried my luck and she accepted my proposal. At the same time she was giving me a lot of money which was just like a miracle to me.

label: disgust
text: "In a disco, there was a dirty little chap who punched my bottom."

label: sadness
text: My father died unexpectedly at the age of 53 years. He certainly would have liked to live longer. I was also said because I was confronted with the fact that I would die one day too.

label: guilt
text: "When I forgot to take out money for my mother. She asked me what she would do, because I had messed up her program for the following day."

label: disgust
text: One of my fellow students used questionable and unfair means to advance her studies faster than others.  I detested her.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died.

label: anger
text: My parents scolded me a lot for something I had not done.  It was my sister who had done it.

label: anger
text: "When a person the same age as me insisted that I call him ""Mister"".  I refused to succumb, but he persisted and I got angry as he had belittled me."

label: disgust
text: I read a book about the sexual phantasies of women; I read about a woman having sexual intercourse with a dog.

label: joy
text: "I felt happy at the end of a 10 day student camp.  We had shared our hopes and aspirations and in the open situation so generated, we had made strong frienships and experienced our own worth as well.  "

label: disgust
text: "Some time ago a man tried to teach me something. ""Tried"" because it is very difficult to teach somebody when you yourself are not competent and cultured."

label: disgust
text: "After buying a ticket, I lost it before I reached my destination and the bus Inspector dropped me at a place I didn't know."

label: shame
text: When I approached a person of the opposite sex and was rejected.

label: shame
text: I felt this feeling during the exam in higher mathematics.

label: guilt
text: "I had to undergo an operation in Summer and so my family had to stay at home during the holidays.  I felt guilty, above all because of my brothers."

label: disgust
text: Saw my roommate messing up our room.

label: anger
text: When our religion teacher presented shocking sectarian thoughts and doom's day as official teaching.

label: anger
text: "I was in ""Hainburg"" in December and I was angry about the politicians and the police."

label: sadness
text: My friend who was in the Bago was kicked out of the sorority.

label: anger
text: "I had a very heavy work load and two colleagues, whom I have nothing against, disturbed me by ""terror ringing"", i.e continously interrupting me by telephoning."

label: anger
text: Listening to long speech of the party leaders wasting my time.

label: shame
text: "While quarelling with a fellow worker of mine, I was vehement and irritated and I told him what I thought of him in plain language.  I was ashamed of myself when I met him the next day."

label: joy
text: When I got the scholarship I was very happy as the finacial burden of the family was reduced.

label: joy
text: When I first passed a job interview.

label: shame
text: In a school parting we agreed to go to a restaurant. We met at school and we separated us in several cars. My car broke and we arrived late. All those who already had arrived stand up and applauded us when we entered two hours late. All the restaurant attention was turned on us.

label: guilt
text: I was at school and afterwards went to work. After work I went to see a friend and stayed out late. when I got home my mother was awake and I felt guilty.

label: joy
text: The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on holiday.

label: shame
text: "Going out for dinner, or during one ice-cream and four spoons."

label: guilt
text: When I shirked the gymnastic lesson I met the director of our school who asked me what I was doing.

label: sadness
text: "My guinea-pig had been ill for a couple of days.  One evening, when I came home I enquired as to how it was doing.  My mother's expression told me that it had died.  My knees refused to support me and I began to weep convulsively."

label: shame
text: Once I was not ready for a seminar and I was asked to leave.

label: sadness
text: "When my father passed away in 1978.  I was left alone with my mother who was very sick so I had to go and live with my aunt, who is very short tempered, till my mother was discharged from the hospital."

label: disgust
text: When a friend didn't invite her own parents to her Graduation ceremony.

label: anger
text: My mother in law slept in my bed.

label: anger
text: I was most angry when India lost the Triangular Cricket trophy held in Australia.  I was so angry that I fought (orally) with my friend.

label: guilt
text: Selling the appartment after my divorce.

label: guilt
text: "When my mother found me in her bedroom ""stealing"" sugar in her bedroom.  According to our customs there comes a stage when a child stops using the parents bedroom and I was well past that age."

label: guilt
text: I hit my cousin badly after she threw away my dresses in a pit-latrine that the little girl fainted.

label: joy
text: "During lectures, I sensed an unexpressed understanding with a boy I did not know.  We exchange glances ; I think he likes me, and I like him too.  Perhaps he has fallen in love with me ........."

label: shame
text: "This was when I was discovered stealing a piece of bread at home, I was very hungry a few hours before supper."

label: joy
text: When my children were born.

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I heard over the radio that I had been successful in my Primary School Leaving Certificate Examination and was selected for Secondary School.

label: sadness
text: When I had to come back from my village last Christmas.

label: joy
text: "I got a letter from my best friend, whom I had not heard from for a long time (a good letter)."

label: joy
text: When I was finally qualified for my profession.

label: guilt
text: I had undertaken to help my sister for her class work but some unexpected circumstances prevented me from doing that.

label: disgust
text: To be kissed by soembody I didn't expect to.

label: guilt
text: "When I was 5, a few of my friends and I would light matches for fun. One of my friends confessed to her parents and my parents, I guess, knew or suspected I was involved but I said I knew nothing about it."

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty after stealing a cookery book from my colleagues.

label: anger
text: Someone spread rumours about me.

label: sadness
text: The death of Jaya Prakash Narayan caused a great deal of sadness as I believed that he was the only true democrat and a ray of hope on the Indian horizon.

label: anger
text: Somebody took my wristwatch and promised to have it mended and later was telling me that he couldn't give it back to me because I was rude at a certain time.

label: sadness
text: "My grandfather was seriously ill, he had only a few days left to live. I had always loved him, but never told him. When I saw him for the last time, I had the feeling that I had omitted so many things I could not do again. - There was a fly sitting on his forehead and he was too weak to drive it away. I was very sad when I saw that."

label: anger
text: When I was victimized for running away with a girl who was somebody else's wife and niece at the same time.  I was very angry over this issue because I was told to pay him money after having been punished for it.

label: joy
text: The birth of my daughter.

label: anger
text: Being insulted by my roommate (she is in the English Class).

label: guilt
text: "I came across a blind man sitting in one of the corridors and asking for money, though I had some money I did not give him anything."

label: joy
text: "When my sister's first child came home, after one week in intensive care at the hospital."

label: shame
text: "My friend was so intoxicated that the police came and took him away, and they later contacted his parents."

label: anger
text: "A few weeks back, as I was in a hurry to leave the house, I left some of my things lying around.  This is something I never do. My uncle,who lives with us, as we live in a joint family, remarked that we were always doing things like  this.  This really got me mad."

label: fear
text: "I lived alone in a repulsive area in the city of Rotterdam. I was annoyed, heard a lot of Burglary and assaults. Especially in the evening and the night I frequently felt anxious."

label: sadness
text: When I had not understood anything after a lecture.

label: anger
text: "Getting a terrible exam mark, which I couldn't understand the reason for, and trying to see a lecturer or tutor, but being given the runaround."

label: guilt
text: I borrowed money from a friend and did not pay back the debt when I said I would.

label: guilt
text: "I read about the national and social spirit and self-discipline of the people of developed coutries like U.S.A, England, France, Germany etc.  Comparing this to the Indian people I felt guilty as they have no national spirit or self-discipline."

label: anger
text: I wrote an Exam and happened to have not done as well as I thought I would. I was angry to myself for not having done so well.

label: fear
text: "Thinking of the unknown, what happens at the moment of death, etc."

label: sadness
text: "When I left my sister's house after staying there for a few days. She has two little boys, and they are very warm people (the family). At the time, I was in need of this sort of contact, and I grew very fond of children (no, I'm not a paedophiliac)."

label: disgust
text: Finding that a girlfriend of mine was a prostitute and had been seeing many others during our relationship.

label: anger
text: When someone told a secret I told them not to tell.

label: fear
text: I am afraid of my academic results as I will face several problems.  I am scared of my limitations and the unlimited problems and I do not know how to cope with them.

label: anger
text: When a car is overtaking another and I am forced to drive off the road.

label: disgust
text: When I saw someone eating live worms.

label: sadness
text: When I learned that my dad had cancer. I knew he was going to the hospital for some tests. My mom told me when she picked me up one weekend from CAL to take me home.

label: anger
text: "I was on vacation, and therefore I did not attend a meeting of the day care centre.  Nevertheless, the very day I came back they called me early morining to ask me ""what are you going to do about the matter ?"" (which had been discussed in the meeting).  Then I got angry."

label: sadness
text: When one of my cat died of a disease.

label: disgust
text: I am disgusted with the fact that bad singers play at the opera (and not only there) only because they are protegTs or lovers of an important felow while at the same time some young and able singers work in a quite different field of life.

label: fear
text: I found myself involved in a fight in which a person died and I had to intervene with some risk.

label: sadness
text: "Watching an old lady running up the street to catch her bus and miss it, it reminded me of my own mother and how dreadful it would be to be her in the same situation."

label: joy
text: "Riding home from school after completing two midterms in two days, and feeling I did well on them."

label: disgust
text: I saw the gare of a prison.  This gare and the building were in deplorable condition and were full of rubbish.

label: fear
text: I was walking on the pavement when a white car rolled on it and directed towards me. I was quite near the house wall when it rolled by and hit me.

label: disgust
text: "While travelling in a bus, there were three people sitting behind me (two men and a woman).  They were drunk and the conversation was unbelievable (about fucking, fellatio, etc...).  They tried to get others to take part in the conversation.  I loathed it and felt like crying."

label: anger
text: "A friend of mine played a joke on another friend over the telephone.  This friend, crying, called me and I got very angry and made the other person apologize."

label: guilt
text: My wrong behaviour made my loved one feel sad and uneasy.

label: disgust
text: When I discovered that my mother had been involved in adultery.

label: guilt
text: "I had an argument with a friend of mine.  She would not let me speak and then I began to shout at her.  She got angry and left, I did not try to prevent her from leaving."

label: shame
text: When I got a bad result for one of my assignments.

label: shame
text: When I made acquaintance with the parents of my boyfriend for the first time. They spoke Limburgian (a dutch dialect) and one of my first remarks was that I disliked Limburgian dialect.

label: anger
text: When my daughter began staying away from classes - at the age of nine only.

label: joy
text: Felt joy a few years ago when I was away on holiday. And sat very close to my best friend looking straight into the eyes.

label: joy
text: When I got permission to study at a place which was far away from my home.

label: shame
text: "When relatives have acted strangely, and unfriendly towards me."

label: anger
text: When my tennis match was interrupted because a kid cycled right into the court.

label: shame
text: When I got drunk at a party and made a fool of myself by vomitting all over the place and insulting the people who were there with me.

label: fear
text: I felt it when I sat for my exam in anatomy.

label: sadness
text: My best friend had failed Exams. She had to leave and so we got separated.

label: disgust
text: NO RESPONSE.

label: shame
text: I was swimming in the river and I lost the top of my bikini.  I did not notice it and came out of water.  There was a disagreeable classmate watching the scene.

label: joy
text: Family member survived an operation.

label: anger
text: "I invited two friends. We should go out together. Those two girls kept talking about boys, chatting up etc. I bacame sick of it."

label: sadness
text: "I had been separated from my girlfriend for about a year.  On her birthday I put a present in her mailbox.  I had spent two days choosing a suitable present for her.  I waited for a few days and there was no reply from her; at last I received a thank-you card in my mailbox.  On the card there was only my name, the words thank-you  and her signature.  I was very sad then."

label: sadness
text: When someone in my family died.

label: sadness
text: "Finding out that China is poor, so we cannot have good reference books."

label: fear
text: "When I stepped on a snake at home, it was dark but there was moonlight."

label: fear
text: "When I lost a wallet while travelling, since it belonged to the group I was very afraid."

label: joy
text: The day I heard that I passed the high school exam.

label: shame
text: "When I realized that I belonged to a country which is amongst the poorest in the world and that inspite of having the resources we do not utilize them.  I was ashamed at myself and my country, shame at the lack of parity between the lifestyles of the citizens."

label: anger
text: "Uncleaniness at my work place.  The place is generally not very clean, but when it reaches a point, I get angry at the person who is supposed to clean the place and the people who are supposed to supervise him."

label: anger
text: During my last exam.

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend and I went out for a dinner and subsequently went to his family. We had a very nice evening.

label: joy
text: "Every time, in the last few days, when my girlfriend told me that she loves me."

label: shame
text: "I had written a ""love-letter"" to a class-mate of mine, this was meant to be a joke.  Unfortunately it fell in the wrong hands  and I had to face the consequences."

label: guilt
