label: shame
text: When I made an end on a relationship after three years.

label: fear
text: "When one has arranged to meet someone and that person arrives late, in the meantime one starts thinking about all that could have gone wrong e.g a traffic accident."

label: shame
text: When I lied to my best friend about a boy she really liked but he didn't like her. I told her he did and she bugged him for a long time embarrassing herself.

label: sadness
text: When I was not chosen to go to your English lectures.

label: fear
text: "I was caught doing something I was not supposed to do.  I did something with the person who caught me (bribe) and even though he promised not to report me, I am still frightened."

label: guilt
text: "When I got low marks in the final year B.Sc exams, I felt guilty as I had not worked hard because I had been roaming around with my  friends."

label: shame
text: "When I had to go to the gynecologist and to sit on that special chair, I felt ashamed."

label: fear
text: I was camping with a friend of mine and we spent the night in the forest.  I could not fall off to sleep and could clearly hear noises from outside (steps ?) approaching our tent.

label: sadness
text: A certain person whom I respect and esteem a lot pays me no attention.  She keeps up appearances but shows almost no interest in me.

label: sadness
text: Finding out that the university will give first priority to qualified practioners and clinical years to go to your English lectures.

label: sadness
text: I had to leave my girlfriend for 4 weeks because of my studies. This happens frequently. The last 24 hours before my departure are always very depressing.

label: anger
text: A person I trusted a lot gave me many false explanations to justify a wrong action.

label: disgust
text: "When I found out how the people of Ethiopia were starving and their government was spending millions on celebrating being in power so many years. Then I saw all these people on TV needing food, etc."

label: anger
text: "When I was deputy manager during the Summer, certain deputies took liberties, more than what was normal."

label: disgust
text: "When the committee, to which I belong, was accused of having squandered the money of the association."

label: sadness
text: The end of a relationship (after 4 years) by doing this I hurt the other person very much.

label: sadness
text: When my elder sister died.

label: shame
text: We were at a football match and when we were leaving the stadium (the stadium was packed with people) and I lost my shoe in the crowd. Our attempts to find it didn't give any result and I had to go home without one shoe. In other words to cross the whole town !

label: joy
text: Saw in TV that China had the most gold medals in the Asian Olympic.

label: sadness
text: Passing away of my father.

label: disgust
text: I was playing a sport in an advanced PE class and many of the people were not advanced.

label: joy
text: Yesterday when I received a B on a history midterm. I felt overjoyed after having received C's previously.

label: shame
text: Zhu Jianhau did not break the world record for China.

label: sadness
text: When my mother died.

label: guilt
text: Too busy to write letters to friends and they said I had forgotten about them.

label: joy
text: When I got my results - I had passed the form III exams.  I had not expected to do so well.

label: shame
text: During the oral part of my final examination I made a mistake in speaking so that all the teachers laughed at me.

label: guilt
text: "I cannot recall feeling guilty in the near past.

label: fear
text: After a short stay in Marocco we missed the ferry-boat back to Spain and we had to look for an accomodation. By chance we met a man who offered to take us to a camping site. While I was sitting in his car I was terribly afraid because I had heard of people being robbed in Marocco.

label: fear
text: I was a passenger in a vehicle when suddenly another vehicle came from behind to overtake us.  However another one was coming right in front so the other vehicle changed course and blocked our way and so we crashed against the side of the road.

label: sadness
text: Losing my job that I had for 4 summers. I took it personally and cried for 6 hours off and on. I wanted to hide away and did for a few days.

label: guilt
text: I feel guilty when when I realize that I consider material things more important than caring for my relatives.  I feel very self-centered.

label: disgust
text: When I was told that I had no right to control my lover.

label: joy
text: "After having finished my B.Sc, I was struggling hard to continue my studies and had taken the M.SC exam.  I was not sure that I would be selected in the written exam.  When I saw my name in the selected candidates list I was overjoyed."

label: anger
text: When I was locked out of my room by my room-mate's friend.

label: joy
text: When I was sick my husband bought me a piece of cake.

label: guilt
text: "When I was in P3 I was always punished as I would forget to do my homework.  The first time that I was punished and not allowed to leave school, I slipped out of school."

label: guilt
text: I forgot to convey an important announcement.

label: shame
text: When I failed the ninth standard exam in school.

label: shame
text: "When I was seven years old, I stole a chewing-gum from a big glass bowl on the counter of a nearby shop, and I got caught."

label: fear
text: Was threatened with a knife ... in the military by soldiers form another unit. The reason was girls.

label: guilt
text: When my father (physically handicapped) asks me to do something and I raise several objections. Often I can fix it in few moments.

label: anger
text: Someone who always took care for the key of the sportshall stayed away without letting us know. Next time he did as if nothing had happened.

label: sadness
text: I felt sadness when my grandfather died.

label: disgust
text: "A teacher gave me lower grades than I was entitled to, and was hoping for."

label: disgust
text: "When an acquaintance of mine told me about the way his parents treated their sons in an unequal manner.  The most successful of them got continuous encouragement, and the youngest was not encouraged and was rejected."

label: sadness
text: When the neighbour of a friend of mine was stabbed to death by thieves in Kabwe.  They stole his van.

label: sadness
text: "My paternal grandmother had died. We weren't close but she was blood. I didn't cry but I was sad, partly due to her death and partly I think, due to the fact that I couldn't/didn't cry."

label: anger
text: I get angry when people disbelieve me or misunderstand me.

label: fear
text: I was teaching someone to drive and when we were about to crash I was scared.

label: disgust
text: When a skunk invaded camp.

label: guilt
text: Forgot to collect post for a friend.

label: disgust
text: "I felt some disgust for my boyfriend for a time, after he had left me."

label: guilt
text: "When I came very late one night (or morning !) and my parents were waiting, not so much angrgy as disappointed."

label: joy
text: Having passed the exam required to be an authorized Radio/TV dealer.

label: fear
text: "I stayed alone in the dark at night in the mountain, waiting for my uncle.  I remember that I took a big stone and it calmed me."

label: fear
text: Few years ago my father was very ill. He stayed at a hospital for a long time. Then I experienced that terrible feeling that I might lose him.

label: joy
text: On December the 28th I was filled with Joy when I was told by my bosses that I had been selected to attend a course at the Lilongwe School for Health Scienced in Lilongwe.

label: joy
text: "My mother, sister and I were thinking about old times, our childhood, and we had a very happy time."

label: sadness
text: When I learnt that my brother-in-law had been poisoned by his friends and that he was dead.

label: sadness
text: A break-up with someone I really liked.

label: sadness
text: Recently I happened to remain alone for a long time.

label: anger
text: When the dean of UNZA asked me to vacate a big flat I was occupying and take up a smaller one as I was becoming a full time student at UNZA.

label: joy
text: "This is one feeling I never betray, but I must confess that the last time I slighty felt happy was when I passed my M.A with a high rank.  This was a few years ago when my friend told me about the result."

label: fear
text: As I was taking venous blood from another patient I introduced air into the place of puncturing and there was a swelling which is dangerous to the patient hence I became afraid.

label: anger
text: When my husband stays late at a meeting and I have to be alone.

label: disgust
text: "In a film, there was an episode where they used a chain saw to cut a man.  I could not look at it, but I could not avoid listening either.  I sought shelter in my boyfriend's arms."

label: fear
text: "When I was a child, one day, I was going home late at night and I did not notice an uncovered man hole and fell in it.  I was in there for several minutes."

label: shame
text: In the classroom we discussed with the teacher. He told me things that affected directly in a negative way my job and my behavior in the classroom in front of the other pupils.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died. I had a very deep relation to her (I lived with her for several years).

label: sadness
text: I did not quite succeed in breast feeding my baby.

label: sadness
text: When my brother's visa for the U.S.A got cancelled.

label: anger
text: My parents did not let me go on holidays with my friends.

label: guilt
text: "When I was baby-sitting at my cousin's place, I tried to have a pleasant time and did not really take care of the child.  I do not care very much about children."

label: fear
text: Once I had to go home on foot at 5 a.m. I had to pass through a forest and I was going alone.

label: joy
text: "Unofficially I was informed about my results of the final examination of the secondary school. A teacher wrote them up for me. When I went outside, I started crying with joy."

label: guilt
text: When once my mother asked me to do some work for her at home because she was busy and moreover this work was to be done by a man. But it remained undone.

label: disgust
text: "When after a storm in the country, I left my shelter and saw a big, fat, slimy green toad by my side."

label: anger
text: When I got to know about the reaction of a friend of mine in a certain situation.  I had not expected him to react that way.

label: guilt
text: Peeping.

label: shame
text: I forgot that the course instructor had directed us to go for special classes after the usual class hours.  I missed this the first day and when he asked me about it the next day I said that I had forgotten.

label: fear
text: Had fear of losing husband.

label: fear
text: "Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening around you. Thoughts come into my mind which make me afraid."

label: joy
text: When I was accepted into the medical school.  Medicine is a profession that I have desired ever since my childhood.

label: guilt
text: Being rude to someone I do not like.

label: disgust
text: This situation occurred when I entered into a smelling ward.

label: anger
text: Brother provoked anger. It was when mother and father were away and we had to look after ourselves. He accused me of being selfish and a snob.

label: guilt
text: "I had not written to, or called my grandmother, who was lonely, for a long time.  My mother asked me to call her on her behalf and when I did so, my grandmother was delighted and she told me that she had been waiting for some news from us."

label: disgust
text: "During these Summer vacations a schoolmate who was not in my class went to Britain.  Before he left, his classmates and some of us who were accquainted with him had a B.B.Q on the beach.  When I arrived I saw that some people , who were not close friends of the departing person(person A), were playing mahjong.  Some others were playing bridge and A had nothing to do, besides it was A who had prepared the food.  Later when we wanted to talk and his classmates did not even have the decency to listen to him.  They only asked him a few questions half-heartedly and then they talked on their own.  Some of their conversation was against me and  another classmate."

label: guilt
text: One day I took a packet of sweets from a certain Grocery at Nathenje. Then later on I started to feel guilty and realised that I had done a wrong thing to him.

label: fear
text: Almost crashing into the back of a car while driving along the motorway on my motorcycle.

label: joy
text: The day I finished my military service.

label: joy
text: "I thought that someone was angry with me but, by hindsight, that didn't appear to be the case, he even liked me."

label: joy
text: When I got engaged to a boy of my choice.

label: anger
text: With self at losing an important game that I should have won.

label: anger
text: "Last semester when I dated a girl whom I've known for almost a year. However one night she said she wanted us to be ""just friends"". I confided this to a friend Jim I was really suffering. A month or two later he broke up with his old girlfriend and they started going out regularly. I have no girlfriend nor have I had a romantic relationship of any significance. I feel some anger but we are friends again."

label: shame
text: I had just masterbated with another boy.

label: anger
text: During a fight with my best friend.

label: shame
text: I overreacted towards my mother and felt ashamed afterwards.

label: sadness
text: All my friends arranged to go for an afternoon snack and they did not tell me.  They told me that they did not have my phone number but I do not think that this was true.

label: shame
text: "During a class I was asked a question which I did not hear very clearly, so I gave an answer which was not related to the question and everyone started laughing at me."

label: anger
text: When I realized that I was far behind the others in the language course and I could no longer catch up with the others.

label: joy
text: Going to a concert.

label: shame
text: Not doing my share of the work for the house job.

label: sadness
text: Having to go back home form the U.S. after having been there for ten weeks to visit my brother and his family.

label: guilt
text: I pointed a failure of a friend of mine.

label: sadness
text: My girl-friend left me.

label: anger
text: "I feel anger when I see a ""parent"" beating and punishing his child in the street. Recently I was a withness of a similar case."

label: guilt
text: "I went to a pub with a group of friends (not very close) and I was with one girl most of the time, while the other girls in the group wanted to be with me.  They stopped talking to the girl I was with."

label: joy
text: When I was admitted to the Institute. I had problems with many people about my applying for this institute and I decided to prove that one can pass excellently without visiting any preparatory couse. That is - I proved what I could do on my own.

label: anger
text: I was playing in a football tournament and saw the rules openly disregarded.

label: joy
text: When the church choir came one Sunday after being away for some weeks.

label: shame
text: I answered a certain question from Dr. Maqgda wrongly. She asked something about Femur and my answer was saying something concerning the brain. So I was very ashamed amongst my friends.

label: joy
text: When I was accepted at UNZA.

label: guilt
text: When I accepted a lunch invitation from a past male friend.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died. I had lived with her for ten years.

label: joy
text: "When my nephew was born. The birth was hard, it was a big baby."

label: joy
text: "When I had a psychical crisis, I met a girl, who told me that she had had almost the same problems and how she had finally overcome them."

label: fear
text: "When I had to talk to some strangers, from whom I was expecting a negative answer."

label: fear
text: Being threatened by another person.

label: anger
text: My class leader told me the university won't let all of us go to your lectures because we are not All English Class.

label: fear
text: Fear from the unknown. I felt fear when I sat for the entrance examinations.

label: shame
text: My sister was afraid of her husband.

label: anger
text: I told my friend something confidential which was supposed to remain between the two of us.  The next thing that happened was that a girl who is not even close to us came laughing and askad me to tell her about it.  I was very angry with my friend as I had trusted her.

label: joy
text: "I felt it when on duty in the hospital I understood that I was not afraid to face death, that I also helped a little to relieve the pains of a patient."

label: shame
text: "A few months back I had gone to my friend's place and they offered me tea and coffee.  I do not have the habit of drinking tea or coffee and so they offered me a glass of milk instead, so I felt ashamed."

label: fear
text: "I was walking in the countryside alone when I came across two dogs who began barking at me.  I did not know whether they were tied up or loose, but I was afraid of them approaching me."

label: shame
text: "Talking about a person's unattractiveness, not realizing that the person was listening."

label: disgust
text: "I once saw an old man up the road, fossicking through the rubbish bins and the gutter. I was really disgusted at first but I've seen him a few times since then and now I feel really sorry for him and I often give him cigarettes when I see him, because he mainly goes after cigarette butts and it is revolting."

label: shame
text: When I went out with a friend of mine to meet her ex-boyfriend who didn't know that she was engaged to be married.

label: fear
text: "Almost crashing my car, something which could have led to great problems."

label: shame
text: I was ashamed when my classmates discovered that I fell in love with an uneducated girl.

label: sadness
text: "In a social situation I became interested in a woman. We talked, we laughed, we enjoyed each other. She desappeared for a few minutes, and a little after appeared with an other man."

label: anger
text: "I peeped into Maurine's bedroom and saw two people - Maurine anbd my step-dad.  I thought, "" Why did she break her promises ? Why had she invited me ? Why do old men go for young girls ? """

label: fear
text: "When I was curious about it and went to a spiritism session with a friend. I had already been there other times (many times when I was younger) but that day, even if I don't believe in spiritism I was terribly afraid that something would happen to me (sort of incorporation !)."

label: anger
text: "When I was mistakenly accused of being a thief when I accidently gave a fake coin at a counter.  I realized this before I handed over the coin, but the man called me a thief and called a witness."

label: fear
text: "When I missed crashing, by a hair's breadth, into a man who came out 20 metres ahead of me when I was driving at 110km/h."

label: sadness
text: My mother's death.

label: sadness
text: "The day I was to receive my gold-medal for the M.A, my grandmother, who I loved very much, died after an illness.  She  died a few hours before the convocation.  While I was attending the convocation I had to control my grief as she would not have liked me to miss it.  It was a day she had been waiting for, but did not get to see. "

label: shame
text: "As a small boy, I took a coin from an empty taxi cab.  My mother saw it and told the driver about it.  I even knew the driver."

label: anger
text: When a close friend did not write.

label: sadness
text: I was very sad when I had to leave persons with whom I had a very intense relationship I also had to leave the environment which was part of this.

label: disgust
text: Noisy people in the library.

label: fear
text: "I had to go to the dentist's. When he touched my tooth with his drill, I was terribly aftaid of the pain I would feel any moment."

label: disgust
text: "I met three drunk boys, almost children, they didn't look like normal people."

label: shame
text: When I am in an auditorium with people and I ask a silly question so that everyone starts to laugh.

label: guilt
text: Promising someone to do their job and then not being able to do it due to transport troubles.

label: anger
text: I was angry at the Cafeteria when the cook scolded and said many bad things about me without reason. He thought I was among the girls who did him wrong.

label: guilt
text: I lost a conference because I hadn't got in touch with a certain person to inform her that I would go with her. I thought she knew what I wanted.

label: disgust
text: Having unwanted attention paid to me in my place of work - harrassment (and sexual harrassment) by another worker - disgusted by his implications.

label: joy
text: I got an A in anatomy - the first one I have ever gotten in a science class here.

label: sadness
text: "There is a boy who I love very much. I asked him to have dinner with me, but he refused I don't know why he didn't go with me, but I felt very lonely."

label: disgust
text: When my father shouted at me for going to a party with my sister.

label: shame
text: I choked on a cold drink in front of girls who were strangers.

label: sadness
text: When I noticed obvious marks of old age (in a negative sense) on a close relative of mine.

label: joy
text: When I won a position on the track-team for the trans-tasman games when I was eleven.

label: shame
text: When I tried to hide a fact from a person for irrelevant reasons and considered such an attitude childish.

label: fear
text: I had been watching a TV-program on paranormal phenomena.  At night I could not fall off to sleep as I feared that humanoids were on the move.

label: guilt
text: I am not very affectionate and I feel guilty as I do not give as much affection as I receive.

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I got an attractive Summer job.

label: sadness
text: My father died. I was away at the time and did not know until two days after.

label: joy
text: "When I passed the B.A exams with 1st class.  I was the first in the family to have got a 1st class, so all the family members were very happy and they gave me the opportunity to study further."

label: sadness
text: "Christmas Eve: there was a tension between my parents, they did not even try to restore a harmonic atmosphere. Mother stayed in her room almost the whole day. I felt alone and was very sad."

label: anger
text: "As I usually do not start learning until a short time before an examination,, I once made up my mind to try to work for a longer time. But once again I did not do it - and got a bad mark."

label: anger
text: When I found out that my sister had been playing with my confidential things which she had taken from my hand-bag.

label: anger
text: When my boyfriend went away for a month long holiday without me.

label: guilt
text: "When before the last exam I have taken, I went out instead of studying."

label: joy
text: "I feel unbelievably happy about the relationship between my boyfriend and me, it is a reoccurring feeling."

label: guilt
text: One evening I went fishing with some friends but we could not fish as a fisherman had already put his net there.  We pulled out the net to find only crabs in it so we threw the net away.  The net was large and may have cost $1000.  The fisherman used the net to earn a living and we had had thrown it.

label: anger
text: "When my flatmate put me down because she ""thought"" she was better than me, or she felt she was."

label: fear
text: When I did not get the compound which is known.

label: guilt
text: Borrowed someone else's towel without asking.

label: disgust
text: "Old man in hospital, hollow-cheeked, only one half of his nose and glass-eye, rattling breath."

label: sadness
text: I lost my purse that had money in it. I was sad until I found it.

label: anger
text: When males in my family try to assign house duties exclusively with referance to sex.

label: fear
text: "I was diving below the ice, in a cave, at a depth of 26 metres.  Visibility was almost zero and the oxygen level decreased threateningly.  There were three of us divers on one safety rope."

label: fear
text: I came home and discovered that someone had broken in. Then I realized that they probably were still there.

label: anger
text: When the paramilitary was sent to the UNZA and it started using tear gas and started intimidating the students without any provocation.

label: sadness
text: When a friend left me and went back home for good.

label: joy
text: Finding out that I am not ill (not seriously).

label: anger
text: "Once when I was playing table tennis I was already sure that I would win , but at last I lost the game."

label: shame
text: Running away from a fire.

label: anger
text: People hunting animals.

label: fear
text: I was looking after my father's sheen in the forest. One day while playing with friends from neighbouring villages the flock escaped me and went into a far place. It became dark and I was afraid of father. I went home and hid myself.

label: joy
text: My class winning against another class in a football match.

label: anger
text: Jealous of my husband's old girlfriend.  We met her with her husband and there was a lot of reminiscing.

label: sadness
text: When I feel helpless after having tried to help someone without any result.

label: guilt
text: When I applied for a false travelling claim allowance and later I thought that I would be found out.

label: sadness
text: The death of a friend.

label: disgust
text: "On school, during a fancy fair, there was a stand of amnesty international. There I read (for the first time) a description of the tortures of a woman, what they did to her."

label: anger
text: "A friend of mine ridiculed me, telling me that I would never accomplish anything. I felt that he had interfered with my life."

label: sadness
text: Finding out that my best friend could not go to university.

label: shame
text: "Being with a close friend, in the city, who was involved at the present point in time in outrageous activity."

label: guilt
text: Not accepting hints of intimate relation from a girl.

label: disgust
text: When the N.Z. rugby union announced that they would proceed with a rugby tour of South Africa.

label: sadness
text: "I don't know why suddenly I thought that what I was feeling for my boyfriend was not really love. After almost three years being together, this matter of fact shaked me and I felt a great sorrow that I can call sadness."

label: anger
text: (1) My father died. (2) My natural father contacted me a year after my father died and this angered me more as I thought he should be dead and not my father.

label: guilt
text: When I was rude to my mother and got angry with her.

label: fear
text: "Lost my purse, the money in the purse belonged to my parents."

label: shame
text: When I went to the sauna for the first time and there were men and women.

label: disgust
text: When I found out that someone close to me was flirting around.

label: fear
text: "When riding in a very fastly-driven car on a lose metal road at a very late hour - no other cars on road, and driver was taking corners very sharply. I felt afraid - because if an accident happened, the area was very isolated. Also, I feared for driver, after I was dropped off - would he make it home safely."

label: guilt
text: When I promised to visit my boyfriend and I didn't fulfil the promise.

label: sadness
text: When I saw my niece (5 yrs) crying in the hallway for her mother who had passed away about a month ago.

label: joy
text: When a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.

label: anger
text: I felt it on the same occasion when I felt sadness which finally grew into anger.

label: fear
text: "The night before my wife had given birth to our twins. I felt fear in the hospital yard, I feared if everything was going to be in order."

label: joy
text: "In order to be admitted to my final examination, I had to pass two examinations. As I had not studied very much, I resigned myself to be left behind. Nevertheless I succeeded in these examinations."

label: anger
text: Discussing with a certain person about a job I was getting and that perosn was negative and pessimistic.

label: guilt
text: I was not sure whether I should help an old woman going down a flight of stairs. I just watched her and saw how difficult it was for her to do it.

label: guilt
text: "One day, I was alone on duty when a patient choked while eating.  I ran to her and tried to make her breath, but it was too late."

label: joy
text: "When I pass exams, or when a close friend of mine recovered from an illness,etc."

label: sadness
text: At the death of a close relative.

label: anger
text: My friends promised me that they would definitely call me to tell me if they were visiting me or not.

label: disgust
text: When I red a report in the magazine VESA about an Iranian telling what she had lived in the prisons in Iran. I felt disgust about that people.

label: sadness
text: "My mother was stuck by an apoplectic fit, was hemi-paralyzed and suffered an aphasia."

label: guilt
text: "When I promised a male friend of mine to visit him, and did not."

label: anger
text: When my sister took something that belonged to me without my permission.

label: sadness
text: It happened that I was alone - with no contacts with friends.

label: shame
text: "A patient, to whom I had given a powerful medicine, shouted at me in front of many people.  I realized that he did so because he was very ill."

label: anger
text: When the coach of our team degraded me to the second team.

label: fear
text: When my mother was seriously ill and had to be admitted to the hospital.

label: anger
text: "While in the army, I was treated unfairly by my superiors.  I was held responsible for a deed of which I was innocent."

label: sadness
text: "This sounds really predictable and usual but it was absolutely heart-rending at the time. My first lover (I was 15) just rang up one day and announced that he had found another woman. I never saw him again and it hurt because I was positive that it was ""TRUE LOVE"" !!"

label: fear
text: "Once, before I had learnt to swim, I stepped on a slippery slope where there was a lot of moss and I slipped into the water.  The water was very deep and I could not stand on my feet.  I sank and had to use a lot of energy."

label: fear
text: Somebody told her friend that she would hit me wherever we would meet.

label: fear
text: We were riding in a friend's car.  He was driving very fast and suddenly a another car crossed the road in front of us.  My friend had to turn the car rapidly.

label: sadness
text: When a very close friend of mine went into hospital for a major operation and I couldn't see her for a while as I was not a relative she had no relatives in N.Z.

label: sadness
text: "The long lasting illness of my grand-mother, and the changes in family relationships caused by it."

label: disgust
text: Getting a low grade on my physics midterm.

label: anger
text: "I was travelling from Delhi to Bombay.  I had booked a seat one month back and I had also got a telegram confirming this.  However, in the train my name had been omitted from the reservation sheet, and the one seat that was still vacant was alloted to another person who paid for it despite my requests for the seat.  I was allowed to stay in the reserved compartment when I paid money."

label: fear
text: "Fear of the loss of a close friend, of feeling the ground slipping from under my feet."

label: sadness
text: When I try to get closer at a person and she misinterpreted me.

label: disgust
text: A few days back I was waiting for the bus at the bus stop.  Before getting into the bus I had prepared the exact amount of coins to pay for the bus fair and when I got into the bus I put these coins into the box meant to collect the bus fair.  I thought that I had paid and wanted to get inside.  However the bus driver called me and asked me in an impolite way if the coins were stuck at the opening  of the box.  He had not seen me paying and there wasn't a stack of coins in the box.  I could not understand this and the driver kept questioning me.  He made me feel angry and at last i inserted a dollar coin in the box just to get away from him.  Later I found that I had forgotten a few coins in my pocket and had not paid enough for the fair the first time.  After I had entered the bus I could still hear him scolding me and I felt disgusted.

label: sadness
text: I heard of the death of a closefriend of mine.  I had gone camping        with him shortly before his death and the whole thing seemed very  sudden to me.

label: fear
text: Waiting for my girlfriend to come from her apt. to mine. She was very late and I thought something awful had happened.

label: shame
text: When I was little - Mum caught me telling a lie about who broke the cup.

label: anger
text: Finding out about some girls who have been nice to the class leader in order to go to the neuropsychology lectures (English ones).

label: shame
text: "When I was in lower six I joined an interview group to interview the general public.  One of my friends in the group lost her purse and she was very nervous.  Five of us had to go another place so we left her, and planned to see her later.  Then I heard her describing how her purse looked.  I realized that I had seen her purse on the floor and had not wanted to do any thing about it. "

label: joy
text: When I received the acceptance form for the second year at university.

label: fear
text: "A bus drove over my right leg.  The event itself was not very frightening but when I had to wait in the emergency ward for three hours and then my leg began to swell, I was frightened."

label: shame
text: In primary school I once faltered while answering a question and the others started laughing.

label: joy
text: "I remember my religious experience.  During  a gospel camp, a few friends of mine decided to believe in God.  The joy that I felt at that time was more than words can express.  I blessed them and praised God in my heart."

label: guilt
text: "I had known the girl for a few months when I proposed to her and this put an end to our friendship, as from then on we started withdrawing from each other.  I liked her very much."

label: sadness
text: When one's studies seem hopelessly difficult and uninteresting.

label: guilt
text: "With a group of handicapped people we went to a party. When we wanted to leave we were not able to find one of these people. I had told his mother that we would leave at 4.30 p.m., actually it was planned for 3.30 p.m. Therefore there was a delay."

label: joy
text: When my little sister was born.

label: fear
text: "When my son fell off the cot at the age of 5 months, I became very nervous and thought that it would cause defects in his head.  "

label: guilt
text: A parking fine.

label: disgust
text: In a bus I fell sick and vomitted in a bag.  The entire situation was disgusting in itself.

label: sadness
text: "When my boyfriend was changing his behavior there was something wrong, I felt sad, because it's desagreable when a relationship is ending."

label: disgust
text: Reading literature on AIDS/homosexuality.

label: fear
text: "Once I was caught by thugs aged between 20-35, they asked me to surrender all the property I had and I remember feeling very scared."

label: guilt
text: "We had a day off from school. Instead of helping my mother with her job, I stayed in bed all day."

label: fear
text: I was afraid when my dog ran out through a crack in the fence when  a train was coming.

label: joy
text: Being together with my best friend.

label: guilt
text: "When I was driving my car, I wanted to pick something from the floor of the car and drove into the guide-rail. I thought that I should not have done that and felt guilty."

label: anger
text: When I found out that the guy I was dating at a particular time had a steady relationship going on with someone else for a long time.

label: anger
text: My boyfriend breaking up with me about 7 months after I had an abortion. Just the fact that he was ignoring me and continued to do so.

label: shame
text: I am ashamed when I am not prepared in a subject and I have to answer in the presence of the patients.

label: guilt
text: Some days ago I had a slight car accident through my fault.

label: joy
text: "Passing an examination, although I felt sure I had failed."

label: disgust
text: "In a film there was a scene in which a rat was sliding on a bed, leaving a trace of blood behind, finally it entered the mouth of one of the actors."

label: guilt
text: I was to take a test and I had not made the necessary preparations until it was too late.  There were two days to go and I still had not done much.

label: joy
text: I felt happy when I received the letter telling me that I had been admitted to the university.

label: shame
text: "I was catched when, as a little girl, I played tricks. I was very startled then and wet my pants."

label: fear
text: "A teacher wanted to instill a certain opinion and a certain behaviour into myself, what I refused. I was afraid when I saw him."

label: joy
text: My old boyfriend - yes the same one - asked me out. We had a good time. Then he asked me out the following week. He actually took interest.

label: shame
text: "I felt shame at the hurt I caused to my family especially my parent father, shame of hurting people emotionally. A misconceived self-blaming that didn't do me any good. Shame at being myself as I am."

label: shame
text: When a friend from whom I preferred to hide my private life discovered that I had relations with a man.

label: fear
text: "I lived in a flat with a couple. The woman was so jealous of me, that she sometimes had crying fits. Eventually her husband could not stand that any more and wanted to kill me."

label: sadness
text: I never failed my examinations since Standard 1 but I experienced sad moments when I sat for Standard 8 Examination and I was not selected for Secondary School education in 1978.

label: anger
text: "When my mother told things to my sister, which I told my mother in confindence."

label: disgust
text: One time at the hospital I passed near the intensive care room. The offensive smell that came out disgusted me in such a way that I didn't even dare to enter the room.

label: guilt
text: "At times I have been attracted to conducts which are socially degraded due to their ill consequences, and then I feel guilty."

label: disgust
text: Saw a scene in a movie implying incest as humorous.

label: shame
text: My failure to provide the appropriate emotional/spiritual level to a sexual relationship that had a large physical content. Born out of inconsistency with my personal beliefs and value shame at largely using this sexual partner.

label: sadness
text: When someone I love told me that she did not love me anymore and that she wanted all the snaps that she had given me in exchange for the ones I had given her.

label: anger
text: I felt angry when repeated pleas to the ticket collector and the co-passengers in order to make a queue fell on deaf ears.  I have this feeling whenever someone is not disciplined and methodic in doing his duty.

label: anger
text: When I learned that my brother had spoilt an LP of mine.

label: joy
text: Getting a phone call from a very old friend.

label: guilt
text: "I've always defended my sister when needed, at the expense of my brother. This has led to feelings of guilt towards him."

label: anger
text: When I failed my S.S.C exam.

label: shame
text: I was drinking a glass of wine and eating something when there suddenly appeared pictures about the famine in some parts of Africa.

label: fear
text: "I was alone at home, a man forced the front door which was locked, forced and tried to open a window."

label: guilt
text: I accused my husband of being late deliberately when he came to pick me up from work.

label: anger
text: Someone told me that I was chosen for English lectures because the class leader is going out with me (not true).

label: anger
text: "At a cash desk where I had gone to buy 16 rolls of kitchen paper at a reduced price.  After queuing with screaming children; it turned out that I had taken two 8 roll packets instead of the one 16 roll packet to which the rebate applied.  The assistant said ""You will have to get it another time."""

label: sadness
text: The loss of a close relative who was ill with cancer.

label: anger
text: A friend called me and told me that she wanted to come and see me. She lived in a village at 50 km distance fom my home town. Next morning I expected her but she didn't arrive. As I got impatient I called her but her parents told me that she had gone skiing. I was very angry because I had cancelled an appointment to be able to see her.

label: joy
text: When I was at a party I met an old friend from an adult education course.  We had not met for 2 years but had both thought a lot about each other.  A wonderful experience.

label: fear
text: When I was attacked by a teenage boy and had my wallet stolen.

label: fear
text: "When I saw Russian roulette on TV. (obviously the movie ""Deer hunter"")"

label: fear
text: I had fear of my father (parents) when I first became pregnant. I was afraid of delivery itself and whether I would give birth to a stiiborn or a baby.

label: disgust
text: "When I opted for my research field, for them the percentage of marks was more important than my knowledge."

label: shame
text: "At the airport, eighty beer cans that I was carrying in a bag spread all around while I was going through the metal detector."

label: disgust
text: Can't describe any disgust situation.

label: guilt
text: "My brother wanted money but I refused to give it to him, two days later he stole it from my father."

label: disgust
text: "I felt it when I saw a colleague of mine eating like a beast. At the same time he was making gestures, speaking and making the hell of a noise."

label: joy
text: When I received the results from my final examination - Higher School Certificate - and received a mark that was beyond my wildest expectations.

label: sadness
text: When I had to leave my mother and my sister after a week's visit.

label: shame
text: "Truely, I got very ashamed when my brother was sent out of Business Machines Limited Company due to improper handling of the office equipment in Sales Services."

label: guilt
text: "I was driving my parents' car into a carpark in front of a shop we own, and scraped the corner of the front panel on the back corner of my father's utility. I didn't tell anyone, I lied about the bump (later I had to confess)."

label: anger
text: A colleague asked me for some advice and as he did not have enough confidence in me he asked a third person.

label: joy
text: When I fell in love.

label: shame
text: When I as a child of 9 or 10 I was playing doctor with the neighbours boys their mother caught us.

label: joy
text: "I acted in an English play in college and got the Best Actress award, while our play got the first place."

label: guilt
text: When I inadvertantly made some close friends and relatives feel bad.

label: disgust
text: "A drunk man attacked his wife and wanted to humiliate her by insulting her. Then he turned violent and started to beat her in front of her child. She left it happen without saying a word in order not to make things worse. I watched the scene and tried to calm the man, but without success. Just because he was stronger we had to comply. From that day I detested him."

label: fear
text: "During a demonstration I climbed up the closed central door of a bus.  When the bus stopped I had to go back to the same place, afraid that the police would see me.   "

label: disgust
text: "I once got a phone call stating ""one of your friend is in jail, please come and see him"".  When I went to the jail and saw him, I was disgusted."

label: joy
text: A friend came to tell me that her father invited me to go on holiday with them in Benidorm otherwise I could not afford to go on holiday.

label: joy
text: When I met a very close friend of mine after one year of separation.

label: shame
text: "After failing a second attempt at Med 4, following a number of difficult personal circumstances."

label: shame
text: Meeting other friends who got in the good universities.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted when I was in a helpless position at the loss of my fiancee.

label: joy
text: When I was told that they had got tickets for me for a film marathon I wanted to see.

label: fear
text: "Being involved in a car accident and having my thumb caught in the glove compartment. My sister and I had a Fear of finally telling my parents, since my sister was the driver."

label: sadness
text: My friend still trusts me as a friend.

label: sadness
text: When I didn't get a certain job at Lillehammer which I wanted very much.

label: fear
text: "When I walked to church with my roommate, a bum told us to call the police and he started following us."

label: shame
text: When I inadvertantly entered the ladies room and met some girls on my way out.

label: shame
text: Each time the professor asks me a question in class.

label: shame
text: I had borrowed some money and I exceeded the time-limit.

label: disgust
text: I saw some images of a decapitation in a horror film.

label: joy
text: Going to a friend's wedding and seeing many of my old friends whom I had known before I moved to a new district five years previously.

label: disgust
text: When I was teaching a student started making silly remarks in class.

label: shame
text: "I was making very strong statements about infidelity in couples. Then I discovered that one of my best friends, who had just been through a very sad case of mutual infidelity, was listening."

label: disgust
text: I saw part of a Prince video with him crawling out of a bath tub.

label: guilt
text: "One evening I went out with some friends of mine, although I was supposed to stay at home with my little sister who is 11."

label: anger
text: "At work, when an elderly man complained unjustifiably about me and distrusted me."

label: disgust
text: Once when I was babysitting for some neighbors children I found roaches in ther bathroom. I had never seen a roach before but I called my mother to make sure that's what they were. And she came over and checked.

label: joy
text: When the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

label: shame
text: Was accused of having hidden intentions in a situation when I believed I was acting honestly and fairly.

label: fear
text: Heard some ghost-like noise at night.

label: disgust
text: Seeing a pornographic movie in which animals were used.

label: disgust
text: I am disgusted with a nieghbour who is looking for all sorts of quarrel with my parents and me. He feels we are hampering his living close to us. This has been going on for quite a long time.

label: shame
text: Failing university entrance examn.

label: disgust
text: When I had to finish those big amounts of homework in time.

label: shame
text: "When I went to a sauna with my father for the first time (I was 16). When I entered the sauna naked, I felt ashamed for a short time."

label: sadness
text: "In 1983, my results at the university entrance exam were very poor - far from what I had expected.   I thought that I would not be accepted at the university."

label: fear
text: I was afraid of moving away from home and moving to Helsinki for my studies.

label: joy
text: This week I was phoned by an old friend with whom I lost contact a few years ago.

label: fear
text: I could have been killed by a falling object.

label: fear
text: I have been afraid several times. What marked me was that I almost didn't enter University.

label: anger
text: "One day in a clinic, the father of a child came in and assaulted a colleague for something that she had not done deliberately."

label: shame
text: "I was carried away while talking about my visits abroad and I tended to boast a little, till I realized that the listener was amused."

label: sadness
text: One of my best friends was hurt by a girl he loves.

label: fear
text: "My boyfriend hinted over the phone about wanting to ""be free"".  He thus did not say it point blank, silence followed."

label: shame
text: When I found out my roommate had been talking behind my back about very personal things.

label: fear
text: Two summers ago my best friend and I drove into unknown mountains at midnight to pick up my broken car. We told one another horrifically scary ghost/murder stories and succeeded in scaring eachother pretty well - even though somewhere in our heads we knew the fears were unjustified.

label: shame
text: My girl-friend and I live in one flat with another couple. We get along very well and usually we share everything. Once we two were sitting in our room and eating a cake when the others came in.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died - having to see my mother weep.

label: disgust
text: There was a cat on the street.  It had been run over and its head was open.  We passed beside it.

label: disgust
text: One day I went to see a rather disagreeable film (X).

label: joy
text: The last time I had sex.

label: sadness
text: "When I recently thought about the hard work it takes to study, and  how one wants to try something else.  When I read a theoretical book in English that I did not understand."

label: disgust
text: Bus driver driving roughly - old man fell off seat into aisle - driver wouldn't stop - disgusted with her behaviour.

label: guilt
text: Not being able to help my friend to do homework.

label: joy
text: When I got the scholarship letter from Australia.

label: anger
text: My older brother who gives me unwanted advices about problems in my relationship with my girlfriend.

label: fear
text: I received a letter from my college telling me that I would not be allowed to sit for the exams because of my low attendance in class and the bad experience in the terminal exams.

label: joy
text: When I passed my Primary school leaving certificate and selected to go to a Boarding secondary school.

label: shame
text: "I had been away all night without having told my parents about it.  In the morning when I came home, my mother looked tired.  She said that she had been awake all night because of me and that she was angry and disappointed."

label: shame
text: Falling over.

label: fear
text: "Before I moved away from home, I feared leaving."

label: guilt
text: "When I have sometimes been unfair to my parents, when I have happened to deceive them over some trifling things."

label: shame
text: When I forgot the birthday of my best friend and I innocently came to visit her one week later.

label: fear
text: "It was winter/spring and the ice was melting.  I was far out on a jetty and I poked the ice with a long branch to try and break it.  The branch went through the ice and I fell in, the water closed in over my head."

label: disgust
text: "At my grandmother's detestable and selfish conduct towards my elder sister, although her behavior was due to senility and lack of understanding."

label: anger
text: There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives in the same house where I live. Suddenly it became too much for me and I accused him of several things.

label: disgust
text: When people/press analyze a particular newsworthy item (CAL Football team) which I am a member and can only see the situation in a bad light and always put the team down.

label: sadness
text: When my first girlfriend an I left each other.

label: guilt
text: When I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting a hot pan in it.

label: sadness
text: It happened when I lost two very intimate friends in a car accident.

label: joy
text: When I got a small present form a person I like very much.

label: anger
text: "When my girlfriend left me to go out with another guy, even though she knew that she was wrong."

label: fear
text: I was on my surf ski. Rather large waves to strong current separated me from my ski and we both began to drift slowly (actually rather quickly) away to sea. The direction I was drifting in was taking me straight over a reef on which rather large sharks were constantly being caught. (I was alone with no one to help me).

label: anger
text: Found out that someone I knew well has been misunderstanding me for 2 years.

label: anger
text: A shop in Downtown wouldn't accept my Visa Card - before December last year.

label: anger
text: "I had got a bad cold. My father said I must be crazy to go by motorbike at those temperatures. When I answered him that I did not care about a cold, he said that if I did not care for anything I could leave him (it was for the second time he said something like that)."

label: disgust
text: "Out of sheer curiosity, I went to see a pornographic movie in Copenhagen.  The room was full of men, who panted and masturbated.  Very disgusting."

label: joy
text: I got to know that I had been accepted at university.

label: guilt
text: Guilt after fighting with my sister (for) telling her how bad she was.

label: anger
text: Bus conductor insulted me for not buying a ticket (I forgot).

label: disgust
text: "In my village there was this tax collector who used to cheat people and collected more than was wanted, the surplus was for his family and himself."

label: guilt
text: I couldn't fulfill a promise.

label: disgust
text: "One day, when I was twelve years old, my brother took some slimy substance swimming on the surface of a pot of vinegar made of cider and threatened to throw it at me."

label: shame
text: I was ashamed one day when we were found stealing and roasting maize cobs from Agricultural experimental projects.

label: shame
text: Some days ago I had a car accident. It was quite slight but through my fault. I felt strong shame because I had the spirits of a good driver.

label: sadness
text: "When I finished a relation after four years, leading to much sorrow for the other one and myself (""although it was the best solution"")."

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I once went out with another boy and made love with him while I had a close boyfriend.

label: disgust
text: I am disgusted with the behavior of a car driver whose car would run over me and my friends during our autumn brigade.

label: joy
text: My friend told me he really likes me.

label: disgust
text: Having moved into a flat within the last week I felt some disgust that a bathroom tap had been left to drip with a faulty fawcet.

label: fear
text: "My daughter was 2 yrs she went up to a colt tried to hit it. It turned on her and kicked her over the heart, sent her flying through the air. I left my mother and sister to deal to her as they are nurses. I felt I didn't want to know if she was going to die, it was just too much."

label: shame
text: "When I began to date, the first gestures of affection made me feel ashamed.

label: shame
text: "One day in class, the professor asked me a question concerning something he had been explaining.  He was very close to me (beside me) and I had no idea what to answer."

label: fear
text: I was at home and we were sleeping when we heard some robbers breaking into our house.

label: fear
text: I was nearly knocked down while I was cycling.

label: disgust
text: "I found out accidentaly that while my uncle was away in Canada, my aunt had been bedding a young man on a regular basis."

label: joy
text: A boy I had been admiring so much asked me to go out with him.

label: disgust
text: When I think now about the way my father behaved when filing a divorce.

label: sadness
text: When my ex-girlfriend and I discovered that there was a certain risk of her being pregnant.

label: anger
text: "I worked with several classmates on a project.  I was very anxious about the project while my partners showed no concern  and when we had meetings on the project my classmates  did not pay any attention.  Some of them read books while the others argued on irrelevant questions.  The meeting would go on for two hours without the main theme being discussed.  We wasted time and could not reach a compromise.  My classmates avoided doing the work and the responsibilities, they seemed to value other projects more than this one."

label: guilt
text: "Leaving University in 1982 following exclusion and lying to parents/friends about reasons for leaving, i.e. lying about the fact of having been excluded."

label: sadness
text: We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an injection).

label: fear
text: I fear before each exam.

label: shame
text: I did not do the homework that the teacher had asked us to do.  I was scolded immediately.

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I heard that I was accepted for the Free University in Driebergen.

label: fear
text: A friend and I were going to have a study session together in which we quiz ourselves in biology material. Because I believed I didn't study enough. I feared I would fail.

label: guilt
text: When I realized that I avoided two good friends with whom I always shared toys and sorrows. I made up idle stories to avoid telling them what happened to me.

label: guilt
text: Missing lectures and avoiding university work for no reason when it had to be done.

label: anger
text: When I was subjected to a very nasty joke by a group of friends.

label: shame
text: The fact that I was pregnant. I was always considered level headed and did not have sex until 18 and out of high school.

label: shame
text: Not having good marks like other people for homeworks.

label: disgust
text: "Yesterday, I was just about to cross the road when a country guy who was ahead of me spat out a mouthful of betel juice on the road.  It was very windy and had I not checked my speed I would have had a very good shower of his saliva.  Though I was not angry, I felt that these people were very indecent."

label: anger
text: Exchange of points of view with my sister on a family matter.

label: sadness
text: A friend's brother died.

label: disgust
text: "When I was an auxiliary nurse at the hospital and I had to change the nappies, for the first time, of a very old and sick woman."

label: shame
text: I wrote a letter to my father to ventilate my bottled up feelings. Afterwards I thought it was too negative.

label: anger
text: When I quarelled with my parents.

label: sadness
text: "For the loss of a close friend or relative, but you feel grief when you are away from home, too."

label: anger
text: "Going away for the weekend, leaving my College room open - when I returned several friends had had a party there, leaving the mess."

label: disgust
text: "I used to play with a group of classmates and I found out later that they were cheap in thought, behaviour and conduct - they would smoke, fight and speak foul language.  I thought that they destroyed the image of college students."

label: sadness
text: Relative's death.

label: sadness
text: "When I didn't succeed to enter at the University, I felt that the college entrance course sistem prejudiced me, that my integrity, and effort weren't corresponded."

label: fear
text: "When I got the midterm exam results, the results were below average and were near the lowest.  I was scared of the final exam."

label: disgust
text: The curriculum of the year !   The English course was very heavy.  I had not prepared and the teacher asked several questions during class.  The students were not ready to answer the questions and the teacher was frustated.

label: shame
text: In a party of friends I got completely drunk.

label: shame
text: Cheating to get the best grade on a test in 7th grade.

label: guilt
text: "Once in my homes yard, I was plaing football with my cousin and in a certain quick the ball went on uncontrolled putting down a bird-cage, killing it."

label: disgust
text: "A situation of overt unfairness, manipulation of people and its consequences."

label: fear
text: "One evening I saw the old guard-man I knew, change into something inhuman for about 5-10 seconds, this really frightened me."

label: sadness
text: "My sister was impolite to my father when the family was having lunch together at a restaurant.  She thought that our parents had been prejudiced against her, this was an extreme thought."

label: fear
text: I had been drinking with a pal and I later (1 o' clock) had a date  with my fiancee.  We were going to a Spanish lesson and I was afraid that she would smell that I had been drinking.

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my nephew had passed away.

label: sadness
text: "When my grandmother, my second mother died."

label: joy
text: Seeing a close friend who had just returned from twelve months overseas.

label: disgust
text: When my friend who was drunk insulted me in public for no reason at all.

label: disgust
text: During a movie in which I saw the effect of white settlers in Africa.

label: sadness
text: The sudden death of one of my parents.

label: shame
text: "In the last day of carnaval I met a boy and began to flirt with him. I was in love with him. When he introduced me to his friends I died of shame because I was with them before, I met my boyfriend in carnaval."

label: anger
text: My boyfriend promised to take me to see a game of tennis and rang saying he was going to the pub with some of his friends instead.

label: fear
text: A car came very close to hitting me whilst I was crossing the street.

label: disgust
text: "When I knew that a person who I didn't like, had about me other feelings."

label: shame
text: I felt shame when I found that I was almost last in the exam.

label: disgust
text: When I failed the grade 7 twice and only passed it the third time.

label: shame
text: I told my primary teacher I hadn't done my homework as my mother was in a car accident. My teacher rang that night to see how my mother was - she was fine i.e. no accident !

label: joy
text: I spoke with a friend on the phone who I haven't seen in many years. It was a joyful event to talk to him.

label: shame
text: In school I was very bad in running long distances and my class-mates laughed at me for this reason.

label: disgust
text: I was really disgusted when I saw one of my friends soiling on his clothes. I thought he was mad.

label: sadness
text: When my half brother became seriously ill with cancer and died later.

label: joy
text: "New year's eve 1983/1984, I met my girlfriend.  We stood on the steps outside her parents home and I kissed her for the first time."

label: shame
text: "When I was in grade one, one day I felt like going to the toilet during class but I was very scared of the teacher so I urinated in the class."

label: guilt
text: "I was spending a few days at my aunt's place.  One night I got home very late, I had told them I was going to a party but I went to another place.  They were very worried."

label: anger
text: When I was insulted by a fellow student.

label: sadness
text: When I received my S.Y.J.C results which did not allow me to get   admission in engineering.

label: shame
text: Went to a lecture about Chinese history and hear about the Opium War.

label: fear
text: Taking a chemistry midterm.

label: disgust
text: When I learned that a relative had been spreading rumours about me.

label: joy
text: I received a letter from a friend whom I was missing

label: sadness
text: When my boyfriend took me to his father's grave.

label: fear
text: When I was six years old we were on holiday in France. There was very heavy weather then.

label: fear
text: When I flew from Athens to Copenhagen after a holiday.  The plane was caught in a storm and it began to shake and I thouhght that we were going to crash.

label: guilt
text: "When I ""hated"" one of mmy flatmates who was nice to me."

label: shame
text: I made a very insulting remark against a person whom I care for very much. This event was caused by a third person who didn't like the person I insulted.

label: sadness
text: My uncle died in the Vietnam War.

label: guilt
text: I took my father's car to church one Sunday (I told them that's where I was going ) I decided instead to go for a drive to the beach - on the way I got a puncture.

label: sadness
text: When I learnt that I had been betrayed by my friend.

label: anger
text: "A ""higher status"" colleague of mine despised my attitude and organization of work."

label: shame
text: I fell off a bike in the presence of a lot of people.

label: joy
text: When I accepted Jesus Christ as my personal saviour.

label: fear
text: Finding out about people can go mad for social reasons.

label: fear
text: Saw a snake unexpectedly.

label: shame
text: Doing poorly on an exam that I thought I should do well.

label: disgust
text: Deception from a person I loved very much.

label: joy
text: It was the weekend of my homecoming. I saw my sister for the first time in 3 months. She's my best friend and extremely close.

label: anger
text: "When my mother slapped me in the face, I felt anger at that moment."

label: shame
text: "When I was a child, I thought that I had to be ashamed when asking and doing certain forbidden things."

label: anger
text: "I gave tutorial to a student and I found that he was lazy, he did not pay attention to what I taught.  He did some easy questions wrong deliberately."

label: anger
text: My boy-friend had promised me to come home at about 10 p.m. He did not return until midnight and had consumed a lot of alcohol.

label: sadness
text: At an irrevocable loss (with respect to human relations).

label: guilt
text: One night I did not come home without telling my parents and I did not want to speak about it afterwards. My mother cried. I had a bad conscience and felt guilty.

label: shame
text: When I overslept for the second time on the day I had an examination.

label: fear
text: Before taking an exam.

label: sadness
text: My partner left me after we had been together for a long time.

label: guilt
text: A person misinterpreted what I had told her. I had told her that I had failed to insert a NasoGastric tube but she went and scolded the patient that she was being uncooperative.

label: sadness
text: "When a girl did not answer a question, concerning my love for her, put forward to her."

label: disgust
text: "A dirty person, smelling bad and unknown laying on me."

label: fear
text: I feel fear quite often but this feeling was very strong last year when my husband was quite unexpectedly sent to the hospital.

label: joy
text: Reading a nice book and talking about it to my friend.

label: fear
text: I felt something close to that when I saw that there was a man on the terrace of the flat.

label: disgust
text: "On my way home in the middle of the night I saw a drunk man and a woman who were quarreling, beating each other, shouting and so on. I felt disgusted especially because they treated each other in such a degrading way."

label: disgust
text: Someone told me I was chosen for the English lectures because I am good looking.

label: joy
text: The computer at school had left out my name along with four others and I had no rights for one year.  So I was happy to find my name on the medical schhol list.

label: sadness
text: It was extremely sad to me when I heard that a patient who I was taking care of in hospital had passed away. He had some abdominal pains.

label: disgust
text: "When a drunkard, in town yelled at me saying that I was a prostitute."

label: fear
text: I went to visit a friend in hospital.  He was going to be operated the next day.  I was afraid that they would not let me in and I did not know what his reaction would be on seeing me.

label: disgust
text: At a night club watching little tarts trying to earn a living.

label: fear
text: When my B.A results had not come.

label: shame
text: "When I had come home drunk the day after a party, I felt very ashamed in front of my parents."

label: fear
text: If a close relative's life is in danger.

label: anger
text: When a very close friend with whom I have a very intimate and bodily relationship (he had a girlfriend) started to avoid me and didn't want to talk to me any more.

label: fear
text: "I was sitting on an electric swing, suddenly the machine went out of order while I was still in the upward position."

label: sadness
text: Talking to a very good friend who had just had a very bad experience which was changing his whole way of looking at life etc.

label: disgust
text: I read a book whose plot and expressions were obscene and in very bad taste.

label: joy
text: "Letting Jesus take control of my emotions i.e., ill feeling."

label: anger
text: "The day the results of the Chinese university was announced I should have been very happy; however my grandmother, because of  her prejudice and misunderstanding, started a  quarrel with my mother.  She expected me to take her side and she deliberately talked of my mother's wrong doings.  I was very angry because - one my grandmother was not being reasonable and two because it should have been a happy day and three we had moved into a new house that day."

label: guilt
text: Failed to do what I had promised.

label: sadness
text: Death of paternal grandmother to whom I was very close - died of cancer.

label: fear
text: "One year, when I went to a camp, I was chased by a dog.  I tried hard and finally managed to escape from it.  My torch suddenly went off and we talked about ghost stories and I thought that there were ghosts."

label: disgust
text: "During a recent meeting, Mr. A showed his excitement and overindulged in the notes delivered.  Though his curiosity could not be blamed, his way of accquiring knowledge was an extreme behaviour e.g he always tried to know what I was reading and gained everything he could."

label: guilt
text: "While doing some calculation exercises, I neglected a part of it, though I had marked it as done.  By chance, I was asked to demonstrate this very part on the blackboard."

label: fear
text: "When I was 8 years old, I would usually come home from school with my mother in a car.  For the first time I had to take the school bus, and I mistook the bus stop and found myself two kilometres away from where I lived.  I was very scared, wondering how I would get back home."

label: anger
text: When a classmate hit me on my occipital region when I was busy studying and concentrating on my classnotes.

label: joy
text: Every year during carnival I am very joyful I have an intense feeling of happiness then.

label: anger
text: When I realized that the person I was courting hadn't been really by my side for a long time already. He had deceived me and I let him deceive me.

label: shame
text: "I had gone to aa bookshop to buy some books.  Somehow, I got very cross with the security guard checking through what I had bought.  I lost my temper and screamed at him.  Later I felt very ashamed at myself as a lot of people I know were there."

label: anger
text: "New Year's Eve party in the country, I hardly knew a person; my partner spent most of the time at the bar. I had little opportunity to get to know people because our table was separated and my boyfriend's parents were present."

label: shame
text: When I excreted on the mat instead of the potty.

label: anger
text: Someone played a trick on me.

label: joy
text: When in an economic crisis I got an unexpected sum of money.

label: disgust
text: People talking in an important lecture.

label: disgust
text: When I heard about the disaster in Bophal (India).

label: anger
text: "When I was studying in the library - preparing for a test, two people sitting next to me talked to each other for 20 minutes.  There were no other seats so I could not go elsewhere and I did   not want to interrupt them, so I could only be angry in my heart."

label: guilt
text: "I destroyed my step-brother's bedsheets by mistake, they were the only ones he had."

label: disgust
text: The price I was charged for work on my car.

label: joy
text: The day I was told that I had passed my Malawi School leaving Exams and I was selected to go to college.

label: fear
text: When my father's home was to be broken into by thieves who had guns.

label: anger
text: People not resprcting my opinion.

label: joy
text: After my girlfriend had taken her exam we went to her parent's place.

label: sadness
text: This issue worried me rather than saddening me.  In mid September I went to Guanggho alone.  I was looking for an accomodation in the evening and after having walked 2 or 3 miles I still could not find anything.  What could I do?  I was not worried about sleeping on the streets but because of some procedural problems.  I finally found a place to sleep at 8 o'clock.

label: joy
text: "On my 18th birthday I passed the driving-test. I was glad because I had had to study very much, because I had been lucky and because - as a proof that it was really difficult - not everybody had passed the test."

label: disgust
text: When I see all the putridness of people. The fact is the catarrh and spits that whash the streets of S.Paulo.

label: anger
text: A month ago when one of my fellow workers got a promotion over me. It was just a small promotion but recognition was involved.

label: anger
text: "Attitude to some manners of dealing and some ""sanctioned"" relations."

label: disgust
text: I was forced to stay in the canteen and eat the food that I had not asked for but got it anyway.

label: disgust
text: "When I was watching some scenes from the Bertoluchi's film ""Twentieth Century""."

label: fear
text: Being alone at night.

label: fear
text: When my dog ran out on thin ice last spring.

label: disgust
text: In Ward 1A was an epileptic patient who was burnt the whole body and was stinking very much such that the whole ward was affected. Few people could come near him.

label: fear
text: "The fear about my future : work, making ends meet and health. Coping."

label: fear
text: When my son has a pain in his leg (for no apparent reason).

label: anger
text: Brother took my money to use for his own purposes.

label: joy
text: When my family allowed me to do higher studies.

label: fear
text: "A Maori language oral test, yeaterday - Although I had studied intensely - once in the examiners room ""I blew it"" -  I was so nervous I couldn't reply easily - It was very important, but I got only blankness."

label: shame
text: Lying to a friend about something that was trivial.

label: guilt
text: It was on January 1st 1985 when I accidentally broke a Fanta bottle in a certain bottle store in Zomba.

label: anger
text: "At an undeserved attitude toward a man, when human personality is not treated decently."

label: sadness
text: I felt sad when my father was sick.

label: disgust
text: When I entered a toilet in a bar and it stank.

label: guilt
text: I am not good enough to join any team to play sport for the class.

label: fear
text: On my way through lonely streets I met with a huge stray dog. It stopped at some distance and looked at me. I tried to ignore it but I was very frightened.

label: anger
text: The sports fishermen who catch gulls instead of fish with their hooks.   It is often a mistake but it makes me angry.

label: joy
text: "One night, at a friend's place I realized that I had everything I most wished, around me."

label: guilt
text: "When I was about 14 years old, I ""borrowed"" a can of drink from the refrigerator, intending to replace it later that day. But it was found missing before I could do anything - no one owned up to its disappearance."

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgust when I realized that I had eaten something fatty, and vomited too much."

label: fear
text: "In 1977 when my friend was caught by a crocodile.  We were swimming in a river on whose banks our primary school was situated.  When my friend was caught, he was on the banks of the river and some of us were still in the middle of the river.  I was very frightened."

label: joy
text: When I got myself the kind of girlfriend I had been hunting for a long time.

label: joy
text: Selling my used car.

label: guilt
text: I got angry at my mother for something trivial.  We were in a bad mood because my father was very ill and I knew that my mother really needed support.  I had reacted wrongly.

label: shame
text: When a person whom I do not want to see is continously present.

label: sadness
text: When I heard the last regulation of the socialist govrenment concerning pensions.

label: anger
text: In a course I thought that I deserved good marks but I only got ordinary marks with no justification as to why I was given these marks.

label: shame
text: "We were at a party, this guy I liked and me.  I really loved him and gathered enough courage to ask him to kiss me.  He did not do it but instead asked me what I would like for my birthday.  I told him that I would like a kiss more than anything else but he excused himself and said that it was impossible.  I really felt embarassed."

label: guilt
text: Lately I've felt guilty because I'm folling behind in my classes and not studying much.

label: guilt
text: Carried out a vandalistic act on some windows at an old army location.

label: shame
text: "When I don't say the truth, when I don't do a certain thing thanks to my laziness."

label: disgust
text: When I lost the notes of the lecturer I had borrowed from my friend.

label: shame
text: I wanted my boyfriend to stay when he didn't. He stayed but when he left I felt ashamed because I should have let him leave when he wanted. I was too selfish.

label: joy
text: When I read the newspaper that morning I found my candidature number on the admission list of the Chinese university.  I was satisfied and happy and the cumulative anxiety disappeared.  I only wanted to cry out that I had succeeded.

label: shame
text: It was when we were beaten or lost the football match by 5-1 and then I scored the third goal to my own side.

label: sadness
text: "I was together with my family one night, a few days after my father had died, during that conversation I expressed my displeasure because nobody understands me."

label: fear
text: "When I was involved in a car accident last November, after the first fall of snow.  I lost control of the car and it spun round and landed on the opposite side of the road, on the hard shoulder.  It was stopped by a pole on top of a bank sloping down to a stream."

label: joy
text: "Several days after my final examination at school, I was sitting in an airplane on my way to Greece. I enjoyed that moment very much."

label: anger
text: "I was waiting behind a car which was going to leave the parking place, because I wanted to park my car there. Because of uncoming traffic I had to wait for a short time - another driver placed his car on the place."

label: anger
text: "Having agreed to share the taxi expenses, three people in the back of the car just ran off, leaving the person up front with the entire bill."

label: disgust
text: "Four weeks ago I felt very much touched to find an asciatic patient who had asked the very morning to be tapped of the fluid, dying in the evening. I was really disgusted because this was the Medical staff's negligence. Had the Clinical officers done something that very morning he might have been alive today."

label: guilt
text: "For the sheer pleasure of it, I quarelled with my boyfriend who was trying  to be especially kind to me."

label: anger
