text: "I felt anger of a friend when she met ""a date"" and become nervous and pest as she always gets when she meets him."

label: sadness
text: Listening and watching a tape of someone with AIDS being prejudiced against at a counselling course on AIDS with 20 others.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to a University College of Nursing.

label: fear
text: "One day, when I realized that I was alone, I felt fear of loneliness."

label: anger
text: When my son omits to carry out certain duties at home that he knows needs doing.

label: joy
text: "Did very, very well on a Physics midterm."

label: fear
text: DO NOT REMEMBER.

label: fear
text: Fighting with class mates in Highschool.

label: fear
text: Ran into a parking car on a bicycle.

label: guilt
text: I do not help out enough at home.

label: fear
text: Someone knocked on the door when I was alone at home (though there was a door bell).  I looked through the peep hole but it had been covered.  I called my sister but she could not help me as she was hundreds of kilometres away.

label: fear
text: I am a kindergarten teacher and I am thoroughly weary of my job.  After having taken the university entrance exam I suffered from anxiety for weeks as I did not want to carry on with my work - studies were the only alternative.

label: sadness
text: Disappointed by a friend.

label: guilt
text: I was unfaithful to my partner once when he was working abroad for a long period.

label: disgust
text: When a close friend of mine maintained a relationship with me till she needed me and broke it off when she did not need me.  She behaved life a really selfish person.

label: anger
text: When one teacher unjustly gave me zero in a test saying that I was cribbing.

label: anger
text: Finding that a subordinate at work was still not willing to cooperate after discussions to try and resolve an attitude problem.

label: joy
text: When I passed the university entrance exam.  I had thus finished with a difficult period of my life and I was about to begin one which I had desired a lot.

label: disgust
text: "During a football game, another player who was perspiring very strongly ran into me."

label: shame
text: I confused a girl with another.

label: shame
text: While intoxicated I invaded someone's (a girl's) personal space to a large extent.

label: fear
text: Waiting for a taxi - when within 1/2 an hour two separate people challenged me to fight for no apparent reason except they were drunk.

label: anger
text: At work being shifted to another area.

label: disgust
text: "This is difficult, since I don't remember feeling disgust towards anyone."

label: anger
text: "Having gone to school without learning anything, as usual."

label: joy
text: Got a big fish in fishing.

label: shame
text: This was when one of the Clinical officers scolded us in the hospital on how to make beds but we did not deserve to be scolded.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I lost K43 for my friend when he was arrested.

label: fear
text: When I broke my leg I felt fear.

label: disgust
text: Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.

label: disgust
text: On the road there was a dead animal with its entrails showing and its skull crushed.

label: disgust
text: "I was supposed to be studying for my math midterm a few days ago, however, I fooled around with my roommate, and didn't start studying until 12:00 am. I was disgusted with myself."

label: shame
text: When I was a child it was found out that I had taken off my clothes outdoors.  It was summer and my friend and I were out in the woods.  It had felt exciting at that time.  My parents discovered that my trousers were back to front and I felt ashamed.

label: shame
text: I felt this when I was copying homework for one of my classes.

label: sadness
text: "It was a complex situation concerning a relationship with a boyfriend, I had broken the relationship for some reasons. Meanwhile, as I felt it, I had most sorrow."

label: guilt
text: I was not able to help my sister to understand that her husband is a bad man before she was married to him.

label: joy
text: I didn't like my former fob and felt joy when I received a telegram offering me a new one that I though better and for which I had been waiting.

label: fear
text: On May 20th I got a summon to appear in court on May 28th 1985 on the subject of impregnanting a school girl. I really feared of standing in the court in a few days time after this notice. I was also embarassed due to formal approach that was expected of me to the Principal.

label: anger
text: "One day, when I was a child, my grandmother shut me up in a room."

label: shame
text: I was totally unprepared for a seminar conducted by an assistant professor whom I highly respect.

label: joy
text: When the result of the certificate exam was announced.  I was surprised and happy as the result was better than I had expected.

label: anger
text: I shared a secret with a friend and it later turned out that he had revealed it to another person with whom I didn't get along very well.

label: anger
text: When I failed the M.S.C exams.

label: disgust
text: "I took a psych. experiment with a totally unappealing gay man as the experimentor, some homosexuals are funny or cute, but this guy was disgusting. Plus the experiment was about gays too."

label: fear
text: When I got lost in New York city a late friday night with a friend of mine.

label: fear
text: "When I was walking at night, I saw fire suspended in the air and it was split into several segments by something I could not see.  I suspected that it was witch-craft."

label: fear
text: I found a problem in homework which would not get solved although I tried my best.

label: shame
text: That was what I felt when I told my first lie and then was cought.

label: joy
text: First time I slept with my present girlfriend. Had been best friends for a year but had been hesitant about getting involved emotionally.

label: anger
text: My girlfriend disliked it when I played majong (a game of gambling).  I expressed my regrets and when I went to see her she neglected my existance.  I was very angry and left in displeasure.

label: shame
text: During a meeting I said something wrong and the others laughed at me.

label: fear
text: I was going to knock down a pedestrian with my car.

label: shame
text: When I ate my sister's food and then she found out that it was me.  I felt very ashamed but still refused to admit that it was me.

label: disgust
text: I found a big black beetle in my coffee cup. It was alive big and it was moving its limbs.

label: sadness
text: "At my grandfather's funeral.  I remembered that the thing he liked and respected most was earth, I thought that he had attained what he wanted and was not separated from it any longer."

label: anger
text: It was when my friend had stolen my money (K10) and had disappeared.

label: sadness
text: When I received my results and found out that I could not go to a school of my choice.

label: sadness
text: When my basket ball team lost the qualification at a final.

label: anger
text: Despite our good performance and excellent results the management refused to meet our demands.

label: disgust
text: Disgust with oneself after being intoxicated enough to go to bed with a stranger.

label: guilt
text: When one of my parents insinuates something about the other (they are divorced).

label: disgust
text: Each time I am confronted with reports about repression and torture.

label: fear
text: "I felt a physical fear, if I can call it this way, today, in the bus where I was sitting on the first seat. While turning the driver didn't see the tram which was making a dash towards us (coming from the side I was), and whose driver intended to cross in yellow light."

label: joy
text: When my child was born.

label: joy
text: "I went to buy a bicycle with my father. When I wanted to pay, my father took his purse and payed."

label: joy
text: "When my brother was born, everything went all right.  It had been very likely that he would have a deficiency (my sister suffers from Down's Syndrome) and that my mother would be in danger."

label: joy
text: Watching the Asian Olympic game (China winning).

label: disgust
text: A boy in my class talking too loud in the lecture.

label: disgust
text: When a very near person got into an awkward situation but showed only helplessness and indecision.

label: shame
text: I found I was pregnant and unmarried.

label: sadness
text: "During my holiday I met again a friend who had tried to commit suicide. She had just left hospital, her lips were trembling, she looked miserable."

label: guilt
text: When I noticed the negative changes in a friend's behaviour.

label: fear
text: When I came to know that my exams were on two successive days and that there was very little time (about 9-10 hours) to study in between.

label: anger
text: I felt angry when I saw on T.V the last slaughter of negroes in South Africa.

label: disgust
text: When an untidy and heavyly drunk person made endeavours to approach me.

label: sadness
text: "A close acquaintance of the family died of lung cancer.  Although it was expected, I still felt depressed."

label: sadness
text: My father's death in January 1983 moved me deeply.  The gloom prevailed for almost two years and I am still to recover from it.

label: fear
text: When the time came for me to see dead bodies and to operate on them.

label: anger
text: A conflict with a pupil.

label: disgust
text: The murder of two girls on a school trip to Berlin (and sexual crimes generally) a couple of years ago.

label: anger
text: "After an exhausting day I came home and wanted to take a bath to relax. My father wanted to take a bath first and when he had finished after an hour, there was no hot water left for me."

label: anger
text: I live with my sister now and sometimes she angers me especially when she thinks I don't keep the apt. clean enough.

label: guilt
text: "I didn't keep a promise I had made to a man, and in this way I lost his esteem and confidence in me. I caused him a lot of trouble."

label: joy
text: When I pass an exam.

label: joy
text: Finding out my name on the list for English lectures.

label: sadness
text: Unrealisation of the desired profession (aviator).

label: sadness
text: When my parents separated temporarily and I was left behind with my father.  As I loved my mother I wanted to go with her.

label: guilt
text: The only guilt I considered reasonable was my reproval at the end of the semester at the University.

label: disgust
text: I felt it when I saw our headmaster blushed ingratiating himself with high ranking officials.

label: anger
text: When my brother was held up and robbed.

label: shame
text: Getting slightly intoxicated at the 1984 I.C.C. Ball.

label: sadness
text: "A young, close relative of mine died, leaving behind a baby a few months old."

label: sadness
text: When I realized that it was impossible for me to be as free as I had imagined and that I could not do anythong about it.

label: shame
text: My mother caught me stealing some food when I was a young boy.

label: anger
text: "When I found my boyfriend, who I had been dating for a year, at another girl's house. We had had previous conflicts concerning the girl, but he had always claimed they were just friends."

label: joy
text: When I told my girlfriend a joke openly and frankly.

label: sadness
text: General Ye Jianying died.

label: shame
text: "I met a friend in a discotheque. he was with a girl and he told me that she was not his girlfriend.  I, to say something, commented that she must be a viscious woman.  He then told me that she was his girl."

label: shame
text: "My brother came to see me and found me with a boy friend.  When my boyfriend greeted him, he did not answer and instead started shouting at me and scolding me in the prescence of my boyfriend."

label: disgust
text: A woman picked her nose and spit right next to me.

label: guilt
text: The day I decided to get out of my house I saw in my brother's eyes that they blamed me for the situaiton.

label: fear
text: When I entered the dissecting room for the anatomy class and saw several dead bodies lying on the benches.

label: guilt
text: "After yelling at my girlfriend, I felt bad because she was ? crying and upset."

label: shame
text: When a group of friends began to make critics about me.

label: fear
text: A time when I was very afraid of something was when I broke my father's antique lamp.

label: disgust
text: I was dominated by a certain person and even though I knew it I could not change my own reactions.

label: fear
text: When I heard a rumour that the 1st year exam results were out. I had fear that I might be one of the failures.

label: shame
text: When the cast general election resulted in Norway getting a conservative government.

label: guilt
text: "When my parents work very hard and get tired - while I go to school and study instead of helping them. I feel that I'm letting them down, disappointing them."

label: guilt
text: I said something which was against my conscience.

label: guilt
text: Promising to do a task for a friend and just forgetting about it.

label: guilt
text: I told my elder brother that he was irresponsible and that I did not care for what he did because he was teasing me.

label: guilt
text: When I was a child I used to play with my cousin gushing wather to each other in front of the door of my house. One day we decided to gush with on a passing car. The driver stopped and went to discuss with my mother and my aunt that were there.

label: shame
text: When I do not succeed in making myself clear to other people. When they do not understand what I say.

label: shame
text: "When someone pointed out that I was proud, yet I didn't dress up properly. This was when I and my friend went for a dnce one Saturday."

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend came back after being away for 10 days.

label: disgust
text: I get disgusted with the inherent racist attitudes of my brother-in-law in putting down various ethnic groups and also my unwillingness to challenge him about these attitudes in order to keep the peace.

label: sadness
text: Death of a parent.

label: disgust
text: When I was giving private tutorials to my student; he would not concentrate and was lazy.  He had not done the home work that I  had assigned and his academic level was very low.  It was a nuisance.

label: anger
text: "When a kid dropped my father's radio cassette player, which he had just repaired."

label: joy
text: When I discovered that I and my friend would be licensed at the first call. This emotion was accompanied by a great relief. It was the coronation of a year of sacrifice and extrene discipline.

label: guilt
text: When my ex-boyfriend didn't want to sleep with me anymore and I insisted. We made love but he felt very badly and I felt guilty.

label: disgust
text: A teacher giving a test was called by a student by his first name. He (the teacher) said that he didn't give him this liberty.

label: disgust
text: When a classmate of ours knocked on our door at 2 o'clock in the morning.  I was disgusted at his behaviour.

label: anger
text: When people without my permission pry in my belongings and take things out of it.

label: anger
text: One of my friends went and told another friend of mine that I was going abut with another guy in Lilongwe besides the one I had. She said I was seen with him hand in hand.

label: disgust
text: When I heard about the treatment of a friend in jail. Really inhuman. I never realised that such things also happen in the Netherlands.

label: guilt
text: "My mother and father had forbidden me to ride my scooter on the road, and I had transgressed (together with the ""wild"" kids from across the street) by riding my scooter down a steep hill near our house. My mother sent the boy next door to collect me, and I was severely scolded."

label: sadness
text: When I knew I had to go out with my mother on some errands.

label: fear
text: Watching a horror film.

label: shame
text: Failing an examn because I did not work hard enough.

label: sadness
text: Did badly in an examn.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted when we (family) avoided a problem which could be solved readily.

label: guilt
text: "When I betrayed my lover, she told me something in confidence, I felt at the time I had to relay the information back to the person concerned, as I felt the situation volitile, did this without telling my lover, she felt like piggy in the middle, as she was not directly concerned. Maybe you could call it gossip I felt different after I had slept on it. If I had waited, thought, NOW I would not have done it."

label: shame
text: When I refused to fetch water for my aunty while she was busy.

label: guilt
text: My mother told me that the enveloppes that I had been tearing (I had torn the stamps away) in good faith had been the first-day enveloppes which my father had collected as a young man.

label: anger
text: A very close friend of mine was refused entrance to the medical school.  Her grades were very good and she should not have been left out.  Biased judgment !

label: joy
text: I learnt from the newspaper that I had been accepted at the Chinese university of H.K.  It was 7 o'clock in the morning.  Later I told my family and relatives about it and had tea with them very joyfully.

label: sadness
text: "We are several friends but our characters are very different and we inevitably split in the two extremes. It is sad that I myself don't know what to do, I try not to hurt either of the ""parties"" because there are conflicts to which one I should belong."

label: shame
text: First time going out with a boy and other people laughed at us.

label: joy
text: "The sense of joy comes to me always after a period of depression, as an organic feeling for an upsurge. I don't exclude the situative feeling but in this case the reason is not in me, it's out of me."

label: sadness
text: I had taken the responsibility to do something and I had prepared for it.  However I failed because of my timidity.  After three attempts I still could not adapt to the atmosphere and failed as before.  I felt imcompetent and felt that the others would think that I had not prepared for it.

label: guilt
text: "I am the secretary of an association, and during the last meeting I forgot to take the minutes."

label: guilt
text: I was 4-5 years old when I hid the bicycle keys of a not very good friend.  After a few hours I pretended that I had found it.

label: disgust
text: "My mother was always fastidious about my room, bed time, etc.  She treated us strictly and punished us physically.   These things were intolerable."

label: anger
text: "When my boss cut off my vacations saying that in that month it wouldn't be possible, and after some time he let another girl take vacations that month. The anger was because of the resentment. Resulting from our bad relationship."

label: anger
text: "I was angry at my brother over an argument we had together.  We do have a few fights from time to time, and also at times I take out my anger on him."

label: shame
text: Shame of not doing something well.

label: disgust
text: "I found a cockroach crushed between two folders in my bedroom, I called my mother."

label: fear
text: Whenever I think of enrolling in Organic Chemistry.

label: disgust
text: "Salo, a movie film by Pasolini. People were misused and tortured for the fun of a few elder Italian authorities, during World War II."

label: shame
text: "A girl in our class was nicknamed ""fatsy"". Later, I heard that she suffered from diabetes mellitus."

label: anger
text: When my roommate's moped was stolen I was very angry.

label: sadness
text: When I first suffered from syphilis.

label: shame
text: This happens to me when I am not prepared in a given subject.

label: joy
text: When I met an old schhol friend (school love) who works in Sk+vde.

label: joy
text: The man I am going around with gave me a very special present.

label: joy
text: "A person with whom I had been on bad terms, gave me a present. We became reconciled."

label: guilt
text: I had spent the weekend visiting relatives and friends and didn't study for Anatomy class on Monday.

label: disgust
text: "Outside a night club, a grown man was sitting on top of a younger woman, beating her up."

label: sadness
text: A sudden end to the relationship with my first girlfriend.

label: fear
text: Not applicable to myself.

label: sadness
text: "Felt sad about some street kids in QUEII square, Aotea square. Because they had been sniffing glue and some were very young. I went into the role of a performing clown."

label: anger
text: They wanted me to pay for a ticket twice because they said that the one I had was out of date.

label: disgust
text: Does not apply.

label: fear
text: "When I was a child, I fell into a cellar (when playing) and could be freed only with big difficulties."

label: guilt
text: When I had to lie to my boyfriend so that he wouldn't suspect I'd bought him a xmas present as expensive as I had.

label: fear
text: Going home alone through the forest after a girl guide (scout ?) meeting.

label: joy
text: "When I recently managed to get my first consulting assignment ""myself"" i.e on my own initiative."

label: joy
text: On my birthday I got a present that I had desired for a long time.

label: shame
text: "Once in primary five, I had forgotten to take a book to class and the teacher punished me by asking me to stand at the back of the class.  I thought about the way my mother would react if she saw me being punished.  My mother was very good to me and though she did not see me punished, I felt sorry for her."

label: fear
text: A large german shepherd dog ran and barked at me (he didn't bite fortunately).

label: joy
text: When Wayne and Sue (close friends) were announced our guardians at ther wedding.

label: guilt
text: "When I got associated with a boy one year ago, I neglected my best friend. When the relation with this boy finished she behaved very easy-going towards me. I felt guilty then."

label: fear
text: My apartment has had three robberies in the last month. The guy upstairs just got robbed making it the fourth.

label: shame
text: When I got 1/2 out of 15 in Abnormal Psychology I felt ashamed.

label: joy
text: While dancing in a restaurant last week.

label: fear
text: I have a fobic anxiety for elevators. This anxiety is worst at the moment when the doors have to open. I have it often in the elevator at our university.

label: anger
text: "When my room-mate locked me out deliberately, before an exam due at 1400 hours."

label: joy
text: I'd just got the top mark in an exam.

label: disgust
text: Person talking about a situation while eating.

label: disgust
text: "When I heard of the assassination of the Indian prime-minister, Indira Gandhi."

label: guilt
text: When I realized that I had three more examinations to take.

label: joy
text: In summer when I was sailing with friends in Greece I felt joy.

label: anger
text: "A girl whom I trusted and with whom I had shared personal, confidential matters twisted the facts and told it to a common friend of ours.  When this common friend told me the version my friend had told her, I was angry."

label: guilt
text: "I did not go to the exercises, without any adequate reason."

label: sadness
text: "My father suddenly fell ill. He stayed for 3 months in the hospital: the last month on intensive care of the Academic Hospital, then he died."

label: guilt
text: "As the only person in my family into academics, I ought to have looked after my younger (and only) sister better, with respect to her education and life experiences."

label: sadness
text: When my dog died.

label: sadness
text: To buy a car and didn't like the business and the car.

label: anger
text: "I don't use to lie to my parets about what I do, and the two times that I felt anger were when they doubted me I said that I was going to the club, and they didn't believe me because the day before they had met me at FLIPERAMA. I had the wish to kill them."

label: fear
text: The day I encountered a queer mamba face to face in a chunk of leaves behind our house.

label: guilt
text: When my brother ran away from home and I thought it was because of my continously scolding him.

label: anger
text: My sister had promised to help me to do a translation from English into German. But the day I needed her she told me that she was busy - I was very angry.

label: sadness
text: My grandmother died suddenly last summer.

label: fear
text: Before an important examn.

label: fear
text: A neighbour's girl had disappeared and many people were looking for her.  Someone had gone to notify the police.  Something had certainly happened to her.

label: shame
text: Finding out that China is backward in science.

label: guilt
text: When I told my uncle a false story - that people had stolen the books from my room and I demanded money from him.  When he found out the truth I was in trouble.

label: guilt
text: "I cut a friend's hair in anger, without any consideration."

label: anger
text: "A friend visited and made comments that my house/garden were not as neat/tidy as in the past. I'd not seen her a year - She implied I'd gone to the pack (I'd only been working full time, and taking 3 University exams part time)."

label: joy
text: "At a party in which I met an interesting female. We enjoyed eachothers company, while slow dacing."

label: guilt
text: A girl dropped some stuff from her bag and when I tried to help her I realized that she had used me and I was made to look like a fool.

label: guilt
text: A sense of guilt I felt once when I couldn't defend the confidence my teacher had in me and thus discrediting him at a concert.

label: anger
text: I was supposed to meet my girlfriend at a pre-arranged place but it took me an hour to find her.

label: disgust
text: Being looked at by someone I do not like.

label: disgust
text: I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.

label: disgust
text: Hear people talking at my back.

label: disgust
text: When a girl that I liked didn't accept my curting.

label: guilt
text: "At my temporary job, I have to restrict  others' actions and make them obey me, and this very often gives me  a feeling of guilt.  I wish there could be some other way of acting."

label: sadness
text: When my flute-teacher was replaced by a new one.

label: disgust
text: "I was in a train when a woman started talking loudly and attracting everybody's attention.  The worst thing was that she was discussing something, about which she knew nothing, with another person."

label: anger
text: Something was stolen.

label: anger
text: The stories about the way my grandmother treated my mother.

label: fear
text: "When I was working in Delhi, I had gone alone to see the hostel where I would be residing."

label: shame
text: I feel this feeling at one and the same degree when I am not prepared to overcome certain obstacle in my life.

label: joy
text: When some friends of mine asked me to go camping with them for a fortnight.

label: anger
text: "I had a date with my girlfriend, the time and place had not been fixed.  I asked her to phone me an hour later as it was midnight and I did not want to disturb her family.  I waited several hours for her call, she did not call me that night."

label: guilt
text: "I borrowed a friend's books and forgot I had them, she asked for them back and I told her I didn't have them. I duly found and returned them."

label: shame
text: "I was watching T.V with my parents and some pornographic scenes came on, I felt uncomfortable and tried to distract my parents attention by talking to them."

label: guilt
text: "I was so excited once that I told my classmate that she was old, this hurt her and I felt guilty."

label: joy
text: My parents and brother came up over the weekend. We are a very close family. This was my first year away from home. They brought one jacko-lantern with a new design. That is the old joke that we have a great new design - it's always the same.

label: fear
text: "In a rather important exam, when they caught me red handed copying."

label: shame
text: I had a misunderstanding with my father and after some time I found that I had been wrong.

label: guilt
text: When my behaviour was immoral - thinking about sex.

label: joy
text: A friend of mine often had difficulties with her parents. Once she had a child she had a better relationship with them.

label: guilt
text: After closing the front door I realized that I had left the key inside the house. I felt even more guilty since it was not my own house but the house of people I hardly knew.

label: anger
text: I went out dancing and found my boyfriend kissing another girl.

label: shame
text: "I am left-handed. When I attended the first form, we learned to write with pens. I smeared everything I had written. All my friends had written well and wanted to know why the teacher was looking at my note-book. I was ashamed."

label: joy
text: I got a very good grade on one of my midterms a few weeks ago.

label: joy
text: When I got my B.A degree with first class.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a spider.

label: joy
text: Passed an exam by 2 points.

label: fear
text: It was the time when I was in no position to secure a Ist class in the M.Sc exam and this was likely to affect my career.

label: anger
text: "I heard friends grumbling at me in an adjoining room, although they had behaved in a friendly way when I was present."

label: sadness
text: Tonight in bed when I realised how bad my relationship with my friend was.

label: anger
text: "While playing indoor-hockey, there always is an older man who frequently and intentionally plays the ball out of the field. In my opinion this is very childish, because we play for fun only."

label: guilt
text: When I didn't bring my girlfriend home one night. Later she told me that a cardriver solicited her.

label: shame
text: "During a family reunion, they started talking about me wearing an ear-ring."

label: guilt
text: "I argued with my father on matters concerning marriage. Traditionally speaking, I was not supposed to, so I felt guilty of violating my traditions which I must hold in esteem."

label: joy
text: I felt happy when my mother gave birth to a son who is the last born in the family.

label: guilt
text: My younger sister was almost run over by a lorry.

label: anger
text: Once a friend had pushed me and I had fallen on to a window which then broke.  I was taken to tthe principal's office and he accused me of having broken the window.

label: sadness
text: "My nephew's mother just left one day (my brother and she were not married). My nephew, Anthony, was shaken. I was sad for him because a similar situation happened to me."

label: shame
text: "When I was 10 years old I stained our bench with a fountain-pen, I tried to twin the cushions, but then there were colour nuances. Then my mother catched me, she saw it and became very angry."

label: joy
text: When I found out that I had passed the last two exams by a margin of three marks.

label: fear
text: "My father was away from home and he did not come back when he was expected, he came back several hours later than expected."

label: joy
text: "A friend of mine that is abroad undertook recently an axam to enter on University in Dallas, and was approved."

label: guilt
text: "I ""snapped"" very abruptly at my mother when she said something silly and stupid, (in front of other people) she looked so defenceless & hurt & told them that I'm always doing that."

label: disgust
text: "I found a big, black spider near a bag of food."

label: anger
text: When I got into a bus I found that my wallet had been stolen. It was not a great loss from the monetary point of view but I lost some documents - identity papers.  As a result I had to spend several days in order to get a new one.  I will always remember all the work I had to do and the bad treatment I suffered because of the bureaucratic behaviour of the civil servant.  I had already had bad luck and they treated me like a criminal.   At one point of time I really wanted to quarrel with them.

label: sadness
text: When I received a letter telling me that my mother was very ill.

label: disgust
text: "A man whom I like, was drunk and tried to molest me."

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I passed the B.A with first class marks.

label: guilt
text: "My sister forgot to bring presents for my birthday, I was rude to her."

label: guilt
text: When I stole money from my mother and she asked me later if I was responsible.  I never admitted it.

label: anger
text: "When we still attended school, my brother and I usually went to see our aunt and to show her our term's report. She rewarded us with money. Although my reports were as good as my brother's, he got more money."

label: sadness
text: "In May 18th, 1984 my boyfriend went to the U.S.A. In December I was told he passed away. He had cancer of the Oesophagus."

label: fear
text: When I nearly caused a traffic accident with my car.

label: joy
text: When I got the positive result of my examination to achieve the Bachelor Degree in Plychology.

label: anger
text: "I had a discussion with my mother concerning my sister's divorce, we disagreed strongly."

label: sadness
text: "When I was younger I was very good in apparatus gymnastics. I always won in competitions, but once I was only at the fourth place."

label: guilt
text: One day I was chatting with children at home. Then I took a lump of soap and gave to one of them pretending that it was a sweet. I thought the child would realise that it was not. Unfortunately he did not and he put it in his mouth.

label: guilt
text: "When I do not put in the needed amount of hours of work or study for the day, I feel guilty and try to make up for the lost time."

label: sadness
text: I saw a friend of mine who had suffered a very heavy contusion after an accident.

label: sadness
text: "I suffer form a disease of my muscles. However, I cannot talk about it and my feelings, the consequence with my parents. They try to repress it."

label: joy
text: The moment I got the news that I had been selected for the U.G.C junior national research fellowship.  It was a dream come true.

label: joy
text: "A meeting with the family and the friends I felt dear and loved, sharing the gladness of being together at a birthday."

label: disgust
text: A very drunk person.

label: shame
text: Once my presentation was the worst among my classmates as I had not prepared it well and had not seen it as important.  My presentation was so confused that it clearly showed my poor preparation.

label: joy
text: I realized that a fellow member had grown spiritually.  I was the leader of a spiritual group and had prayed for him.  He did not want to burn the incense but his mother forced him to do it.  Finally his mother told him that he could discontinue if he got good results at school.

label: shame
text: My friend had many female friends and I thought that they were his lovers.  I would scold him but he did not accept my advice.  Later I learnt from his girlfriends that this was not true.  I felt ashamed at having misunderstood him.

label: sadness
text: "I was on my way back from the Inter Rail, on board the ferry from Stockholm when my father called me at 7 o'clock to tell me that my uncle had died and that I would be seeing him off on his final journey within four days."

label: guilt
text: Telling my parents that I did not get into a good university.

label: guilt
text: I dreamed that this girl and I were cuddling in bed when my girlfriend walked in. I really love my girlfriend so I felt guilty and sad. I know that this is a wierd example but the dream and the feeling was clear to me as if it had really happened.

label: shame
text: "I was at a children's camp abroad. The people (the leaders, my coevals) were very king to us. One night we smeared our foreign friends with tooth-paste while they were sleeping and then we roused the whole camp by our shouts. Later I was so sorry. I didn't utter a word for two days, then I went to apologize."

label: sadness
text: My parents told me that they do not like my friend.

label: guilt
text: "At my summer job, I was responsible for making various orders.  It was not me who had ordered some seasonal merchandise, but when much of it was left over and had to be thrown away in the Autumn, I felt partly responsible for the much too large order."

label: sadness
text: "I wanted to be pregnant and did not succeed, so I was depressed    at every menstruation."

label: fear
text: When I almost ran over a small boy who suddenly was in front of my car.

label: joy
text: Waking in morning (early morning) and having whole day to myself.

label: disgust
text: "We had friends to dinner and one of them threw a beer bottle in the air, and it bounced on an expensive table and damaged the table .The person did not apologise."

label: anger
text: I was in the library of medical psychology and walked into the wrong direction. A man who came out of a room threated me very denigrating and I became very angry in a resisting manner.

label: guilt
text: I spent all weekend with a friend instead of studying for my exams.

label: shame
text: I came home from a party rather drunk. I said things I would never have said normally. Next morning I was terribly ashamed about what I had said.

label: fear
text: "Climbing a mountain, I got stuck and realized I could get neither up nor down."

label: guilt
text: In a fit of temper I told things that were unjust and they greatly hurt my mother though she didn't show it.

label: anger
text: Receiving personal criticisms early in the morning.

label: joy
text: "When I realised that I was forgiven by the God who is there, when I realised how much God loves me and that my acceptance with him is not based on my performance - that he loves me unconditionally and showed that love in Christ who died because I do need forgiveness."

label: fear
text: After having taken an exam i feared having failed it.

label: sadness
text: "When I got into an argument with someone and was very abusive, but they were a close friend and I later regretted it."

label: guilt
text: "During an argument with my brother, I behaved rather intransigently, even cruelly, wishing to morally hurt the ""person"" opposed to me."

label: shame
text: "I was alone in the bus when I tripped and fell, and dropped all my papers."

label: shame
text: When five of my friends at the secondary school found out the bad things that I had been saying about them.

label: fear
text: "When I was told that my daughter, who is at a boarding school, was very ill and that they needed me there the same day."

label: joy
text: "I received a wedding invitation from an ex-flatmate, enclosed was a small note that overcame a lot of the differences that had arisen between us due to the circumstances in which she left the flat."

label: anger
text: "A drunken friend of mine was beating up another friend, who was also drunk."

label: anger
text: When somebody stole my brother's disco machine.

label: disgust
text: "My dog had been run over and died near the house.  We had to pick him up, cold and glassy eyed, to get rid of the corpse."

label: anger
text: My sister once stole my mother's money and made her very angry.  After this my mother would beat her up for unreasonable reasons.  One day my sister lent her book to a friend without telling my mother about it.  When my mother learnt this she beat her up and even threatened her with a pair of scissors.

label: sadness
text: We went to visit my mother at the residence.  She was crying and said that she was about to die.  I believed all her complaints and continously thought of the possibility of loosing her.

label: sadness
text: "I heard that a friend had died in an accident; group situation: suddenly a friend came in and said ""Have you already heard that...""; there was a terrible consternation, silence, then everybody shouted excitedly ""How could that happen...""."

label: disgust
text: When I heard that a woman of my community had aborted and got rid of the foetus by throwing it in the drain.

label: shame
text: In our flat the bath-tub is in the kitchen. At the beginning I had very intensive feelings of shame when I had a bath and people were in the kitchen.

label: sadness
text: Last night I did not do very well in one of the subjects.  Before the result was announced I feared that I would fail.  Finally I got a D and as the results of the other subjects were not all      good I felt a little sad.

label: guilt
text: When I beat up a stupid boy who was fond of cracking jokes on me.

label: guilt
text: Losing my temper with my spouse.

label: sadness
text: My living and working conditions at home were unbearable. We used to live in a three room flat together with two more families. The discords caused a change - one of the families moved out. The other family stayed with us but I drifted away from my fiancT. In fact we were two families in the flat. Then I found myself alone in the struggle for this life because my fiancT did not stay next to me my grief and sorrow took on large proportions. I wanted to commit suicide but instead I threw myself against the cause of the irritation.

label: sadness
text: When felt lonely about writing my family.

label: joy
text: My son passed grade 7 and was accepted for form I.

label: anger
text: "When I miss the train and I am late, and I have to wait half an hour for the next one."

label: shame
text: Forgetting an important appointment.

label: guilt
text: "I wasn't able to see my girlfriend on her birthday and because I was late arriving home from uni, I didn't phone her as arranged at a certain time (she rang in the meantime)."

label: joy
text: "I had been away from home for a long time and when I came home I was delighted.  It was wonderful to see familiar, dear people and I was rejoycing in advance.  I had been feeling very lonely."

label: shame
text: When I was a school girl and I copied at a class work.

label: disgust
text: "The teacher of one course gave me 10 questions with sub-questions going from a to e for each question.  She asked me to do all this in one and a half hours.  It involved a lot of describing and explaining and even though I knew all the answers, I could not finish the work."

label: guilt
text: "Doing something wrong at home, and then letting my (normally) more rampant brother take the blame."

label: fear
text: "In college, I started a discussion with the teacher referring to a question I posed. I felt very unsure and I was afraid to fail."

label: shame
text: "I look up to my Karate-teacher. When I came to a training lesson after I had not trained for one week, I was totally stiff. I was ashamed."

label: guilt
text: Falling in love with a close friend.

label: fear
text: When our school was raided by the pupils of the boys secondary school who beat us up.

label: sadness
text: My roommate's sister committed suicide.

label: sadness
text: When I found out that a person I went to school with had died in a car accident.

label: shame
text: I took my math midterm and got it back the following Wednesday in class. It was a totally low grade.

label: joy
text: "After attending a song contest proposed by a band called ""Chyne"" we (6 of us) waited for the members of the band to greet us in front of the stage.  We went out after a few minutes as it was time to close the hall.  We had been waiting at the entrance hall for ten minutes when three of the band members came out.  They were very excited to see us, one of them was so excited that he had tears in his eyes.  We felt very warm and close to each other.  They took us back into the hall and we talked freely.  We were together for about an hour and during this time we felt that they were very sincere."

label: anger
text: Made a statement that other people did not believe.

label: anger
text: Some people were sitting outside and saying things which were not really true.

label: disgust
text: "Observing someone in the cafeteria noisily gulping in his food, having extremely bad manners."

label: anger
text: When I had been obviously unjustly treated and had no possibility of elucidating this.

label: sadness
text: From the fact that my husband and I are not in good terms.

label: sadness
text: At the begining of a new course one is afraid of encountering problems one can not manage.  Thoughts revolve around failing the subject and the consequences it would have for the future.

label: joy
text: When my sister was born.

label: disgust
text: "When I saw a woman who had been run over by a train, just off Kafue.  The woman had been cut to bits, there was blood and        splinters of bone every where."

label: anger
text: When a close friend failed to live up to the expectations I had of him - thereby causing pain to his spouse. I believe that my anger was probably a reaction of fear that I wouldn't be able to live up to my own expectations.

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend decided to finish our relation.

label: joy
text: I can't give one description here. I often feel joyful when I have done things good in relation to other people especially when my friend says he loves me and I also tell him that I love him.

label: joy
text: My neighbour was not able to set his car in motion because it had snowed heavily. I helped him - he was thankful and invited me.

label: fear
text: "After having watched a crime show on the TV, I was about to take the dog for a walk. Then, suddenly, there was a man on the porch... (We live some distance away from other people)."

label: anger
text: When a friend wouldn't speak to me and wouldn't tell me why.

label: guilt
text: "When my father and I worked on the house just after he had recovered from illness, I was rather lazy.  This meant that he had to work hard and was not very well later."

label: anger
text: When I get home late my father scolds me and this makes me angry.

label: sadness
text: "After having been ill, when I was coming back to the hostel, I felt very sad leaving home."

label: joy
text: Having a good trip on a boat with good friends.

label: anger
text: When I see how people around me pass by certain unjustice because of indifference or cowardice.

label: disgust
text: "When I found a maggot in my food at the dinning hall, all the food had gone bad."

label: joy
text: "When I was a child, my beloved cat gave birth to four beautiful little kittens. Before she had them, she came up to me and I followed her out, then witnessed them being born."

label: disgust
text: I read about a monk who had been murdered and put into a barrel which was filled with blood of pigs.

label: anger
text: My brother accused me undeservedly before my parents. I was not guilty. He was misled by his wife.

label: disgust
text: When my husband told me about his pre-marital affairs.

label: disgust
text: A friend was assaulted by a young man on her way home.

label: joy
text: The time I qualified to enter secondary school.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died.

label: shame
text: "My grades. When my parents say, ""How are you doing at school, getting good grades ?"" I say, ""Great, just fine !"" Actually, I feel ashamed about myself."

label: anger
text: "We were starting a student project, and the teacher we talked to was very negative and not very helpful."

label: fear
text: "When I was cycling through the park late one night, two people jumped out of the woods and tried to stop me.  There were shouting something at the same time."

label: fear
text: While paddling in the river during a storm.  I feared drowning.

label: guilt
text: I offended a person who had done much for me and who had helped me for everything.

label: disgust
text: "I happened to see two boys fighting, one of them fell down and hurt his head.  The other one used this to spank the head of the "

label: fear
text: "As a child, one evening I had read a novel about ghosts and I had thus spent a sleepless night as I kept feeling that there were ghosts dancing around me."

label: disgust
text: When I failed the  grade 7 exams.

label: disgust
text: When I beat up my brother in order to control him and make him obey my parents orders.

label: fear
text: Walking in the dark by myself.

label: joy
text: "My 21st birthday celebration, when I cut the cake and received the presents."

label: shame
text: I was made a very sharp remark at a rehearsal.

label: shame
text: "Again, a quarrel had come up in our difficult relationship.  My life-partner threw all the books off the shelf.  I am sure that it disturbed our neighbours since this happened late in the night."

label: guilt
text: Against the will and without the approval of my parents I went for a few days to my boyfriend in Germany.

label: joy
text: Day I received my T.E. score and acceptance into my chosen course.

label: disgust
text: "I was disgusted at the behavior of these boys I work with in the scouting program. They showed a lack of interest, unrest, and at times just plain rude behavior."

label: fear
text: While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most difficult subject this year.

label: sadness
text: Hearing of the death of a friend who had been skiing.

label: anger
text: "When my aunt scolded me for something I was not responsible for.  A boy had come to our gate asking for me, my aunt went out to see him.  I had neither met nor known the boy."

label: joy
text: "I experienced joy at a friend's 22nd birthday party. We had good food, good liquid, good company, good music, and an overall warm atmosphere. The birthday girl and I communicate incredibly well. I felt very content, warm and inspired just talking with her giving her a neck massage."

label: anger
text: "When I tried to put up a tent some years ago, I was teased and hindered by my cousin."

label: fear
text: Almost had a bicycle accident.

label: disgust
text: When a boy whom I refused to be my lover told all his friends that I was his girl he has refused me because I was not faithful to him.

label: shame
text: When I have a plain appearance.

label: anger
text: Misunderstood by a close friend for the wrong reason.

label: sadness
text: My girlfriend gave me the mitten (left me).

label: guilt
text: "When I was in the fifth class the rating was done in our mark-books. I hadn't been examined yet but I had heard from my classmates about the scolding they had got at home. My first mark was in geography - good 4. I judged I had known for more than that and I put down ""very good"" for fear of being scolded. Naturally my parents guessed all about it. They rebuked me for what I had done."

label: joy
text: For the first time in my life telling someone I loved them.

label: shame
text: When I did something naughty and it lead to the embarrassment of my parents.

label: joy
text: When I saw that I had passed the university entrance exam.  It made me forget all my problems.

label: anger
text: Meddlesomeness of my mother about the way I live. She thinks I am to free in my behavior for instance when a boyfriend stays the night.

label: fear
text: "When I dream of anything terrifying I used to have fear for the rest of the day that the dream might come true e.g., being beaten (or eaten ?) by a snake."

label: shame
text: A mishap suffered on misinterpreting a girl's proposition.

label: guilt
text: My grandmother has been in a hospital for a week and I still haven't had time to see her.

label: sadness
text: When my studies are too demanding and I cannot cope with it.

label: sadness
text: I was very sad at hearing that my grandfather had passed away.

label: shame
text: One day in the TYBA class the teacher asked me a very simple question which I could not answer.  Finally the teacher himself gave us the answer and my friends started laughing at me as I had not been able to answer a simple question.  I knew the answer but feared that my response may be wrong.  All this made me feel ashamed of myself.

label: joy
text: Talking to a close friend.

label: fear
text: When there is danger nearby.

label: fear
text: I felt the above condition when I took my brother's bicycle to a market and unfortunately the bicycle was stolen and I didn't know how I could tell the owner about the stolen bicycle.

label: guilt
text: When I had a little accident with my boss'car.

label: shame
text: Being rude to somebody who was impolite to me.

label: fear
text: I felt very frightened when a robber broke into our house and threatened to shoot my father if he did not part with some money.  I was looking at the man with his hand on the trigger.

label: guilt
text: "I met my ex boyfriend by chance.  We separated a few months ago and I am now with a new boyfriend.  My ex boyfriend looked depressed, and I know I am not to be blamed."

label: joy
text: "When I got 21/30 points in an exam of statistics. The result was unexpected and it made me realize that statistics do not surpass my abilities, as I have sometimes thought."

label: disgust
text: When someone makes advances that one does not want.

label: fear
text: Doesn't apply.

label: anger
text: My father promised me a bicycle for my birthday. Just before my birthday he forgot he promised this to me.

label: joy
text: Before Christmas I got to know a girl but our relationshop could not consolidate before the holiday. Therefore it was a big surprise to get a carefully hand-made present from her. - Our relationship grew closer.

label: guilt
text: When I shot a bird in the head with a shotgun.

label: disgust
text: "When an employer of my younger sister (17 yrs) made a ""pass"" at her."

label: guilt
text: "I know that a certain person feels very lonely, and that she always looks forward to seeing me. However, often I am too busy to visit her, then I feel guilty."

label: guilt
text: I was keeping a friend's Library book which went overdue. My friend was charged for the delay in returning the book to the Library. I felt guilty when I realised I was responsible.

label: shame
text: "When I gave water to the plants of a friend. Then one plant fell over, and a little statue broke. I, of course, had to tell him everything."

label: joy
text: "When I was a student at the Institute doing my M.Phil degree, one of my professors called me before the convocation and told me ""You have got the gold-medal (first rank) in the university and tomorrow you will be on T.V""."

label: anger
text: "A person walking his dog allowed it to defecate on the footpath outside my house. Although it had happened before, this was the first time I had witnessed it. All the skills I had learnt from PY 263 were thrown out the window when his indifference to my protestation was obvious to me."

label: disgust
text: A friend unjustly put the blame on me to relieve his conscience and also spread lies for the same purpose.

label: guilt
text: At my Summer job a new caretaker had been employed who was my age  but I preferred going out for lunch with the accounts personnel rather than with him.

label: disgust
text: A sister broke a cup and when mother asked I was reported to have been responsible.

label: anger
text: "In a confrontation with a person, he provoked me several times till I reacted in an angry way.  Fortunately there were no disastrous consequences."

label: sadness
text: When I was accused of neglecting work for the wrong reasons.

label: joy
text: Always when I meet the person I love.

label: fear
text: I had gone to the hospital for my research and got late in reaching home.  I feared that when I reached home there would be a quarrel because of my being late.

label: shame
text: "I put on a lot of weight in a few months and every time I met someone I knew would avoid them, usually by hiding because my self image was low and I was ashamed of what I had done to myself."

label: guilt
text: When I shoplifted a pair of earrings from Coles and my Mum caught me with them in my bag.

label: joy
text: "I was in a restaurant with my boyfriend when I saw my best female friend after not seeing her for two weeks.  We rejoyced, hugged and had a long talk."

label: disgust
text: I witnessed a scene in which two women were abusing each other.

label: shame
text: When I was in the canteen of the United college I mistook a stranger for a classmate as I was not wearing my glasses.  I realized that I had made this mistake when I saw him again carefully.

label: sadness
text: Finding out I am not chosen for the English lectures.

label: shame
text: Finding out that the university police was afraid to stop the foreign students playing loud music (China's shame).

label: guilt
text: I failed to complete a working task within the agreed time.

label: joy
text: When I attended the concert of a pop singer.

label: joy
text: "Hearing that I had been successful in getting a position whereby my financial, physical, spiritual and emotional needs will be well catered for. This position fulfils a lot of my aims for the last five years of my life."

label: shame
text: "I remember when I was in Standard 6, I failed one of the terminal tests and I told my parents that I had passed but after they found out from the class teacher that I had failed, I was proved a liar."

label: fear
text: "Passing (by car) over a bridge where only one car could pass. There was a precipice on both sides, no protection grilles, and the bridge was completely muddled."

label: fear
text: "I and my cousin went to a filmshow at night. We went without making it known to my mother. While we were there at interval, I came across my mother just close to where we sat."

label: guilt
text: "I was on a visit to friends who have a baby. The baby was crying in another room, but soon it became quieter and it seemed that it would fall asleep. I went into the room where the baby was lying - and it started crying again."

label: shame
text: "When I was caught telling a white lie.  At that time, I was not allowed to stay outdoors after 8 p.m.  One day when I was late, I made up a story that our neighbour had invited me to his place, though I had actually forgotten about the time while playing with my pals."

label: shame
text: When my friends were rude to a girl.

label: disgust
text: "Normally my father never tells vulgar jokes, we do not speak about sexual things, too. But once he told such a vulgar joke, that I was really disgusted. He did not tell me, but some of his friends, but I was present."

label: guilt
text: Gave the wrong meal tickets to other people (my classmate).

label: anger
text: When someone took my writing materials yet I was to write Examinations in a few minutes.

label: sadness
text: My uncle died - I felt sad at the funeral.

label: anger
text: When my father failed to send me transport money after the closure of the school.

label: anger
text: "A whole crowd of us went to a folklore festival. The instructor of the cast where my boyfriend played was traveling with us. We decided to catch the train that leaved early in the morning because we had business on the following day. The instructor tried to get the upper hand and made us catch the train in spite of everything, all the time he made me angry."

label: disgust
text: "Viewing the nuclear war film ""Threads""."

label: fear
text: It was when I stepped on a python (snake) unknowingly while it was sleeping near a baobab tree.

label: disgust
text: "When a ""friend"" woke me up in the middle of a blessful sleep by knocking on the door.  Then he started calling me names and saying that he had heard that I had been talking behind his back, this was a lie and the guy was drunk to the core."

label: joy
text: "I had a quarrel with my fiancT. When he admitted his fault, everything was allright. It was then for the first time that he surprised me with coffee and cake and a bunch of flowers."

label: sadness
text: My grandfather's funeral.

label: guilt
text: I had told a person unpleasant things in a bad manner. He was very depressed and caused an accident.

label: disgust
text: Observation of people lost in the profit motive - i.e. business managers to their actions esp.

label: guilt
text: When something unpleasant happens to a friend or relative of yours and you are at the bottom of it.

label: disgust
text: "At hostel, my roommate was a very selfish person and would avoid doing anyhting that did not concern him.  A few of us prepared lunch together and had decided to share the work.  My roomate had promised to do the same but I had to wash the bowls everytime after dinner.  I tried to wait and thought that he would realize his fault.  I did not want to tell him to do the work as he is a university student and ought to have self-respect.  He disappointed me and so every time I saw him I tried to avoid him and did not want to keep any contact with him."

label: sadness
text: Saw a father beating up his small child.

label: joy
text: When I received my TE Score and my acceptance from University - it had been a goal since I left the bank a year earlier.

label: anger
text: I had a quarrel with my parents; I was convinced to be right.

label: fear
text: "When we had swimming instruction, we had to take a header from the springboard. I usually refused to do that, but at least I was forced to."

label: fear
text: "While he was drunk, my life partner tried to hit me.  I felt scared and fled to the bathroom."

label: disgust
text: When I was studying and someone disturbed me.

label: sadness
text: When the thing that made my friends and relatives sad happened to them.

label: shame
text: Caught cheating on a diet.

label: disgust
text: I found some worms in the food and I had obviously eaten some.

label: fear
text: I should have given a test lesson to get a job. I had no courage. I didn't make the test.

label: shame
text: My teacher asked me a question which I failed to answer and I was told to stay behind after the class and give the answer after studying it from a book.

label: anger
text: "I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter. However, for the third time in that week she arrived an hour too late."

label: shame
text: "At school I was bad in mathematics. Although my teacher had admonished me to do my homework, one day I had forgotten to do it. When my teacher noticed it, I blushed and was ashamed to be rebuked in front of the other pupils."

label: sadness
text: When I came back from my holidays.

label: fear
text: A close relative of mine died in a serious car accident.  I was one of the first two people to see the corpse and I had to do it.  Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time that I was seeing a corpse.

label: joy
text: "After waiting impatiently for the results of the form 5 examinations for almost a year, at last I received a letter of acceptance from the Senate of the university of Zambia telling me that I had made it to the first year course at UNZA."

label: anger
text: When I am made to do things in which I see no sense and I waste my time. Some time ago I had to participate in a sociological investigation and then I got really angry.

label: fear
text: "On a mountain tour, my girlfriend and I passed by an inn. Near the house there was a big dog which began to follow us. As my girlfriend is afraid of dogs, I had to draw his attention to me. He jumped towards my shoulders and wanted to play with me but I really did not like that."

label: sadness
text: "When my little brother passed away mysteriously, at least from what I was told about it."

label: fear
text: A reoccurring fear that something will happen to my relatives.

label: shame
text: "I tried after months to begin talking to my boyfriend again. He ignored me. I felt I had lowered my pride and became his ""doormat""."

label: fear
text: Practicing wind-surf my body was caught under the sail. On trying to get out my leg was caught in the lashing. I was afraid of dying by asphixia.

label: shame
text: Getting drunk and creating a lot of trouble at a place I respect - my friend's home.

label: joy
text: I passed successfully the preliminary exam for a participation in the children Assembly.

label: guilt
text: When I had drunk too much and nearly got an alcohol poisoning.

label: anger
text: "One day, I discussed a very important question with A.  A suddenly declared that he would not accept my position and thought that he himself was right.  Moreover, he attacked  strongly, not my opinion but me personally."

label: fear
text: One evening my father told me to go into the cellar and get him a beer. I was terribly frightened at the idea of a man sitting in the cellar and assaulting me. For my defence I took an empty bottle with me.

label: sadness
text: My best friend had a relatively severe illness.  I was sad because she was suffering.

label: shame
text: When I noticed that a person I found attractive had seen me picking my nose.

label: joy
text: When I met again a great friend and talked a little while with him. When I see again another I miss.

label: anger
text: "One morning I was standing at the bus-stop and the bus passed by without stopping, even though there were only 8-10 passengers inside.  I felt angry at the rude behaviour of the bus driver and  conductor."

label: joy
text: I felt it when I received a letter telling that I had been classified in a national concourse of p... I felt happy and vanity about it.

label: anger
text: A friend forgot his appointment with me.

label: shame
text: When I broke a tea saucer. I felt ashamed. This was during the birthday of my girlfriend.

label: sadness
text: "At end of school - function to ""celebrate"" ? Leaving friends who I'd known for up to 12 years."

label: disgust
text: One night I saw a man being knocked down by two other men. The victim was kicked against his head.

label: joy
text: When I was informed that I had been accepted as a student of Psychology.

label: anger
text: Saw my unfair report.

label: shame
text: On Christmas eve I went to a classmate's home with other classmates.  The next morning when I came out of the toilet she said something and I did not understand what she was saying.  When she pointed at my trousers I discovered that I had forgotten to zip them up.  I rushed back to the toilet but by the time the others had guessed what had happened.

label: fear
text: "When I was 20 years old, I fell severely ill and was bed-ridden for 6 months.  I felt very scared for my health and my studies."

label: disgust
text: "When I had to sleep in a bed at a hostel, which was full of dirt."

label: guilt
text: Being catched when stealing.

label: shame
text: "I do not have accomodation on the campus so I stay with my extended family, one young man used bad words while asking me to leave their home."

label: guilt
text: When I was caught sneaking back into the house at night after having  gone to a disco without permission.

label: fear
text: Got ill.

label: fear
text: "Afraid of getting alone without friends, without anybody."

label: guilt
text: We owned a shop and I used to serve in it occasionally. We sometimes took lollies out of the stand and Dad caught me one day.

label: guilt
text: At one time while at primary school I lost a pencil case of a friend and I didn't mention it to her until after a fortnight.

label: joy
text: When planning to marry.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted with a friend's behaviour when she got absolutely drunk so that she vomitted all over my house.

label: joy
text: A friend of mine suggested that I become a film extra.  The idea seemed very funny to me and my reaction seemed rather outlandish to the others.

label: disgust
text: "On a trip I passed by a cellulose factory. It was a fine day, beautiful landscape; I observed this factory with disgust."

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when once I made my mother angry.

label: disgust
text: "A friend and a girlfriend went to Rome for 10 days with their class. When they were back home I heard people tell ""strange"" stories about my friend and that girlfriend."

label: joy
text: I was given a gift by my sister. There were many pleasant things in this parcel.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a man who hadn't the lower .... in a car exhibition. He was passing a handkerchief from inside to outside of his mouth.

label: joy
text: "When I felt that an exam, which I had feared, was an easy one and went well."

label: sadness
text: Losing a boyfriend for the second time to my friend. He fell in love with her. The same thing happened a few months earlier with another boyfriend.

label: anger
text: Brother continually interupting while I was talking on the telephone.

label: shame
text: "When I hadn't learnt my lesson and I asked the teacher to give me ""a three"" and he agreed but even he felt quite awkward."

label: guilt
text: I lied to one of my best friends.

label: sadness
text: When I received the news that my beloved grandmother had died.  I was at the boarding school and was only 13 years old.

label: disgust
text: "This was when I saw, for the first time, a naked woman (prostitute) run away from a house after having been discovered by the guardian."

label: shame
text: When I forgot about a meeting at work.

label: fear
text: "A ""near-accident"" in a car, driving too fast on an icy road."

label: shame
text: When parents of a certain girl refused to let me marry their daughter because I was not fit to do so yet the girl accepted everything and later she followed what her parents insisted and she told me never to talk to her again.

label: anger
text: My roommate was rude to me.

label: disgust
text: "Was confronted with a person having negative thoughts of other people because of their social status, beliefs, color and outlook on life (perspective)."

label: joy
text: I went to a doctor with a complaint. The doctor told me that I was completely healthy.

label: anger
text: "I had a quarrel with my father, because I was of the opinion that he decided in an authoritarian way which TV program we should watch. I became very angry and started throwing things through the room."

label: joy
text: Hearing my girlfriend accept my offer of marriage.

label: sadness
text: When my team lost a championship.

label: anger
text: Came back from surfing to find car broken into and gear and money stolen.

label: joy
text: Our only elder sister got married and started having pains in her abdomen and she was told that she could not have children. To our suprise she had a baby 2 months back.

label: fear
text: "I was then in the 10th standard and was going to my native place.  The last bus had already left and so I started walking, it soon became quite dark.  The road was a village road and was deserted, I was not even sure if that was the right way.  I finally reached home at 10 P.M."

label: shame
text: Being unable to stop urinating on the bus.

label: disgust
text: "At school, when the only thing people my age could think of was getting rolling drunk. They couldn't have a good time without firstly getting drunk."

label: shame
text: "When I blamed my failure to the bias and favouritism in the        marking system, in fact I had not worked hard enough."

label: shame
text: When I went to a disco with a friend I started behaving badly embarrassing him without reason.

label: joy
text: When I first came to the campus.

label: joy
text: When I had my children.

label: guilt
text: "When I was very young, one day, I kicked my grandmother and caused her an injury which took a long time to heal."

label: sadness
text: Getting separated from my girlfriend.

label: disgust
text: The emotion came to me when a certain girl who was not polite to her mother hit her sister severely.

label: sadness
text: "When my grandfather died. When I heard about his death, I had a bad feeling in my stomach and I felt as if I had lost something very precious."

label: sadness
text: Father lost his temper at home because he was mistreated at work.

label: anger
text: A teacher at my former secondary school forced my darling to marry him.  The girl tried to refuse but her parents would not leave her alone.

label: shame
text: "I was working in a job in which I could not work quickly enough, and was told that my work was not up to standard."

label: sadness
text: I had a quarrell with my boyfriend and decided to finish with him and and my Easter holidays.

label: fear
text: I could not do the questions on my math midterm.

label: shame
text: I cried for 3 hours because I felt very miserable. Then I called my boyfriend and he said lovely things to me. After this feeling disappeared I felt ashamed.

label: disgust
text: "With my mouth full of bun, I drank directly from a packet of milk which turned out to be weeks old (completely separated).  It took a while for the milk to seep through the bun."

label: guilt
text: When I sided with my mother in a quarrel she had with my father before they briefly separated.

label: joy
text: "On our way to France, my girlfriend and I went to Verona. By chance we met an Italian couple - they gave us two tickets for the dress-rehearsal of ""Aida"". It was a different world for us full of fascination. After the representation we ate a phantastic pizza in a restaurant near the ""Arena""."

label: fear
text: "It was when I dreamt that I had encountered Satan, he wanted to grab me and take me to his kingdom.  He was very repulsive and I have never seen anything like that before."

label: anger
text: Punished by a leader.

label: shame
text: When I failed the twelveth standard exams I was ashamed at having to see my parents later.

label: anger
text: "My grandmother is a highly authoritative person, who lives alone, is independent, but doesn't know to live without commanding the others. I hate this!"

label: shame
text: A girl I was with yelled something out to this group of guys I knew. It sounded really childish.

label: fear
text: Afraid of a dead body.

label: disgust
text: A man was unfair to a girlfriend of mine.

label: shame
text: Talking to friends about how old you are and we cannot be as successful as you at your age.

label: anger
text: When I got caught in the pouring rain last Thursday and did not have a raincoat on me.

label: fear
text: Movement in bush late at night while camping.

label: guilt
text: A friend of mine had the sleeves of a leather coat stolen from his car.  It was me who had left them there for everyone to see.

label: shame
text: I had a test in the class and I had not adequately prepared myself. I didn't fare so well on the exam and I felt bad about it.

label: guilt
text: Forgot to turn up on prescribed day for jury service.

label: shame
text: I was unaware that I had walked the streets in torn trousers.

label: fear
text: "One evening, while going to meet a friend of mine, I had to cross a meadow by a dark road.  There were bushes on the other side of the road.  The weather was damp and a bit foggy.  I heard steps behind me and kept speeding up my steps all the time."

label: disgust
text: A person that eat half of a cockroach in a cake without knowing it.

label: anger
text: I read in the newspaper that the Student Lodging Fund was going to build new appartments for refugees (in my opinion this is the state's affair).  This is when only a fractoin of the students can find an appartment.

label: sadness
text: "When my grandfather whom I had met only once for 3 weeks, died after several months. I was really sad because he was a lovely person and I did not have the means for his company."

label: fear
text: When I was 12 years old I frequently was pursued by others and got sound thrashes.

label: anger
text: "We hitch hiked our way back from a town rather drunk.  We were dropped in another town which was unknown to us.  I needed to urinate, so I did it on a wall which turned out to belong to the military headquarters.  They arrested me and made me pay a fine of 500 pts.  We had to go home on foot (6 km) since it was too late for anyone to give us a lift."

label: joy
text: When my older sister told us that she was thinking of joining the rest of the family for the winter sports holiday.

label: anger
text: "At a restaurant I observed how the gypsies tried to get money by cheating the foreigners i.e non Swedish speaking.  My anger had nothing to do with hatred against foreigners, but it was an expression of the anger I feel when I see people being used ."

label: fear
text: Because of a conflict with my parents there was a possibility to interrupt my studies.

label: fear
text: "A gang of screaming and drunk youths ""captured"" a tram."

label: fear
text: Walking through campus at night a squirrel jumped in front of me.

label: joy
text: When I got to know that I had passed the university entrance exam.  I thought that I had done one of the exams badly.

label: joy
text: A quarrel was followed by the decision of leaving a person close to me. Several days later my regret was great. I was beside myself. Quite unexpectedly he came and the conflict was calmly solved. I was glad at the possibility to be with him.

label: shame
text: When people next to me play the fool.

label: fear
text: My best frieend left school recently.  The next day the weather turned bad suddenly and the male class-mates turned off the lights.  I remained on the table and was scared.

label: shame
text: At school - being whipped by the teacher in front of the class.

label: sadness
text: "The breaking up of a relationship.  We decided that the relationship could not carry on, so it was no surprise to me. And anyhow, I had known it would happen sooner or later."

label: joy
text: "Unexpected visit by a close friend, whom I hadn't seen for half a year."

label: anger
text: A chief was unjustly punished on an autumn brigade and the one who was really guilty kept silent. I stepped in front and told the truth. The guilty chief called me in after the roll-call and threatened me.

label: guilt
text: I ate 12 biscuits one night after tea while watching TV - I don't know why.

label: shame
text: I lost my driver's licence because of speeding.

label: shame
text: Cheating in a minor geography exam at school.

label: joy
text: After a long time I saw my boy-friend again.

label: sadness
text: When I was told that my uncle had passed away.

label: disgust
text: Finding out my grades at the end of my Sophomore year.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted with the hypocrisy of my colleagues from the group.

label: disgust
text: Disgust at a girl I know for continually feeling sorry for herself and never acting positively to do something about her problems.

label: shame
text: "I feel guilty as I am not working, and even my studies are not progressing."

label: guilt
text: To force someone to do something that suits me.

label: joy
text: Passed the last exam.

label: anger
text: I felt angry when my mother-in-law did not handle my daughter properly and she fell down from the bed and hurt her head.

label: fear
text: "On embarking on University life. I came from a different city and did not know anybody at the Uni. I was frightened because my well known and loved friends, also all my security had been taken away."

label: joy
text: After having considered it for hours I was able to overcome my scruples and to call a friend with whom I had fallen in love. I realized that my decision was right - and was very glad.

label: guilt
text: "My baby sister was 2-3 months old and when I was trying to get her on my back, she slipped and fell."

label: sadness
text: "When I feel lonely, perhaps because I have to study a lot and I am shut up in my appartment.  Nothing happens in particular because there is no time for anything else."

label: joy
