text: Celebrations on the graduation day with the orchestra playing in the garden ( I am a part of this orchestra).

label: fear
text: When I entered the dissection room for the first time and was exposed to preserved dead human bodies.

label: joy
text: "When my lover and I felt like we had gone full circle. And our relationship was new, fresh, vital etc. once again."

label: anger
text: "This also happened when I was very small.  I was beaten up by my  mother for no fault of mine, I had just beaten up my younger brother for what I thought was his fault.  I was very angry with my mother."

label: disgust
text: A drunk man had fallen in the street and he was shouting obscene words.

label: fear
text: "At the dentist's, waiting for my turn to come."

label: disgust
text: When I found my girl in bed with another man.

label: fear
text: I had an important amount of money with me and felt fear of being assaulted.

label: fear
text: "I was attacked, standing in a doorway, by a pack of 5 dogs, alsatians and farm dogs with my escape route blocked by a shut fence."

label: disgust
text: I feel disgusted since I am unable to cope with all the wordly affairs as I spend much precious time to pursue my hobby and to be admist the people I love and long to be with.

label: disgust
text: "When I was travelling to school by bus, I went past a place where a sewer had been repaired.  There was a bad strong smell which suffocated me and I wanted to leave the place immediately."

label: shame
text: When friends found out that I had been lying about where I had been on a particular occasion.

label: shame
text: "When I asked my classmate to teach me to do my homework, he asked me to study by myself first but I did not do it.  When he asked me  if I had studied, I felt very ashamed. "

label: guilt
text: A neighbour complained about smoke from my backyard incinerator entering his house after a change of wind direction. I lit the fire after originally checking that the wind would not blow the smoke in that direction.

label: joy
text: "When the results of the part I exams came out I felt tremendous joy in my heart.  The results came out after a long period of worry and anxiety, so it gave me endless relief and joy."

label: fear
text: "Recently my younger brother disappeared for two days without leaving a trace. Usually he tells me when he wants to do something like that, therefore I was afraid that something had happened to him."

label: guilt
text: Not giving up something for Lent.

label: sadness
text: When I got separated from my first love.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I mislead a person into thinking he was a close friend when that person was more of a casual acquaintance.

label: fear
text: Staying alone in the room after midnight and reading horror stories.

label: sadness
text: When I got divorced from my husband after ten years of marriage.

label: shame
text: When I stole a packet of cigarettes from a neighbour  and the next day I owned up and returned it.

label: fear
text: I was so sick that my relatives thought that I was bewitched.  I felt like dying.

label: anger
text: "A friend had promised to get me a book which was very important for my work, but she forgot it."

label: disgust
text: "I saw a septic, smelling wound."

label: guilt
text: When I moved away from home.

label: disgust
text: With the N.Z. Rugby Union wanting to send the All Blacks to South Africa.

label: guilt
text: I feel guilty when I should have done something at any rate but I haven't done it.

label: anger
text: I loved a person and he went away. It wasn't necessary that he left me to reach his goals.

label: sadness
text: When we were on holidays my girl-friend had to leave me after 4 weeks and I had to stay in Turkey for some more weeks because I had a job there.

label: anger
text: I remember that when I was in school I saw a case of partiality - one of the teachers gave private coaching classes to some girls and she would give these girls extra attention in class and would ignore the others.

label: sadness
text: "When I was in Bombay one of my good friends was getting married and he had not informed me about it, this made me sad."

label: anger
text: People not cueing in the dining hall.

label: disgust
text: When I first saw the state of a cafeteria in the grounds of the university. Due to students own lack of concern for the environment in which they eat and drink. Rubbish and spilled tea and coffee left everywhere.

label: disgust
text: "I realised that someone was insidiously attempting to shit me off I was disgusted with him for doing so, because I afforded him with no excuse to do so."

label: disgust
text: "It was at a comsomol(??) meeting, the last one because we were to graduate. The way one of my fellow-students behaved made me feel disgusted."

label: disgust
text: "Students on campus were unnecessarily creating trouble just to heckle the authorities - not to achieve something concrete, but to further their own interest."

label: fear
text: "The day that there was a black-out in the city, and I was in an exposition, I felt fear that something more serious was happening, like a revolution for example."

label: guilt
text: I was sitting in a restaurant with friends and I knew that in the meantime my girl-friend must have come to my flat and found the door closed.

label: fear
text: "I was fearful when I realised that the relish was overcooked simply because I was not keen enough at checking whether there was still enough water in the relish or not, instead I was just playing with my friends."

label: guilt
text: "When I have forgotten to warn somebody for something, or when I have forgotten to bring something I have been asked for."

label: shame
text: Felt it after I spoke terribly (got mad at) the person who is the most important in my life.

label: anger
text: "When my neighbours accused my brother of stealing their rose-bush, I was very angry as he had not touched it at all."

label: joy
text: "When I passed the driving test already on the first try, although I felt more and more uncertain as the day came near."

label: joy
text: Finished a difficult midterm.

label: disgust
text: Saw a dirty street.

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgust with the alcohol, after I happened to see a young man, who was dead to the world and who wallowed on the pavement. This ""sight"" I watched from the bus."

label: guilt
text: Did not do what I promised to do for a friend.

label: guilt
text: "When my friend needed my help very much and I, at that moment, made an end to our relationship."

label: anger
text: "When I came back to my hostel, my bed was full of newspapers and dirty clothes.  My room-mate asked me to wash the clothes for him as he had no time (this was his responsibility).  The food we shared had been eaten up by him (I ate little)."

label: sadness
text: "I had to give up my love, because it did not work out well."

label: guilt
text: "I was alone at home when I broke a figure and then mended it.  A few days later my mother noticed it and asked me about it, I told her that I had no idea."

label: disgust
text: When people manipulate others through appearing better than what they really are.

label: sadness
text: I was very sad when I heard that my Auntie had passed away.

label: sadness
text: When I failed two subjects last year.

label: anger
text: Having a fight with a class mate.

label: disgust
text: A wurm dropped on my head.

label: joy
text: When I found out I got accepted to Berkeley.

label: joy
text: I felt glad when I took the rather difficult organic chemistry examination.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted about a teacher who had rejected all that was human in her. She refused to accept the flowers we gave her for the eighth of March and asked for a foreign parfume instead.

label: disgust
text: "Disgust for a person who treated me badly, and has treated other people similarly - including lying, hiding facts, being deceitful, unfair, etc."

label: anger
text: I received a poor grade on a midterm even though I got all the right answers and knew the material. I went to the TA to try to raise my grade and he wouldn't do it.

label: sadness
text: Not getting the reference paper.

label: fear
text: Fear of sexual overtures from a close relative in the family.

label: guilt
text: When I made an excuse to get out of participating in an important family occasion that I should not have missed.

label: joy
text: "Went to a movie with a date, walked on the beach (in Alameda) spent some time afterwards in her apt."

label: anger
text: The outrageous conduct of a relative towards me and those close to me.(blaming us and lying)

label: disgust
text: "I was returning from the Universtity at night when I was accosted by a boy who molested me, passing his hands on my body."

label: disgust
text: I feel disgust towards those who are responsible for the death of others.

label: shame
text: "During an informal discussion I contributed a lot even though I had not spent much time studying.  Whenever someone said that someone was not paying attention, or that he had too many other things to do, or that the persoon was not trying his best, I would feel ashamed."

label: guilt
text: Our class had organized a picnic in November.  I was the class representative so I became the organizor.  However the picnic was postponed by one week and I had something else to do then. Initially I did not ponder on what to do and decided to go for the picnic.  When I had the time to think about it I thought that my decision was wrong.  My classmates thought that I would go as I had signed my name but I did not go.  I told another class representative that I was not going but he did not know the reason behind my not going.  After the picnic my classmates asked me why I had not gone to the picnic and everytime someone mentioned it I was apologetic.  I should have decided right in the begining that I would not go and then they would not see me as irresponsible i.e promising to go and changing my mind afterwards.

label: anger
text: I felt anger against a person who told bad things about me in my absence.

label: sadness
text: "The elections of 1982 and 1985.  The thought of what a social democrat and communist majority could achieve, especially ""worker share"" funds and its extension."

label: anger
text: When the university withdrew the accomodation that it had given me.

label: shame
text: When my boy-friend left me and I wanted to persuade him to stay.

label: disgust
text: Some people not cueing in the dining hall.

label: disgust
text: "On a trip to Santander a child sitting beside me fell ill and started to vomit, seeing this made me feel very bad."

label: shame
text: "When I was tired and unmotivated, I shouted at my girlfriend and and brought up negative sides of her character which are actually not so important."

label: disgust
text: "One of my flatmates and I came back to the flat Monday morning, to find a real Mess, left by the guy we share with."

label: fear
text: Staying alone in a dark place.

label: anger
text: I had gone home for a week-end and when I came back I found that my clothes and my bedding had been stolen.

label: joy
text: When I unexpectedly received birthday greetings from a person I like.

label: guilt
text: After moving out of my apt. I took all the furniture and dishes and everything. It was mine but I took it all just to spite my roomies. We had a few (a lot) of disagreements. I felt guilt for moving out for the bad reasons.

label: shame
text: Cannot remember such a situation.

label: joy
text: "When I passsed the M.S.C board exams with first class, which I had not expected."

label: joy
text: My father stayed abroad for one year. He does not like to write letters because he makes ortographic mistakes. I never had a good relation to him. He wrote me a letter in which he said that he loved me.

label: fear
text: "Climbing a mountain where the rocks were very loose. When we realized the danger, we were very high up, but still had a long climb ahead."

label: sadness
text: My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my room while my father explained that the way she saw things was not correct. I had done things with the best intentions.

label: anger
text: "When someone tried to rape one of my best friends and he claimed it was her fault. He the hassled her, claimed she was loose, and threatened to sue her."

label: sadness
text: "At our Senior dinner - separated from school friends, nothing will ever be the same again."

label: shame
text: Some times I was ashamed of presenting seminaries or even to speak in class.

label: shame
text: I had reacted angrily at a friend for no fault of his.  I had raised my voice and had not cared for his opinion.

label: anger
text: Overhear people talking about me and saying that I am stupid.

label: joy
text: When I knew that my husband and I were going to have a child.

label: sadness
text: I experienced this emotion when my friend committed suicide after we had spent the afternoon playing and discussing life and it's problems.

label: disgust
text: "I was sitting in school, waiting for my sister to go home. Suddenly a boy put fire in a paper and threw it were I was sitting. The paper didn't get me, but I felt terribly disgusted at this cowardliness and irresponsibility that caused a great discussion. We went to the director and he, drunk as always, said that I was ... attention in school. I felt disgust of this situation, and of the persons implicated in it."

label: anger
text: "My little niece, who is very talkative, suddenly became very naughty and began wetting her pants.  She did it one afternoon."

label: shame
text: As a kid my mother caught me stealing sugar and giving it to a neighbour.

label: anger
text: One of my colleagues accused me of having stolen his iron and I was sure that I had done no such thing.

label: sadness
text: "After I had lived with my boyfriend in a foreign country for half a year, I saw that it was impossible for me to stay with him (for economic reasons). We separated although I loved him."

label: sadness
text: It was when I failed standard 8 exams while all my friends passed and went to secondary school. In class I was always getting more marks than they did.

label: anger
text: "I live by myself and a few weeks ago was woke by a man on the end of my bed coming up my bed at me. I was really angry, told him to get out. He was surprised, hesitated; I started to move towards him and he backed off - kept telling him - loudly, but firmly to go. Because I'd got the initiative, I succeeded. A very powerful message."

label: anger
text: That a friend had been badly beaten and stabbed many times and the person that did it got away without any punishment from the law.

label: anger
text: When I was the target of a great many insults and completely unfair accusations of a large group of people.

label: fear
text: Before an examn.

label: anger
text: "I suffered from a gynaecological illness. I was quite displeased to hear that my roommates had talked about it and they had misrepresented the truth. I felt deeply hurt when I learned that it was done by a ""good"" acquaintance of mine."

label: guilt
text: "When I lied to my mum, who later came to know that what I had been teling her was false."

label: sadness
text: When I got separated from the woman I loved.

label: joy
text: "When the bank let me borrow some money this winter, after my grant was spent."

label: disgust
text: "I felt disgust with a lady teacher who used to nag, to mock, to interrupt everyone of my fellow students each time we had a class with her in our first year."

label: disgust
text: "Next door nieghbour ran over his cat in driveway, he tried to finish it off with a flat shovel. I would have taken cat to veterinary to either kill humanely or cure."

label: shame
text: "I had called a boy who had dated me, and told him that I was ill, while, actually, I didn't want to go out with him, later on, he asked me if I was feeling better, then I felt ashamed."

label: anger
text: I had studied for almost one week for my physics-examination. With difficulty I passed the examn. I was angry about the teacher and also about myself because I had not remembered enough during the examn and because the time that I spent studying was wasted.

label: disgust
text: When I was younger I often saw my father come home drunk (he had big problems at that time). Once he woke me up in the middle of the night and shouted at me.

label: sadness
text: "I could not meet my love, after having waited for a month, due to illness."

label: joy
text: When I was told that I had passed the exams.

label: disgust
text: "One day I was in the countryside with several friends, and we began to eat figs, after we were all full we noticed that all the figs were full of worms."

label: guilt
text: "A close friend of mine was leaving for graduate school out of state. I had arranged to gather some people together the day before he left to be with him and have a good time, but I didn't pay as much attention to him as I should have."

label: anger
text: "When, after drinking a glass of water, I found a cockroach walking out of the glass."

label: anger
text: "When my brother got very low marks in the exams, I was very angry. I put my studies aside to help him, as every time my brother does  badly at school, my family members blame me as well."

label: fear
text: When I was going to take the practical exams.

label: joy
text: "When I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me too."

label: disgust
text: When a dog is left whining outside a shop.

label: guilt
text: When I acted in a negative way at a certain moment by laziness to concede a moment of the time I thought to be my own.

label: guilt
text: "When I decided to move away from my parent's home, my mother told me that it was as if a part of her had been torn out of her."

label: disgust
text: There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

label: guilt
text: I was the reason behind the break-up of my friend's relationship with his girlfriend.  She finished with him.

label: anger
text: I was angry when I watched a ski-race. All the Austrian skiers dropped out.

label: fear
text: When we got lost in Florence and the coach did not turn up until midnight.  I had no place to go to and there were strange reports at the police station.

label: joy
text: "Last night I had a chat with a fellow student.  I had known her for about half a year, and for the first time we were speaking ""the same language""- meaning an inspiring discussion and encounter."

label: sadness
text: At my grandfather's death.

label: disgust
text: When I heard that my sister had shouted at my friend's cousin at their place.

label: joy
text: I passed my MCE Examination. at first I was worried but when I heard my name I had joy in my heart and I arranged for a trip to attend a wedding ceremony.

label: fear
text: Before the examn.

label: anger
text: "Unfair and unjust attitude toward a person close to me, what I was the witness of, caused anger in me."

label: sadness
text: "My father won't be so pleased with me as if I was elected ""Three Good""."

label: anger
text: "Too many people in TV room, I was not able to get a seat to watch TV."

label: fear
text: Motor failure on a boat outside Gottenburg when we were in heavy  seas and the wind was strong.  As we could not steer the boat we drifted towards the rocks.  We did not succeed in attracting the attention of any passerby until 4 hours had elapsed.

label: shame
text: We got into a fight with some chaps in front of our family house. The value of the property destroyed was approximately 15 000 FIM. I felt ashamed when my parents came to know about this.

label: fear
text: "When I was going home for my holiday, I almost drowned in the Zambezi river."

label: fear
text: When going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.

label: fear
text: "I was watching a procession during the Holy week, and a penitent approached me."

label: joy
text: I was emotionally happy when I was in love with the girl I had longed for.

label: fear
text: "When I was 7-8 years old, I woke up one night and found myself alone at home.  My mother had gone out to buy cigarattes from a machine."

label: guilt
text: "Once, when I arrived home very late, my parents had an argument because of this; my mother wanted to stand up for me."

label: disgust
text: My roommate's lack of consideration of me.

label: anger
text: Once a person in authority (school teacher) was telling blatant lies about me and the headmistress would not let me defend myself. She was also telling lies about other members of my family.

label: anger
text: I had too much homework and examinations and I did not know how to organize my work.

label: fear
text: I was given a wristwatch by my first girl and after two days another girl of mine also gave me a wristwatch.

label: sadness
text: My old teacher in primary school died.

label: fear
text: "One evening I was watching the news on TV. Again they were talking about the danger of war. Suddenly I imagined what it might mean for me, for my friends, for the people close to me. I felt it a very near and possible event."

label: disgust
text: When I was studying in the library a pair of lovers were sitting next to me talking in an intense and soft voice.  They were disturbing others.

label: disgust
text: It was when I read a newspaper article on the future and they foresaw that we would be eating frog-burgers by the year 2000.  An illustration showed a frog between two pieces of bread.

label: sadness
text: When I lost my grandmother.  She had been my guardian after the death of my father.

label: disgust
text: "A friend had a quarrel with the mother of her boyfriend because she and her friend decided to go and live together. She needed money for removal, then she made a great effort to reconcile."

label: joy
text: I felt very happy when I won the football pools.

label: disgust
text: "When some friends and I get acquainted a guy during vacations I thought he was disgusted and ""a friend"" of mine for whom I feel a little disgust wanted to stay with him."

label: joy
text: When I received the best actor award at the inter-college drama competition.  It gave me tremendous joy and satisfaction which lasted for several days.

label: anger
text: When someone took my pen away.

label: anger
text: When my mother kept me in leading-strings.

label: anger
text: When I was mistreated by my step-mother.

label: anger
text: "About a month ago the Regional Council refused to pay my wife the due maternity benefit, because of bureaucratic reasons."

label: joy
text: "An ex-colleague asked me if I was interested in working in their accounts bureau.  They needed ""clever people"" and he had ""immediately thought of me."""

label: disgust
text: "Coming home one night - my sister was home, and had been drinking heavily and started picking arguments."

label: disgust
text: When I realized that my closest friend had said bad things about me when I was not around and had betrayed me by making friends with my boyfriend's other girl.

label: anger
text: When present boyfriend's mother approached my parents and self - to leave her son alone - as she did not want me for a future daughter-in-law.

label: shame
text: "My girlfriend had started going around with another boy.  Her cousin, also a friend of mine, asked her as to who she preferred.  Both of us were present and she chose the other guy."

label: fear
text: Upon reading a story on a serial killer by the name of Henry Lee Lucas who has been given the distinction of killing more people that any other man. I began to wonder if I should take more care for my safety.

label: disgust
text: When my father revealed inconsistent morals.

label: fear
text: When my mother was robbed in a shop.

label: joy
text: "When a girl I wanted very much, said ""yes"" and fell in love with  me."

label: guilt
text: Many years back I quarrelled with my younger brother for a small reason.  I used a pole to beat him and nearly broke his arm.  He recovered after a treatment which lasted several months.  After this our relationship was worse and he would not listen to me.

label: joy
text: When I got my drivers licence.

label: joy
text: When I obtained good marks in a subject I had failed before.

label: joy
text: When I was at the end-of-term party last week and had fun - was happy and sang and drank only soft drinks.  It is possible to have a good time without alcohol.

label: anger
text: "When my father addressed me directly and maliciously, thus including me in the ""family war""."

label: shame
text: Once I had torn a few pages off a library book and I felt ashamed at this.

label: disgust
text: "While watching the movie called ""Deer hunter"" on TV, when it showed how prisoners were treated."

label: fear
text: "My mother, my sister and I were sitting in the sitting room and watching a film on TV. My father came home drunk and told us to turn off. When we did not do that he switched off the fuse and started shouting. We were sitting in the dark and I was afraid that he would do us a harm."

label: joy
text: "When a study tour got confirmed, I was happy all the time till    the tour began."

label: disgust
text: On seeing a scene of an accident in a magazine.

label: disgust
text: When I witnessed an accident.

label: joy
text: When I had my four children.

label: shame
text: Failing in the English language exam.

label: shame
text: My father who is very quiet discovered I was going out with a coloured boy. He called me names and was really upset.

label: joy
text: My old friend visited me in the university.

label: shame
text: "I had to go to the doctor's because of a veneral disease. I told the doctor that I must have been infected by my boy-friend. This was not true, but I was ashamed to tell the truth."

label: disgust
text: "When my friend, after a beer spree vomitted in my sitting room."

label: fear
text: It was last week on Saturday night when I was at Mchesi. I feared to cross the Lilongwe River Bridge to come back to School due to darkness - until somebody had to escort me.

label: sadness
text: Death of the family dog.

label: fear
text: Alone in the house (late 8pm) I heard noises. Sounded like someone was trying to get in our back door.

label: fear
text: "When I could not find my 2 year old daughter.  I ran and looked for her everywhere and could not find her.  (I finally found her, she had gone to bed to sleep)"

label: joy
text: When I won my car.

label: anger
text: Meeting generally dominating persons in social occasions.

label: fear
text: Someone attacked me with a knife.

label: shame
text: I bacame involved with a boy for a very brief moment not because I liked him but because I needed some sort of company. The consequences weren't as I expected and caused me much shame.

label: disgust
text: "When I was taking my girlfriend out, she seemed to have taken her time."

label: shame
text: It was my father's birthday party when I was asked to bring a tray of tea and other drinks.

label: guilt
text: Having told a certain lie.

label: disgust
text: "In the evening, while I was watching TV, my little brother came in and started eating food he had brought from the kitchen while I was trying to concentrate on the program."

label: shame
text: After a party in which I made love with a boy in public. Later on I heard that others were talking about me and called me a slut.

label: sadness
text: When my sister died in a fire accident at home.

label: sadness
text: Always when I get separated from my friends and relatives from my home town.

label: sadness
text: A very close friend left me.

label: anger
text: I get angry with my brothers and sisters when they do something that I do not like.  They know this and still do it so as to tease me.

label: shame
text: I was walking one day and I met a man who wanted to ask me about my brother but I didn't stop to hear what he was saying. I was ashamed when I found him at home and he told my brother what had happened.

label: anger
text: "At the hardware store, trying to convert Imperial to Metric measurements, I made a mistake, and didn't buy enough tiles for the bathroom. I was angry at myself, because I hope to be a Maths teacher."

label: guilt
text: "Inventing a fictitious series of events, as a result of which I ended up in a conflict with my two closest friends."

label: guilt
text: Being disloyal with persons I loved.

label: fear
text: Waiting for the results of the High level examination.  I was afraid of not being accepted.

label: sadness
text: "When I had to move away from home to study, and I knew that I would not be coming back home for a long time."

label: disgust
text: "On a camp - boys and girls in one cabin. One guy forced himself upon another girl and was having intercourse, while the girl in the bunk beneath was pretending to be asleep and not be ill."

label: sadness
text: My sister won a scholarship to Norway and it was particularly as she walked across the tarmac to get on the plane and she looked back at us.

label: anger
text: When I heard that my girlfriend was talking behind my back and looking down on me.

label: sadness
text: When I was left alone one week-end without being prepared for it.

label: anger
text: My trouser's zipper was open when I was at a public wedding.

label: sadness
text: Not getting a job.

label: guilt
text: My girlfriend and I agreed to go to the cinema. However I completely forgot our appointment. I remembered it two hours too late when I went to visit her.

label: guilt
text: "I was on a concert-tour and therefor seperated from my boy-friend. But I needed warmth which was given by a male member of the orchestra. My feelings towards him were not very deep, but his feelings were. I felt guilty when he said ""I am not a radiator"".

label: joy
text: Meeting an old friend from high school.

label: guilt
text: A few days back my mother was not feeling too well and still did all the house work.  I felt guilty as I had not offered to help.

label: sadness
text: When I lost my father in a car accident.

label: guilt
text: I was looking after a child and she fell down because I was not paying her much attention.  One side of her face got bruised.

label: fear
text: Risk of being involved in a fight after a party.

label: joy
text: When I received some good news : I obtained an amount of money I needed to buy something I had been planning to buy.

label: joy
text: When I was appointed to position of trust in a group set up to change the working environment.

label: joy
text: When i was asked to be a child's godmother.

label: sadness
text: "A sudden doubt made me run for a long time in a rainy autumn night. When I reached the intended place I saw my beloved in another man's arms. A sudden blow, grief, I cannot qualify it, it is painful for me to remember about it."
